original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam
śrīgaṇeśāyanamaḥ /
analyzed: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ

original: śrīlakṣmīnṛsiṃhāya namaḥ /
analyzed: śrī lakṣmī nṛsiṃhāya namaḥ

original: śrīdattātreyāya namaḥ /
analyzed: śrī dattātreyāya namaḥ

original: śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ /
analyzed: śrī vedavyāsāya namaḥ

original: śrīhayagrīvāya namaḥ /
analyzed: śrī hayagrīvāya namaḥ

original: atha gāruḍe brahmakāṇḍastṛtīya ārabhyate /
analyzed: atha gāruḍe brahmakāṇḍaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ārabhyate

original: oṃ mallānāmaśanirnṛṇāṃ naravaraḥ strīṇāṃ smaro mūrtimān gopānāṃ svajano 'satāṃ kṣitibhṛtāṃ śāstā svapitroḥ śiśuḥ /
analyzed: om mallānām aśaniḥ nṛṇām nara varaḥ strīṇām smaraḥ mūrtimān gopānām sva jano satām kṣitibhṛtām śāstā sva pitroḥ śiśuḥ

original: mṛtyurbhojapatervidhātṛvihita stattvaṃ paraṃ yogināṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ ca patiḥ sadaiva śuśubhe raṅge 'cyutaḥ sāgrajaḥ // GarP_3,1.1 //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ bhoja pateḥ vidhātṛ vihitaḥ stattvam param yoginām vṛṣṇīnām ca patiḥ sadā eva śuśubhe raṅge cyutaḥ sāgrajaḥ

original: namo nārāyaṇāyeti tasmai vai mūlarūpiṇe /
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti tasmai vai mūla rūpiṇe

original: namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathāmimām // GarP_3,1.2 //
analyzed: namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi nārāyaṇa kathām imām

original: śaunakādyā mahātmāno hyṛṣayo brahmavādinaḥ /
analyzed: śaunaka ādyāḥ mahātmānaḥ hi ṛṣayaḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: naimiṣākhye mahāpuṇye tapastepurmahattaram // GarP_3,1.3 //
analyzed: naimiṣa ākhye mahā puṇye tapaḥ tepuḥ mahattaram

original: jitendriyā jitāhārāḥ saṃtaḥ satyaparāyaṇāḥ /
analyzed: jita indriyāḥ jita āhārāḥ saṃtaḥ satya parāyaṇāḥ

original: yajantaḥ parayā bhaktyā viṣṇumādyaṃ jagadgurum // GarP_3,1.4 //
analyzed: yajantaḥ parayā bhaktyā viṣṇum ādyam jagadgurum

original: gṛṇantaḥ paramaṃ brahma jagaccakṣurmahaujasaḥ /
analyzed: gṛṇantaḥ paramam brahma jagaccakṣuḥ mahā ojasaḥ

original: sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñāstepurnaimiṣa kānane // GarP_3,1.5 //
analyzed: sarva śāstra artha tattva jñāḥ tepuḥ naimiṣa kānane

original: yajñairyajñapatiṃ kecijjñānairjñānātmakaṃ param /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ yajñapatim kecid jñānaiḥ jñāna ātmakam param

original: kecitparamayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇamapūjayan // GarP_3,1.6 //
analyzed: kecid paramayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇam apūjayan

original: ekadā tu mahātmānaḥ samājaṃ cakruruttamāḥ /
analyzed: ekadā tu mahātmānaḥ samājam cakruḥ uttamāḥ

original: dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāmupāyaṃ jñātumicchavaḥ // GarP_3,1.7 //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām upāyam jñātum icchavaḥ

original: ṣadviṃśatisahasrāṇi munīnāmūrdhvaretasām /
analyzed: ṣadviṃśati sahasrāṇi munīnām ūrdhvaretasām

original: teṣāṃ śiṣyapraśiṣyāṇāṃ saṃkhyā vaktuṃ na śaṅkyate // GarP_3,1.8 //
analyzed: teṣām śiṣya praśiṣyāṇām saṃkhyā vaktum na śaṅkyate

original: munayo bhāvitātmāno militāste mahojasaḥ /
analyzed: munayaḥ bhāvitātmānaḥ militāḥ te mahā ojasaḥ

original: lokānugrahakartāro vītarāgā vimatsarāḥ // GarP_3,1.9 //
analyzed: loka anugraha kartāraḥ vīta rāgāḥ vimatsarāḥ

original: kathaṃ harau manuṣyāṇāṃ bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: katham harau manuṣyāṇām bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇī

original: kena sidhyettu sakalaṃ karma trividhamātmanaḥ // GarP_3,1.10 //
analyzed: kena sidhyet tu sakalam karma trividham ātmanaḥ

original: ityevaṃ praṣṭumātmānamudyatānprekṣya śaunakaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam praṣṭum ātmānam udyatān prekṣya śaunakaḥ

original: sāṃja lirvākyamāha sma vinayāvanataḥ sudhīḥ // GarP_3,1.11 //
analyzed: sa aṃja liḥ vākyam āha sma vinaya avanataḥ sudhīḥ

original: śaunaka uvāca /
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: āste siddhāśrame puṇye sūtaḥ paurāṇikottamaḥ /
analyzed: āste siddhāśrame puṇye sūtaḥ paurāṇika uttamaḥ

original: sa etadakhilaṃ vetti vyāsaśiṣyo yatīśvaraḥ // GarP_3,1.12 //
analyzed: saḥ etat akhilam vetti vyāsa śiṣyaḥ yati īśvaraḥ

original: tasmāttameva pṛcchāma ityevaṃ śaunako muniḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tam eva pṛcchāmaḥ iti evam śaunakaḥ muniḥ

original: atha te ṛṣayo jagmuḥ puṇyaṃ siddhāśramaṃ tataḥ // GarP_3,1.13 //
analyzed: atha te ṛṣayaḥ jagmuḥ puṇyam siddhāśramam tatas

original: papracchuste sukhāsīnaṃ naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ /
analyzed: papracchuḥ te sukha āsīnam naimiṣa araṇya vāsinaḥ

original: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: vayaṃ tvatithayaḥ prāptāstvātitheyosi suvrata // GarP_3,1.14 //
analyzed: vayam tu atithayaḥ prāptāḥ tu ātitheyī asi suvrata

original: snānadānopacāreṇa pūjayitvā yathāvidhi /
analyzed: snāna dāna upacāreṇa pūjayitvā yathāvidhi

original: kena viṣṇuḥ prasannaḥ syātsa kathaṃ pūjyate naraiḥ // GarP_3,1.15 //
analyzed: kena viṣṇuḥ prasannaḥ syāt sa katham pūjyate naraiḥ

original: muktisādhanabhūtaṃ ca brūhi tattvavinirṇayam /
analyzed: mukti sādhana bhūtam ca brūhi tattva vinirṇayam

original: sūta uvāca /
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇudhvamṛṣyaḥ sarve hariṃ tattvavinirṇayam // GarP_3,1.16 //
analyzed: śṛṇudhvam ṛṣyaḥ sarve harim tattva vinirṇayam

original: natvā viṣṇuṃ śriyaṃ vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ śeṣasaṃjñakam /
analyzed: natvā viṣṇum śriyam vāyum bhāratīm śeṣa saṃjñakam

original: dvaipāyanaṃ guruṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāmati // GarP_3,1.17 //
analyzed: dvaipāyanam gurum kṛṣṇam pravakṣyāmi yathāmati

original: nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: na asti nārāyaṇa samam na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati

original: etena satyavākyena sarvārthānsādhayāmyaham // GarP_3,1.18 //
analyzed: etena satya vākyena sarva arthān sādhayāmi aham

original: śaunaka uvāca /
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: kimarthaṃ namanaṃ viṣṇorgranthādau munisattama /
analyzed: kimartham namanam viṣṇoḥ grantha ādau muni sattama

original: kartavyaṃ brūhi me brahmankṛpayā mama suvrata // GarP_3,1.19 //
analyzed: kartavyam brūhi me brahman kṛpayā mama suvrata

original: tataḥ śriyaṃ tato vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ ca tataḥ param /
analyzed: tatas śriyam tatas vāyum bhāratīm ca tatas param

original: ante vyāsaṃ kimarthaṃ ca tvaṃ namaskṛtavānasi /
analyzed: ante vyāsam kimartham ca tvam namaskṛtavān asi

original: sūtasūta mahābhāga brūhi kāraṇamatra ca // GarP_3,1.20 //
analyzed: sūta sūta mahābhāga brūhi kāraṇam atra ca

original: sūta uvāca /
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ādau vandyaḥ sarvavedaikavedyo vede śāstre setihāse purāṇe /
analyzed: ādau vandyaḥ sarva veda eka vedyaḥ vede śāstre sa itihāse purāṇe

original: sattāṃ prāyo viṣṇurevaika eva prakāśate 'to namya eko harirhi // GarP_3,1.21 //
analyzed: sattām prāyas viṣṇuḥ evā ekaḥ eva prakāśate namyaḥ ekaḥ hariḥ hi

original: sarvatra mukhyastvadhikonyatopi sa eva namyo na ca śaṅkarādyāḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra mukhyaḥ tu adhikaḥ nyatas api saḥ eva namyaḥ na ca śaṅkara ādyāḥ

original: namanti ye 'vinayācchaṅkaraṃ tu vināyakaṃ caṇḍikāṃ reṇukāṃ ca // GarP_3,1.22 //
analyzed: namanti ye vinayāt śaṅkaram tu vināyakam caṇḍikām reṇukām ca

original: tathā sūryaṃ bhairavaṃ mātāraśva tathā vāṇīṃ girijāṃ vai śriyaṃ ca /
analyzed: tathā sūryam bhairavam tathā vāṇīm girijām vai śriyam ca

original: sarvepi te vaiṣṇavā naiva loke na tadbhaktā veti cāryā vadanti // GarP_3,1.23 //
analyzed: sarve api te vaiṣṇavāḥ nā eva loke na tad bhaktāḥ vā iti ca āryāḥ vadanti

original: na pārthikyānnamanaṃ kāryameva prīṇanti naitā devatāḥ pūjanena /
analyzed: na pārthikyāt namanam kāryam eva prīṇanti na etāḥ devatāḥ pūjanena

original: pūjāṃ gṛhītvā devatāścaiva sarvāḥ kiñciddatvā phaladānena tāṃśca // GarP_3,1.24 //
analyzed: pūjām gṛhītvā devatāḥ ca eva sarvāḥ kiñcid datvā phala dānena tān ca

original: saṃtarpya tuṣṭaiḥ svamanonu sārāttaiḥ kāritāṃ kāmyapūjāṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: saṃtarpya tuṣṭaiḥ sva manaḥ nu sārāt taiḥ kāritām kāmya pūjām tathā eva

original: nivedayitvā paradevatāyāṃ viṣṇau harau śrīpuruṣādivandye // GarP_3,1.25 //
analyzed: nivedayitvā para devatāyām viṣṇau harau śrī puruṣa ādi vandye

original: ihāparatrāpi sukhetarāṇi dāsyanti paścādadharaṃ vai tamaśca /
analyzed: iha aparatra api sukhetarāṇi dāsyanti paścāt adharam vai tamaḥ ca

original: ato hyete naiva pūjyā na namyā mokṣecchubhirbrāhmaṇādyairdvijendra // GarP_3,1.26 //
analyzed: atas hi ete nā eva pūjyāḥ na namyāḥ mokṣa icchubhiḥ brāhmaṇa ādyaiḥ dvijendra

original: tathaiva sarvāśramibhiśca nityaṃ mahāvipattāvapi vipravaryāḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva sarva āśramibhiḥ ca nityam mahā vipattau api vipra varyāḥ

original: śrīkāmya yā ye tu bhajanti nityaṃ śrībrahmarudredrayamādidevān // GarP_3,1.27 //
analyzed: śrī kāmya yāḥ ye tu bhajanti nityam śrī brahma rudra idra yama ādi devān

original: iheva bhuñjanti mahacca duḥ khaṃ mahāpadaḥ kuṣṭhabhagandarādīn /
analyzed: iha iva bhuñjanti mahat ca duḥ kham mahā padaḥ kuṣṭha bhagaṃdara ādīn

original: namanti ye 'vaiṣṇavānbrahmarudravāyu pratīkānnaiva te viṣṇubhaktāḥ // GarP_3,1.28 //
analyzed: namanti ye vaiṣṇavān brahma rudra vāyu pratīkān na eva te viṣṇu bhaktāḥ

original: abhiprāyaṃ tvatra vakṣye munīndrāḥ paraṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ hi taddhi /
analyzed: abhiprāyam tu atra vakṣye muni indrāḥ param gopyam hṛdi dhāryam hi tat hi

original: vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ pūjyameveha viprā na brahmarudrādipratīkameva // GarP_3,1.29 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ pratīkam pūjyam eva iha viprāḥ na brahma rudra ādi pratīkam eva

original: pūjākāle devadevasya viṣṇorvāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yogyabhāge nidhāya /
analyzed: pūjā kāle devadevasya viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ pratīkam yogya bhāge nidhāya

original: antargataṃ tasya vāyorhariṃ ca lakṣmīpatiṃ pūjayitvā hi samyak // GarP_3,1.30 //
analyzed: antargatam tasya vāyoḥ harim ca lakṣmīpatim pūjayitvā hi samyak

original: paścādvāyoḥ supratīkaṃ ca samyaṅ nirmālyaśeṣeṇa hareḥ samarcayet /
analyzed: paścāt vāyoḥ supratīkam ca samyak nirmālya śeṣeṇa hareḥ samarcayet

original: pṛthakca sragdhūpavilepanādipūjāṃ prakurvanti ca ye vimūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,1.31 //
analyzed: pṛthak ca sraj dhūpa vilepana ādi pūjām prakurvanti ca ye vimūḍhaḥ

original: teṣāṃ duḥ khamiha loke paratra bhaviṣyate nātra vicāryamasti /
analyzed: teṣām duḥ kham iha loke paratra bhaviṣyate na atra vicāryam asti

original: prāyaścittaṃ svasti viprāḥ kathañcittatkurvantu smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ // GarP_3,1.32 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam svasti viprāḥ kathañcid tat kurvantu smaraṇam nāma viṣṇoḥ

original: pāṣaṇḍarudrādikasaṃ pratiṣṭhitānharervāyoḥ śaṅkarasya pratīkān /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitān hareḥ vāyoḥ śaṅkarasya pratīkān

original: namanti ye phalabuddhyā vibhūḍhāsteṣāṃ phalaṃ śāśvataṃ duḥ khameva // GarP_3,1.33 //
analyzed: namanti ye phala buddhyā vibhūḍhāḥ teṣām phalam śāśvatam duḥ kham eva

original: vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yadi vipravaryaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ cennamanaṃ hi kāryam /
analyzed: vāyoḥ pratīkam yadi vipra varyaiḥ pratiṣṭhitam ced namanam hi kāryam

original: naivedyaśeṣeṇa hareśca viṣṇoḥ pūjā kṛtā cenna hi doṣaleśaḥ // GarP_3,1.34 //
analyzed: naivedya śeṣeṇa hareḥ ca viṣṇoḥ pūjā kṛtā ced na hi doṣa leśaḥ

original: gururhi mukhyo hanumajjanirmahānrāmāṅghribhakto hanumānsadaiva /
analyzed: guruḥ hi mukhyaḥ hanumat janiḥ mahān rāma aṅghri bhaktaḥ hanumān sadā eva

original: evaṃ viditvā paramaṃ hariṃ ca putraṃ punarmukhyadevasya vāyoḥ // GarP_3,1.35 //
analyzed: evam viditvā paramam harim ca putram punar mukhya devasya vāyoḥ

original: namaskāro nānyathā vipravaryā ādhīyatāṃ hṛdi sarvai rahasyamam /
analyzed: namaskāraḥ na anyathā vipra varyāḥ ādhīyatām hṛdi sarvaiḥ rahasyamam

original: ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇa vadāsabhṛtyāḥ sarvepi te sarvadā viṣṇumeva // GarP_3,1.36 /
analyzed: ye vaiṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇa va dāsa bhṛtyāḥ sarve api te sarvadā viṣṇum eva

original: namanti ye vai pratipādayanti tathaiva puṇyāni ca sāttvikāni /
analyzed: namanti ye vai pratipādayanti tathā eva puṇyāni ca sāttvikāni

original: namanti ye vāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca samyak svaśaktyā pratipādayanti // GarP_3,1.37 //
analyzed: namanti ye vāsudevam harim ca samyak sva śaktyā pratipādayanti

original: pravṛttimārgeṇa na pūjayanti hyāpatkāle paradaivaṃ tadanyam /
analyzed: pravṛtti mārgeṇa na pūjayanti hi āpad kāle para daivam tad anyam

original: te vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsabhṛtyā anye ca sarve 'vaiṣṇavamātrakāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,1.38 //
analyzed: te vaiṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇava dāsa bhṛtyāḥ anye ca sarve vaiṣṇava mātrakāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: upakramairupasaṃhārasya liṅgairhariṃ guruṃ hyantareṇaiva yānti /
analyzed: upakramaiḥ upasaṃhārasya liṅgaiḥ harim gurum hi antareṇa eva yānti

original: tānevāhuḥ satpurāṇāni viprāḥ kalau yuge nābhyasūyanti sarve // GarP_3,1.39 //
analyzed: tān eva āhuḥ sat purāṇāni viprāḥ kalau yuge na abhyasūyanti sarve

original: yato hitānye pratipādayanti pravṛttidharmānsvasvavarṇānurūpān /
analyzed: yatas hitāni ye pratipādayanti pravṛtti dharmān sva sva varṇa anurūpān

original: ato hyasūyanti sadā vimūḍhāḥ kalau hi viprāḥ pracurā hi tepi // GarP_3,1.40 //
analyzed: atas hi asūyanti sadā vimūḍhāḥ kalau hi viprāḥ pracurāḥ hi te pi

original: na cāsti viṣṇoḥ sadṛśaṃ ca daivataṃ na cāsti vāyoḥ sadṛśo guruśca /
analyzed: na ca asti viṣṇoḥ sadṛśam ca daivatam na ca asti vāyoḥ sadṛśaḥ guruḥ ca

original: na cāsti tīrthaṃ sadṛśaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ na viṣṇubhaktena samosti bhaktaḥ // GarP_3,1.41 //
analyzed: na ca asti tīrtham sadṛśam viṣṇupadyāḥ na viṣṇu bhaktena samaḥ asti bhaktaḥ

original: anyāni viṣṇoḥ pratipādakāni sarvāṇi te sāttvikānīti cāhuḥ /
analyzed: anyāni viṣṇoḥ pratipādakāni sarvāṇi te sāttvikāni iti ca āhuḥ

original: śrāvyāṇi tānyeva manuṣyaloke śrāvyāṇi nānyāni ca duḥ khadāni // GarP_3,1.42 //
analyzed: śrāvyāṇi tāni eva manuṣya loke śrāvyāṇi na anyāni ca duḥ kha dāni

original: kalau yuge sarva purāṇamadhye trīṇyeva mukhyāni haripriyāṇi /
analyzed: kalau yuge sarva purāṇa madhye trīṇi eva mukhyāni hari priyāṇi

original: mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ hi kalau nṛṇāṃ ca śreyaskaraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam // GarP_3,1.43 //
analyzed: mukhyam purāṇam hi kalau nṛṇām ca śreyaskaram bhāgavatam purāṇam

original: pūrvaṃ hi sṛṣṭiḥ pratipādyate tra yato hyato bhāgavataṃ paraṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: pūrvam hi sṛṣṭiḥ pratipādyate yatas hi atas bhāgavatam param smṛtam

original: yasminpurāṇe kathayanti sṛṣṭiṃ hyādau viṣṇorbrahmarudrādikānām // GarP_3,1.44 //
analyzed: yasmin purāṇe kathayanti sṛṣṭim hi ādau viṣṇoḥ brahma rudra ādikānām

original: nānārthamevaṃ kathayanti vipra nīcoccarūpaṃ jñānamāhurmahāntaḥ /
analyzed: nānā artham evam kathayanti vipra nīca ucca rūpam jñānam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: tenaiva siddhaṃ pravadanti sarvaṃ hyataḥ paraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam // GarP_3,1.45 //
analyzed: tena eva siddham pravadanti sarvam hi atas param bhāgavatam purāṇam

original: tataḥ paraṃ viṣṇupurāṇamāhustataḥ paraṃ gāruḍasaṃjñakaṃ ca /
analyzed: tatas param viṣṇupurāṇam āhuḥ tatas param gāruḍa saṃjñakam ca

original: trīṇyeva mukhyā ni kalau nṛṇāṃ tu tathā viśeṣo gāruḍe kiñcidasti // GarP_3,1.46 //
analyzed: trīṇi eva mukhyā kalau nṛṇām tu tathā viśeṣaḥ gāruḍe kiñcid asti

original: śṛṇudhvaṃ vai taṃ viśeṣaṃ ca viprāstryaṃśairyuktaṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ purāṇam /
analyzed: śṛṇudhvam vai tam viśeṣam ca viprāḥ tri aṃśaiḥ yuktam gāruḍa ākhyam purāṇam

original: ādyāṃśaṃ vai karmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti dvitīyāṃśaṃ dharmakāṇḍaṃ tamāhuḥ // GarP_3,1.47 //
analyzed: ādya aṃśam vai karmakāṇḍam vadanti dvitīya aṃśam dharmakāṇḍam tam āhuḥ

original: tṛtīyāṃśaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti teṣāṃ madhye tvantimoyaṃ variṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśam brahmakāṇḍam vadanti teṣām madhye variṣṭhaḥ

original: tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇātpuṇyamāhustulyaṃ puṇyaṃ bhāgavatasya viprāḥ // GarP_3,1.48 //
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśa śravaṇāt puṇyam āhuḥ tulyam puṇyam bhāgavatasya viprāḥ

original: tṛtīyāṃśe paṭhite vedatulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavennātra vicāryamasti /
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśe paṭhite veda tulyam phalam bhavet na atra vicāryam asti

original: tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇādeva viprāḥ phalaṃ proktaṃ paṭhatopyarthamevam // GarP_3,1.49 //
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśa śravaṇāt eva viprāḥ phalam proktam paṭhataḥ api artham evam

original: tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇādarthataśca puṇyaṃ cāhuḥ paṭhato vai daśāṃśam /
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśa śravaṇāt arthataḥ ca puṇyam ca āhuḥ paṭhataḥ vai daśa aṃśam

original: tato varaṃ matsyapurāṇamāhustato varaṃ kūrmapūrāṇamāhuḥ // GarP_3,1.50 //
analyzed: tatas varam matsyapurāṇam āhuḥ tatas varam kūrmapūrāṇam āhuḥ

original: tathaiva vai vāyupurāṇamāhustrīṇyeva cāhuḥ sāttvikānīti loke /
analyzed: tathā eva vai vāyupurāṇam āhuḥ trīṇi eva ca āhuḥ sāttvikāni iti loke

original: tatrāpi kiñcidveditavyaṃ bhavecca purāṇaṣaṭke sattvarūpe munīndrāḥ // GarP_3,1.51 //
analyzed: tatra api kiñcid veditavyam bhavet ca purāṇa ṣaṭke sattva rūpe muni indrāḥ

original: sattvādhame mātsyakaurme tathāhurvāyu cāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ madhyamaṃ ca /
analyzed: sattva adhame mātsya kaurme tathā āhuḥ vāyu ca āhuḥ sāttvikam madhyamam ca

original: viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sattvottamaṃ gāruḍaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,1.52 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ purāṇam bhāgavatam purāṇam sattva uttamam gāruḍam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: skāndaṃ pādmaṃ vāmanaṃ vai varāhaṃ tathāgreyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ parvasṛṣṭau /
analyzed: skāndam pādmam vāmanam vai varāham tathā āgreyam bhaviṣyam parva sṛṣṭau

original: etānyāhū rājasānīti viprāstatraikadeśaḥ sāttvikastāmasaśca // GarP_3,1.53 //
analyzed: etāni āhuḥ rājasāni iti viprāḥ tatra eka deśaḥ sāttvikaḥ tāmasaḥ ca

original: rajaḥ prācuryādrājasānīti ca huḥ śrāvyāṇi naitāni mumukṣubhiḥ sadā /
analyzed: rajaḥ prācuryāt rājasāni iti ca huḥ śrāvyāṇi nā etāni mumukṣubhiḥ sadā

original: teṣāṃ madhye sāttvikāṃśāśca saṃti teṣāṃ śrutergāruḍīyaṃ phalaṃ ca // GarP_3,1.54 //
analyzed: teṣām madhye sāttvika aṃśāḥ ca saṃti teṣām śruteḥ gāruḍīyam phalam ca

original: brahmāṇḍalaiṅgye brahmavaivartakaṃ vai mārkaṃṇḍeyaṃ brāhmamādityakaṃ ca /
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa laiṅgye brahmavaivartakam vai mārkaṃṇḍeyam brāhmam ādityakam ca

original: etānyā hustāmasānīti viprāstatraikadeśaḥ sāttviko rājasaśca // GarP_3,1.55 //
analyzed: etāni ā huḥ tāmasāni iti viprāḥ tatra eka deśaḥ sāttvikaḥ rājasaḥ ca

original: śrāvyāṇi naitāni manuṣyaloke tattvecchubhistāmasānītyato hi /
analyzed: śrāvyāṇi nā etāni manuṣya loke tattva icchubhiḥ tāmasāni iti atas hi

original: teṣu sthitāḥ sāttvikāṃśā munīndrāsteṣāṃ śrutirgāruḍaikāṅghritulyā // GarP_3,1.56 //
analyzed: teṣu sthitāḥ sāttvika aṃśāḥ muni indrāḥ teṣām śrutiḥ gāruḍa eka aṅghri tulyā

original: alpānyupapurāṇāni vadantyaṣṭādaśāni ca /
analyzed: alpāni upapurāṇāni vadanti aṣṭādaśāni ca

original: viṣṇudharmotaraṃ caiva tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tathā // GarP_3,1.57 //
analyzed: ca eva tantram bhāgavatam tathā

original: tattvasāraṃ nārasiṃhaṃ vāyuproktaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: tattva sāram nārasiṃham vāyu proktam tathā eva ca

original: tathā haṃsapurāṇaṃ ca ṣaḍetāni munīśvarāḥ // GarP_3,1.58 //
analyzed: tathā haṃsapurāṇam ca ṣaḍ etāni muni īśvarāḥ

original: sāttvikānyeva jānīdhvaṃ prāyaśo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sāttvikāni eva jānīdhvam prāyaśas na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ śravaṇādeva gāruḍārdhaphalaṃ śrutam // GarP_3,1.59 //
analyzed: eteṣām śravaṇāt eva gāruḍa ardha phalam śrutam

original: bhaviṣyottaranāmānaṃ bṛhannāradameva ca /
analyzed: bhaviṣya uttara nāmānam bṛhat nāradam eva ca

original: yamanāradasaṃvādaṃ laghunāradameva ca // GarP_3,1.60 //
analyzed: yama nārada saṃvādam laghu nāradam eva ca

original: vināyakapurāṇaṃ ca bṛhadbrahmāṇḍameva ca /
analyzed: vināyaka purāṇam ca bṛhat brahmāṇḍam eva ca

original: etāni rājasānyāhuḥ śravaṇādbhuktaruttamā // GarP_3,1.61 //
analyzed: etāni rājasāni āhuḥ śravaṇāt bhuktaḥ uttamā

original: gāruḍātpādatulyaṃ ca phalaṃ cāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: gāruḍāt pāda tulyam ca phalam ca āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ śaivaṃ nandiproktaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_3,1.62 //
analyzed: purāṇam bhāgavatam śaivam nandi proktam tathā eva ca

original: pāśupatyaṃ raiṇukaṃ ca bhairavaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
analyzed: pāśupatyam raiṇukam ca bhairavam ca tathā eva ca

original: etāni tāmasānyāhurharitattvārthavedinaḥ // GarP_3,1.63 //
analyzed: etāni tāmasāni āhuḥ hari tattva artha vedinaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ śravaṇādviprāgāruḍāṅghyardhmeva ca /
analyzed: eteṣām ca

original: sarveṣvapi purāṇeṣu śreṣṭhaṃ bhāgavataṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,1.64 //
analyzed: sarveṣu api purāṇeṣu śreṣṭham bhāgavatam smṛtam

original: vedaistulya sama pāṭhe śravaṇe ca tadardhakam /
analyzed: vedaiḥ tulya sama pāṭhe śravaṇe ca tad ardhakam

original: arthataḥ śravaṇe cāsya puṇyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,1.65 //
analyzed: arthataḥ śravaṇe ca asya puṇyam daśaguṇam smṛtam

original: vaktuḥ syāddviguṇaṃ puṇyaṃ vyākhyātuśca tathādhikam /
analyzed: vaktuḥ syāt dviguṇam puṇyam vyākhyātuḥ ca tathā adhikam

original: anantavedaiḥsāmyamāhurmahāntaḥ bhārānmahattvādbhāratasyāpi viprāḥ // GarP_3,1.66 //
analyzed: ananta vedaiḥ sāmyam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ bhārāt mahat tvāt bhāratasya api viprāḥ

original: vedobhyosya tvarthataścādhikatvaṃ vadanti bai viṣṇurahasyavedinaḥ // GarP_3,1.67 //
analyzed: vedobhyaḥ asya tu arthataḥ ca adhika tvam vadanti bai viṣṇu rahasya vedinaḥ

original: tatra śreṣṭhāṃ gītikāmāhurāryāstathaiva viṣṇornāmasāhasraka ca /
analyzed: tatra śreṣṭhām gītikām āhuḥ āryāḥ tathā eva ca

original: tayostatra śravaṇādbhāratasya daśādhikaṃ phalamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,1.68 //
analyzed: tayoḥ tatra śravaṇāt bhāratasya daśa adhikam phalam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: daityāḥ sarva viprakuleṣu bhūtvā kṛte yuge bhārate ṣaṭsahasryām /
analyzed: daityāḥ sarva vipra kuleṣu bhūtvā kṛte yuge bhārate ṣaṭsahasryām

original: niṣkāsya kāṃścinnavanirmitānāṃ niveśanaṃ tatra kurvanti nityam // GarP_3,1.69 //
analyzed: niṣkāsya kāṃścid nava nirmitānām niveśanam tatra kurvanti nityam

original: matvā hariṃ bhagavānvyāsarūpī cakre tadā bhāgavataṃ purāṇam /
analyzed: matvā harim bhagavān vyāsa rūpī cakre tadā bhāgavatam purāṇam

original: tathā samākhyāya ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tattataḥ paraṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ sa cakre // GarP_3,1.70 //
analyzed: tathā samākhyāya ca vaiṣṇavam tat tatas param gāruḍa ākhyam sa cakre

original: ato hi gāruḍaṃ mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ śāstrasaṃmatam /
analyzed: atas hi gāruḍam mukhyam purāṇam śāstra saṃmatam

original: gāruḍena samaṃ nāsti viṣṇudharmapradarśane // GarP_3,1.71 //
analyzed: gāruḍena samam nā asti viṣṇu dharma pradarśane

original: yathā surāṇāṃ pravaro janārdano yathāyudhānāṃ pravaraḥ sudarśanam /
analyzed: yathā surāṇām pravaraḥ janārdanaḥ yathā āyudhānām pravaraḥ sudarśanam

original: yathāśvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnāṃ chinneṣu bhakteṣu tathaiva rudraḥ // GarP_3,1.72 //
analyzed: yathā aśvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnām chinneṣu bhakteṣu tathā eva rudraḥ

original: nadīṣu gaṅgā jalajeṣu padmamacchinnabhakteṣu tathaiva vāyuḥ /
analyzed: nadīṣu gaṅgā jalajeṣu padmam acchinna bhakteṣu tathā eva vāyuḥ

original: tathā purāṇeṣu ca gāruḍaṃ ca mukhyaṃ tadāhurharitattvadarśane // GarP_3,1.73 //
analyzed: tathā purāṇeṣu ca gāruḍam ca mukhyam tat āhuḥ hari tattva darśane

original: gāruḍākhyapurāṇe tu pratipādyo hariḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: gāruḍa ākhya purāṇe tu pratipādyaḥ hariḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ato harirnamaskāryo gamyo yogyo hariḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.74 //
analyzed: atas hariḥ namaskāryaḥ gamyaḥ yogyaḥ hariḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bhāgyātmakatvācchrīdevyā namanaṃ nadanu smṛtam /
analyzed: bhāgya ātmaka tvāt śrī devyāḥ namanam na danu smṛtam

original: paro narottamo vā sa sādhakeśopi ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.75 //
analyzed: paraḥ nara uttamaḥ vā sa sādhakeśaḥ api ca smṛtaḥ

original: ato namyo vāyurapi purāṇādau dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: atas namyaḥ vāyuḥ api purāṇa ādau dvijottamāḥ

original: bhāratī vākyarūpatvānnamyā vāyoranantaram // GarP_3,1.76 //
analyzed: bhāratī vākya rūpa tvāt namyā vāyoḥ anantaram

original: upasādhako naraḥ prokto yatotastadanantaram /
analyzed: upasādhakaḥ naraḥ proktaḥ yatas utas tad anantaram

original: namya ityacyate sadbhistāratamyena sarvadā // GarP_3,1.77 //
analyzed: namyaḥ iti acyate sadbhiḥ tāratamyena sarvadā

original: ato vyāsaṃ namaskuryādgranthakartṛtvahetutaḥ /
analyzed: atas vyāsam namaskuryāt grantha kartṛ tva hetutaḥ

original: śaunaka uvāca /
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: vyāsasya namanaṃ hyante kathaṃ kāryaṃ mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,1.78 //
analyzed: vyāsasya namanam hi ante katham kāryam mahātmanaḥ

original: ante ca vandane tasya kāraṇaṃ brūhi suvrata /
analyzed: ante ca vandane tasya kāraṇam brūhi suvrata

original: sūta uvāca /
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: viṣṇoranantaraṃ vyāsanamanaṃ mukhyameva hi // GarP_3,1.79 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ anantaram vyāsa namanam mukhyam eva hi

original: harireva yato vyāso vācyacakrasvarūpakaḥ /
analyzed: hariḥ eva yatas vyāsaḥ vācya cakra svarūpakaḥ

original: vyāso naiva samatvena prokto bhagavato hareḥ // GarP_3,1.80 //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ nā eva sama tvena proktaḥ bhagavataḥ hareḥ

original: tatrāpi kāraṇaṃ vakṣye sādareṇa munīśvarāḥ /
analyzed: tatra api kāraṇam vakṣye sa ādareṇa muni īśvarāḥ

original: vyāsastu kaścana ṛṣiḥ purāṇe tāmase smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.81 //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ tu kaścana ṛṣiḥ purāṇe tāmase smṛtaḥ

original: iti jñānā valaṃbena daityā daityānugaiḥ samāḥ /
analyzed: iti jñānāḥ valaṃbena daityāḥ daitya anugaiḥ samāḥ

original: praviśanti hyandhatama iti tvante namaskṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.82 //
analyzed: praviśanti hi andhatame iti tu ante namaskṛtaḥ

original: yadidaṃ paramaṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: yat idam paramam gopyam hṛdi dhāryam na saṃśayaḥ

original: parāṇāṃ namyamevoktaṃ pratipādyaṃ yatotra hi // GarP_3,1.83 //
analyzed: parāṇām namyam eva uktam pratipādyam yatas utra hi

original: samāsavyāsabhāvāddhi parāṇāṃ tatpratīyate /
analyzed: samāsa vyāsa bhāvāt hi parāṇām tat pratīyate

original: vāstavaṃ taṃ na jānīyurupajīvyo yato hariḥ // GarP_3,1.84 //
analyzed: vāstavam tam na jānīyuḥ upajīvyaḥ yatas hariḥ

original: harirvyāsastveka eva vyāsastu harivatsmṛtaḥ /
analyzed: hariḥ vyāsaḥ tu ekaḥ eva vyāsaḥ tu hari vat smṛtaḥ

original: upajīvyatadīśatve tayoreva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,1.85 //
analyzed: upajīvya tad īśa tve tayoḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: īśakoṭipraviṣṭatvācchriyaḥ svāmitvamīritam /
analyzed: īśa koṭi praviṣṭa tvāt śriyaḥ svāmi tvam īritam

original: trayāṇāmupajīvyatvātsevyatvātsvāmitā smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,1.86 //
analyzed: trayāṇām upajīvya tvāt sevya tvāt svāmi tā smṛtāḥ

original: vāyvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca sevyatvātsevyatā smṛtā /
analyzed: vāyu ādīnām trayāṇām ca sevya tvāt sevya tā smṛtā

original: bhūbhāraharaṇe viṣṇoḥ pradhānāṅgaṃ hi mārutiḥ // GarP_3,1.87 //
analyzed: bhū bhāra haraṇe viṣṇoḥ pradhāna aṅgam hi mārutiḥ

original: vākyarūpā bhāratī tu dvitīyāṅgaṃ hi sā smṛtā /
analyzed: vākya rūpā bhāratī tu dvitīya aṅgam hi sā smṛtā

original: tṛtīyāṅga hareḥ śeṣo na namyāḥ sāmyato hareḥ // GarP_3,1.88 //
analyzed: tṛtīyā aṅga hareḥ śeṣaḥ na namyāḥ sāmyataḥ hareḥ

original: pratipādyā mukhyatayā namyā eva samīritāḥ /
analyzed: pratipādyāḥ mukhya tayā namyāḥ eva samīritāḥ

original: avāntarāśca vāyvādyā na namyāstena te smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,1.89 //
analyzed: avāntarāḥ ca vāyu ādyāḥ na namyāḥ tena te smṛtāḥ

original: bhīṣmadroṇādināmāni bhīmādiṣveva mukhyataḥ /
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa ādi nāmāni bhīma ādiṣu eva mukhyatas

original: vācakāni yato nityaṃ tannamyāste munīśvarāḥ // GarP_3,1.90 //
analyzed: vācakāni yatas nityam tat namyāḥ te muni īśvarāḥ

original: parāṇāmeva namyatvaṃ pratipādyatvameva hi /
analyzed: parāṇām eva namya tvam pratipādya tvam eva hi

original: etatsarvaṃ mayākhyātaṃ kimanyacchrotumicchatha // GarP_3,1.91 //
analyzed: etat sarvam mayā ākhyātam kim anyat śrotum icchatha

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe sūtaśaunakasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe sāttvikādipurāṇavibhāganamyānamyadevavibhāgādiviṣayanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe sūta śaunaka saṃvāde uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe sāttvika ādi purāṇa vibhāga namya anamya deva vibhāga ādi viṣaya nirūpaṇam

original: nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 2
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīśaunaka uvāca /
analyzed: śrī śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: kathaṃ sasarja bhagavāṃstattattattvābhimāninaḥ /
analyzed: katham sasarja bhagavān tad tad tattva abhimāninaḥ

original: sṛṣṭikramaṃ na jānāmi devānāṃ hyantaraṃ mune // GarP_3,2.1 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi kramam na jānāmi devānām hi antaram mune

original: śaunakenaiva muktastu sūto vacanamabravīt /
analyzed: śaunakena eva muktaḥ tu sūtaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: śūta uvāca /
analyzed: śūtaḥ uvāca

original: samyagvyavasitā buddhistava brahmarṣisattama // GarP_3,2.2 //
analyzed: samyak vyavasitā buddhiḥ tava brahma ṛṣi sattama

original: evameva kṛtaḥ praśro harau tu garuḍena vai /
analyzed: evam eva kṛtaḥ praśraḥ harau tu garuḍena vai

original: yaduktavānharistasmaitadvakṣyāmi tavānagha /
analyzed: yat uktavān hariḥ tasmai etat vakṣyāmi tava anagha

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: sṛṣṭiṃ vrūhi mahābhāga saccidānandavigraha // GarP_3,2.3 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭim vrūhi mahābhāga saccidānanda vigraha

original: sṛṣṭau jñāte tavotkarṣo jñātaprāyo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: sṛṣṭau jñāte tava utkarṣaḥ jñāta prāyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: brahmādīnāṃ tāratamyajñānaṃ mama bhaviṣyati // GarP_3,2.4 //
analyzed: brahma ādīnām tāratamya jñānam mama bhaviṣyati

original: mokṣopāyamyaḥ sa vokta mitatarattasya sādhanam /
analyzed: mokṣa upāya myaḥ sa vā ukta mitatarat tasya sādhanam

original: garuḍenaiva muktastu kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt // GarP_3,2.5 //
analyzed: garuḍena eva muktaḥ tu kṛṣṇaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: śṛkṛṣṇa uvāca mūlarūpe hyato jñeyo viṣṇutvādviṣṇuravyayaḥ // GarP_3,2.6 //
analyzed: uvāca mūla rūpe hi atas jñeyaḥ viṣṇu tvāt viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ

original: avatāramidaṃ proktaṃ pūrṇatvādeva suvrata /
analyzed: avatāram idam proktam pūrṇa tvāt eva suvrata

original: aneko hyekatāṃ prāpya saṃśete pralayāya vai // GarP_3,2.7 //
analyzed: anekaḥ hi eka tām prāpya saṃśete pralayāya vai

original: tatrāpi ca viśeṣosti jñātavyaṃ tatvameva saḥ // GarP_3,2.8 //
analyzed: tatra api ca viśeṣaḥ usti jñātavyam tattvam eva saḥ

original: bhedena darśanādvāpi bhedābhedena darśanāt /
analyzed: bhedena darśanāt vā api bheda abhedena darśanāt

original: viṣṇorguṇānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ sukhādinām /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ guṇānām rūpāṇām tad aṅgānām sukha ādinām

original: tatraiva daśanādvāpi kṣiprameva tamo vrajet // GarP_3,2.9 //
analyzed: tatra eva daśanāt vā api kṣipram eva tamaḥ vrajet

original: puruṣāntaramārabhya kalpitā ye dvijottama /
analyzed: puruṣa antaram ārabhya kalpitāḥ ye dvijottama

original: harirūpāstu te jñeyā ekībhūtā hi tena te // GarP_3,2.10 //
analyzed: hari rūpāḥ tu te jñeyāḥ ekībhūtāḥ hi tena te

original: praleya samanuprāpte jīvāḥ sa yānti māmakāḥ /
analyzed: praleya samanuprāpte jīvāḥ sa yānti māmakāḥ

original: virājṛpe hareḥ saṃti tadā te ca hyanekadhā // GarP_3,2.11 //
analyzed: virājṛpe hareḥ saṃti tadā te ca hi anekadhā

original: ekībhāvaṃ prāpnuvanti mūlena pralaye dvija /
analyzed: ekībhāvam prāpnuvanti mūlena pralaye dvija

original: biṃbena tu svayaṃ viṣṇurekībhāvaṃ vrajedyadi // GarP_3,2.12 //
analyzed: biṃbena tu svayam viṣṇuḥ ekībhāvam vrajet yadi

original: pratibiṃbaḥ kathaṃ jīvo bhavennārāyaṇasya ca /
analyzed: pratibiṃbaḥ katham jīvaḥ bhavet nārāyaṇasya ca

original: tadadhīnastatsadṛśo harerjīvo na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,2.13 //
analyzed: tad adhīnaḥ tad sadṛśaḥ hareḥ jīvaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: pratibiṃbasya śabdārtho hyayamevamudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: pratibiṃbasya śabda arthaḥ hi ayam evam udāhṛtaḥ

original: tasmācca biṃbarūpāṇāmekībhāvaṃ na cintayet // GarP_3,2.14 //
analyzed: tasmāt ca biṃba rūpāṇām ekībhāvam na cintayet

original: kṛṣṇarāmādivaccaiva tvekī bhāvo vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāma ādi vat ca eva tu ekī bhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: biṃbānāṃ mūlarūpasya bhedo nātra vivakṣitaḥ // GarP_3,2.15 //
analyzed: biṃbānām mūla rūpasya bhedaḥ na atra vivakṣitaḥ

original: tatrāpi ca viśeṣosti jñātavyastattvamicchubhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra api ca viśeṣaḥ usti jñātavyaḥ tattvam icchubhiḥ

original: ekāṃśena tu biṃbaistu caikībhāvaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_3,2.16 //
analyzed: eka aṃśena tu biṃbaiḥ tu ca ekībhāvam vrajanti te

original: ekāṃśena tu jīvatve saṃsthitā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: eka aṃśena tu jīva tve saṃsthitāḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: biṃbamūlaṃ na jānanti te janā hyasurāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,2.17 //
analyzed: biṃba mūlam na jānanti te janāḥ hi asurāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: eka eva hariḥ pūrvaṃ hyavidyāvaśataḥ svayam /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hariḥ pūrvam hi avidyā vaśataḥ svayam

original: aneko bhavati hyārādādarśapratirbibavat // GarP_3,2.18 //
analyzed: anekaḥ bhavati hi ārāt ādarśa pratiḥ bibavat

original: evaṃ vadanti ye mūḍhā stepi yāntyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: evam vadanti ye mūḍhāḥ yānti adharam tamaḥ

original: upādhirdvividhaḥ proktaḥ svarūpo bāhya eva ca // GarP_3,2.19 //
analyzed: upādhiḥ dvividhaḥ proktaḥ svarūpaḥ bāhyaḥ eva ca

original: bāhyopādhirlaye yāti muktāvanyasya saṃśthitiḥ /
analyzed: bāhya upādhiḥ laye yāti muktau anyasya saṃśthitiḥ

original: sarvopādhivi nāśe hi pratibiṃbaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_3,2.20 //
analyzed: sarva upādhi vi nāśe hi pratibiṃbaḥ katham bhavet

original: cidrūpākhyo hyupādhistu mokṣe yepyadhikāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: cit rūpa ākhyaḥ hi upādhiḥ tu mokṣe ye pi adhikāriṇaḥ

original: duḥ kharūpo hyupādhistu tamaso yedhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,2.21 //
analyzed: duḥ kha rūpaḥ hi upādhiḥ tu tamasaḥ yedhikāriṇaḥ

original: miśrarūpo hyupādhistu nityasaṃsāriṇāṃ mataḥ /
analyzed: miśra rūpaḥ hi upādhiḥ tu nitya saṃsāriṇām mataḥ

original: bāhyopādhirliṅgadehaḥ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,2.22 //
analyzed: bāhya upādhiḥ liṅga dehaḥ sarveṣām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: daityāḥ duḥ khāyate yasmāttasmāduḥ khī hariḥ svayam /
analyzed: daityāḥ duḥ khāyate yasmāt tasmāt duḥkhī hariḥ svayam

original: tattadduḥ khasvarūpatvāddaityānāṃ biṃbarūpakaḥ // GarP_3,2.23 //
analyzed: tad tad duḥ kha sva rūpa tvāt daityānām biṃba rūpakaḥ

original: daityasthitānāṃ biṃbānāṃ mūlarūpasya vai prabhoḥ /
analyzed: daitya sthitānām biṃbānām mūla rūpasya vai prabhoḥ

original: parasparaṃ tathā bhedaṃ hyantaraṃ vā na cintayet // GarP_3,2.24 //
analyzed: parasparam tathā bhedam hi antaram vā na cintayet

original: śrībhūdurgādirūpāṇāṃ tathā sītādirūpiṇām /
analyzed: śrī bhū durgā ādi rūpāṇām tathā sītā ādi rūpiṇām

original: anyonyaṃ nāṇumātraṃ ca bhedo bāhyāntarepi ca // GarP_3,2.25 //
analyzed: anyonyam na aṇu mātram ca bhedaḥ bāhya antare pi ca

original: cintanīyaḥ kathamapi jñātvā yāntyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: cintanīyaḥ katham api jñātvā yānti adharam tamaḥ

original: pratibiṃbasthito biṃbaḥ strīrūpo hyasti sarvadā // GarP_3,2.26 //
analyzed: pratibiṃba sthitaḥ biṃbaḥ strī rūpaḥ hi asti sarvadā

original: pralaye samanuprāpte lakṣmyā saha khagottama /
analyzed: pralaye samanuprāpte lakṣmyā saha khaga uttama

original: ekībhāvaṃ nāpnuvanti viṃbena saha saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_3,2.27 //
analyzed: ekībhāvam na āpnuvanti viṃbena saha saṃsthitāḥ

original: biṃvasthitānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ lakṣmyāśca vinatāsuta /
analyzed: rūpāṇām lakṣmyāḥ ca vinatā suta

original: bhedastu nāṇumātraṃ ca śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana // GarP_3,2.28 //
analyzed: bhedaḥ tu na aṇu mātram ca śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana

original: yadā hi śete pralayārṇave vibhurjīvāṃśca sarvānudare niveśya /
analyzed: yadā hi śete pralaya arṇave vibhuḥ jīvān ca sarvān udare niveśya

original: muktāṃśca brahmendramarudgaṇādīnprātpavyamuktīṃśca sutau?
analyzed: muktān ca brahma indra marut gaṇa ādīn prāt pavya muktīn ca sutau

original: ca saṃsthitān // GarP_3,2.29 //
analyzed: ca saṃsthitān

original: prāptāndhakūpādisamastajīvāṃstathaiva prāptavyakalīnathāparān /
analyzed: prāpta andhakūpa ādi samasta jīvān tathā eva prāptavya kalīn atha aparān

original: tathaiva nityaṃ sṛtisaṃsthitāñjanānacetanānṛkṣarūpādijīvān // GarP_3,2.30 //
analyzed: tathā eva nityam sṛti saṃsthitān janān acetana an ṛkṣa rūpa ādi jīvān

original: evaṃ janāñjaṭhare saṃnidhāya samyakūśete hyaṃbhasi vai sa kalpe /
analyzed: evam janān jaṭhare saṃnidhāya hi aṃbhasi vai sa kalpe

original: lakṣmīstu sā sarvavedātmikā ca bhaktyā harau nityasaṃvardhitāpi // GarP_3,2.31 //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ tu sā sarva veda ātmikā ca bhaktyā harau nitya saṃvardhitā api

original: atyādaraṃ darśayatīva sā tu īḍe viṣṇuṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitāpi /
analyzed: atyādaram darśayati iva sā tu īḍe viṣṇum bhakti saṃvardhitā api

original: ceṣṭādirūpeṇa tadā na kiñcidāsīdvinā viṣṇumatha śriyaṃ ca // GarP_3,2.32 //
analyzed: ceṣṭā ādi rūpeṇa tadā na kiñcid āsīt vinā viṣṇum atha śriyam ca

original: paryaṅkarūpeṇa vabhūva devī vāsasvarūpeṇa ramā vireje /
analyzed: paryaṅka rūpeṇa vabhūva devī vāsa sva rūpeṇa ramā vireje

original: sarvaṃ ramā saiva tadaiva cāsītsaikā devī bahurūpā babhāṣe // GarP_3,2.33 //
analyzed: sarvam ramā sā eva tadā eva ca āsīt sā ekā devī bahu rūpā babhāṣe

original: tvamutkṛṣṭaḥ sarvadevottamatvānna tvatsamaḥ kaścidevādhiko vā /
analyzed: tvam utkṛṣṭaḥ sarva deva uttama tvāt na tvad samaḥ kaścid eva adhikaḥ vā

original: tvaṃ brahma eko na caturmukhaśca nāhaṃ rudro na bṛhaspatiśca // GarP_3,2.34 //
analyzed: tvam brahma ekaḥ na catur mukhaḥ ca na aham rudraḥ na bṛhaspatiḥ ca

original: viṣṇāveva brahmaśabdo hi mukhyo hyanyeṣvamukhyo brahmarudrādikeṣu /
analyzed: viṣṇau eva brahma śabdaḥ hi mukhyaḥ hi anyeṣu amukhyaḥ brahma rudra ādikeṣu

original: anantaguṇapūrṇatvādbrahmeti harirucyate // GarP_3,2.35 //
analyzed: ananta guṇa pūrṇa tvāt brahma iti hariḥ ucyate

original: guṇādipūrṇatābhāvānnānye brahmetyudāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: guṇa ādi pūrṇa tā bhāvāt na anye brahma iti udāhṛtāḥ

original: deśānantyaṃ guṇataḥ kālato vā nāstyānantyaṃ kvāpi deśe ca kāle // GarP_3,2.36 //
analyzed: deśa ānantyam guṇataḥ kālataḥ vā na asti ānantyam kvāpi deśe ca kāle

original: yadā nantyaṃ kimu vaktavyamatra guṇānantyaṃ nāsti brahmādikeṣu /
analyzed: yadā nantyam kimu vaktavyam atra guṇa ānantyam nā asti brahma ādikeṣu

original: yadyapyahaṃ deśataḥ kālataśca samastadā vāsudevena sārdham // GarP_3,2.37 //
analyzed: yadi api aham deśataḥ kālataḥ ca samaḥ tadā vāsudevena sārdham

original: tathāpi me guṇato nāstyanantaṃ tato dharmā guṇatonantataśca /
analyzed: tathā api me guṇataḥ nā asti anantam tatas dharmāḥ guṇataḥ unantataḥ ca

original: saṃti śrutāvaviruddhāśca deve cintyā hyacintyā bahudhā te hyanantāḥ // GarP_3,2.38 //
analyzed: saṃti śrutau aviruddhāḥ ca deve cintyāḥ hi acintyāḥ bahudhā te hi anantāḥ

original: ato guṇāṃstava devasya viṣṇo stotuṃ sadā smo na hareḥ kadāpi /
analyzed: atas guṇān tava devasya viṣṇoḥ stotum sadā smaḥ na hareḥ kadāpi

original: nāhaṃ na keśau na ca gīrna rudro na dakṣakanyā na ca menakāsutā // GarP_3,2.39 //
analyzed: na aham na keśau na ca gīḥ na rudraḥ na dakṣa kanyā na ca menakā sutā

original: na vai biḍaujā na ca vā pulomajā na cedhmavāho na yamo na cānyaḥ /
analyzed: na vai biḍaujāḥ na ca vā pulomajāḥ na ca idhmavāhaḥ na yamaḥ na ca anyaḥ

original: na nārado nāpi bhṛgurvasiṣṭho na vighnapo nāpi balyādayaśca // GarP_3,2.40 //
analyzed: na nāradaḥ nā api bhṛguḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ na vighnapaḥ nā api bali ādayaḥ ca

original: na vai virāṭo nāpi bhīmaḥ śaniśca na puṣkaro na kaśerustathaiva /
analyzed: na vai virāṭaḥ na api bhīmaḥ śaniḥ ca na puṣkaraḥ na kaśeruḥ tathā eva

original: na kinnarāḥ pitaro naiva devā gandharvamukhyā nāpi vā tuṣyasaṃjñāḥ // GarP_3,2.41 //
analyzed: na kinnarāḥ pitaraḥ nā eva devāḥ gandharva mukhyāḥ nā api vā tuṣya saṃjñāḥ

original: na vai kṣitīśā na ca mānuṣāśca viṣṇorna jānanti kimatra cānye /
analyzed: na vai kṣitīśāḥ na ca mānuṣāḥ ca viṣṇoḥ na jānanti kim atra ca anye

original: mattodhamaḥ kociguṇena brahmā samo hi tasya brahmaṇo mātariśva // GarP_3,2.42 //
analyzed: mattaḥ adhamaḥ koci guṇena brahmā samaḥ hi tasya brahmaṇaḥ mātariśva

original: tau vai virāge haribhaktibhāve dhṛtistitiprāṇabaleṣuyoge /
analyzed: tau vai virāge hari bhakti bhāve dhṛti stiti prāṇa bala iṣu yoge

original: buddhau samānau saṃsṛtau mokṣakāle parasparādhārasamanvitau ca // GarP_3,2.43 //
analyzed: buddhau samānau saṃsṛtau mokṣa kāle paraspara ādhāra samanvitau ca

original: annābhimānaṃ brahma cāhurmurāriṃ jīvābhimānaṃ vāyumāhurmahāntaḥ /
analyzed: anna abhimānam brahma ca āhuḥ murārim jīva abhimānam vāyum āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: na śaktosau brahmadevo vivastuṃ vāyuṃ vinā saṃsṛtāveva nityam // GarP_3,2.44 //
analyzed: na śaktā asau brahma devaḥ vivastum vāyum vinā saṃsṛtau eva nityam

original: na taṃ vinā mātariśvā ca vastumanyonyamāptiḥ kālato nyūnatā ca /
analyzed: na tam vinā mātariśvā ca vastum anyonyam āptiḥ kālataḥ nyūna tā ca

original: yadā mahattattvani yāmakobhūdbrahmāṇḍāntasthūlasṛṣṭau mahātmā // GarP_3,2.45 //
analyzed: yadā mahat tattvani yāmakaḥ bhūt brahmāṇḍa anta sthūla sṛṣṭau mahātmā

original: tadā vāyurnāśakadvai mahātmā bāhye sṛṣṭau kālabhedena cāsti /
analyzed: tadā vāyuḥ nā aśakat vai mahātmā bāhye sṛṣṭau kāla bhedena ca asti

original: sarasvatī bhāratī brahmaṇastu saṃvatsarānantaraṃ saṃbabhūva // GarP_3,2.46 //
analyzed: sarasvatī bhāratī brahmaṇaḥ tu saṃvatsara anantaram saṃbabhūva

original: yadā daśābdāḥ samatītā mahātmā tadā vāyuḥ samabhūllokapūjyaḥ /
analyzed: yadā daśa abdāḥ samatītāḥ mahātmā tadā vāyuḥ samabhūt loka pūjyaḥ

original: kiñcinnyūnatvaṃ sthūlasṛṣṭau mahātmannaitāvatā vānayoḥ saumyahāniḥ // GarP_3,2.47 //
analyzed: kiñcid nyūna tvam sthūla sṛṣṭau mahātman na etāvatā vā anayoḥ saumya hāniḥ

original: sarasvatī vatsarātsaṃbabhūva hyanantaraṃ brahmaṇo janmakālāt /
analyzed: sarasvatī vatsarāt saṃbabhūva hi anantaram brahmaṇaḥ janma kālāt

original: giraḥ sakāśātkālato nyūnatāsti vāyostadā hyadhamattve kṣatiḥ kā // GarP_3,2.48 //
analyzed: giraḥ sakāśāt kālataḥ nyūna tā asti vāyoḥ tadā hi adhamat tve kṣatiḥ kā

original: vāyoranantaraṃ vāṇī hyabhūtsaṃvatsarātparam /
analyzed: vāyoḥ anantaram vāṇī hi abhūt saṃvatsarāt param

original: yāvatpaścājjanistāvatpūrvadehakṣayo bhavet // GarP_3,2.49 //
analyzed: yāvat paścāt janiḥ tāvat pūrva deha kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: śeṣastvindro rudra ete trayaśca samā hyete jñānabalādikeṣvapi tathāpi teṣāṃ kālato nyūnatāsti kālopi teṣāṃ dvivyesahasravarṣam // GarP_3,2.50
analyzed: śeṣaḥ tu indraḥ rudraḥ ete trayaḥ ca samāḥ hi ete jñāna bala ādikeṣu api tathā api teṣām kālataḥ nyūna tā asti kālaḥ api teṣām

original: anantarudro brahmavāyū yathā vā tathā jñeyo naiva hāniḥ svarūpe /
analyzed: ananta rudraḥ brahma vāyū yathā vā tathā jñeyaḥ nā eva hāniḥ svarūpe

original: sthūlasya sṛṣṭau bāhyasṛṣṭau mahātmankālānnyūnatvaṃ sa mayā naiva cintyaḥ // GarP_3,2.51 //
analyzed: sthūlasya sṛṣṭau bāhya sṛṣṭau mahātman kālāt nyūna tvam sa mayā nā eva cintyaḥ

original: teṣāṃ sakāśādvāruṇī pārvatī ca sauparṇīnāmnī tistra etā mahātman /
analyzed: teṣām sakāśāt vāruṇī pārvatī ca sauparṇī nāmnī tistraḥ etāḥ mahātman

original: daśābdebhyonantaraṃ saṃbabhūvuḥ sarasvatī bhāratīvacca bodhyā // GarP_3,2.52 //
analyzed: daśa abdebhyaḥ anantaram saṃbabhūvuḥ sarasvatī bhāratī vat ca bodhyā

original: indro varo rudrabhāryādikebhya evaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadā dehyamandam /
analyzed: indraḥ varaḥ rudra bhāryā ādikebhyaḥ evam jñānam sarvadā dehi amandam

original: evaṃ jñānaṃ yasya bhavecca loke sa vai jñānī vedavedyaḥ sa eva // GarP_3,2.53 //
analyzed: evam jñānam yasya bhavet ca loke sa vai jñānī veda vedyaḥ saḥ eva

original: na vai jñānītyantaraṃ yo na veda sa vedavādī na ca vedapāṭhakaḥ // GarP_3,2.54 //
analyzed: na vai jñānī iti antaram yaḥ na veda sa veda vādī na ca veda pāṭhakaḥ

original: vedākṣarāṇi yāvanti paṭhitāni dvijātibhiḥ /
analyzed: veda akṣarāṇi yāvanti paṭhitāni dvijātibhiḥ

original: tāvanti harināmāni priyāṇi ca hareḥsadā // GarP_3,2.55 //
analyzed: tāvanti hari nāmāni priyāṇi ca hareḥ sadā

original: mama svāmī harirnityaṃ dāsohaṃ sarvadā hareḥ /
analyzed: mama svāmī hariḥ nityam dāsaḥ ham sarvadā hareḥ

original: brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvā guravo me yathākramam // GarP_3,2.56 //
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ guravaḥ me yathākramam

original: eteṣāṃ ca hariḥ svāmī vede sarvatra gīyate /
analyzed: eteṣām ca hariḥ svāmī vede sarvatra gīyate

original: evaṃ jānaṃstu yo vedānsaṃpaṭhetsa dvijottamaḥ // GarP_3,2.57 //
analyzed: evam jānan tu yaḥ vedān saṃpaṭhet sa dvijottamaḥ

original: sa vedapāṭhako jñeyastadanye vedavādinaḥ /
analyzed: sa veda pāṭhakaḥ jñeyaḥ tad anye veda vādinaḥ

original: vedabhārabharākrāntaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇagardabhaḥ // GarP_3,2.58 //
analyzed: veda bhāra bhara ākrāntaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇagardabhaḥ

original: jñānābhimānī vedamānī ubhau tu parasparaṃ hyūcatuḥ sarvadaiva /
analyzed: jñāna abhimānī veda mānī ubhau tu parasparam hi ūcatuḥ sarvadā eva

original: jalaṃ vedo yatra vāso murārerācāryāṇāṃ saṃgadoṣāddvijānām // GarP_3,2.59 //
analyzed: jalam vedaḥ yatra vāsaḥ murāreḥ ācāryāṇām saṃga doṣāt dvijānām

original: mahāparādhāḥ saṃti loke mahātmansahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaśca /
analyzed: mahā aparādhāḥ saṃti loke mahātman sahasraśas śataśas koṭiśas ca

original: hariśca tānkṣamate sarvadaiva nāmatrayasmaraṇādvai kupāluḥ // GarP_3,2.60 //
analyzed: hariḥ ca tān kṣamate sarvadā eva nāma traya smaraṇāt vai kupāluḥ

original: sarvāparādhādrahitaṃ dānamānairyuktaṃ sadā tāratamyācca hīnam /
analyzed: sarva aparādhāt rahitam dāna mānaiḥ yuktam sadā tāratamyāt ca hīnam

original: dṛṣṭvāparādhaṃ tasya viṣṇurmahātmā hāhākāraṃ kurute krodhabuddhyā // GarP_3,2.61 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā aparādham tasya viṣṇuḥ mahātmā hāhākāram kurute krodha buddhyā

original: uttiṣṭha govinda suvedavedya sovyātkṛtākhyo mayi samyak prasīda /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha govinda su veda vedya mayi samyak prasīda

original: bho keśavottiṣṭha sukhasvarūpa sṛṣṭau vyaye vartayituṃ samarthaḥ // GarP_3,2.62 //
analyzed: bho keśava uttiṣṭha sukha svarūpa sṛṣṭau vyaye vartayitum samarthaḥ

original: sṛṣṭvā brahmāṇaṃ prerayetpūjyasṛṣṭau sṛṣṭvā rudraṃ prerayetsaṃhṛtau ca /
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā brahmāṇam prerayet pūjya sṛṣṭau sṛṣṭvā rudram prerayet saṃhṛtau ca

original: prāptavyayogyānbrahmaśeṣādidevāndṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā dehi mokṣaṃ ca samyak // GarP_3,2.63 //
analyzed: prāptavya yogyān brahmaśeṣa ādi devān dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā dehi mokṣam ca samyak

original: hare murāre svāpahīnādya tiṣṭha kalpā dikānantarajñāna (raṃ buddhi) (jāna) hīnāt /
analyzed: hare murāre svāpa hīna adya tiṣṭha hīnāt

original: samyag dṛṣṭvā karmadṛṣṭyā mahātmallaṃbdhaṃ tamo dāhi duḥ khasvarūpam // GarP_3,2.64 //
analyzed: samyak dṛṣṭvā karma dṛṣṭyā mahātmal laṃbdham tamaḥ dāhi duḥ kha svarūpam

original: daityādikānduḥ khamatīnha yasmāttamasyandhesarvadā citsvarūpī /
analyzed: daitya ādikān duḥ kha matīn ha yasmāt tamasi andhe sarvadā cit svarūpī

original: tasmādāhurduḥ svarūpī haristvaṃ duḥ khasvarūpāttvaṃ ca duḥ khī hare tvam // GarP_3,2.65 //
analyzed: tasmāt āhuḥ dus svarūpī hariḥ tvam dus kha svarūpāt tvam ca dus khī hare tvam

original: uttiṣṭha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva hyuttiṣṭha kṛṣṇācyuta mādhaveti /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva hi uttiṣṭha kṛṣṇa acyuta mādhava iti

original: uttiṣṭha vaikuṇṭha dayārdramūrte uttiṣṭha lakṣmīśa namonamaste // GarP_3,2.66 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha vaikuṇṭha dayā ārdra mūrte uttiṣṭha lakṣmīśa namaḥ namaḥ te

original: uttiṣṭha madhveśa sarasvatīśa uttiṣṭha rudreśa tathāṃbikeśa /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha madhveśa sarasvatī īśa uttiṣṭha rudra īśa tathā aṃbikā īśa

original: uttiṣṭha candreśa tathā śacīśa vipreśa bhakteśa gaveśa nityam // GarP_3,2.67 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha candreśa tathā śacīśa vipra īśa bhakta īśa gaveśa nityam

original: śāstrapriyottiṣṭha ṛci priyastvaṃ yajuḥ priyottiṣṭha nidānamūrte /
analyzed: śāstra priya uttiṣṭha ṛci priyaḥ tvam yajuḥ priya uttiṣṭha nidāna mūrte

original: sāmapriyastvaṃ ca tathā murāre atharvavedapriya sarvadā tvam // GarP_3,2.68 //
analyzed: sāma priyaḥ tvam ca tathā murāre atharvaveda priya sarvadā tvam

original: gadyapriyastvaṃ ca purāṇamūrte stutipriyottiṣṭha vicitramūrte /
analyzed: gadya priyaḥ tvam ca purāṇa mūrte stuti priya uttiṣṭha vicitra mūrte

original: sugāyanaprītikarastvameva hyutiṣṭha śīghraṃ kamalā patistvam // GarP_3,2.69 //
analyzed: sugāyana prīti karaḥ tvam eva śīghram kamalā patiḥ tvam

original: evaṃ stuto viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇo hyatitvarāvānutthito nityabaddhaḥ // GarP_3,2.70 //
analyzed: evam stutaḥ viṣṇuḥ ajaḥ purāṇaḥ hi ati tvarāvān utthitaḥ nitya baddhaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe brahmāviṣṇumaheśvarādidevatātāramyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe brahmāviṣṇumaheśvarādidevatātāramyanirūpaṇam nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 3
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: babhūvecchā mama devasya viṣṇoḥ sraṣṭuṃ sṛjyānmokṣayogyāṃśca moktum /
analyzed: babhūva icchā mama devasya viṣṇoḥ sraṣṭum sṛjyān mokṣa yogyān ca moktum

original: icchāśaktiḥ sarvadaivāsti viṣṇostathāpi tadvyāharaṇaṃ ca laukikam // GarP_3,3.1 //
analyzed: icchā śaktiḥ sarvadā evā asti viṣṇoḥ tathā api tad vyāharaṇam ca laukikam

original: tadā harirjagṛhe laukikaṃ ca tamaḥ pānaṃ tena rūpeṇa cakre /
analyzed: tadā hariḥ jagṛhe laukikam ca tamaḥ pānam tena rūpeṇa cakre

original: tadrūpamāhuḥ prākṛtaṃ vai tadajñā hyandhaṃ tamaḥ praviśantyeva sarve // GarP_3,3.2 //
analyzed: tat rūpam āhuḥ prākṛtam vai tat ajñāḥ hi andham tamaḥ praviśanti eva sarve

original: avatārā mahāviṣṇoḥ sarve pūrṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: avatārāḥ mahā viṣṇoḥ sarve pūrṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: pūrṇaṃ ca tatparaṃ rūpaṃ pūrṇātpūrṇāḥ samudgatāḥ // GarP_3,3.3 //
analyzed: pūrṇam ca tat param rūpam pūrṇāt pūrṇāḥ samudgatāḥ

original: parāvaratvaṃ teṣāṃ tu vyaktimātraviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: parāvara tvam teṣām tu vyakti mātra viśeṣataḥ

original: na deśakālasāmarthyātpārāvaryaṃ kathañcana // GarP_3,3.4 //
analyzed: na deśa kāla sāmarthyāt pārāvaryam kathañcana

original: pūrvarūpaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ padavitāragam? /
analyzed: pūrvarūpam ca pūrṇam ca pūrṇam padavī tāragam

original: rūpaṃ tadātmanyādāya pūrṇamevāvaśiṣyate // GarP_3,3.5 //
analyzed: rūpam tat ātmani ādāya pūrṇam eva avaśiṣyate

original: laukikavyavahāroyaṃ bhūbhārakṣapaṇādikaḥ /
analyzed: laukika vyavahāraḥ ayam bhū bhāra kṣapaṇa ādikaḥ

original: tasya dṛrṣṭi vinā nānyo layaḥ kṛṣṇādinā kvacit // GarP_3,3.6 //
analyzed: tasya dṛrṣṭi vinā nā anyaḥ layaḥ kṛṣṇa ādinā kvacid

original: tattve pīḍā na kartavyā tayā duḥ khāni vindati /
analyzed: tattve pīḍā na kartavyā tayā duḥkhāni vindati

original: atyantapīḍanāttasya rogastasya na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,3.7 //
analyzed: atyanta pīḍanāt tasya rogaḥ tasya na saṃśayaḥ

original: jñātavyāṃśe tu pīḍā tu kartavyā guruṇā saha /
analyzed: jñātavyā aṃśe tu pīḍā tu kartavyā guruṇā saha

original: tamantevāsinaṃ cāhuḥ sa eva cu guruḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,3.8 //
analyzed: tam antevāsinam ca āhuḥ saḥ eva guruḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ye kurvanti harestattvavicāraṃ tu parasparam /
analyzed: ye kurvanti hareḥ tattva vicāram tu parasparam

original: tāveva guruśiṣyau tu vinatānandasaṃyuta // GarP_3,3.9 //
analyzed: tau eva guru śiṣyau tu vinatā ānanda saṃyuta

original: guruṇāpi samaṃ hāsyaṃ kartavyaṃ kuṭilaṃ vinā /
analyzed: guruṇā api samam hāsyam kartavyam kuṭilam vinā

original: harṣāmarṣayutaḥ śiṣyo guruḥ kauṭilyasaṃyutaḥ // GarP_3,3.10 //
analyzed: harṣa amarṣa yutaḥ śiṣyaḥ guruḥ kauṭilya saṃyutaḥ

original: ubhau tau nirayaṃ yāto yāvadācandratārakam /
analyzed: ubhau tau nirayam yātaḥ yāvat ācandratārakam

original: sākṣāddhariḥ puruṣaḥ piṅgalākṣaḥ svamāyāyāṃ guṇamayyāṃ mahātmā /
analyzed: sākṣāt hariḥ puruṣaḥ piṅgala akṣaḥ sva māyāyām guṇa mayyām mahātmā

original: svapauruṣeṇaiva sumaṅgalena adhāttu vīryaṃ bhagavānvīryavāṃśca // GarP_3,3.11 //
analyzed: sva pauruṣeṇa eva su maṅgalena adhāt tu vīryam bhagavān vīryavān ca

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: vīryasvarūpaṃ brūhi me vāsudeva vīrye tvadīye saṃśayo me vibhāti /
analyzed: vīrya svarūpam brūhi me vāsudeva vīrye tvadīye saṃśayaḥ me vibhāti

original: kiṃ vīryamīśasya svarūpabhūtaṃ kiṃ vā vibhinnaṃ vada sādhu vetsi // GarP_3,3.12 //
analyzed: kim vīryam īśasya svarūpa bhūtam kim vā vibhinnam vada sādhu vetsi

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: yadvīryamādhatta hariḥ svayaṃ prabhurmāyābhidhāyāṃ vinatātanūja /
analyzed: yat vīryam ādhatta hariḥ svayam prabhuḥ māyā abhidhāyām vinatā tanūja

original: tadvīryamāhurnṛhareḥ svarūpaṃ vipaścito niścitatattvadarśinaḥ // GarP_3,3.13 //
analyzed: tat vīryam āhuḥ nṛhareḥ sva rūpam vipaścitaḥ niścita tattva darśinaḥ

original: bhinnaṃ tadāhuḥ prākṛtameva cāhuḥ svanābhipadmādikavacca bodhyam /
analyzed: bhinnam tat āhuḥ prākṛtam eva ca āhuḥ sva nābhi padma ādika vat ca bodhyam

original: naitāvatā jñānarūpasya viṣṇorna vīryahāniriti cintanīyam // GarP_3,3.14 //
analyzed: na etāvatā jñāna rūpasya viṣṇoḥ na vīrya hāniḥ iti cintanīyam

original: vīryasvarūpī bhagavānvā sudevaḥ sarvatra deśepi ca sarvakāle /
analyzed: vīrya svarūpī bhagavān vā sudevaḥ sarvatra deśe pi ca sarva kāle

original: sarvārthavānyadi na syātkhagendra tarhīśvaraḥ puruṣo naiva sa syāt // GarP_3,3.15 //
analyzed: sarva arthavān yadi na syāt khaga indra tarhi īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ nā eva sa syāt

original: acintyavīryaiścintyavīryairdvirūpaḥ strīrūpamekaṃ puruṣaṃ tathā param /
analyzed: acintya vīryaiḥ cintya vīryaiḥ dvi rūpaḥ strī rūpam ekam puruṣam tathā param

original: ubhe rūpe vīryavatī khagendra tayorabhedaścintanīyo hi samyakū // GarP_3,3.16 //
analyzed: ubhe rūpe vīryavatī khaga indra tayoḥ abhedaḥ cintanīyaḥ hi samyak

original: strīrūpavānyadi na syātkhargedrastrīṇāṃ kathaṃ pratibiṃbatvameva // GarP_3,3.17 //
analyzed: strī rūpavān yadi na syāt kharga idra strīṇām katham pratibiṃba tvam eva

original: strīrūpamasmādbrahmajaṃ (dvāstavaṃ)
analyzed: strī rūpam asmāt brahma jam dvāstavam

original: cintanīyaṃ svarūpametannānyathā cintanīyam /
analyzed: cintanīyam svarūpam etat na anyathā cintanīyam

original: strīrūpavannaiva vicintanīyaṃ napuṃsakaṃ tbasya janyaṃ hi viddhi // GarP_3,3.18 //
analyzed: strī rūpa vat na eva vicintanīyam napuṃsakam tu asya janyam hi viddhi

original: napuṃsakaṃ navaiva svarūpabhūtamato harau nāsti vicintanīyam /
analyzed: napuṃsakam navā eva svarūpa bhūtam atas harau nā asti vicintanīyam

original: strībiṃbabhūte harirūpe khagendra śrīrūpamastīti vicintanīyam // GarP_3,3.19 //
analyzed: strī biṃba bhūte hari rūpe khaga indra śrī rūpam asti iti vicintanīyam

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: striyā striyaśca saṃyogaṃ vyarthamahurmanīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: striyā striyaḥ ca saṃyogam vyartham ahuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: strīrūpabhūte viṃbe tu strīrūpāḥ santi sarvadā // GarP_3,3.20 //
analyzed: strī rūpa bhūte viṃbe tu strī rūpāḥ santi sarvadā

original: sthitau tatra nimittaṃ ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mama prabho // GarP_3,3.21 //
analyzed: sthitau tatra nimittam ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mama prabho

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: strībiṃbabhūtastrīrūpe lakṣmīrna syātkhageśvara /
analyzed: strī biṃba bhūta strī rūpe lakṣmīḥ na syāt khageśvara

original: nityāviyoginī devī kathaṃ syātparamātmanaḥ // GarP_3,3.22 //
analyzed: nitya aviyoginī devī katham syāt paramātmanaḥ

original: hareranantarūpāṇāṃ strīrūpāṇāṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: hareḥ ananta rūpāṇām strī rūpāṇām khageśvara

original: anantānantarūpeṇa nityaṃ śuśrūṣaṇe ratā // GarP_3,3.23 //
analyzed: ananta ananta rūpeṇa nityam śuśrūṣaṇe ratā

original: ato lakṣmyā viyogastu śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana /
analyzed: atas lakṣmyāḥ viyogaḥ tu śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana

original: nārāyaṇo nāma hariḥ svatantraḥ śriyā vinā nāsti kadāpi tārkṣya /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ nāma hariḥ svatantraḥ śriyā vinā nā asti kadāpi tārkṣya

original: harermukundasya padāravinde śuśrūṣamāṇā paramādareṇa // GarP_3,3.24 //
analyzed: hareḥ mukundasya pada aravinde śuśrūṣamāṇā parama ādareṇa

original: hariṃ vinā śrīrapi deśakāle nāstīti mokṣecchubhireva vedyam /
analyzed: harim vinā śrīḥ api deśa kāle nā asti iti mokṣa icchubhiḥ eva vedyam

original: yasyāmadhādvīryamanukṣaṇaṃ ca sā māmikā cendrajālā tmiketi // GarP_3,3.25 //
analyzed: yasyām adhāt vīryam anukṣaṇam ca sā māmikā ca indrajālā tmikā iti

original: vadanti ye asurā mūḍharūpā adhaṃmataḥ praviśantyeva sarve /
analyzed: vadanti ye asurāḥ mūḍha rūpāḥ a dhaṃmataḥ praviśanti eva sarve

original: māyā nāma prakṛtistvemāhuḥ susūkṣmarūpā na tu cendrajālikā // GarP_3,3.26 //
analyzed: māyā nāma prakṛtiḥ tu emā āhuḥ su sūkṣma rūpā na tu ca indrajālikā

original: tasyābhimānaḥ śrīriti veditavyo vīryādhānaṃ tatra teṣāṃ ca melaḥ /
analyzed: tasya abhimānaḥ śrīḥ iti veditavyaḥ vīrya ādhānam tatra teṣām ca melaḥ

original: kāryonmukhaṃ melanaṃ cāhurāryā ito rūpaṃ nāhurāyyāśca viṣṇoḥ // GarP_3,3.27 //
analyzed: kārya unmukham melanam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ itas rūpam na āhuḥ āyyāḥ ca viṣṇoḥ

original: sānādi nityā satyarūpā ca viṣṇormithyā rūpā sā kathaṃ syātkhagendra /
analyzed: sā anādi nityā satya rūpā ca viṣṇoḥ mithyā rūpā sā katham syāt khaga indra

original: satyā tanuḥ prakṛtestannigūḍhā satyatvamāhurvyavahārārtharūpam // GarP_3,3.28 //
analyzed: satyā tanuḥ prakṛteḥ tat nigūḍhā satya tvam āhuḥ vyavahāra artha rūpam

original: vyavahārarūpā satyatā cetprakṛtyāstadā kathaṃ syādyadanādibhūtā /
analyzed: vyavahāra rūpā satyatā ced prakṛtyāḥ tadā katham syāt yat anādi bhūtā

original: anādinityā yadi na syātkhagendra suśūkṣmarūpeṇa na kāraṇaṃ syāt // GarP_3,3.29 //
analyzed: anādi nityā yadi na syāt khagendra su śūkṣma rūpeṇa na kāraṇam syāt

original: sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa ca kāraṇaṃ syāt tarhi prapañcasya ca kāraṇaṃ vada /
analyzed: sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa ca kāraṇam syāt tarhi prapañcasya ca kāraṇam vada

original: avidyāyā vaśato viṣṇureva nānārūpairdṛśyate viṣṇureva // GarP_3,3.30 //
analyzed: avidyāyāḥ vaśataḥ viṣṇuḥ eva nānā rūpaiḥ dṛśyate viṣṇuḥ eva

original: śāstrajñānānnāśameti hyavidyā na saṃśayo hariṇā caikyameti /
analyzed: śāstra jñānāt nāśam eti hi avidyā na saṃśayaḥ hariṇā ca aikyam eti

original: evaṃ brūṣe yadi vādatkhagendra vakṣyehaṃ te tatra yuktiṃ śṛṇu tvam // GarP_3,3.31 //
analyzed: evam brūṣe yadi vādat khaga indra vakṣyā iham te tatra yuktim śṛṇu tvam

original: sarvajñarūpasya hi me murāreḥ kathaṃ harerghaṭate hyajñatā ca /
analyzed: sarvajña rūpasya hi me murāreḥ katham hareḥ ghaṭate hi ajña tā ca

original: sūrye yathā tamo nāsti tathā nārāyaṇe harau /
analyzed: sūrye yathā tamaḥ na asti tathā nārāyaṇe harau

original: ajñānaṃ nāsti pakṣīdra kathaṃ tatvaṃ bravīṣyaho // GarP_3,3.32 //
analyzed: ajñānam nā asti pakṣīdra katham bravīṣi aho

original: ato nāhaṃ brāhmaṇastvādikālādupādhisaṃbandhavaśādajñatācet /
analyzed: atas na aham brāhmaṇaḥ tu ādi kālāt upādhi saṃbandha vaśāt ajña tā ced

original: sarvajñosau kutra pakṣīndra viṣṇuralpajñajīvo jñānaśūnyaśca kutra // GarP_3,3.33 //
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ asau kutra pakṣi indra viṣṇuḥ alpa jña jīvaḥ jñāna śūnyaḥ ca kutra

original: viruddhayoścānayoḥ sarvadaiva kathaṃ caikyaṃ saṃvādiṣyanti vedāḥ /
analyzed: viruddhayoḥ ca anayoḥ sarvadā eva katham ca aikyam saṃvādiṣyanti vedāḥ

original: deśe kāle sarvadā dduḥ khahīno jagatkartā pūrṇaśaktiḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,3.34 //
analyzed: deśe kāle sarvadā kha hīnaḥ jagatkartā pūrṇa śaktiḥ sadā eva

original: jīvaḥ sadā svalpakartāsti pūrṇaḥ saṃsārarūpe duḥ kharūpe ca nityam /
analyzed: jīvaḥ sadā su alpa kartā asti pūrṇaḥ saṃsāra rūpe duḥkha rūpe ca nityam

original: viruddhayoścānayoraikyamāhurīśasya māyāvaśato māyinaśca // GarP_3,3.35 //
analyzed: viruddhayoḥ ca anayoḥ aikyam āhuḥ īśasya māyā vaśataḥ māyinaḥ ca

original: ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaśyāsteṣāṃ drohaṃ sarvadā saṃcaredyaḥ /
analyzed: ye vaiṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇava dāsa vaśyāḥ teṣām droham sarvadā saṃcaret yaḥ

original: hariprītistena bhavenna nityamānandavṛddhistena bhavenna muktau // GarP_3,3.36 //
analyzed: hari prītiḥ tena bhavet na nityam ānanda vṛddhiḥ tena bhavet na muktau

original: māyī sadā māyibhṛtyastathāpi bhedajñānānnindyate kāryate ca /
analyzed: māyī sadā māyi bhṛtyaḥ tathā api bheda jñānāt nindyate kāryate ca

original: tenāpi teṣāṃ duḥ khavṛddhirbhavecca hyadhaṃ tamaḥ punarāvṛttihīnam // GarP_3,3.37 //
analyzed: tena api teṣām duḥ kha vṛddhiḥ bhavet ca hi adham tamaḥ punarāvṛtti hīnam

original: khagendrātaḥ prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmarūpā sā nityā sā satyabhūtā sadaiva /
analyzed: khagendrātaḥ prakṛtiḥ sūkṣma rūpā sā nityā sā satya bhūtā sadā eva

original: evaṃ svayaṃ kālavāyvādikānāṃ parā (ramā)
analyzed: evam svayam kāla vāyu ādikānām parā ramā

original: ṇavaḥ satyarūpāśca santi // GarP_3,3.38 //
analyzed: ṇavaḥ satya rūpāḥ ca santi

original: parā (māṇū)nāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ jñānecchubhirnānyathā veditavyam /
analyzed: parā māṇūnām lakṣaṇam veditavyam jñāna icchubhiḥ na anyathā veditavyam

original: padārthānāṃ pārthivānāṃ khagendra viśeṣāṇāṃ caramākhyo viśeṣaḥ // GarP_3,3.39 //
analyzed: padārthānām pārthivānām khaga indra viśeṣāṇām carama ākhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: sa evaḥ syātparamāṇurdvijendra yontyovi (va)
analyzed: saḥ evaḥ syāt paramāṇuḥ dvijendra va

original: śeṣovayavaśca sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,3.40 //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ uvayavaḥ ca sa smṛtaḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: he kṛṣṇa he mādhava sāttvatāṃ pate padārthānāṃ caramāṃśaḥ parāṇu // GarP_3,3.41 //
analyzed: he kṛṣṇa he mādhava sāttvatām pate padārthānām carama aṃśaḥ parāṇu

original: iti proktaṃ tatra me saṃśayosti yontyo viśeṣaḥ sa tu nāṃśayuktaḥ /
analyzed: iti proktam tatra me saṃśayaḥ asti yaḥ antyaḥ viśeṣaḥ sa tu na aṃśa yuktaḥ

original: yo hyaṃśayukto na tu soṃtyo viśeṣa evaṃ mamābhāti vacastu tathyam // GarP_3,3.42 //
analyzed: yaḥ hi aṃśa yuktaḥ na tu saḥ antyaḥ viśeṣaḥ evam mama ābhāti vacaḥ tu tathyam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: ya eva loke saṃsthitā mānuṣāstu viśeṣāṇāṃ darśane śaktiyuktāḥ /
analyzed: ye eva loke saṃsthitāḥ mānuṣāḥ tu viśeṣāṇām darśane śakti yuktāḥ

original: tathāpi te yasya cāṃśitvameva viśeṣaṃ vai naiva draṣṭuṃ samarthāḥ // GarP_3,3.43 //
analyzed: tathā api te yasya ca aṃśi tvam eva viśeṣam vai nā eva draṣṭum samarthāḥ

original: tamevāhuścaramāṃśaṃ viśeṣaṃ ye caivamāhurmunayastena cānye /
analyzed: tam eva āhuḥ carama aṃśam viśeṣam ye ca evam āhuḥ munayaḥ tena ca anye

original: ye kāṇādā gautamādyāḥ khagendra niraṃśakaṃ paramāṇuṃ vadanti // GarP_3,3.44 //
analyzed: ye kāṇādāḥ gautama ādyāḥ khaga indra niraṃśakam paramāṇum vadanti

original: anantāṃśaiḥ saṃyutatvepi tāṃśca niraṃśino bhrāntidṛṣṭyā vadanti /
analyzed: ananta aṃśaiḥ saṃyuta tve pi tān ca niraṃśinaḥ bhrānti dṛṣṭyā vadanti

original: tasmātparā (ramā)
analyzed: tasmāt parā ramā

original: ṇoḥ paramāṇutvamasti tadaṃśānāṃ vinatāgarbhajāta // GarP_3,3.45 //
analyzed: ṇoḥ paramāṇu tvam asti tad aṃśānām vinatā garbha jāta

original: parā (ramā) ṇūnāmekadeśe khagendra tanno saṃti prāṇināṃ rāśayaśca /
analyzed: parā rama ṇūnām eka deśe khaga indra tat no saṃti prāṇinām rāśayaḥ ca

original: pratyekaśa saṃti rūpā hareśca hyataśca tatparamāṇoraṇīyaḥ // GarP_3,3.46 //
analyzed: pratyekaśa saṃti rūpāḥ hareḥ ca hi atas ca tat paramāṇoḥ aṇīyaḥ

original: yo vā tvaṇīyānparamasya viṣṇoḥ sa eva rūpo mahato mahīyān /
analyzed: yaḥ vā tu aṇīyān paramasya viṣṇoḥ saḥ eva rūpaḥ mahataḥ mahīyān

original: teṣāmanyonyaṃ na viśeṣosti kaścidacintyarūpe ca vicintanīyaḥ // GarP_3,3.47 //
analyzed: teṣām anyonyam na viśeṣaḥ usti kaścid acintya rūpe ca vicintanīyaḥ

original: kālakoṭivihīnatvaṃ kālānantyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ /
analyzed: kāla koṭi vihīna tvam kāla ānantyam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: deśakoṭivihīnatvaṃ deśānantyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ // GarP_3,3.48 //
analyzed: deśa koṭi vihīna tvam deśa ānantyam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: guṇānāmaprameyatve guṇānantyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ /
analyzed: guṇānām aprameya tve guṇa ānantyam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: ānantyaṃ trividhaṃ nityaṃ harernānyasya kasyacit // GarP_3,3.49 //
analyzed: ānantyam trividham nityam hareḥ na anyasya kasyacid

original: tasya sarvasvarūpeṣu cānantyaṃ tu trilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tasya sarva svarūpeṣu ca ānantyam tu tri lakṣaṇam

original: tathāpi deśatastasya paricchedopi yujyate // GarP_3,3.50 //
analyzed: tathā api deśataḥ tasya paricchedaḥ api yujyate

original: paricchedastathā vyāpterekarūpepi yujyate /
analyzed: paricchedaḥ tathā vyāpteḥ eka rūpe api yujyate

original: tasyācintyādbhutaiśvaryaṃ vyavahārārthameva ca // GarP_3,3.51 //
analyzed: tasya acintya adbhuta aiśvaryam vyavahāra artham eva ca

original: guṇataḥ kālataścaiva paricchedo na kutracit /
analyzed: guṇataḥ kālataḥ ca eva paricchedaḥ na kutracid

original: vyāptatvaṃ deśato hyasti sarvabhūteṣu yadyāpi // GarP_3,3.52 //
analyzed: vyāpta tvam deśataḥ hi asti sarva bhūteṣu yadi api

original: na ca bhedaḥ kvacittasya hyaṇumātrepi yujyate /
analyzed: na ca bhedaḥ kvacid tasya hi aṇu mātre api yujyate

original: tathāpi vidyateṇutvaṃ tasmādaiśvaryayogataḥ // GarP_3,3.53 //
analyzed: tathā api vidyateṇu tvam tasmāt aiśvarya yogataḥ

original: tasmādviddhyavatārārthaṃ vyāptatvaṃ cāpi bhaṇyate /
analyzed: tasmāt viddhi avatāra artham vyāpta tvam ca api bhaṇyate

original: yattasya vyāpakaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ // GarP_3,3.54 //
analyzed: yat tasya vyāpakam rūpam param nārāyaṇam viduḥ

original: ataśca paramāṇūnāṃ pārthivā'nantyavādinām /
analyzed: atas ca paramāṇūnām pārthiva ānantya vādinām

original: bhedaḥ parasparaṃ jñeyastatheśasya mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,3.55 //
analyzed: bhedaḥ parasparam jñeyaḥ tathā īśasya mahātmanaḥ

original: jaḍeśayorjaḍānāṃ ca jīvānāṃ ca parasparam /
analyzed: jaḍa īśayoḥ jaḍānām ca jīvānām ca parasparam

original: tathaiva jaḍajīvānāṃ nityaṃ bhedo jaḍeśayoḥ // GarP_3,3.56 //
analyzed: tathā eva jaḍa jīvānām nityam bhedaḥ jaḍa īśayoḥ

original: pañca bhedā ime nityaṃ sarvāvasthāsu sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: pañca bhedāḥ ime nityam sarva avasthāsu sarvaśas

original: etādṛśyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ vīryamādhatta vīryavān // GarP_3,3.57 //
analyzed: etādṛśyām tu māyāyām vīryam ādhatta vīryavān

original: puruṣākhyo haristasmāttriguṇānasṛjatprabhuḥ // GarP_3,3.58 //
analyzed: puruṣa ākhyaḥ hariḥ tasmāt triguṇān asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavadvīryasvarūpatadādhānadvārakaguṇatraya sṛṣṭijaḍeśabhedādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavat vīryasvarūpatadādhānadvārakaguṇatrayasṛṣṭijaḍeśabhedādinirūpaṇam nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 4
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: yathā sasarja bhagavāṃstrīn guṇānprakṛtestadā /
analyzed: yathā sasarja bhagavān trīn guṇān prakṛteḥ tadā

original: lakṣmīstrirūpā saṃbhūtā śrīrbhūrdurgoti saṃjñitā // GarP_3,4.1 //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ tri rūpā saṃbhūtā śrīḥ bhūḥ durgā iti saṃjñitā

original: sattvābhimāninī śrīstu bhūrdevī rajamāninī /
analyzed: sattva abhimāninī śrīḥ tu bhūḥ devī raja māninī

original: tamobhimāninī durgā hyevamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ // GarP_3,4.2 //
analyzed: tamaḥ abhimāninī durgā hi evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: antaraṃ na vijānīyādrūpāṇāṃ ca parasparam /
analyzed: antaram na vijānīyāt rūpāṇām ca parasparam

original: guṇānāṃ caiva saṃbandhāddurgādīnāṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,4.3 //
analyzed: guṇānām ca eva saṃbandhāt durgā ādīnām khageśvara

original: antaraṃ ye vijānanti te yāntyandhantamaḥ param /
analyzed: antaram ye vijānanti te yānti andhantamaḥ param

original: puruṣastu trirūpobhūdviṣṇurbrahmā bhavetisaḥ // GarP_3,4.4 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tu tri rūpaḥ bhūt viṣṇuḥ brahmā bhava iti saḥ

original: sattvena lokānvardhayituṃ viṣṇuḥ sākṣāddhariḥ svayam /
analyzed: sattvena lokān vardhayitum viṣṇuḥ sākṣāt hariḥ svayam

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ ca rajasā brahmaṇi prāviśaddhariḥ // GarP_3,4.5 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kartum ca rajasā brahmaṇi prāviśat hariḥ

original: ādyo brahmā sa vijñeyo na tu sākṣāddhariḥ svayam /
analyzed: ādyaḥ brahmā sa vijñeyaḥ na tu sākṣāt hariḥ svayam

original: tamasāpi samānhantuṃ rudre ca prāviśaddhariḥ // GarP_3,4.6 //
analyzed: tamasā api samān hantum rudre ca prāviśat hariḥ

original: rudre sthito rudrasaṃjño na rudrastu hariḥ svayam /
analyzed: rudre sthitaḥ rudra saṃjñaḥ na rudraḥ tu hariḥ svayam

original: viṣṇureva hariḥ sākṣāttāvubhauna harī smṛtau // GarP_3,4.7 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ eva hariḥ sākṣāt tau ubhau na harī smṛtau

original: āviṣṭarūpau vijñeyau brahmarudrābhidhāyakau /
analyzed: āviṣṭa rūpau vijñeyau brahma rudra abhidhāyakau

original: evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,4.8 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā mokṣam eti na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: viṣṇubrahmādirūpāṇāmaikyaṃ jānanti ye dvijāḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇu brahma ādi rūpāṇām aikyam jānanti ye dvijāḥ

original: te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam // GarP_3,4.9 //
analyzed: te yānti narakam ghoram punarāvṛtti varjitam

original: guṇatrayaṃ praviṣṭastu puruṣo hariravyayaḥ /
analyzed: guṇatrayam praviṣṭaḥ tu puruṣaḥ hariḥ avyayaḥ

original: kāryonmukhaṃ yathā bhūyātkṣobhayāmāsa vai tathā // GarP_3,4.10 //
analyzed: kārya unmukham yathā bhūyāt kṣobhayāmāsa vai tathā

original: jātakṣobhādbhagavato mahānāsīdguṇatrayāt /
analyzed: jāta kṣobhāt bhagavataḥ mahān āsīt guṇa trayāt

original: guṇatraye vidyamānādbhāgādeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.11 //
analyzed: guṇatraye vidyamānāt bhāgāt eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: mahato brahmavāyū ca jajñāte khābhimāninau /
analyzed: mahataḥ brahma vāyū ca jajñāte kha abhimāninau

original: tasya saṃvatsarātpaścādyamalau saṃbabhūvatuḥ // GarP_3,4.12 //
analyzed: tasya saṃvatsarāt paścāt yamalau saṃbabhūvatuḥ

original: rajaḥ pradhānaṃ yattatvaṃ mahattattavamitīritam /
analyzed: rajaḥ pradhānam mahat tattavam iti īritam

original: sargaṃ tvimaṃ vijānīyādguṇavaiṣamyanāmakam // GarP_3,4.13 //
analyzed: sargam tu imam vijānīyāt guṇa vaiṣamya nāmakam

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: mahattattavasvarūpasya jñānārthaṃ devakīsuta /
analyzed: mahat tat tava svarūpasya jñāna artham devakī suta

original: tvayoktā guṇavaiṣamyanāmikā sṛṣṭiruttamā // GarP_3,4.14 //
analyzed: tvayā uktā guṇa vaiṣamya nāmikā sṛṣṭiḥ uttamā

original: guṇavaiṣamyaśabdārthaṃ mama brūhi mahāprabho /
analyzed: guṇa vaiṣamya śabda artham mama brūhi mahā prabho

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: guṇavaiṣamyaśabdārthajñāpanāya khageśvara // GarP_3,4.15 //
analyzed: guṇa vaiṣamya śabda artha jñāpanāya khageśvara

original: apikṣitaṃ ca tatrādau guṇasāmyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: apikṣitam ca tatra ādau guṇa sāmyam na saṃśayaḥ

original: samyagjñāpayituṃ tatra khādau tāvatsvageśvara // GarP_3,4.16 //
analyzed: samyak jñāpayitum tatra kha ādau tāvat svaga īśvara

original: rāśibhūtaṃ guṇānāṃ tu darśayiṣye sthitiṃ ca vai /
analyzed: rāśi bhūtam guṇānām tu darśayiṣye sthitim ca vai

original: rāśībhūtasya tasamaḥ sakāśādvinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.17 //
analyzed: rāśībhūtasya tasamaḥ sakāśāt vinatā suta

original: rāśībhūtaṃ rajo jñeyandviguṇaṃ tattu nānyathā /
analyzed: rāśībhūtam rajaḥ jñeyat dviguṇam tat tu na anyathā

original: rāśībhūtasya rajasaḥ sakāśādvinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.18 //
analyzed: rāśībhūtasya rajasaḥ sakāśāt vinatā suta

original: rāśībhūtaṃ tathā sattvaṃ dviguṇaṃ samudāhṛtam /
analyzed: rāśībhūtam tathā sattvam dviguṇam samudāhṛtam

original: mūlaprakṛtijā hyete na mūlā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā // GarP_3,4.19 //
analyzed: mūlaprakṛti jāḥ hi ete na mūlā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā

original: yataḥ prakṛtirūpāṇāṃ paricchedo na vidyate /
analyzed: yatas prakṛti rūpāṇām paricchedaḥ na vidyate

original: ataḥ prakṛtijā jñeyā na mūlāste khageśvara // GarP_3,4.20 //
analyzed: atas prakṛti jāḥ jñeyāḥ na mūlāḥ te khageśvara

original: evaṃ tava guṇānāñca parimāṇaṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: evam tava guṇānām ca parimāṇam khageśvara

original: uktaṃ svarūpaṃ teṣāṃ tu tava samyak khageśvara // GarP_3,4.21 //
analyzed: uktam svarūpam teṣām tu tava samyak khageśvara

original: tatra rāśitraye sattvaṃ kevalaṃ samudāhṛtam /
analyzed: tatra rāśi traye sattvam kevalam samudāhṛtam

original: rajastamobhyāṃ garuḍa hyavimiśraṃ hyatastu tat // GarP_3,4.22 //
analyzed: rajaḥ tamobhyām garuḍa hi avimiśram hi atas tu tat

original: kevalaṃ sattvamityuktaṃ na tu śreṣṭhatvataḥ prabho /
analyzed: kevalam sattvam iti uktam na tu śreṣṭha tvataḥ prabho

original: sṛṣṭikāle kevalaṃ syātpralaye miśritaṃ bhavet // GarP_3,4.23 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi kāle kevalam syāt pralaye miśritam bhavet

original: sarvadāpyavimiśraṃ ca sattvarāśiṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: sarvadā api avimiśram ca sattva rāśim khageśvara

original: sarvadāpi vimiśraṃ ca sattvarāśiṃ dvijottama // GarP_3,4.24 //
analyzed: sarvadā api vimiśram ca sattva rāśim dvijottama

original: ye vijānanti te sarve viśanti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: ye vijānanti te sarve viśanti hi adharam tamaḥ

original: rajastamoguṇau vīndra itarābhyāṃ vimiśritau // GarP_3,4.25 //
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ guṇau vi indraḥ itarābhyām vimiśritau

original: sṛṣṭau pralayakālepi miśrāveva khageśvara /
analyzed: sṛṣṭau pralaya kāle api miśrau eva khageśvara

original: rāśibhūtepi rajasi rajobhāgācchatādhikam // GarP_3,4.26 //
analyzed: rāśi bhūte pi rajasi rajaḥ bhāgāt śata adhikam

original: sattvaṃ ca miśritaṃ jñeyaṃ nānyathā pakṣisattama /
analyzed: sattvam ca miśritam jñeyam na anyathā pakṣi sattama

original: rajasaḥ śatabhāgānāṃ madhye tu vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.27 //
analyzed: rajasaḥ śata bhāgānām madhye tu vinatā suta

original: ya eko bhāga uddiṣṭastāvatparimitaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ bhāgaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ tāvat parimitam tamaḥ

original: rāśibhūtepi rajasi miśritaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,4.28 //
analyzed: rāśi bhūte pi rajasi miśritam parikīrtitam

original: rajorāśisthitistvevaṃ tāta vyāptaṃ tamoguṇaiḥ /
analyzed: rajaḥ rāśi sthitiḥ tu evam tāta vyāptam tamaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: rāśibhūtepi tamasi sattvaṃ ca vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.29 //
analyzed: rāśi bhūte api tamasi sattvam ca vinatā suta

original: tamaḥ sakāśādgaruḍa daśabhāgādhikena ca /
analyzed: tamaḥ sakāśāt garuḍa daśa bhāga adhikena ca

original: miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.30 //
analyzed: miśritam bhavati iti evam jñātavyam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tamaso daśabhāgānāṃ madhye tu vinatāsuta /
analyzed: tamasaḥ daśa bhāgānām madhye tu vinatā suta

original: ya eko bhāga uddiṣṭastāvatparimitaṃ rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.31 //
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ bhāgaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ tāvat parimitam rajaḥ

original: rāśibhūtepi tamasi miśritaṃ bhavati dhruvam /
analyzed: rāśi bhūta ipi tamasi miśritam bhavati dhruvam

original: tamorāśisthitistvevaṃ jñātavyā pakṣisattama // GarP_3,4.32 //
analyzed: tamaḥ rāśi sthitiḥ tu evam jñātavyā pakṣi sattama

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: raśibhūtepi rajasi rāśibhūte tamasyapi /
analyzed: raśi bhūte api rajasi rāśi bhūte tamasi api

original: sattvāṃśā hyadhikāḥ saṃtītyevamuktaṃ mayānagha // GarP_3,4.33 //
analyzed: sattva aṃśāḥ hi adhikāḥ saṃti iti evam uktam mayā anagha

original: tatra me saṃśayo hyasti śṛṇu tvaṃ sāttvatāṃ pate /
analyzed: tatra me saṃśayaḥ hi asti śṛṇu tvam sāttvatām pate

original: yadrāśyāṃ yadrā śibhāgā hyadhikāḥ saṃti yāvatā // GarP_3,4.34 //
analyzed: yad rāśyām yad rā śi bhāgāḥ hi adhikāḥ saṃti yāvatā

original: tāvatā vyavahāraḥ syātkṣīranīramiva prabho /
analyzed: tāvatā vyavahāraḥ syāt kṣīra nīram iva prabho

original: śrutvā sa garuḍenoktaṃ bhagavānpuruṣottamaḥ // GarP_3,4.35 //
analyzed: śrutvā sa garuḍena uktam bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: uvāca para maprītyā saṃstuvan garuḍaṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: uvāca para ma prītyā saṃstuvan garuḍam hariḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: rajorāśyā tamorāśyā sattvarāśyadhikā sadā // GarP_3,4.36 //
analyzed: rajaḥ rāśyā tamaḥ rāśyā sattva rāśī adhikā sadā

original: miśritaṃ cāpi pakṣīndra na sattavamiti kīrtyate /
analyzed: miśritam ca api pakṣi indra na sattavam iti kīrtyate

original: rajorāśistamorāśirityevaṃ vibudhā viduḥ // GarP_3,4.37 //
analyzed: rajaḥ rāśiḥ tamaḥ rāśiḥ iti evam vibudhāḥ viduḥ

original: viṣaṃ tu carudugdhasthaṃ viṣamityucyate yathā /
analyzed: viṣam tu caru dugdha stham viṣam iti ucyate yathā

original: evaṃ mayoktā garuḍa guṇānāṃ nijasaṃsthitiḥ // GarP_3,4.38 //
analyzed: evam mayā uktā garuḍa guṇānām nija saṃsthitiḥ

original: sāmyāvasthāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śṛṇvidānīṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: sāmya avasthām guṇānām ca śṛṇu idānīm khageśvara

original: rāśīkṛtācca rajasaḥ janyaṃ yacca kageśvara // GarP_3,4.39 //
analyzed: rāśīkṛtāt ca rajasaḥ janyam yat ca kaga īśvara

original: mahattattve praviṣṭaṃ ca yadrajaḥ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: mahat tattve praviṣṭam ca yat rajaḥ parikīrtitam

original: pralaye samanuprāpte mahattattve sthitaṃ rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.40 //
analyzed: pralaye samanuprāpte mahat tattve sthitam rajaḥ

original: dvādaśāṃśena tu hyaddhā vibhaktaṃ bhavatiṃ prabho /
analyzed: dvādaśa aṃśena tu hi addhā vibhaktam bhavatim prabho

original: rāśībhūte hi sattve tu daśabhāgena miśritam // GarP_3,4.41 //
analyzed: rāśībhūte hi sattve tu daśa bhāgena miśritam

original: samyak bhavati pakṣīndra tathaikāṃśena cāṇḍaja /
analyzed: samyak bhavati pakṣi indra tathā eka aṃśena ca aṇḍaja

original: tamorāśyā miśritaṃ ca bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.42 //
analyzed: tamaḥ rāśyā miśritam ca bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: anyenaikena bhāgena rajorāśyā khageśvara /
analyzed: anyena ekena bhāgena rajaḥ rāśyā khageśvara

original: miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nānyathā kvacit // GarP_3,4.43 //
analyzed: miśritam bhavati iti evam jñātavyam na anyathā kvacid

original: guṇatrayepi bhagavānmahattattvasya cāṇḍaja /
analyzed: guṇatraye api bhagavān mahat tattvasya ca aṇḍaja

original: evaṃ layastu jñātavyo hṛdi tattvārthavodibhiḥ // GarP_3,4.44 //
analyzed: evam layaḥ tu jñātavyaḥ hṛdi tattva artha vodibhiḥ

original: evaṃ guṇatrayāṇāṃ ca miśritattvātkhageśvara /
analyzed: evam guṇa trayāṇām ca miśri tattvāt khageśvara

original: guṇasāmyamiti prāhurevaṃ jānīhi vai khaga // GarP_3,4.45 //
analyzed: guṇa sāmyam iti prāhuḥ evam jānīhi vai khaga

original: anyathā ye vijānanti te yānti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: anyathā ye vijānanti te yānti hi adharam tamaḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: rāśīkṛtaguṇānāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ parameśvara // GarP_3,4.46 //
analyzed: rāśīkṛta guṇānām ca trayāṇām parameśvara

original: viśālānāṃ paraṃ brahmanpralaye guṇasāmyatā /
analyzed: viśālānām param brahman pralaye guṇa sāmya tā

original: kathaṃ brūhi mahābhāga etattattvaṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_3,4.47 //
analyzed: katham brūhi mahābhāga etat tattvam samāsatas

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: rāśībhūtaguṇānāṃ tu trayaṇāmapi sattama /
analyzed: rāśībhūta guṇānām tu trayaṇām api sattama

original: tadā vimiśritatvena hyavasthānaṃ vidurbudhāḥ // GarP_3,4.48 //
analyzed: tadā vimiśrita tvena hi avasthānam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: idānīṃ guṇavaiṣamyaṃ śṛṇu samyaṅ mama priya /
analyzed: idānīm guṇa vaiṣamyam śṛṇu samyak mama priya

original: sṛṣṭikāle tu saṃprāpte yatpūrvaṃ pralaye khaga // GarP_3,4.49 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi kāle tu saṃprāpte yat pūrvam pralaye khaga

original: daśabhāgaiśca sattve tu miśritaṃ yadra jastathā /
analyzed: daśa bhāgaiḥ ca sattve tu miśritam yat rajaḥ tathā

original: tamasyapyekabhāgena praviṣṭaṃ yattu tadrajaḥ // GarP_3,4.50 //
analyzed: tamasi api eka bhāgena praviṣṭam yat tu tat rajaḥ

original: rajasyapyekabhāgena praviṣṭaṃ yacca tadrajaḥ /
analyzed: rajasi api eka bhāgena praviṣṭam yat ca tat rajaḥ

original: evaṃ dvādaśabhāgaiśca praviṣṭaṃ sarvaśo rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.51 //
analyzed: evam dvādaśa bhāgaiḥ ca praviṣṭam sarvaśas rajaḥ

original: sattvastairdaśabhāgaiśca tathaikena rajoṃśinā /
analyzed: sattvaḥ taiḥ daśa bhāgaiḥ ca tathā ekena rajaḥ oṃśinā

original: evamekādaśairbhāgaistamasthāṃśena vai vdija // GarP_3,4.52 //
analyzed: evam ekādaśaiḥ bhāgaiḥ tamastha aṃśena vai

original: miśritaṃ bhavati hyaddhā mahattattvaṃ tadā smṛtam /
analyzed: miśritam bhavati hi addhā mahat tattvam tadā smṛtam

original: etadanyo viśeṣaśca mantadhyo vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.53 //
analyzed: etad anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ ca mantadhyaḥ vinatā suta

original: ekāṃśastāmaso jñeyo mahattattve na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tāmasaḥ jñeyaḥ mahat tattve na saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ trayodaśairbhāgairmiśritaṃ tacca sattama // GarP_3,4.54 //
analyzed: evam trayodaśaiḥ bhāgaiḥ miśritam tat ca sattama

original: evametadvijānīyānnānyathā tu kathañcana /
analyzed: evam etat vijānīyāt na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: caturmukhācchrutaṃ pūrvaṃ bhagavansāttvatāṃ pate // GarP_3,4.55 //
analyzed: caturmukhāt śrutam pūrvam bhagavan sāttvatām pate

original: caturbhāgātsamutpannaṃ mahattattvamiti prabho /
analyzed: catur bhāgāt samutpannam mahat tattvam iti prabho

original: tatraikāṃśastamaḥ proktaḥ tribhāgo raja eva ca // GarP_3,4.56 //
analyzed: tatra eka aṃśaḥ tamaḥ proktaḥ tri bhāgaḥ rajaḥ eva ca

original: tadāhurbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ guṇavaiṣamyanāmakam /
analyzed: tat āhuḥ brahmaṇaḥ rūpam guṇa vaiṣamya nāmakam

original: caturbhāgātmakaṃ proktaṃ mahattattvaṃ śrutaṃ mayā // GarP_3,4.57 //
analyzed: catur bhāga ātmakam proktam mahat tattvam śrutam mayā

original: trayodaśāṃśaiḥ saṃbhūtamiti proktaṃ tvayānagha /
analyzed: trayodaśa aṃśaiḥ saṃbhūtam iti proktam tvayā anagha

original: tadetatsaṃśayaṃ chindhi kṛpālo bhaktavatsala // GarP_3,4.58 //
analyzed: tat etat saṃśayam chindhi kṛpālaḥ bhakta vatsala

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: brahmoktamya mayoktasya vivādo nāsti sarvathā /
analyzed: mayā uktasya vivādaḥ nā asti sarvathā
