original: mūlasattve miśritaṃ ca daśabhāgena yadrajaḥ // GarP_3,4.59 //
analyzed: mūla sattve miśritam ca daśa bhāgena yat rajaḥ

original: tatsarvaṃ ca militvaiva tveko bhāgastu kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: tat sarvam ca militvā eva tu ekaḥ bhāgaḥ tu kīrtitaḥ

original: mūle rajasi yaccokto rajobhāgaḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,4.60 //
analyzed: mūle rajasi yat ca uktaḥ rajaḥ bhāgaḥ khageśvara

original: bhāge dvitīye vijñeyastadrajo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: bhāge dvitīye vijñeyaḥ tat rajaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: mūle tamasi yaccokto rajobhāgastathaiva ca // GarP_3,4.61 //
analyzed: mūle tamasi yat ca uktaḥ rajaḥ bhāgaḥ tathā eva ca

original: tṛtīyabhāgo vijñeyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: tṛtīya bhāgaḥ vijñeyaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tathā mūle ca tamasi hyeko bhāgastamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,4.62 //
analyzed: tathā mūle ca tamasi hi ekaḥ bhāgaḥ tamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ tribhāgo rajasaḥ ekāṃśastamasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: evam tri bhāgaḥ rajasaḥ eka aṃśaḥ tamasaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tadāhurbrahmaṇo dehaṃ guṇavaiṣamyanāmakam // GarP_3,4.63 //
analyzed: tat āhuḥ brahmaṇaḥ deham guṇa vaiṣamya nāmakam

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: mahattattvasya catvāro bhāgāsteṣu rajastrayaḥ /
analyzed: mahat tattvasya catvāraḥ bhāgāḥ teṣu rajaḥ trayaḥ

original: tamasastveka eveti tvayoktaṃ garuḍadhvaja // GarP_3,4.64 //
analyzed: tamasaḥ tu ekaḥ evā iti tvayā uktam garuḍadhvaja

original: rajobhāgātmako dehoḥ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: rajaḥ bhāga ātmakaḥ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: iti pratīyate brahmanvacanāttava mādhava // GarP_3,4.65 //
analyzed: iti pratīyate brahman vacanāt tava mādhava

original: śuddhasattvātmako deho brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: śuddha sattva ātmakaḥ dehaḥ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: evaṃ hi śrūyate kṛṣṇa saṃśayo metra bādhate // GarP_3,4.66 //
analyzed: evam hi śrūyate kṛṣṇa saṃśayaḥ mā itra bādhate

original: tamevaṃ saṃśayaṃ chindhi yaddhi tacchrotumarhati /
analyzed: tam evam saṃśayam chindhi yat hi tat śrotum arhati

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: tribhāgabhūte rajasi tathā dvādaśadhāpi ca // GarP_3,4.67 //
analyzed: tri bhāga bhūte rajasi tathā dvādaśadhā api ca

original: rajasopekṣayā sattvaṃ daśāṃśādhikameva ca /
analyzed: rajasā upekṣayā sattvam daśa aṃśa adhikam eva ca

original: praviṣṭamastīti khaga jñātavyaṃ tacchaṇu dvija // GarP_3,4.68 //
analyzed: praviṣṭam asti iti khaga jñātavyam tat śaṇu dvija

original: tamasopekṣayā sattvaṃ daśāṃśādhikameva vai /
analyzed: tamasā upekṣayā sattvam daśa aṃśa adhikam eva vai

original: praviṣṭamastīti khaga vaktavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.69 //
analyzed: praviṣṭam asti iti khaga vaktavyam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tamasopekṣayā tatra tama ekādaśaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: tamasā upekṣayā tatra tamaḥ ekādaśam smṛtam

original: ekāṃśastu rajo jñeyamevamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tu rajaḥ jñeyam evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: evaṃ ca militānbhāgānvakṣye śṛṇu mahāmate // GarP_3,4.70 //
analyzed: evam ca militān bhāgān vakṣye śṛṇu mahāmate

original: mahattattvasamutpattā upādānaṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: mahat tattva samutpattā upādānam khageśvara

original: trayodaśāṃśā vijñeyā dvādaśāśaṃ rajaḥ smṛtam // GarP_3,4.71 //
analyzed: trayodaśa aṃśāḥ vijñeyāḥ dvādaśa āśam rajaḥ smṛtam

original: ekāṃśastamaso jñeyastatra bhāgāñchṛṇu dvijā /
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tamasaḥ jñeyaḥ tatra bhāgān śṛṇu dvijāḥ

original: ādau tu dvādaśāṃśeṣu bhāgānvakṣyāmi tacchṛṇu // GarP_3,4.72 //
analyzed: ādau tu dvādaśa aṃśeṣu bhāgān vakṣyāmi tat śṛṇu

original: ekāṃśastamaso jñeyastaddaśāṃ śādhikaṃ rajaḥ /
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tamasaḥ jñeyaḥ tad daśām śa adhikam rajaḥ

original: tacchatāṃśādhikaṃ sattvamevamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ // GarP_3,4.73 //
analyzed: tad śata aṃśa adhikam sattvam evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: ekāṃśatamasi hyevaṃ vibhāgāñchṛṇu sattama /
analyzed: eka aṃśa tamasi hi evam vibhāgān śṛṇu sattama

original: ekāṃśastu rajo jñeyastamo hyekā daśādhikam // GarP_3,4.74 //
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tu rajaḥ jñeyaḥ tamaḥ hi ekā daśa adhikam

original: tamobhāgāstu vijñeyāstaddaśāṃśādhikaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ bhāgāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ tad daśa aṃśa adhikaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: sattvabhāga iti jñeyo mahattattve khageśvara // GarP_3,4.75 //
analyzed: sattva bhāgaḥ iti jñeyaḥ mahat tattve khageśvara

original: sattvāṃśo bahulo yasmācchuddhasattvaṃ caturmukhaḥ /
analyzed: sattva aṃśaḥ bahulaḥ yasmāt śuddhasattvam caturmukhaḥ

original: utpattirmahataścoktā evaṃ ca vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.76 //
analyzed: utpattiḥ mahataḥ ca uktā evam ca vinatā suta

original: tajjñānānmokṣamāpnoti nānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,4.77 //
analyzed: tad jñānāt mokṣam āpnoti na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe guṇavaiṣamyabhedabrahmadehasvarūpaguṇasāmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturtho
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe guṇavaiṣamyabhedabrahmadehasvarūpaguṇasāmyanirūpaṇam nāma caturthaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 5
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: etādṛśe mahattattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam /
analyzed: etādṛśe mahat tattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam

original: praviveśa mahābhāga kṣobhayāmāsa vai hariḥ // GarP_3,5.1 //
analyzed: praviveśa mahābhāga kṣobhayāmāsa vai hariḥ

original: ahantattvamabhūttasmājjñānadravyakriyātmakam /
analyzed: aham tattvam abhūt tasmāt jñāna dravya kriyā ātmakam

original: ahaṅkārasamutpattāvekāṃśastamasi smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,5.2 //
analyzed: ahaṅkāra samutpattau eka aṃśaḥ tamasi smṛtaḥ

original: taddaśāṃśādhikarajastaddaśāṃśādhikaṃ prabho /
analyzed: tad daśa aṃśa adhika rajaḥ tad daśa aṃśa adhikam prabho

original: sattvamityucyate sadbhirhyetadātmā tvahaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,5.3 //
analyzed: sattvam iti ucyate sadbhiḥ hi etat ātmā tu aham smṛtam

original: ahantattvābhimānī tu ādau śeṣo babhūvaha /
analyzed: ahar tattva abhimānī tu ādau śeṣaḥ babhūva ha

original: sahasrābdācca paścāttau jātau khagaharau dvija // GarP_3,5.4 //
analyzed: sahasra abdāt ca paścāt tau jātau khaga harau dvija

original: ahantattve khaga hyeṣu praviṣṭo hariravyayaḥ /
analyzed: ahar tattve khaga hi eṣu praviṣṭaḥ hariḥ avyayaḥ

original: kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavāllaṅkṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam // GarP_3,5.5 //
analyzed: kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavān laṅkṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam

original: vaikārikastāmasaśca taijasaścetyahaṃ tridhā /
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ tāmasaḥ ca taijasaḥ ca iti aham tridhā

original: tridhā babhūva rudropi yatasteṣāṃ niyāmakaḥ // GarP_3,5.6 //
analyzed: tridhā babhūva rudraḥ api yatas teṣām niyāmakaḥ

original: vaikārikasthito rudro vaikārika iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vaikārika sthitaḥ rudraḥ vaikārikaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: tāmase tu sthito rudrastāmaso hyabhidhīyate // GarP_3,5.7 //
analyzed: tāmase tu sthitaḥ rudraḥ tāmasaḥ hi abhidhīyate

original: taijase tu sthito rudro loke vai taijasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: taijase tu sthitaḥ rudraḥ loke vai taijasaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: taijase tu hyahantattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam // GarP_3,5.8 //
analyzed: taijase tu hi ahar tattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam

original: viśitvā kṣobhayāmāsa tadāsau daśadhā tvabhūt /
analyzed: viśitvā kṣobhayāmāsa tadā asau daśadhā tu abhūt

original: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca // GarP_3,5.9 //
analyzed: śrotram cakṣuḥ sparśanam ca rasanam ghrāṇam eva ca

original: vākpāṇipādaṃ pāyuśca upastheti daśa smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: vāc pāṇi pādam pāyuḥ ca upasthā iti daśa smṛtāḥ

original: vaikārike hyahantattve praviśya kṣobhayaddhariḥ // GarP_3,5.10 //
analyzed: vaikārike hi ahar tattve praviśya kṣobhayat hariḥ

original: mahattattvādimā adāvindriyāṇāṃ ca devatāḥ /
analyzed: mahat tattva ādimāḥ adau indriyāṇām ca devatāḥ

original: ekādaśavidhā āsankrameṇa tu khageśvara // GarP_3,5.11 //
analyzed: ekādaśavidhāḥ āsan krameṇa tu khageśvara

original: manobhimāni nī hyādau vāruṇī tvabhavattadā /
analyzed: nī hi ādau vāruṇī tu abhavat tadā

original: anantaraṃ ca sauparṇī gaurojāpi tathaiva ca // GarP_3,5.12 //
analyzed: anantaram ca sauparṇī gaurojā api tathā eva ca

original: śeṣādanantarāstāsāṃ daśavarṣādanaṃram /
analyzed: śeṣāt anantarāḥ tāsām daśa varṣāt anaṃram

original: utpattiriti vijñeyaṃ krameṇa tu khageśvara // GarP_3,5.13 //
analyzed: utpattiḥ iti vijñeyam krameṇa tu khageśvara

original: manobhimānināvanyāvindrakāmau prajajñatuḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ abhimāninau anyau indra kāmau prajajñatuḥ

original: tārkṣya hyanantarau jñeyau muktau saṃsāra eva ca // GarP_3,5.14 //
analyzed: tārkṣya hi anantarau jñeyau muktau saṃsāraḥ eva ca

original: tatastvagātmā hyabhavatsohaṃ kārika īritaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tvac ātmā hi abhavat saḥ ham kārikaḥ īritaḥ

original: tataḥ pāṇyātmakāścaiva jajñire pakṣisattama // GarP_3,5.15 //
analyzed: tatas pāṇi ātmakāḥ ca eva jajñire pakṣi sattama

original: śacī ratiścāniruddhastathā svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ /
analyzed: śacī ratiḥ ca aniruddhaḥ tathā svāyaṃbhuvaḥ manuḥ

original: bṛhaspatistathā dakṣa ete pāṇyātmakāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,5.16 //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ tathā dakṣaḥ ete pāṇi ātmakāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: dakṣasyānantaraṃ jajñe pravāho nāma cāṇḍaja /
analyzed: dakṣasya anantaram jajñe pravāhaḥ nāma ca aṇḍaja

original: sa evoktaścātiṃvāho yāpayatyātmacoditaḥ // GarP_3,5.17 //
analyzed: saḥ eva uktaḥ ca atiṃvāhaḥ yāpayati ātma coditaḥ

original: hastādanantaraṃ jñeyo na tu śacyādivatsmṛtaḥ /
analyzed: hastāt anantaram jñeyaḥ na tu śacī ādi vat smṛtaḥ

original: tatobhavanmahābhāga cakṣuridriyamātmanaḥ // GarP_3,5.18 //
analyzed: tatas bhavat mahābhāga cakṣuḥ idriyam ātmanaḥ

original: svāyaṃbhuvamanorbhāryā śatarūpā yamastathā /
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuva manoḥ bhāryā śatarūpā yamaḥ tathā

original: candrasūryau tu cattvāraścakṣurindriyamāninaḥ // GarP_3,5.19 //
analyzed: candra sūryau tu cattvāraḥ cakṣuḥ indriya māninaḥ

original: candraḥ śrotrābhimānīti tathā jñeyaḥ khageśvara /
analyzed: candraḥ śrotra abhimānī iti tathā jñeyaḥ khageśvara

original: jihvendriyātmā varuṇaḥ sūryasyānantarobhavat // GarP_3,5.20 //
analyzed: jihvā indriya ātmā varuṇaḥ sūryasya anantaraḥ bhavat

original: vāgindriyābhimāninyo hyabhavanvaruṇādanu /
analyzed: vāc indriya abhimāninyaḥ hi abhavan varuṇāt anu

original: dakṣapatnī prasūtiśca bhṛguragnistarthava ca // GarP_3,5.21 //
analyzed: dakṣa patnī prasūtiḥ ca bhṛguḥ agniḥ ca

original: tatra vaite mahātmāno vāgindriyaniyāmakāḥ /
analyzed: tatra vā ete mahātmānaḥ vāc indriya niyāmakāḥ

original: ye kravyādādayaścoktāstenantattvaniyāmakāḥ // GarP_3,5.22 //
analyzed: ye kravyāda ādayaḥ ca uktāḥ tenan tattva niyāmakāḥ

original: sāmyatvācca tathaivoktirna tu tattvābhimānitaḥ /
analyzed: sāmya tvāt ca tathā evā uktiḥ na tu tattva abhimānitaḥ

original: upasthamānino vīndra babhūvustadanantaram // GarP_3,5.23 //
analyzed: upastha māninaḥ vi indra babhūvuḥ tad anantaram

original: viśvāmitro vasiṣṭotrirmarīciḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ vasiṣṭotriḥ marīciḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ

original: pulastyoṅgirasaścaiva tathā vaivasvato manuḥ // GarP_3,5.24 //
analyzed: pulastyaḥ uṅgirasaḥ ca eva tathā vaivasvataḥ manuḥ

original: manvādayonantasaṃkhyā upasthātmāna īritāḥ /
analyzed: manu ādayaḥ ananta saṃkhyāḥ upastha ātmānaḥ īritāḥ

original: pāyośca mānino vīndra jajñire tadanantaram // GarP_3,5.25 //
analyzed: pāyoḥ ca māninaḥ vi indra jajñire tad anantaram

original: sūryeṣu dvādaśasveko mitrastārā guroḥ priyā /
analyzed: sūryeṣu dvādaśasu ekaḥ mitraḥ tārā guroḥ priyā

original: koṇādhipo nirṛtiśca pravahapriyā // GarP_3,5.26 //
analyzed: koṇādhipaḥ nirṛtiḥ ca pravahapriyā

original: cattvāra ete pakṣīndra vāyutattvābhimāninaḥ /
analyzed: cattvāraḥ ete pakṣi indra vāyu tattva abhimāninaḥ

original: ghrāṇābhimāninaḥ sarve jajñire dvijasattama // GarP_3,5.27 //
analyzed: ghrāṇa abhimāninaḥ sarve jajñire dvijasattama

original: viṣvavaseno vāyuputrau hyaśvinau gaṇapastathā /
analyzed: viṣvavasenaḥ vāyuputrau hi aśvinau gaṇapaḥ tathā

original: vittapaḥ sapta vasava ukto hyāgnistathāṣṭamaḥ // GarP_3,5.28 //
analyzed: vittapaḥ sapta vasavaḥ uktaḥ

original: satyānāṃ śṛṇu nāmāni droṇaḥ prāṇo dhruvastathā /
analyzed: satyānām śṛṇu nāmāni droṇaḥ prāṇaḥ dhruvaḥ tathā

original: arke doṣastathā vaskaḥ saptamastu vibhāvasuḥ // GarP_3,5.29 //
analyzed: arke doṣaḥ tathā vaskaḥ saptamaḥ tu vibhāvasuḥ

original: daśarudrāstathā jñeyā mūlarudro bhavaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: daśa rudrāḥ tathā jñeyāḥ mūlarudraḥ bhavaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: daśa rudrasya nāmāni śṛṇuṣva dvijasattama // GarP_3,5.30 //
analyzed: daśa rudrasya nāmāni śṛṇuṣva dvijasattama

original: raivanteyastathā bhīmo vāmadevo vṛṣākapiḥ /
analyzed: raivanteyaḥ tathā bhīmaḥ vāmadevaḥ vṛṣākapiḥ

original: ajaikapādahirvudhnyo bahurūpo mahāniti // GarP_3,5.31 //
analyzed: ajaikapād ahirvudhnyaḥ bahu rūpaḥ mahān iti

original: daśa rudrā iti proktāḥ ṣaḍādityāñchṛṇu dvija /
analyzed: daśa rudrāḥ iti proktāḥ ṣaṭ ādityān śṛṇu dvija

original: urukramastathā śakro vivasvānvaruṇastathā // GarP_3,5.32 //
analyzed: urukramaḥ tathā śakraḥ vivasvān varuṇaḥ tathā

original: parjanyotibāhureta uktāḥ pūrvaṃ dvijottama /
analyzed: parjanya ūtibāhuḥ ete uktāḥ pūrvam dvijottama

original: parjanyavyatiriktāstu pañcaivoktā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,5.33 //
analyzed: parjanya vyatiriktāḥ tu pañca eva uktāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: gaṅgāsamastu parjanya iti coktaḥ khageśvara /
analyzed: gaṅgā samaḥ tu parjanyaḥ iti ca uktaḥ khageśvara

original: savitā hyaryamā dhātā pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathā bhagaḥ // GarP_3,5.34 //
analyzed: savitā hi aryamā dhātā pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathā bhagaḥ

original: catvāriṃśattathā sapta mahataḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: catvāriṃśat tathā sapta mahataḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: dvāvuktāviti vijñeyo pravahotivahastathā // GarP_3,5.35 //
analyzed: dvau uktau iti pravahaḥ ūtivahaḥ tathā

original: tathā daśavidhā jñeyā viśvedevāḥ khageśvara /
analyzed: tathā daśavidhāḥ jñeyāḥ viśvedevāḥ khageśvara

original: śṛṇu nāmāni teṣāṃ tu purūravārdravasaṃjñakau // GarP_3,5.36 //
analyzed: śṛṇu nāmāni teṣām tu purūrava ārdrava saṃjñakau

original: dhūrilocanasaṃjñau dvau kratudakṣetisaṃjñakau /
analyzed: dhūri locana saṃjñau dvau kratu dakṣa iti saṃjñakau

original: dvau satyavasusaṃjñau ca kāmakālakasaṃjñakau // GarP_3,5.37 //
analyzed: dvau satyavasu saṃjñau ca kāmakālaka saṃjñakau

original: evaṃ daśavidhā jñeyā viśvedevāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: evam daśavidhāḥ jñeyāḥ viśvedevāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: tathā ṛbhugaṇaścoktastathā ca pitarastrayaḥ // GarP_3,5.38 //
analyzed: tathā ṛbhu gaṇaḥ ca uktaḥ tathā ca pitaraḥ trayaḥ

original: dyāvā pṛthivyau vijñeyau ete ca ṣaḍaśītayaḥ /
analyzed: dyāvā pṛthivyau vijñeyau ete ca ṣaḍaśītayaḥ

original: devāḥ prajajñire sarve nāsikadriyamāninaḥ // GarP_3,5.39 //
analyzed: devāḥ prajajñire sarve nāsikadriya māninaḥ

original: ākāśasyābhimānī tu gaṇapaḥ sudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśasya abhimānī tu gaṇapaḥ sudāhṛtaḥ

original: ubhayatrābhi mānīti jñeyaṃ tattvārthavedibhiḥ // GarP_3,5.40 //
analyzed: ubhayatra abhi māni iti jñeyam tattva artha vedibhiḥ

original: viṣvaksenaṃ vinā sarve jayādyā viṣṇupārṣadāḥ /
analyzed: viṣvaksenam vinā sarve jaya ādyāḥ viṣṇu pārṣadāḥ

original: abhavansamahīnāśca viṣvaksenādanantaram // GarP_3,5.41 //
analyzed: abhavan sama hīnāḥ ca viṣvaksenāt anantaram

original: etepi nāsikāyāśca avāntaraniyāmakāḥ /
analyzed: ete api nāsikāyāḥ ca avāntara niyāmakāḥ

original: ataste tattvamānibhyo hyavarāste prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,5.42 //
analyzed: atas te tattva mānibhyaḥ hi avarāḥ te prakīrtitāḥ

original: sparśatattvābhimānī tu apānaścetyudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sparśa tattva abhimānī tu apānaḥ ca iti udāhṛtaḥ

original: rūpābhimānī saṃjajñe vyāno nāma mahānprabho // GarP_3,5.43 //
analyzed: rūpa abhimānī saṃjajñe vyānaḥ nāma mahān prabho

original: rasātmaka udānaśca samāno gandhanāmakaḥ /
analyzed: rasa ātmakaḥ udānaḥ ca samānaḥ gandha nāmakaḥ

original: apāṃ nāthāśca catvāro marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,5.44 //
analyzed: apām nāthāḥ ca catvāraḥ marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: jayādyanantarānvakṣye samutpannānkhageśvara /
analyzed: jaya ādi anantarān vakṣye samutpannān khageśvara

original: pradhānāgre prathamajaḥ pāvakaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // GarP_3,5.45 //
analyzed: pradhāna agre prathama jaḥ pāvakaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: bhṛgormaharṣeḥ putraśca cyavanaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ mahā ṛṣeḥ putraḥ ca cyavanaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: bṛhaspateśca putrastu utathyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,5.46 //
analyzed: bṛhaspateḥ ca putraḥ tu utathyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: raivataścākṣuṣaścaiva tathā svārociṣaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: raivataḥ cākṣuṣaḥ ca eva tathā svārociṣaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: uttamo brahmasāvarṇī rudrasāvarṇireva ca // GarP_3,5.47 //
analyzed: uttamaḥ brahmasāvarṇiḥ rudrasāvarṇiḥ eva ca

original: devasāvarṇisāvarṇirindrasāvarṇirevaca /
analyzed: devasāvarṇi sāvarṇiḥ indrasāvarṇiḥ eva ca

original: tathaiva dakṣasāvarṇirdharmabhāvarṇireva ca // GarP_3,5.48 //
analyzed: tathā eva dakṣasāvarṇiḥ dharmabhāvarṇiḥ eva ca

original: ekādaśavidhā hyevaṃ manavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: ekādaśavidhāḥ hi evam manavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: pitṝṇāṃ saptakaṃ caivetyādyāḥ saṃjajñire khaga // GarP_3,5.49 //
analyzed: pitṝṇām saptakam ca eva ityādyāḥ saṃjajñire khaga

original: tadanantaramutpannāstebhyo nīcāḥ śṛṇu dvija /
analyzed: tad anantaram utpannāḥ tebhyaḥ nīcāḥ śṛṇu dvija

original: varuṇasya patnī gaṅgā parjanyākhyo vibhāvasuḥ // GarP_3,5.50 //
analyzed: varuṇasya patnī gaṅgā parjanya ākhyaḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: yamabhāryā śyāmalā tu hyaniruddhapriyā virāṭ /
analyzed: yama bhāryā śyāmalā tu hi aniruddha priyā virāj

original: brahmāṇḍamāninī saiva hyuṣānāmnā suśabditā // GarP_3,5.51 //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa māninī sā eva hi uṣā nāmnā su śabditā

original: rohiṇī candrabhāryoktā sūryabhāryā tu saṃjñakā /
analyzed: rohiṇī candra bhāryā uktā sūrya bhāryā tu saṃjñakā

original: etā gaṅgādiṣaṭūsaṃkhyā jajñire vinatāsuta // GarP_3,5.52 //
analyzed: etāḥ jajñire vinatā suta

original: gaṅgādyanantaraṃ jajñe svāhā vai mantradevatā /
analyzed: gaṅgā ādi anantaram jajñe svāhā vai mantradevatā

original: svāhānāmāgnibhāryoktā gaṅgādibhyodhamā śrutā // GarP_3,5.53 //
analyzed: svāhā nāmā agni bhāryā uktā gaṅgā ādibhyaḥ adhamā śrutā

original: svāhānantarajo jñeyo jñānātmā budhanāmakaḥ /
budhastu candraputro yaḥ svāhāyā adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,5.54 //
analyzed: budhaḥ tu candra putraḥ yaḥ svāhāyāḥ adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: uṣā nāma tathā jajñe budhasyānantaraṃ khaga /
analyzed: uṣāḥ nāma tathā jajñe budhasya anantaram khaga

original: uṣānāmā bhimānī tu hyaśvibhāryā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,5.55 //
analyzed: uṣā nāmā bhimānī tu hi aśvi bhāryā prakīrtitā

original: budhādhamā sā vijñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: budha adhamā sā vijñeyā na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tataḥ śanaiścaro jajñe pṛthivyātmeti viśrutaḥ // GarP_3,5.56 //
analyzed: tatas śanaiścaraḥ jajñe pṛthivyātmā iti viśrutaḥ

original: uṣādhamastu vijñeyastato jajñetha puṣkaraḥ /
analyzed: uṣādhamaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ tatas puṣkaraḥ

original: karmābhimānī vijñeyaḥ śanaiścara itīritaḥ // GarP_3,5.57 //
analyzed: karma abhimānī vijñeyaḥ śanaiścaraḥ iti īritaḥ

original: tattvābhimānino devānevaṃ sṛṣṭvā hariḥ svayam /
analyzed: tattva abhimāninaḥ devān evam sṛṣṭvā hariḥ svayam

original: praviveśa sa deveśastattveṣu ramayā sahā // GarP_3,5.58 //
analyzed: praviveśa sa deveśaḥ tattveṣu ramayā sahā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimāni devatotpattitattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimāni devatotpattitattāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 6
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: tatratatra sthitāstattve tattattattvābhimāninaḥ /
analyzed: tatra tatra sthitāḥ tattve tad tad tattva abhimāninaḥ

original: svesve hyāyatane svāṅge tadarthaṃ ca khageśvara // GarP_3,6.1 //
analyzed: sve sve hi āyatane sva aṅge tad artham ca khageśvara

original: hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ samyak stotuṃ samupacakrire /
analyzed: harim nārāyaṇam samyak stotum samupacakrire

original: cintyācintyaguṇe viṣṇau viruddhāḥ saṃti sadguṇāḥ // GarP_3,6.2 //
analyzed: cintya acintya guṇe viṣṇau viruddhāḥ saṃti sat guṇāḥ

original: ekaikaśohyanantāste tadguṇānāṃ stutau mama /
analyzed: ekaikaśas hi anantāḥ te tad guṇānām stutau mama

original: kva śaktiriti buddhyā sā vrīḍayāvanatābravīt // GarP_3,6.3 //
analyzed: kva śaktiḥ iti buddhyā sā vrīḍayā avanatā abravīt

original: śrīruvāca /
analyzed: śrīḥ uvāca

original: natāsmi te nātha padāravindaṃ na veda cānyaccaraṇādṛte tava /
analyzed: natā asmi te nātha pada aravindam na veda ca anyat caraṇāt ṛte tava

original: tvayīśvare saṃti guṇāḥ śrutāstu tathāśrutāḥ saṃti ca devadeva // GarP_3,6.4 //
analyzed: tvayi īśvare saṃti guṇāḥ śrutāḥ tu tathā śrutāḥ saṃti ca devadeva

original: samyak sṛṣṭaṃ svāyatanaṃ ca datvā govinda dāmodara māṃ ca pāhi /
analyzed: samyak sṛṣṭam sva āyatanam ca da tvā govinda dāmodara mām ca pāhi

original: stutyā madīyaśca sukhakapūrṇaḥ priyo jano nāsti tathā tvadanyaḥ // GarP_3,6.5 //
analyzed: stutyā madīyaḥ ca sukhaka pūrṇaḥ priyaḥ janaḥ nā asti tathā tvad anyaḥ

original: brahmovāca /
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: lakṣmīpate sarvajagannivāsa tvaṃ jñānasiṃdhuḥ kva ca viśvamūrte /
analyzed: lakṣmīpate sarva jagat nivāsa tvam jñāna siṃdhuḥ kva ca viśvamūrte

original: ahaṃ kva cājñastava vai śaktirasti hyajñohaṃ vai hyalpaśaktirmamāsti // GarP_3,6.6 //
analyzed: aham kva ca ajñaḥ tava vai śaktiḥ asti hi ajñaḥ ham vai hi alpa śaktiḥ mama asti

original: lakṣmyāścaiva jñānavairāgyabhakti hyatyalpamaddhā mayi sarvadaiva /
analyzed: lakṣmyāḥ ca eva jñāna vairāgya bhakti hi ati alpam addhā mayi sarvadā eva

original: tava prasādādasti jagannivāsa tatra svāmitvaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva // GarP_3,6.7 //
analyzed: tava prasādāt asti jagannivāsa tatra svāmi tvam nā asti viṣṇo sadā eva

original: na dehi tvaṃ sarvadā me murāre ahaṃmamatvaṃ prāpyametāvadeva /
analyzed: na dehi tvam sarvadā me murāre ahaṃmamatvam prāpyam etāvat eva

original: gamyajñānaṃ yogyaguṇe rameśa pramādo vā nāstināstyadya nitya // GarP_3,6.8 //
analyzed: gamya jñānam yogya guṇe rama īśa pramādaḥ vā nitya

original: tanme hṛṣīkāṇi patantyasatpathe padāravinde tu patantu sarvadā /
analyzed: tat me hṛṣīkāṇi patanti asat pathe pada aravinde tu patantu sarvadā

original: lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇena hīnaḥ stotuṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsti me suprasīda // GarP_3,6.9 //
analyzed: lakṣmyā hi aham koṭi guṇena hīnaḥ stotum sāmarthyam nā asti me su prasīda

original: iti stavaṃ viṣṇuguṇānvidhātā tārkṣyasthitaḥ prāñjalistasya cāgre /
analyzed: iti stavam viṣṇu guṇān vidhātā tārkṣya sthitaḥ prāñjaliḥ tasya ca agre

original: tadā vāyurdevadevo mahātmā dṛṣṭvā viṣṇu bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā // GarP_3,6.10 //
analyzed: tadā vāyuḥ devadevaḥ mahātmā dṛṣṭvā viṣṇu bhakti saṃvardhita ātmā

original: snahottharāvaḥ skhalitākṣarastaṃ muñcankaṇānprāñjalirābabhāṣe /
analyzed: snaha uttha rāvaḥ skhalita akṣaraḥ tam muñcan kaṇān prāñjaliḥ ābabhāṣe

original: vāyuruvāca /
analyzed: vāyuḥ uvāca

original: ete hi devāstava bhṛtyabhūtāḥ padāravindaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham // GarP_3,6.11 //
analyzed: ete hi devāḥ tava bhṛtya bhūtāḥ pada aravindam paramam su durlabham

original: caturvidhānpuruṣārthānrameśa saṃprārthaye tacca sadāpi deva /
analyzed: caturvidhān puruṣa arthān rama īśa saṃprārthaye tat ca sadā api deva

original: dṛṣṭvā hareḥ saiva māyaiva tāvatsukāraṇaṃ kiñcidanyanna cāsti // GarP_3,6.12 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā hareḥ sā eva māyā eva tāvat su kāraṇam kiñcid anyat na ca asti

original: ato nāhaṃ pradayopi bhūman bhavatpadāṃbhojaniṣavaṇotsukaḥ /
analyzed: atas nā aham bhūman bhavat pada aṃbhoja niṣavaṇa utsukaḥ

original: lokasya kṛṣṇādvimukhasya karmaṇā apuṇyaśīlasya suduḥ khitasya // GarP_3,6.13 //
analyzed: lokasya kṛṣṇāt vimukhasya karmaṇā apuṇya śīlasya su duḥ khitasya

original: anugrahārthaṃ ca tavāvatāro nānyaśca kiñcitpuruṣārthastaveśa /
analyzed: anugraha artham ca tava avatāraḥ na anyaḥ ca kiñcid puruṣa arthaḥ tava īśa

original: gobhūsurāṇāṃ ca mahīruhāṇāṃ tathā surāṇāṃ pravarāvatāraiḥ // GarP_3,6.14 //
analyzed: go bhūsurāṇām ca mahīruhāṇām tathā surāṇām pravara avatāraiḥ

original: kṣemopakārāṇi ca vāsudeva krīḍanvidhatte na ca kiñcidanyat /
analyzed: kṣema upakārāṇi ca vāsudeva krīḍan vidhatte na ca kiñcid anyat

original: mano na tṛpyatyapi śaṃsatāṃ naḥ sukarmamauleścaritāmṛtāni // GarP_3,6.15 //
analyzed: manaḥ na tṛpyati api śaṃsatām naḥ sukarma mauleḥ carita amṛtāni

original: acchinnabhaktasya hi me mukunda sadā bhaktiṃ dehi pādāravinde /
analyzed: acchinna bhaktasya hi me mukunda sadā bhaktim dehi pāda aravinde

original: sadā tadevāstu na kiñcidanyadyatra tvamāsīḥ puruṣe devadeva // GarP_3,6.16 //
analyzed: sadā tat eva astu na kiñcid anyat yatra tvam āsīḥ puruṣe devadeva

original: ahaṃ ca tatrāsmi tava prasādādyatrāsmyahaṃ tatra bhavānmahāprabho /
analyzed: aham ca tatra asmi tava prasādāt yatra asmi aham tatra bhavān mahā prabho

original: vyaṃsirmameyaṃ ca śarīramadhye caturmukhaścaiva na caitatadanyaiḥ // GarP_3,6.17 //
analyzed: vyaṃsiḥ mama iyam ca śarīra madhye catur mukhaḥ ca eva na ca etat tad anyaiḥ

original: madīyanidrā tava vandanaṃ prabho madīyayāmācaraṇaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
analyzed: madīya nidrā tava vandanam prabho madīyayām ācaraṇam pradakṣiṇam

original: madīyavyākhyāharaṇaṃ stutiḥ syādevaṃ viditvā ca samarpayāmi // GarP_3,6.18 //
analyzed: madīya vyākhyā haraṇam stutiḥ syāt evam viditvā ca samarpayāmi

original: madbrṛddhiyogyaṃ ca padārthajātaṃ dṛṣṭvā hareḥ pratimā eva tacca /
analyzed: mad brṛddhi yogyam ca padārtha jātam dṛṣṭvā hareḥ pratimāḥ eva tat ca

original: itthaṃ matvāhaṃ sarvadā devadeva tatrasthitānharirūpān bhajiṣye // GarP_3,6.19 //
analyzed: ittham matvā aham sarvadā devadeva tatra sthitān hari rūpān bhajiṣye

original: yaccandanaṃ yattu puṣpaṃ ca dhūpaṃ vastraṃ ca yadbhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: yat candanam yat tu puṣpam ca dhūpam vastram ca yat bhakṣya bhojya ādikam ca

original: etatsarvaṃ viṣṇuprītyarthamevetyetadvrataṃ sarvadā vai kariṣye // GarP_3,6.20 //
analyzed: etat sarvam viṣṇu prīti artham eva iti etat vratam sarvadā vai kariṣye

original: avaiṣṇavāndūṣayiṣye sadāhaṃ sadvaiṣṇavānpā (llāṃ)
analyzed: avaiṣṇavān dūṣayiṣye sadā aham sat vaiṣṇavān pā llāṃ

original: layiṣye murāre /
analyzed: layiṣye murāre

original: viṣṇudruhāṃ chedayiṣye ca jihvāṃ tacchṛṇvatāṃ pūrayiṣye trapūlkāḥ // GarP_3,6.21 //
analyzed: viṣṇu druhām chedayiṣye ca jihvām tad śṛṇvatām pūrayiṣye trapūlkāḥ

original: etādṛśī śaktirmamāsti deva tava prasādādbra linopi viṣṇo /
analyzed: etādṛśī śaktiḥ mama asti deva tava prasādāt viṣṇo

original: athāpi nāhaṃ stavane samarthaḥ lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇairvihīnaḥ // GarP_3,6.22 //
analyzed: athā api na aham stavane samarthaḥ lakṣmyā hi aham koṭi guṇaiḥ vihīnaḥ

original: etatstotraṃ hyarthayeccaiva yā naḥ tatra prītirhyakṣayā me sadā syāt /
analyzed: etat stotram hi arthayet ca eva yā naḥ tatra prītiḥ hi akṣayā me sadā syāt

original: stotraṃ hyetatpāṭhayantīha loke te vaiṣṇavāste ca haripriyāśca // GarP_3,6.23 //
analyzed: stotram hi etat pāṭhayanti iha loke te vaiṣṇavāḥ te ca hari priyāḥ ca

original: kurvanti ye paṭhanaṃ nityameva samarpayiṣyati sadā harau ca /
analyzed: kurvanti ye paṭhanam nityam eva samarpayiṣyati sadā harau ca

original: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ harau prasanne kimalabhyamasti // GarP_3,6.24 //
analyzed: teṣām hariḥ prīyate harau prasanne kim alabhyam asti

original: evaṃ stutvā valadevo mahātmā tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjaliragrato hareḥ /
analyzed: evam stutvā valadevaḥ mahātmā tūṣṇīm sthitaḥ prāñjaliḥ agratas hareḥ

original: sarasvatyuvāca /
analyzed: sarasvatī uvāca

original: ko vā rasajño bhagavan murāre hare guṇastavanātkīrtanādvā // GarP_3,6.25 //
analyzed: kaḥ vā rasa jñaḥ bhagavat murāre hare guṇa stavanāt kīrtanāt vā

original: alaṃbuddhiṃ prāpnuyāddevadeva brahmādibhiḥ sarvadā stūyamāna /
analyzed: alaṃbuddhim prāpnuyāt devadeva brahma ādibhiḥ sarvadā stūyamāna

original: yaḥ karṇanāḍīṃ puruṣasya yāto bhavapradāṃ deharatiṃ chinatti // GarP_3,6.26 //
analyzed: yaḥ karṇa nāḍīm puruṣasya yā atas bhava pradām deha ratim chinatti

original: na kevalaṃ deharatiṃ chinattyasadgṛhakṣetrabhāryāsuteṣu nityam /
analyzed: na kevalam deha ratim chinatti asat gṛha kṣetra bhāryā suteṣu nityam

original: paśvādirūpeṣu dhanādikeṣu anarghyaratneṣu priyaṃ chinātti // GarP_3,6.27 //
analyzed: paśu ādi rūpeṣu dhana ādikeṣu an arghya ratneṣu priyam china atti

original: anaṃ tavedapratipāditopi lakṣmīrna vai veda tava svarūpam /
analyzed: tava id a pratipāditaḥ api lakṣmīḥ na vai veda tava sva rūpam

original: caturmukho naiva veda na vāyurasau na vettīti kimatra citram // GarP_3,6.28 //
analyzed: catur mukhaḥ na eva veda na vāyuḥ asau na vetti iti kim atra citram

original: etādṛśasya stavane kvāsti śaktirmama prabho brahmavāyvoḥ sakāśāt /
analyzed: etādṛśasya stavane kva asti śaktiḥ mama prabho brahma vāyvoḥ sakāśāt

original: śatairguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūnatāsti ato hare dayayā māṃ ca pāhi // GarP_3,6.29 //
analyzed: śataiḥ guṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūna tā asti atas hare dayayā mām ca pāhi

original: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ sā tu tūṣṇīmāsa khagaśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā harim sā tu tūṣṇīm āsa khagaśvara

original: bhāratī tu tadā stotuṃ hariṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,6.30 //
analyzed: bhāratī tu tadā stotum harim samupacakrame

original: bhāratyuvāca /
analyzed: bhāratī uvāca

original: brahmeśa lakṣmīśa hare murāre guṇāṃstava śraddadhānasya nityam /
analyzed: brahmeśa lakṣmīśa hare murāre guṇān tava śraddadhānasya nityam

original: tathā stuvantosya vivardhamānāṃ matiṃ ca nityaṃ viṣayeṣvasatsu // GarP_3,6.31 //
analyzed: tathā stuvantaḥ asya vivardhamānām matim ca nityam viṣayeṣu asatsu

original: kurvanti vairāgyamamutra loke tataḥ paraṃ bhaktidṛḍhāṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: kurvanti vairāgyam amutra loke tatas param bhakti dṛḍhām tathā eva

original: tataḥ paraṃ caiva hareḥ prasannatāṃ kurvanti nityaṃ tava devadeva // GarP_3,6.32 //
analyzed: tatas param ca eva hareḥ prasanna tām kurvanti nityam tava devadeva

original: tenāparokṣaṃ ca bhavecca tasya ato guṇānāṃ stavane ca me ratiḥ /
analyzed: tena aparokṣam ca bhavet ca tasya atas guṇānām stavane ca me ratiḥ

original: sā tu prajātā puruṣasya nityaṃ saṃsāraduḥ khaṃ tu tadācchinatti // GarP_3,6.33 //
analyzed: sā tu prajātā puruṣasya nityam saṃsāra duḥkham tu tadā ācchinatti

original: vicchinnaduḥ khasya tadādhikāriṇa ānandarūpākhyaphalaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: vicchinna duḥ khasya tadā adhikāriṇaḥ ānanda rūpa ākhya phalam dadāti

original: harerguṇānastuvatāṃ ca pāpaṃ teṣāṃ hi puṇyaṃ ca tathā kṣiṇoti // GarP_3,6.34 //
analyzed: hareḥ guṇān astuvatām ca pāpam teṣām hi puṇyam ca tathā kṣiṇoti

original: evaṃ viditvā paramo gururmama vāyurdayālurmama vallabhaśca /
analyzed: evam viditvā paramaḥ guruḥ mama vāyuḥ dayāluḥ mama vallabhaḥ ca

original: harerguṇānsarvaguṇaprasārānmamaiva yogyānsukhamukhyabhūtān // GarP_3,6.35 //
analyzed: hareḥ guṇān sarva guṇa prasārān mama eva yogyān sukha mukhya bhūtān

original: uddhṛtya puṇyebhya ivārtabandhuḥ śivaśca no druhyati puṇyakīrtim /
analyzed: uddhṛtya puṇyebhyaḥ iva ārta bandhuḥ śivaḥ ca naḥ druhyati puṇya kīrtim

original: tava prasādācca śriyaḥ prasādādvāyoḥ prasādācca mamāsti nityam // GarP_3,6.36 //
analyzed: tava prasādāt ca śriyaḥ prasādāt vāyoḥ prasādāt ca mama asti nityam

original: yadyatkarotyeva sadaiva vāyustattatkarotyeva sadaiva nityam /
analyzed: yat yat karoti eva sadā eva vāyuḥ tat tat karoti eva sadā eva nityam

original: vāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti devaḥ sa tadvirodhaṃ ca karoti nityam // GarP_3,6.37 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ virodham na karoti devaḥ sa tad virodham ca karoti nityam

original: harervirodhaṃ na karoti vāyurvāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: hareḥ virodham na karoti vāyuḥ vāyoḥ virodham na karoti viṣṇuḥ

original: vāyoḥ prasādānmamanāsti kiñcidatānabhāvaśca tava prasādāt // GarP_3,6.38 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ prasādāt mamanā asti kiñcid atāna bhāvaḥ ca tava prasādāt

original: yathaiva mūlaṃ ca tathāvatāre duḥ khādikaṃ nāsti samīraṇasya /
analyzed: yathā eva mūlam ca tathā avatāre duḥ kha ādikam nā asti samīraṇasya

original: vāyustathānye ca ubhau mukundastathāvatāreṣu na duḥ kharūpau // GarP_3,6.39 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ tathā anye ca ubhau mukundaḥ tathā avatāreṣu na

original: aśaktavaddṛśyate vāyudevaḥ yugānusārāṃllokadharmāṃstu rakṣan /
analyzed: aśakta vat dṛśyate vāyudevaḥ yuga anusārān loka dharmān tu rakṣan

original: narāvatāre tatra deve murāre hyaśaktatā neti vicaṃ tanīyam // GarP_3,6.40 //
analyzed: nara avatāre tatra deve murāre hi aśakta tā na iti

original: avatārarūpe yamaduḥ khādikaṃ ca na cintanīyaṃ jñānibhirdevadeva /
analyzed: avatāra rūpe yama duḥkha ādikam ca na cintanīyam jñānibhiḥ devadeva

original: ahaṃ kadācitsukhanāśapradeśe daityāṃstathā mārayituṃ gatosmi // GarP_3,6.41 //
analyzed: aham kadācid sukha nāśa pradeśe daityān tathā mārayitum gataḥ asmi

original: naitāvatā mama vāyośca nityaṃ duḥ khātanaṃ naiva saṃcitanīyam /
analyzed: na etāvatā mama vāyoḥ ca nityam duḥ khātanam na eva saṃcitanīyam

original: etādṛśohaṃ stavanenu kāsti śaktirguṇānāṃ madhusūdana prabho /
analyzed: etādṛśā uham stavanenu kā asti śaktiḥ guṇānām madhusūdana prabho

original: vāyoḥ sakāśācca guṇena hīnā saṃsārarūpe muktarūpe ca deva // GarP_3,6.42 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ sakāśāt ca guṇena hīnā saṃsāra rūpe mukta rūpe ca deva

original: evaṃ stutvā bhāratī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā bhāratī tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: tadanantarajaḥ śeṣaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha keśavam // GarP_3,6.43 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ śeṣaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha keśavam

original: śeṣa uvāca /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ uvāca

original: nāhaṃ ca jāne tava pādamūlaṃ rudro na vetti garuḍo na veda /
analyzed: na aham ca jāne tava pāda mūlam rudraḥ na vetti garuḍaḥ na veda

original: ahaṃ vāṇyāḥ śataguṇāṃśahīno dattvā hyāyatanaṃ pāhi māṃ vāsudeva // GarP_3,6.44 //
analyzed: aham vāṇyāḥ śataguṇa aṃśa hīnaḥ dattvā hi āyatanam pāhi mām vāsudeva

original: evaṃ stutvā saśeṣastu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā sa śeṣaḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: tadanantarajo vīśaḥ stotuṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,6.45 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ vīśaḥ stotum samupacakrame

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: tava padoḥ stutiṃ kiṃ karomyahaṃ mama padāṃbuje hyarpitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: tava padoḥ stutim kim karomi aham mama pada aṃbuje hi arpitam manaḥ

original: kathamahaṃ mukhe pakṣiyonijaḥ kathamevaṅguṇā nīḍituṃ kṣamaḥ // GarP_3,6.46 //
analyzed: katham aham mukhe pakṣi yoni jaḥ katham evaṅguṇāḥ nīḍitum kṣamaḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā tu garuḍastūṣṇīmāsa nayānvitaḥ /
analyzed: evam stutvā tu garuḍaḥ tūṣṇīm āsa naya anvitaḥ

original: tadanantarajo rudrastotuṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,6.47 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ rudraḥ stotum samupacakrame

original: rudra uvāca /
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca

original: yā vai taveśa bhagavanna vidāma bhūman bhaktirmamāstu śivapādasarojamūle /
analyzed: yāḥ vai tava īśa bhagavan na vidāma bhūman bhaktiḥ mama astu śiva pāda saroja mūle

original: channāpi sā nanu sadā na mamāsti deva tenādruhaṃ tava viruddhamataḥ karomi // GarP_3,6.48 //
analyzed: channā api sā nanu sadā na mama asti deva tena adruham tava viruddham atas karomi

original: sarvānna buddhisahitasya hare murāre kā śaktirasti vacane mama mūḍhabuddheḥ /
analyzed: sarvān na buddhi sahitasya hare murāre kā śaktiḥ asti vacane mama mūḍha buddheḥ

original: vāṇyā sadā śataguṇena vihīnamenaṃ māṃ pāhi ceśa mama cāyatanaṃ ca dattvā // GarP_3,6.49 //
analyzed: vāṇyā sadā śataguṇena vihīnam enam mām pāhi ca īśa mama ca āyatanam ca dattvā

original: evaṃ stutvā sa rudrastu tūṣṇīmāsa dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: evam stutvā sa rudraḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa dvijottamaḥ

original: śeṣānantarajā devī vāruṇī vākyamabravīt // GarP_3,6.50 //
analyzed: śeṣa anantara jā devī vāruṇī vākyam abravīt

original: vāruṇyuvāca /
analyzed: vāruṇī uvāca

original: lakṣmīpate brahmapate manoḥ pategiraḥ pate rudrapate nṛṇāṃ pate /
analyzed: lakṣmīpate brahma pate manoḥ pate giraḥ pate rudra pate nṛṇām pate

original: guṇāṃstava stotumahaṃ samarthā na pārvatī nāpi suparṇapatnī // GarP_3,6.51 //
analyzed: guṇān tava stotum aham samarthā na pārvatī nā api suparṇa patnī

original: śeṣādahaṃ daśaguṇairvihīnā māṃ pāhi nityaṃ jagatāmadhīśa // GarP_3,6.52 //
analyzed: śeṣāt aham daśaguṇaiḥ vihīnā mām pāhi nityam jagatām adhīśa

original: evaṃ stutvā vāruṇī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā vāruṇī tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: tadanantarajā brāhmī sauparṇī hyupacakrame // GarP_3,6.53 //
analyzed: tad anantara jā brāhmī sauparṇī hi upacakrame

original: sauparṇyuvāca /
analyzed: sauparṇī uvāca

original: stotuṃ guṇāṃstava hare jagadī śavācā śrotuṃ hare tava kathāṃ śravaṇe na śaktiḥ /
analyzed: stotum guṇān tava hare jagadī śa vācā śrotum hare tava kathām śravaṇe na śaktiḥ

original: yastattvanuṃ smarati deva tava svarūpaṃ ko vai nu veda bhuvi taṃ bhagavatpadārtham // GarP_3,6.54 //
analyzed: yaḥ tat tu anum smarati deva tava sva rūpam kaḥ vai nu veda bhuvi tam bhagavat padārtham

original: ato guṇastavane nāsti śaktirvīndrāhadaṃ daśaguṇairavarā ca nityam // GarP_3,6.55 //
analyzed: atas guṇa stavane nā asti śaktiḥ vi indra ahadam daśaguṇaiḥ avarā ca nityam

original: evaṃ stutvā tu sauparṇī tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā tu sauparṇī tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: rudrānantarajā stotuṃ girijā tūpacakrame // GarP_3,6.56 //
analyzed: rudra anantara jā stotum girijā tu upacakrame

original: pārvatyuvāca govinda nārāyaṇa vāsudeva tvayā hi me kiñcidapi prayojanam /
analyzed: pārvatī uvāca govinda nārāyaṇa vāsudeva tvayā hi me kiñcid api prayojanam

original: nāstyeva svāminna ca nāma vācā saubhāgyarūpaḥ sarvadā eka eva // GarP_3,6.57 //
analyzed: na asti eva svāmin na ca nāma vācā saubhāgya rūpaḥ sarvadā ekaḥ eva

original: nārāyaṇeti tava nāma ca ekameva vairāgyabhaktivibhave paramaṃ samarthām /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti tava nāma ca ekam eva vairāgya bhakti vibhave paramam samarthām

original: asaṃkhyabrahmādikahatyanāśāne gurvaṅganākoṭivināśane ca // GarP_3,6.58 //
analyzed: asaṃkhya brahma ādika hatya nāśāne guru aṅganā koṭi vināśane ca

original: nāmādhikāriṇī cāhaṃ guṇānāṃ ca mahāprabho /
analyzed: nāma adhikāriṇī ca aham guṇānām ca mahā prabho

original: stavane nāsti me śaktī rudrāddaśaguṇairaham // GarP_3,6.59 //
analyzed: stavane nā asti me śaktī rudrāt daśaguṇaiḥ aham

original: avarā ca sadāsmyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: avarā ca sadā asmi eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: evaṃ stutvā sā girijā stūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara // GarP_3,6.60 //
analyzed: evam stutvā sā girijā stūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttara- tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimānitattaddevatākṛtaviṣṇustutitattaddevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttara tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe

original: nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 7
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: pārvatyānantarotpanna indro vacanamabravīt /
analyzed: pārvatya anantara utpannaḥ indraḥ vacanam abravīt

original: indra uvāca /
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: tava svarūpaṃ hṛdi saṃvijānan samutsukaḥ syātstavane yastu mūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: tava sva rūpam hṛdi saṃvijānan samutsukaḥ syāt stavane yaḥ tu mūḍhaḥ

original: ajānataḥ stavanaṃ devadeva tadevāhurhelanaṃ cakrapāṇe // GarP_3,7.1 //
analyzed: a jānataḥ stavanam devadeva tat eva āhuḥ helanam cakrapāṇe

original: tathāpi tadvai tava nāma pūrvaṃ bhavettadā puṇyakaraṃ bhavediti /
analyzed: tathā api tat vai tava nāma pūrvam bhavet tadā puṇya karam bhavet iti

original: rudrādi kānāṃ stavane nāsti śaktistadā vaktavyaṃ mama nāstīti kiṃ vā // GarP_3,7.2 //
analyzed: rudra ādi kānām stavane nā asti śaktiḥ tadā vaktavyam mama nā asti iti kim vā

original: guṇāṃśato daśabhī rudrato vai sadā nyūno matsamaḥ kāmadevaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa aṃśataḥ daśabhiḥ rudrataḥ vai sadā nyūnaḥ mad samaḥ kāmadevaḥ

original: jñāne bale samatā sarvadāsti tathāḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ ca dūtaḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,7.3 //
analyzed: jñāne bale sama tā sarvadā asti kāmaḥ kim ca dūtaḥ sadā eva

original: evaṃ stutvā devadevo hariṃ ca tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjalirnamrabhūrdhā /
analyzed: evam stutvā devadevaḥ harim ca tūṣṇīm sthitaḥ prāñjaliḥ namra bhūrdhā

original: tadanantarajo brahmā ahaṅkārika ūcivān // GarP_3,7.4 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ brahmā ahaṅkārikaḥ ūcivān

original: ahaṅkārika uvāca /
analyzed: ahaṅkārikaḥ uvāca

original: namaste gaṇapūrṇāya namaste jñānamūrtaye /
analyzed: namaḥ te gaṇapūrṇāya namaḥ te jñāna mūrtaye

original: namo 'jñānavidūrāya brahmaṇenaṃ tamūrtaye // GarP_3,7.5 //
analyzed: namaḥ jñāna vidūrāya

original: indrādahaṃ daśaguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūna ukto na jani tvāṃ sarvadā hyaprameya /
analyzed: indrāt aham daśaguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūnaḥ uktaḥ na tvām sarvadā hi aprameya

original: tathāpi māṃ pāhi jagadguro tvaṃ dattvā divyaṃ hyāyatanaṃ ca viṣṇo // GarP_3,7.6 //
analyzed: tathā api mām pāhi jagadguro tvam dattvā divyam hi āyatanam ca viṣṇo

original: āhaṅkārika evaṃ tu stutvā tūṣṇīṃbabhūva ha /
analyzed: āhaṅkārikaḥ evam tu stutvā tūṣṇīṃbabhūva ha

original: tadanantarajā stotuṃ śacī vacanamabravīt // GarP_3,7.7 //
analyzed: tad anantara jā stotum śacī vacanam abravīt

original: śacyuvāca /
analyzed: śacī uvāca

original: saṃcintayāmi aniśaṃ tava pādapadmaṃ vajrāṅkuśadhvajasaroruhalāñchanāḍhyam /
analyzed: saṃcintayāmi aniśam tava pāda padmam vajra aṅkuśa dhvaja saroruha lāñchana āḍhyam

original: vāgīśvarairapi sadā manasāpi dhartuṃ no śakyamīśa tava pādarajaḥ smarāmi // GarP_3,7.8 //
analyzed: vāc īśvaraiḥ api sadā manasā api dhartum no śakyam īśa tava pāda rajaḥ smarāmi

original: āhaṅkārikaprāṇācca guṇaiśca daśabhiḥ sadā /
analyzed: āhaṅkārika prāṇāt ca guṇaiḥ ca daśabhiḥ sadā

original: nyūnabhūtāṃ ca māṃ pāhi kṛpālo bhaktavatsala // GarP_3,7.9 //
analyzed: nyūna bhūtām ca mām pāhi kṛpālaḥ bhakta vatsala

original: evaṃ stutvā śacī devī tūṣṇīṃ bhagavatī hyabhūt /
analyzed: evam stutvā śacī devī tūṣṇīm bhagavatī hi abhūt

original: tadanantarajā stotuṃ ratiḥ samupacakrame // GarP_3,7.10 //
analyzed: tad anantara jā stotum ratiḥ samupacakrame

original: ratiruvāca /
analyzed: ratiḥ uvāca

original: saṃcintayāmi nṛharervadanāravindaṃ bhṛtyānukaṃpitadhiyā hi gṛhītamūrtim /
analyzed: saṃcintayāmi nṛhareḥ vadana aravindam bhṛtya anukaṃpita dhiyā hi gṛhīta mūrtim

original: yacchrīniketamajarudraramādikaiśca saṃlālitaṃ kuṭilaṅkuntalavṛndajuṣṭam // GarP_3,7.11 //
analyzed: yat śrīniketam aja rudra rama ādikaiḥ ca saṃlālitam kuṭi laṅkuntala vṛnda juṣṭam

original: etādṛśaṃ tava mukhaṃ nuvituṃ na śaktiḥ śacyā samāpi bhagavanparipāhi nityam /
analyzed: etādṛśam tava mukham nuvitum na śaktiḥ śacyā samāpi bhagavan paripāhi nityam

original: kṛtvā stutiṃ ratiriyaṃ paramādareṇa tūṣṇīṃ sthitā bhagavataśca samīpa eva // GarP_3,7.12 //
analyzed: kṛtvā stutim ratiḥ iyam parama ādareṇa tūṣṇīm sthitā bhagavataḥ ca samīpe eva

original: ratyanantarajo dakṣaḥ stotuṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,7.13 //
analyzed: rati anantara jaḥ dakṣaḥ stotum samupacakrame

original: dakṣa uvāca /
analyzed: dakṣaḥ uvāca

original: saṃcintaye bhagavataścaraṇodatīrthaṃ bhaktyā hyajena pariṣiktamajādivandyam /
analyzed: saṃcintaye bhagavataḥ caraṇa uda tīrtham bhaktyā hi ajena pariṣiktam aja ādi vandyam

original: yacchaucaniḥ sṛtamajapravarāvatāraṃ gaṅgākhyatīrthamabhavatsaritāṃ variṣṭham // GarP_3,7.14 //
analyzed: yat śauca niḥ sṛtam aja pravara avatāram gaṅgā ākhya tīrtham abhavat saritām variṣṭham

original: rudropi tenava vidhṛtena jaṭākalāpapūtena pādarajasā hyaśivaḥ śivobhūt /
analyzed: rudraḥ api vidhṛtena jaṭā kalāpa pūtena pāda rajasā hi aśivaḥ

original: etādṛśaṃ te caraṇaṃ karuṇeśa viṣṇo stotuṃ śaktirmama nāsti kṛpāvatāra /
analyzed: etādṛśam te caraṇam karuṇa īśa viṣṇo stotum śaktiḥ mama nā asti kṛpā avatāra

original: ratyā samaḥ śrutigato na gatosmi mokṣametādṛśaṃ ca paripāhi nidānamūrte // GarP_3,7.15 //
analyzed: ratyā samaḥ śruti gataḥ na gataḥ asmi mokṣam etādṛśam ca paripāhi nidāna mūrte

original: evaṃ stutvā sa dakṣastu tūṣṇī meva babhūva ha /
analyzed: evam stutvā sa dakṣaḥ tu tūṣṇīm eva babhūva ha

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ bṛhaspatirupākramīt // GarP_3,7.16 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum bṛhaspatiḥ upākramīt

original: bṛhaspatiruvāca /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uvāca

original: saṃcintayāmi satataṃ tava cānanābjaṃ tvaṃ dehi duṣṭaviṣayeṣu viraktimīśa // GarP_3,7.17 //
analyzed: saṃcintayāmi satatam tava ca ānana abjam tvam dehi duṣṭa viṣayeṣu viraktim īśa

original: eteṣu śaktiryadi vai sa jīvo kartā ca bhoktā ca sadā ca dātā /
analyzed: eteṣu śaktiḥ yadi vai sa kartā ca bhoktā ca sadā ca dātā

original: yoṣāṃ ca putrasuhṛdau ca paśūṃśca sarvamevaṃ vinaśyati yato hi tadāśu chindhi // GarP_3,7.18 //
analyzed: yoṣām ca putra suhṛdau ca paśūn ca sarvam evam vinaśyati yatas hi tat āśu chindhi

original: saṃsāracakrabhramaṇenaiva deva saṃsāraduḥ khamanubhūyehāgatosmi /
analyzed: saṃsāra cakra bhramaṇena eva deva saṃsāra duḥ kham anubhūya iha āgataḥ asmi

original: śaktirna cāsti navane mama devadeva satyā samaṃ ca satataṃ paripāhi nityam // GarP_3,7.19 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ na ca asti navane mama devadeva satyā samam ca satatam paripāhi nityam

original: evaṃ śrutvā ca paramaṃ tūṣṇīmeva sthito muniḥ /
analyzed: evam śrutvā ca paramam tūṣṇīm eva sthitaḥ muniḥ

original: tadanantarajastotuṃ hyaniruddhopacakrame // GarP_3,7.20 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum hi aniruddhā upacakrame

original: aniruddha uvāca /
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ harestava kathāṃ rasikāṃ vihāya strīṇāṃ bhage ca vadane parimuhya nityam /
analyzed: evam hareḥ tava kathām rasikām vihāya strīṇām bhage ca vadane parimuhya nityam

original: viṣṭhāntrapūritabile rasiko hi nityaṃ sthāyī ca sūkaravadeva vimūḍhabuddhiḥ // GarP_3,7.21 //
analyzed: viṣṭhā antra pūrita bile rasikaḥ hi nityam sthāyī ca sūkara vat eva vimūḍha buddhiḥ

original: majjāsthipittakapharaphalādipūrṇe carmāntraveṣṭitamukhe patitaṃ ha pītam /
analyzed: majja asthi pitta kaphara phala ādi pūrṇe carma antra veṣṭita mukhe patitam ha pītam

original: āsvādane mama ca pāpagatermurāre māyābalaṃ tava vibho paramaṃ nimittam // GarP_3,7.22 //
analyzed: āsvādane mama ca pāpa gateḥ murāre māyā balam tava vibho paramam nimittam

original: saṃsāracakre bhramataśca nityaṃ suduḥ kharūpe sukhaleśavarjite /
analyzed: saṃsāra cakre bhramataḥ ca nityam su duḥ kha rūpe sukha leśa varjite

original: malaṃ vamantaṃ navabhiśca dvāraiḥ śarīramāruhya sumūḍhabuddhiḥ // GarP_3,7.23 //
analyzed: malam vamantam navabhiḥ ca dvāraiḥ śarīram āruhya su mūḍha buddhiḥ

original: namāmi nityaṃ tava tatkathāmṛtaṃ vihāyadeva śrutimūlanāśanam /
analyzed: namāmi nityam tava tat kathā amṛtam vihāyat eva śruti mūla nāśanam

original: kuṭuṃbapoṣaṃ ca sadā ca kurvandānādyakurvannivasan gṛhe ca // GarP_3,7.24 //
analyzed: kuṭuṃba poṣam ca sadā ca kurvan dānādi akurvan nivasan gṛhe ca

original: dūre ca saṃsāramalaṃ tvidaṃ kuru dehi hyado divyakathāmṛtaṃ sadā /
analyzed: dūre ca saṃsāra malam tu idam kuru dehi hi adaḥ divya kathā amṛtam sadā

original: etādṛśohaṃ tava sadguṇaughaṃ stotuṃ samartho nāsmi śacīsamaśca // GarP_3,7.25 //
analyzed: etādṛśaḥ uham tava sat guṇa ogham stotum samarthaḥ na asmi śacī samaḥ ca

original: evaṃ stutvāniruddhastu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā aniruddhaḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotraṃ manaḥ svāyaṃbhuvobravīt // GarP_3,7.26 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotram manaḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ bravīt

original: svāyaṃbhuva uvāca /
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuvaḥ uvāca

original: stotuṃ hyanupraviśatopi na garbhaduḥ khaṃ tasmādahaṃ paramapūjyapadaṃ gataste // GarP_3,7.27 //
analyzed: stotum hi anupraviśataḥ api na garbha duḥ kham tasmāt aham parama pūjya padam gataḥ te

original: manorbhāryā mānavī ca yamaḥ saṃyaminīpatiḥ /
analyzed: manoḥ bhāryā mānavī ca yamaḥ saṃyaminī patiḥ

original: diśābhimānī candrastu sūryaścakṣurniyāmakaḥ /
analyzed: diśā abhimānī candraḥ tu sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ niyāmakaḥ

original: parasparasamā hyete muktvā saṃsārameva ca // GarP_3,7.28 //
analyzed: paraspara samāḥ hi ete muktvā saṃsāram eva ca

original: pravāhādviguṇonaścetyevaṃ jānīhi cāṇḍaja /
analyzed: pravāhāt viguṇa ūnaḥ ca iti evam jānīhi ca aṇḍaja

original: sūryānantarajaḥ stotuṃ varuṇaḥ saṃpracakrame // GarP_3,7.29 //
analyzed: sūrya anantara jaḥ stotum varuṇaḥ saṃpracakrame

original: varuṇa uvāca /
analyzed: varuṇaḥ uvāca

original: tvadvicchayā racite dehagehe puttre kalatrepi dhane dravyajātau /
analyzed: tvad vicchayā racite deha gehe puttre kalatre api dhane dravya jātau

original: mamāhamityalpadhiyā ca mūḍhā saṃsāraduḥ khe vinimajjanti sarve // GarP_3,7.30 //
analyzed: mama aham iti alpa dhiyā ca mūḍhā saṃsāra duḥ khe vinimajjanti sarve

original: ato hare tādṛśīṃ me kubuddhiṃ vināśya me dehi te pādadāsyam /
analyzed: atas hare tādṛśīm me ku buddhim vināśya me dehi te pāda dāsyam

original: ahaṃ manoḥ pādapādārdhabhūtaguṇena hīnaḥ sarvadā vai murāre // GarP_3,7.31 //
analyzed: aham manoḥ pāda pāda ardha bhūta guṇena hīnaḥ sarvadā vai murāre

original: evaṃ stutvā tu varuṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ /
analyzed: evam stutvā tu varuṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ

original: varuṇānantarotpanno nārado hyastuvaddharim // GarP_3,7.32 //
analyzed: varuṇa anantara utpannaḥ nāradaḥ hi astuvat harim

original: nārada uvāca /
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: yannāmadheyaśravaṇānukīrtanātsvādvanyatattvaṃ mama nāsti viṣṇo /
analyzed: yad nāmadheya śravaṇa anukīrtanāt svādu anya tattvam mama nā asti viṣṇo

original: punīhyataścaiva parovarāyānyajjihvāgre vartate nāma tasya // GarP_3,7.33 //
analyzed: punīhi atas ca eva parovarāya anyat jihvā agre vartate nāma tasya

original: yajjihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti sa brāhmaṇo naiva sa eva gokharaḥ /
analyzed: yat jihvā agre hari nāmā eva na asti sa brāhmaṇaḥ nā eva saḥ eva go kharaḥ

original: ahaṃ na jāne ca tava svarūpaṃ nyūno hyahaṃ varuṇātsarvadaiva // GarP_3,7.34 //
analyzed: aham na jāne ca tava sva rūpam nyūnaḥ hi aham varuṇāt sarvadā eva

original: evaṃ stutvā nārado vai khagendrastūṣṇīmabhūddevadevasya cāgre /
analyzed: evam stutvā nāradaḥ vai khaga indraḥ tūṣṇīm abhūt devadevasya ca agre

original: yo nāradānantaraṃ saṃbabhūva bhṛgurmahātmā stotumupapracakrame // GarP_3,7.35 //
analyzed: yaḥ nārada anantaram saṃbabhūva bhṛguḥ mahātmā stotum upapracakrame

original: bhṛguruvāca /
analyzed: bhṛguḥ uvāca

original: kimāsanaṃ te garuḍāsanāya kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kaustubhabhūṣaṇāya /
analyzed: kim āsanam te garuḍa āsanāya kim bhūṣaṇam kaustubha bhūṣaṇāya

original: lakṣmīkalatrāya kimasti deyaṃ vāgīśa kiṃ te vacanīyamasti /
analyzed: lakṣmī kalatrāya kim asti deyam vāgīśa kim te vacanīyam asti

original: ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca hyahaṃ sadā varuṇā tpādahīnaḥ // GarP_3,7.36 //
analyzed: atas na jāne tava sat guṇān ca hi aham sadā varuṇa āt pāda hīnaḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ devaṃ bhṛgustūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha /
analyzed: evam stutvā harim devam bhṛguḥ tūṣṇīm babhūva ha

original: tadanantarajo hyagnirastāvītpuruṣottamam // GarP_3,7.37 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ hi agniḥ astāvīt puruṣottamam

original: agniruvāca /
analyzed: agniḥ uvāca

original: yattejasāhaṃ susamiddhatejā havyaṃ vahāmyadhvare ājyasiktam // GarP_3,7.38 //
analyzed: yat tejasā aham su samiddha tejāḥ havyam vahāmi adhvare ājya siktam

original: yattejasāhaṃ jaṭhare saṃpraviśya pacannannaṃ sarvadā pūrṇaśaktiḥ /
analyzed: yad tejasā aham jaṭhare saṃpraviśya pacan annam sarvadā pūrṇa śaktiḥ

original: ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca bhṛgorahaṃ sarvadaivaṃ samosmi // GarP_3,7.39 //
analyzed: atas na jāne tava sat guṇān ca bhṛgoḥ aham sarvadā evam samaḥ asmi

original: tadanantarajā stotuṃ prasūtirupacakrame // GarP_3,7.40 //
analyzed: tad anantara jā stotum prasūtiḥ upacakrame

original: prasūtiruvāca /
analyzed: prasūtiḥ uvāca

original: yannāmārthavicāraṇepimunayo muhyati vai sarvadā tvadbhītā api devatā hyavirataṃ strībhiḥ sahaiva sthitāḥ /
analyzed: yad nāma artha vicāraṇa īpi munayaḥ muhyati vai sarvadā tvad bhītāḥ api devatāḥ hi aviratam strībhiḥ saha eva sthitāḥ

original: māndhātṛdhruvanāradāśca bhṛgavo vaivasvatādyākhilāḥ premṇā vai praṇamāmyahaṃ hitakṛte tasmai namo viṣṇave // GarP_3,7.41 //
analyzed: māndhātṛ dhruva nāradāḥ ca bhṛgavaḥ vaivasvata ādya akhilāḥ premṇā vai praṇamāmi aham hita kṛte tasmai namaḥ viṣṇave

original: ato na jāne tava sadguṇānsadā evaṃ vidhā kā mama śaktirasti /
analyzed: atas na jāne tava sat guṇān sadā evaṃvidhā kā mama śaktiḥ asti

original: stutvā hyevaṃ prasūtistu tūṣṇīmāsītkhageśvara // GarP_3,7.42 //
analyzed: stutvā hi evam prasūtiḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsīt khageśvara

original: agnirvāgātmako brahmaputro bhṛgu ṛṣistathā /
analyzed: agniḥ vāc ātmakaḥ brahma putraḥ bhṛguḥ ṛṣiḥ tathā

original: tadbhāryā vai prasūtistu traya ete samāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,7.43 //
analyzed: tad bhāryā vai prasūtiḥ tu trayaḥ ete samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: varuṇātpādahīnāśca pravahādviguṇādhamāḥ /
analyzed: varuṇāt pāda hīnāḥ ca pravahāt viguṇa adhamāḥ

original: dakṣācchatāvarā jñeyā mitrāttu dviguṇādhikāḥ // GarP_3,7.44 //
analyzed: dakṣāt śata avarāḥ jñeyāḥ mitrāt tu dviguṇa adhikāḥ

original: prasūtyanantaraṃ jāto vasiṣṭho brahmanandanaḥ /
analyzed: prasūti anantaram jātaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ brahma nandanaḥ

original: vinayāvanato bhūtvā stotuṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,7.45 //
analyzed: vinaya avanataḥ bhūtvā stotum samupacakrame

original: vasiṣṭha uvāca /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca

original: namostu tasmai puruṣāya vedhase namonamo 'sadvṛjinacchide namaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ astu tasmai puruṣāya vedhase namaḥ namaḥ sat vṛjina chide namaḥ

original: namonamo svāṅgabhavāya nityaṃ natosmi henātha tavāṅghripaṅkajam // GarP_3,7.46 //
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ sva aṅga bhavāya nityam nataḥ asmi henā atha tava aṅghri paṅkajam

original: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ bhagavanvāsudeva hyagnerahaṃ sarvadā nyūna eva /
analyzed: mām pāhi nityam bhagavan vāsudeva hi agneḥ aham sarvadā nyūnaḥ eva

original: mitrādahaṃ sarvadā kiñcidūnaḥ stutvā deva sobhavattatra tūṣṇīm // GarP_3,7.47 //
analyzed: mitrāt aham sarvadā kiñcid ūnaḥ stutvā deva saḥ bhavat tatra tūṣṇīm

original: yo vasiṣṭhānantarajo marīcirbrahmanandanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vasiṣṭha anantara jaḥ marīciḥ brahma nandanaḥ

original: harintuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_3,7.48 //
analyzed: harin tuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇam gurum

original: marīciruvāca /
analyzed: marīciḥ uvāca

original: devena cāhaṃ hatadhīrbhavanaprasaṅgātsarvāśubhopagamanādvimukhedriyaśca /
analyzed: devena ca aham hata dhīḥ bhavana prasaṅgāt sarva aśubha upagamanāt vimukha idriyaḥ ca

original: kurve ca nityaṃ sukhaleśalavādinā tvaddaraṃ manastvaśubhakarma samācarīṣye // GarP_3,7.49 //
analyzed: kurve ca nityam sukha leśa lava ādinā tvad daram manaḥ tu aśubha karma samācarīṣye

original: etādṛśohaṃ bhagavānanantaḥ sadā vasiṣṭhasya samāna eva // GarP_3,7.50 //
analyzed: etādṛśaḥ uham bhagavān anantaḥ sadā vasiṣṭhasya samānaḥ eva

original: evaṃ stutvā marīcistu tūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
analyzed: evam stutvā marīciḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga

original: tadatantarajohyatrirastāvītprāñjalirharim // GarP_3,7.51 //
analyzed: tad atantara johya triḥ astāvīt prāñjaliḥ harim

original: āvirbhavajjagatprabhavāyāvatīrṇaṃ tadrakṣaṇārthamanavadyañca tathāvyayāya /
analyzed: āvirbhavat jagat prabhavāya avatīrṇam tad rakṣaṇa artham anavadyam ca tathā avyayāya

original: tattvārthamūlamavikāri tava svarūpaṃ hyānandasāramata eva vikāraśūnyam // GarP_3,7.52 //
analyzed: tattva artha mūlam avikāri tava svarūpam hi ānanda sāram atas eva vikāra śūnyam

original: traiguṇyaśūnyamakhileṣu ca saṃvibhaktaṃ tatra praviśya bhagavanna hi paśyatīva /
analyzed: traiguṇya śūnyam akhileṣu ca saṃvibhaktam tatra praviśya bhagavat na hi paśyati iva

original: ato marārestava sadguṇāṃśca stotuṃ na śakromi marīcetulyaḥ // GarP_3,7.53 //
analyzed: atas marāreḥ tava sat guṇān ca stotum na śakromi marīci tulyaḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hyatrirapitūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
analyzed: evam stutvā hi atriḥ api tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotumaṅgirā vākyamabravīt // GarP_3,7.54 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum aṅgirāḥ vākyam abravīt

original: aṅgirā uvāca /
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ uvāca

original: draṣṭuṃ na śakromi tava svarūpaṃ hyanantabāhūdaramastakaṃ ca /
analyzed: draṣṭum na śakromi tava sva rūpam hi ananta bāhu udara mastakam ca

original: anantasāhasrakirīṭajuṣṭaṃ mahārhanānābharaṇaiśca śobhitam /
analyzed: ananta sāhasra kirīṭa juṣṭam mahārha nānā ābharaṇaiḥ ca śobhitam

original: etādṛśaṃ rūpamanantapāraṃ stotuṃ hyaśaktastu samosmi cātreḥ // GarP_3,7.55 //
analyzed: etādṛśam rūpam ananta pāram stotum hi aśaktaḥ tu samaḥ asmi ca atreḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hyaṅgirāśca tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā hi aṅgirāḥ ca tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ pulastyo vākyamavravīt // GarP_3,7.56 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum pulastyaḥ vākyam avravīt

original: pulastya uvāca /
analyzed: pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: yo vā haristu bhagavānsa (sva)
analyzed: yaḥ vā hariḥ tu bhagavān sa sva

original: upāsakānāṃ saṃdarśayedbhuvanamaṅgalamaṅgalaṃ ca /
analyzed: upāsakānām saṃdarśayet bhuvana maṅgala maṅgalam ca

original: (laśca) yasmai namo bhagavate purupāya tubhyaṃ yo vāvitā nirayabhāgagamaprasaṅge // GarP_3,7.57 //
analyzed: laḥ ca yasmai namaḥ bhagavate purupāya tubhyam yaḥ niraya bhāga gama prasaṅge

original: etādṛśāṃstava guṇānnavituṃ na śaktaṃ māṃ pāhi bhagavansadṛśo hyaṅgirasā ca // GarP_3,7.58 //
analyzed: etādṛśān tava guṇān navitum na śaktam mām pāhi bhagavan sadṛśaḥ hi aṅgirasā ca

original: evaṃ stutvā pulastyopi stūṣṇīmeva vabhūva ha /
analyzed: evam stutvā pulastyaḥ api stūṣṇīm eva vabhūva ha

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ pulaho vākyamabravīt // GarP_3,7.59 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum pulahaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: pulaha uvāca /
analyzed: pulahaḥ uvāca

original: niṣkāmarūparihitasya samarpitaṃ ca snānāvarottamapayaḥ phalapuṣpabhojyam /
analyzed: niṣkāma rūpa rihitasya samarpitam ca snāna avara uttama payaḥ phala puṣpa bhojyam

original: ārādhanaṃ bhagavatastava satkriyāśca vyarthaṃ bhavediti vadanti mahānubhāvāḥ // GarP_3,7.60 //
analyzed: ārādhanam bhagavataḥ tava satkriyāḥ ca vyartham bhavet iti vadanti mahā anubhāvāḥ

original: tasmai sadā bhagavate praṇamāmi nityaṃ niṣkāmayā tava samarpaṇamātravuddhyā /
analyzed: tasmai sadā bhagavate praṇamāmi nityam niṣkāmayā tava samarpaṇa mātra vuddhyā

original: vaikuṇṭhanātha bhagavanstavane na śaktiḥ sohaṃ pulasatyasadṛśosmi na saṃśayotra // GarP_3,7.61 //
analyzed: vaikuṇṭha nātha bhagavan stavane na śaktiḥ saḥ ham pula satya sadṛśaḥ asmi na

original: evaṃ stutvā tu pulahastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
analyzed: evam stutvā tu pulahaḥ tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ kratuḥ samupacakrame // GarP_3,7.62 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum kratuḥ samupacakrame

original: kraturuvāca /
analyzed: kratuḥ uvāca

original: prāṇaprayāṇasamaye bhagavaṃstavaiva nāmāni saṃsṛtijaduḥ khavināśakāni /
analyzed: prāṇa prayāṇa samaye bhagavan tava eva nāmāni saṃsṛti ja duḥkha vināśakāni

original: yenaikajanmaśamalaṃ sahasaiva hitvā saṃyāti muktimamalāṃ tamahaṃ prapadye // GarP_3,7.63 //
analyzed: yena eka janma śamalam sahasā eva hitvā saṃyāti muktim amalām tam aham prapadye

original: ye bhaktyā vivaśā viṣṇo nāmamātraikadajalpakāḥ /
analyzed: ye bhaktyā vivaśāḥ viṣṇo

original: tepi muktiṃ prayāntyāśu kimuta dhyāyinaḥ sadā // GarP_3,7.64 //
analyzed: te api muktim prayānti āśu kim uta dhyāyinaḥ sadā

original: evaṃ stutvā kraturapi tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
analyzed: evam stutvā kratuḥ api tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ manurvaivasvatobravīt // GarP_3,7.65 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum manuḥ vaivasvataḥ bravīt

original: vaivalasvata uvāca /
analyzed: vaivalasvataḥ uvāca

original: sohaṃ hi karmakaraṇe nirataḥ sadaiva strīṇāṃ bhoge ca nirataśca gude pramattaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ uham hi karma karaṇe nirataḥ sadā eva strīṇām bhoge ca nirataḥ ca gude pramattaḥ

original: jihvendriye ca niratastava darśane ca samyagvirāgasahitaḥ paramo dareṇa // GarP_3,7.66 //
analyzed: jihvā indriye ca nirataḥ tava darśane ca samyak virāga sahitaḥ paramaḥ dareṇa

original: māṃsāsthimajjarudhiraiḥ sahite ca dehe bhaktiṃ sadaiva bhagavannapi taskare ca /
analyzed: māṃsa asthi majja rudhiraiḥ sahite ca dehe bhaktim sadā eva bhagavan api taskare ca

original: gurvagnibāḍabagavādiṣu satsu duḥ khātsamyagviraktimupayāmi sahasva nityam // GarP_3,7.67 //
analyzed: guru agni bāḍaba gavādiṣu satsu duḥ khāt samyak viraktim upayāmi sahasva nityam

original: lokānuvādaśravaṇe paramā ca śaktirnārāyaṇasya namane na ca mesti śaktiḥ /
analyzed: loka anuvāda śravaṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ nārāyaṇasya namane na ca mā isti śaktiḥ

original: lokānuyānakaraṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ kṣetrādimārgagamane paramā hyaśaktiḥ // GarP_3,7.68 //
analyzed: loka anuyāna karaṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ kṣetra ādi mārga gamane paramā hi aśaktiḥ

original: vaiśyādikeṣu dhanikeṣu parā ca śaktiḥ sadbrāhmaṇeṣvapi na śaktiraho murāre // GarP_3,7.69 //
analyzed: vaiśya ādikeṣu dhanikeṣu parā ca śaktiḥ sat brāhmaṇeṣu api na śaktiḥ aho murāre

original: vaivasvatamanurdevaṃ stutvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha /
analyzed: vaivasvata manuḥ devam stutvā tūṣṇīm babhūva ha

original: tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ viśvāmitropacakrame // GarP_3,7.70 //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ stotum viśvāmitra upacakrame

original: viśvāmitra uvāca /
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ uvāca

original: na dhyāte caraṇāṃbuje bhagavato saṃdhyāpi nānuṣṭhitā jñānadvārakapāṭapāṭanapaṭurdharmopinopārjitaḥ /
analyzed: na dhyāte caraṇa aṃbuje bhagavato saṃdhyā api nā anuṣṭhitā jñāna dvāra kapāṭa pāṭana paṭuḥ dharmopinā upārjitaḥ

original: antarvyāphamalābhighātakaraṇe paṭvī śrutā te kathā no deva śravaṇena pāhi bhagavanmāmatritulyaṃ sadā // GarP_3,7.71 //
analyzed: antar vyāpha mala abhighāta karaṇe paṭvī śrutā te kathā naḥ deva śravaṇena pāhi bhagavat mām atri tulyam sadā

original: viśvāmitraṛṣistvevaṃ stutvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha /
analyzed: viśvāmitra ṛṣiḥ tu evam stutvā tūṣṇīm babhūva ha

original: bhṛgunāradakṣāṃśca vihāya brahmaputrakāḥ // GarP_3,7.72 //
analyzed: bhṛgu nārada kṣān ca vihāya brahma putrakāḥ

original: saptasaṃkhyā vasiṣṭhādyā viśvāmitrastathaiva ca /
analyzed: sapta saṃkhyāḥ vasiṣṭha ādyāḥ viśvāmitraḥ tathā eva ca

original: vaivasvatamanustvete parasparasamāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,7.73 //
analyzed: vaivasvata manuḥ tu ete paraspara samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vahnerapyavarā nityaṃ kiñcinmitrādguṇādhikāḥ /
analyzed: vahneḥ api avarāḥ nityam kiñcid mitrāt guṇa adhikāḥ

original: tadanantajastotraṃ vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara // GarP_3,7.74 //
analyzed: tad ananta ja stotram vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde devādistutitattattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde devādistutitattattāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 8
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: kratoranantaraṃ jāto mitro (śro)
analyzed: kratoḥ anantaram jātaḥ

original: nāma khageśvara /
analyzed: nāma khageśvara

original: nārāyaṇaṃ jagadyoniṃ stotuṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,8.1 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇam jagadyonim stotum samupacakrame

original: mitra uvāca /
analyzed: mitraḥ uvāca

original: natosmyajñastvaccaraṇāravindaṃ bhavacchidaṃ svastyayanaṃ bhavacchide /
analyzed: nataḥ asmi ajñaḥ tvad caraṇa aravindam bhavat chidam svastyayanam bhavat chide

original: veda svayaṃ bhagavānvāsudevo nāhaṃ nāgnirna tridevā munīndrāḥ // GarP_3,8.2 //
analyzed: veda svayam bhagavān vāsudevaḥ na aham na agniḥ na tridevāḥ muni indrāḥ

original: athāpare bhāgavatapradhānā yadā na jānīyurathāpare kutaḥ /
analyzed: atha apare bhāgavata pradhānāḥ yadā na jānīyuḥ atha apare kutas

original: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ paratopyadhīśa viśvāmitrānnyūna eveti nityam /
analyzed: mām pāhi nityam paratas api adhīśa viśvāmitrāt nyūnaḥ evā iti nityam

original: ahaṃ parjanyārdviguṇa eva nityamato mama stavane nāsti śaktiḥ // GarP_3,8.3 //
analyzed: aham parjanyāt dviguṇaḥ eva nityam atas mama stavane nā asti śaktiḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ mitrastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
analyzed: evam stutvā harim mitraḥ tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga

original: tadanantarajā tārā stotuṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,8.4 //
analyzed: tad anantara jā tārā stotum samupacakrame

original: tārovāca
analyzed: tārā uvāca

original: ananyena tu bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām /
analyzed: ananyena tu bhāvena bhaktim kurvanti ye dṛḍhām

original: tvatkṛte tyaktakarmāṇastyaktasvajanabāndhavāḥ // GarP_3,8.5 //
analyzed: tvad kṛte tyakta karmāṇaḥ tyakta sva jana bāndhavāḥ

original: tvadāśrayāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā (dṛṣṭvā)
analyzed: tvad āśrayām kathām śrutvā dṛṣṭvā

original: śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca /
analyzed: śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca

original: tathaite sādhavo viṣṇo sarvasaṃgavivarjitāḥ // GarP_3,8.6 //
analyzed: tathā ete sādhavaḥ viṣṇo sarva saṃga vivarjitāḥ

original: tanmadhye patitāṃ pāhi sadā mitrasamāṃ prabho /
analyzed: tad madhye patitām pāhi sadā mitra samām prabho

original: tārānantarajaḥ prāha nirṛtiśca khageśvara // GarP_3,8.7 //
analyzed: tārā anantara jaḥ prāha nirṛtiḥ ca khageśvara

original: nirṛtiruvāca /
analyzed: nirṛtiḥ uvāca

original: yogena tvayyarpitayā ca bhaktyā saṃyānti lokāḥ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca /
analyzed: yogena tvayi arpitayā ca bhaktyā saṃyānti lokāḥ paramām gatim ca

original: āsevayā sarvaguṇādhikānāṃ jñānena vairāgyayutenadave // GarP_3,8.8 //
analyzed: āsevayā sarva guṇa adhikānām jñānena

original: cittasya nigraheṇaiva viṣṇoryānti paraṃ padam /
analyzed: cittasya nigraheṇa eva viṣṇoḥ yānti param padam

original: ato māṃ pāhi dayayā sadā tārāsamaṃ prabho /
analyzed: atas mām pāhi dayayā sadā tārā samam prabho

original: tadanantarajā stotuṃ prāvahī taṃ pracakrame // GarP_3,8.9 //
analyzed: tad anantara jā stotum prāvahī tam pracakrame

original: pravāhyuvāca /
analyzed: pravāhī uvāca

original: sutāḥ prasaṃgena bhavanti vīryāttava prasādātparamāḥ sampadaśca /
analyzed: sutāḥ prasaṃgena bhavanti vīryāt tava prasādāt paramāḥ sampadaḥ ca

original: yā hyuttamaślokarasāyanāḥ kathāstatsevanādāstvapavargavartmani // GarP_3,8.10 //
analyzed: yāḥ hi uttamaśloka rasāyanāḥ kathāḥ tad sevanāt āstu apavarga vartmani

original: bhaktirbhavetsarvadā devadeva sadāpyahaṃ nirṛteḥ sāmyameva /
analyzed: bhaktiḥ bhavet sarvadā devadeva sadā api aham nirṛteḥ sāmyam eva

original: saharbhāṣyakomitraḥ tkayītāraḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,8.11 //
koṇādhipo nirṛtiśca prāvahī pravahapriyā /
analyzed: koṇādhipaḥ nirṛtiḥ ca prāvahī pravahapriyā

original: catvāra ete parjanyāttriguṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,8.12 //
analyzed: catvāraḥ ete parjanyāt triguṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: tadanantarajānvakṣye tāñchṛṇu tvaṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: tad anantara jān vakṣye tān śṛṇu tvam khageśvara

original: pravāhabhāryānantarajo viṣvaksenothapārṣadaḥ /
vāyuputro mahābhāgaḥ hariṃ stotuṃ pracakrame // GarP_3,8.13 //
analyzed: vāyuputraḥ mahābhāgaḥ harim stotum pracakrame

original: viṣvaksena uvāca /
analyzed: viṣvaksenaḥ uvāca

original: bhagavānmokṣadaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pūrṇānando sadāyadi /
analyzed: bhagavān mokṣa daḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sadā yadi

original: yadi syātparamā bhaktirhya parokṣatvasādhanā // GarP_3,8.14 //
analyzed: yadi syāt paramā bhaktiḥ hya parokṣa tva sādhanā

original: tathā svagurumārabhya brahmānteṣu ca sādhuṣu /
analyzed: tathā sva gurum ārabhya brahma anteṣu ca sādhuṣu

original: tadyogyatānusāreṇa bhaktirniṣkapaṭā yadi // GarP_3,8.15 //
analyzed: tad yogyatā anusāreṇa bhaktiḥ niṣkapaṭā yadi

original: tulasyādiṣu jīveṣu yadi syātprītiraṇḍaja /
analyzed: tulasī ādiṣu jīveṣu yadi syāt prītiraṇḍaja

original: saṃsmṛtiśca tadā nāśī bhūyādeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,8.16 //
analyzed: saṃsmṛtiḥ ca tadā na āśī bhūyāt eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ stuttvā mahābhāgo viṣvakse no mahāprabho /
analyzed: evam stuttvā mahābhāgaḥ viṣvakse naḥ mahā prabho

original: tūṣṇīṃ babhūva garuḍa prāñjalirnamrakandharaḥ /
analyzed: tūṣṇīm babhūva garuḍa prāñjaliḥ namra kandharaḥ

original: mitrādahaṃ nyūna eva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,8.17 //
analyzed: mitrāt aham nyūnaḥ eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: iti śrīgā- ma- u- tṛ- dha- viṣṇustutirdevatāramyādi- aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti viṣṇustutiḥ devatā ramyā ādi aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 9
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīgaruḍa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: ajānajasvarūpaṃ ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mahāmate /
analyzed: aja anaja svarūpam ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mahāmate

original: tadanyāṃśca krameṇeva vaktuṃ kṛṣṇa tvamarhasi // GarP_3,9.1 //
analyzed: tad anyān ca krameṇa iva vaktum kṛṣṇa tvam arhasi

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: ajānākhyā devatāstu tattaddevakule bhavāḥ /
analyzed: devatāḥ tu tad tad devakule bhavāḥ

original: ajānadevatāstā hi tebhyogyāḥ karmadevatāḥ // GarP_3,9.2 //
analyzed: a jāna devatāḥ tāḥ hi tebhyogyāḥ karma devatāḥ

original: virādhaścārudeṣṇaśca tathā citrarathastathā /
analyzed: virādhaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca tathā citrarathaḥ tathā

original: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ kiśoraśca hūhūrhāhāstathaiva ca // GarP_3,9.3 //
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ kiśoraḥ ca hūhūḥ hāhāḥ tathā eva ca

original: vidyādharaścograseno viśvāvasuparāvasū /
analyzed: vidyādharaḥ ca ugrasenaḥ viśvāvasu parāvasū

original: citrasenaśca gopālo balaḥ pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,9.4 //
analyzed: citrasenaḥ ca gopālaḥ balaḥ pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ

original: evamādyaśca gandharvāḥ śatasaṃkhyāḥ khageśvara /
analyzed: evamādyaḥ ca gandharvāḥ śata saṃkhyāḥ khageśvara

original: ajānajasamā jñeyā muktau saṃsāra eva ca // GarP_3,9.5 //
analyzed: aja anaja samāḥ jñeyāḥ muktau saṃsāre eva ca

original: ajñānajāstu me devāḥ karmajebhyaḥ śatāvarāḥ /
analyzed: ajñāna jāḥ tu me devāḥ karma jebhyaḥ śata avarāḥ

original: ghṛtācī menakā raṃbhā urvaśī ca tilottamā // GarP_3,9.6 //
analyzed: ghṛtācī menakā raṃbhā urvaśī ca tilottamā

original: suketuḥ śabarī caiva mañjughoṣā ca piṅgalā /
analyzed: suketuḥ śabarī ca eva mañjughoṣā ca piṅgalā

original: ityādikaṃ yakṣaratnaṃ saha saṃparikīrtitam // GarP_3,9.7 //
analyzed: iti ādikam yakṣa ratnam saha saṃparikīrtitam

original: ajānajasamā hyete karmajebhyaḥ śatāvarāḥ /
analyzed: aja ana ja samāḥ hi ete karma jebhyaḥ śata avarāḥ

original: viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaśca nāradaścyavanastathā // GarP_3,9.8 //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca nāradaḥ cyavanaḥ tathā

original: utathyaśca muniścaitāndrājapitvā khageśvara /
analyzed: utathyaḥ ca muniḥ ca etān drā japitvā khageśvara

original: ṛṣayaśca mahātmāno hyajānajasamāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,9.9 //
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ hi aja anaja samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: śatarciḥ kaśyapo jñeyo madhyamaśca parāśaraḥ /
analyzed: śatarciḥ kaśyapaḥ jñeyaḥ madhyamaḥ ca parāśaraḥ

original: pāvamānyaḥ pragāthaśca kṣudrasūktaśca devalaḥ // GarP_3,9.10 //
analyzed: pāvamānyaḥ pragāthaḥ ca kṣudrasūktaḥ ca devalaḥ

original: gṛtsamado hyāsuriśca bharadvājotha mudgalaḥ /
analyzed: gṛtsamadaḥ hi āsuriḥ ca bharadvājaḥ utha mudgalaḥ

original: uddālako hyṛ śṛṅgaḥ śaṅkhaḥ satyavratastathā // GarP_3,9.11 //
analyzed: uddālakaḥ śṛṅgaḥ śaṅkhaḥ satyavrataḥ tathā

original: suyajñaścaiva bābhravyo māṇḍūkaścaiva bāṣkalaḥ /
analyzed: suyajñaḥ ca eva bābhravyaḥ māṇḍūkaḥ ca eva bāṣkalaḥ

original: dharmācāryastathāgastyo dālbhyo dārḍhyacyutastathā // GarP_3,9.12 //
analyzed: dharmācāryaḥ tathā agastyaḥ dālbhyaḥ dārḍhyacyutaḥ tathā

original: kavaṣo haritaḥ kaṇvo virūpo musalastathā /
analyzed: kavaṣaḥ haritaḥ kaṇvaḥ virūpaḥ musalaḥ tathā

original: viṣṇuvṛddhaśca ātreyaḥ śrīvatso vatsaletyapi // GarP_3,9.13 //
analyzed: viṣṇuvṛddhaḥ ca ātreyaḥ śrīvatsaḥ vatsala iti api

original: bhārgavaścāpnavānaśca māṇḍūkeyastathaiva /
analyzed: bhārgavaḥ ca āpnavānaḥ ca māṇḍūkeyaḥ tathā eva

original: maṇḍkaścaiva jābacaliḥ vītihavyastathaiva ca // GarP_3,9.14 //
analyzed: maṇḍkaḥ ca eva jābacaliḥ vītihavyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: gṛtsamadaḥ śaunakaśca ityādyā ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: gṛtsamadaḥ śaunakaḥ ca ityādyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: eteṣāṃ śravaṇādeva hariḥ prīṇāti sarvadā // GarP_3,9.15 //
analyzed: eteṣām śravaṇāt eva hariḥ prīṇāti sarvadā

original: bruve dvyaṣṭasahasraṃ ca śṛṇu tārkṣya mama striyaḥ /
analyzed: bruve dvi aṣṭa sahasram ca śṛṇu tārkṣya mama striyaḥ

original: agniputrāstu yaddvyaṣṭasahasrañca mama striyaḥ /
analyzed: agni putrāḥ tu yat dvi aṣṭa sahasran ca mama striyaḥ

original: ajānajasamā hyetā (te)
analyzed: aja ana jasamā hi etā te

original: nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,9.16 //
analyzed: na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tvaṣṭuḥ putrī kaśerūśca tāsāṃ madhye guṇādhikā /
analyzed: tvaṣṭuḥ putrī kaśerūḥ ca tāsām madhye guṇa adhikā

original: tadanantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu samyak khageśvara // GarP_3,9.17 //
analyzed: tad anantara jān anvakṣye śṛṇu samyak khageśvara

original: ājānebhyastu pitaraḥ saptabhyonye śatāvarāḥ /
analyzed: ājānebhyaḥ tu pitaraḥ saptabhyaḥ nye śata avarāḥ

original: tathādhikā hi pitara iti vedavidāṃ matam // GarP_3,9.18 //
analyzed: tathā adhikāḥ hi pitaraḥ iti veda vidām matam

original: tadanantarājānvakṣye śṛṇu tvaṃ dvijasattama /
analyzed: tad ananta rāja anvakṣye śṛṇu tvam dvijasattama

original: aṣṭābhyo devagandharvā aṣṭottaraśataṃ vinā // GarP_3,9.19 //
analyzed: aṣṭābhyaḥ devagandharvāḥ aṣṭottaraśatam vinā

original: tebhyaḥ śataguṇānandā devapreṣyāstu mukhyataḥ /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ śataguṇānandāḥ devapreṣyāḥ tu mukhyatas

original: svamukeneva devaiśca ājñāpyāḥ sarvadā gaṇāḥ // GarP_3,9.20 //
analyzed: devaiḥ ca ājñāpyāḥ sarvadā gaṇāḥ

original: ākhyātā devagandharvāstebhyaste ca śatāvarāḥ /
analyzed: ākhyātāḥ deva gandharvāḥ tebhyaḥ te ca śata avarāḥ

original: tebhyastu kṣitipā jñeyā avarāśca śatairguṇaiḥ // GarP_3,9.21 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ tu kṣitipāḥ jñeyāḥ avarāḥ ca śataiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: tebhyaḥ śataguṇājñeyā mānuṣeṣūttamā gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ śataguṇāḥ jñeyāḥ mānuṣeṣu uttamāḥ gaṇāḥ

original: evaṃ prāsaṃgikānuktvā prakṛtaṃ hyanusarāmyaham /
analyzed: evam prāsaṃgikān uktvā prakṛtam hi anusarāmi aham

original: evaṃ brahmādayo devā lakṣmyādyā api sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,9.22 //
analyzed: evam brahma ādayaḥ devāḥ lakṣmī ādyāḥ api sarvaśas

original: stutvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ sarve prāñjalīkṛtya bho dvija // GarP_3,9.23 //
analyzed: stutvā tūṣṇīm sthitāḥ sarve prāñjalīkṛtya bho dvija

original: iti stutaśca deveśo bhagavān hariravyayaḥ /
analyzed: iti stutaḥ ca deveśaḥ bhagavān hariḥ avyayaḥ

original: teṣāmāyatanaṃ dātuṃ manasā samacintayat // GarP_3,9.24 //
analyzed: teṣām āyatanam dātum manasā samacintayat

original: idaṃ pavitramārogyaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam /
analyzed: idam pavitram ārogyam puṇyam pāpa praṇāśanam

original: hariprasādajanakaṃ svarūpasukhasādhanam // GarP_3,9.25 //
idaṃ tu stavanaṃ viprā na paṭhantīha mānavāḥ /
analyzed: idam tu stavanam viprāḥ na paṭhanti iha mānavāḥ

original: na śṛṇvanti ca ye nityaṃ te sarve caiva māyinaḥ // GarP_3,9.26 //
analyzed: na śṛṇvanti ca ye nityam te sarve ca eva māyinaḥ

original: nasmarantontaraṃ nityaṃ ye bhuñjanti narādhamāḥ /
analyzed: na smarantaḥ ntaram nityam ye bhuñjanti nara adhamāḥ

original: tairbhuktā satataṃ viṣṭhā sadā krimiśatairyutā // GarP_3,9.27 //
analyzed: taiḥ bhuktā satatam viṣṭhā sadā krimi śataiḥ yutā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtī- utta- brahmakāṇḍe devakṛtaviṣṇustutidevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe brahmakāṇḍe devakṛtaviṣṇustutidevatātāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 10
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: devairevaṃ stuto viṣṇurbhagavānsāttvatāṃ patiḥ /
analyzed: devaiḥ evam stutaḥ viṣṇuḥ bhagavān sāttvatām patiḥ

original: kīdṛśaṃ hyāśrayaṃ dattvaiṣāṃ viveśa mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,10.1 //
analyzed: kīdṛśam hi āśrayam dattvā eṣām viveśa mahā prabhuḥ

original: etadveditumicchāmi kṛṣṇakṛṣṇa mahāprabho /
analyzed: etat veditum icchāmi kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā prabho

original: samyag brūhi dayālo tvaṃ yadi macchrotramarhati // GarP_3,10.2 //
analyzed: samyak brūhi dayālo tvam yadi mad śrotram arhati

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: teṣu tattveṣu bhagavānsa viveśa mahāprabhuḥ /
analyzed: teṣu tattveṣu bhagavān sa viveśa mahā prabhuḥ

original: kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavān saṃbandhavidhuro hariḥ // GarP_3,10.3 //
analyzed: kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavān saṃbandha vidhuraḥ hariḥ

original: adau sasarja bhagavān brahmāṇḍaṃ kana kātmakam /
analyzed: adau sasarja bhagavān brahmāṇḍam kana ka ātmakam

original: pañcāśatkoṭivistīrṇaṃ yojanānāṃ samantataḥ // GarP_3,10.4 //
analyzed: pañcāśat koṭi vistīrṇam yojanānām samantataḥ

original: tadūrdhvamaṇvavayavastāvānkanakarūpakaḥ /
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam aṇu avayavaḥ tāvān kanaka rūpakaḥ

original: vartate tata ūrdhvaṃ tu pañcāśatkoṭibhūtalam // GarP_3,10.5 //
analyzed: vartate tatas ūrdhvam tu pañcāśat koṭi bhū talam

original: evaṃ koṭiśataṃ tasyāvayavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: evam koṭi śatam tasya avayavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: tataśca saptāvaraṇaiḥ samatātparidhīkṛtam // GarP_3,10.6 //
analyzed: tatas ca sapta āvaraṇaiḥ samatāt paridhīkṛtam

original: kabandhāvaraṇaṃ hyādyaṃ koṭyā daśasahasrakam /
analyzed: kabandha āvaraṇam hi ādyam koṭyā daśa sahasrakam

original: dvitīyā varaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ pāvakasya mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,10.7 //
analyzed: dvitīyā varaṇam jñeyam pāvakasya mahātmanaḥ

original: apāṃ daśaguṇairyuktaṃ samantātparidhī (khī) kṛtam /
analyzed: apām daśaguṇaiḥ yuktam samantāt paridhī khī kṛtam

original: tṛtīyāvaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ harasyaiva mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,10.8 //
analyzed: tṛtīya āvaraṇam jñeyam harasya eva mahātmanaḥ

original: daśādhikaṃ pāvakācca samantātparivāritam /
analyzed: daśa adhikam pāvakāt ca samantāt parivāritam

original: caturthāvaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ nabhasopi mahāprabho // GarP_3,10.9 //
analyzed: caturtha āvaraṇam jñeyam nabhasaḥ api mahā prabho

original: harāddaśaguṇairevaṃ samantātparivāritam /
analyzed: harāt daśaguṇaiḥ evam samantāt parivāritam

original: pañcamāvaraṇaṃ jñeyamahaṅkārākhyamevaca // GarP_3,10.10 //
analyzed: pañcama āvaraṇam jñeyam ahaṅkāra ākhyam eva ca

original: vyomno daśaguṇairevaṃ samantātparivāri tam /
analyzed: vyomnaḥ daśaguṇaiḥ evam samantāt parivāri tam

original: ṣaṣṭhamāvaraṇaṃ proktaṃ mahattattvaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,10.11 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham āvaraṇam proktam mahat tattvam khageśvara

original: ahaṅkārāddaśaguṇaṃ samantātparivāritam /
analyzed: ahaṅkārāt daśaguṇam samantāt parivāritam

original: saptamāvaraṇaṃ proktaṃ triguṇāvaraṇaṃ prabho // GarP_3,10.12 //
analyzed: saptama āvaraṇam proktam triguṇa āvaraṇam prabho

original: mahattattvāddaśaguṇairadhikaṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: mahat tattvāt daśaguṇaiḥ adhikam parikīrtitam

original: mahattattvānantaraṃ ca tamo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,10.13 //
analyzed: mahat tattva anantaram ca tamaḥ hi āvaraṇam smṛtam

original: mahattattvātpañcaguṇairadhikaṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: mahat tattvāt pañcaguṇaiḥ adhikam parikīrtitam

original: tasmācca dviguṇaṃ jñeyaṃrajo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,10.14 //
analyzed: tasmāt ca dviguṇam jñeyam rajaḥ hi āvaraṇam smṛtam

original: tataśca dviguṇaṃ jñeyaṃ sattvāvaraṇamuttamam /
analyzed: tatas ca dviguṇam jñeyam sattva āvaraṇam uttamam

original: trayaścaivaṃ militvā tu ekāvaraṇamīritam // GarP_3,10.15 //
analyzed: trayaḥ ca evam militvā tu eka āvaraṇam īritam

original: avyākṛtākhyamākāśaṃ tadanantaramīritam /
analyzed: avyākṛta ākhyam ākāśam tat anantaram īritam

original: maryādārahitaścaivaṃ tatrāste hariravyayaḥ // GarP_3,10.16 //
analyzed: maryādā rahitaḥ ca evam tatra āste hariḥ avyayaḥ

original: aṣṭamāvaraṇaṃ vyomnoraṃ tarā virajā nadī /
analyzed: aṣṭama āvaraṇam vyomnā uram tarā virajā nadī

original: pañcayojanavistīrṇā samantātparīdhīkṛtā // GarP_3,10.17 //
analyzed: pañca yojana vistīrṇā samantāt parīdhīkṛtā

original: asti puṇyatamā jñeyā lokasaṃsāranāśinī /
analyzed: asti puṇyatamā jñeyā loka saṃsāra nāśinī

original: evaṃ caturmukhenaiva tadā hṛṣyaṃ ti cāṇḍaja // GarP_3,10.18 //
analyzed: evam caturmukhena eva tadā ca aṇḍaja

original: te sarve virajānadyāṃ samyak snātvā visarjya ca /
analyzed: te sarve virajā nadyām samyak snātvā visarjya ca

original: liṅgadehaṃ tataḥ paścānmokṣaṃ vindanti te hareḥ // GarP_3,10.19 //
analyzed: liṅga deham tatas paścāt mokṣam vindanti te hareḥ

original: aparokṣadṛśāmevaṃ brahmaṇā saha gāminām /
analyzed: a parokṣa dṛśām evam brahmaṇā saha gāminām

original: virajātaraṇaṃ viddhi nānyeṣāṃ vinatāsuta // GarP_3,10.20 //
