analyzed: virajā taraṇam viddhi na anyeṣām vinatā suta

original: aparokṣadṛśāṃ brahmanvyāsādīnāṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: aparokṣa dṛśām brahman vyāsa ādīnām khageśvara

original: virajātaraṇaṃ nāsti bhoktavyatvācca karmaṇaḥ // GarP_3,10.21 //
analyzed: virajā taraṇam na asti bhoktavya tvāt ca karmaṇaḥ

original: viriñcenaiva sākaṃ tu kalpesminnadhikāriṇām /
analyzed: viriñcena eva sākam tu kalpe smin adhikāriṇām

original: teṣāṃ tu niyamenaiva sarvaprārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_3,10.22 //
analyzed: teṣām tu niyamena eva sarva prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: bhavatyevaṃ na saṃdeho nānyeṣāṃ sarvasaṃkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: bhavati evam na saṃdehaḥ na anyeṣām sarva saṃkṣayaḥ

original: atastu virajātaraṇaṃ teṣāmeva bhavetpaṭo // GarP_3,10.23 //
analyzed: atas tu virajā taraṇam teṣām eva bhavet paṭaḥ

original: virajātaraṇaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ ta (tayosta)
analyzed: virajā taraṇam na asti teṣām ta tayoḥ ta

original: tsaṃgināṃ tathā /
analyzed: tsaṃginām tathā

original: sarvārabdhakṣayo nāsti yatasteṣāṃ khagādhipa // GarP_3,10.24 //
analyzed: sarva ārabdha kṣayaḥ nā asti yatas teṣām khaga adhipa

original: ataśca sarvathā nāsti virajātaraṇaṃ prabho /
analyzed: atas ca sarvathā nā asti virajā taraṇam prabho

original: pralaye virajānadyā layo nāsti khageśvara // GarP_3,10.25 //
analyzed: pralaye virajā nadyāḥ layaḥ na asti khageśvara

original: lakṣmyātmikā tu sā jñeyā liṅgadehavidāriṇī /
analyzed: lakṣmī ātmikā tu sā jñeyā liṅga deha vidāriṇī

original: brahmatvayogyā ṛjavo nāma devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,10.26 //
analyzed: brahmatva yogyāḥ ṛjavaḥ nāma devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: tepi pratyekaśaḥ saṃti hyanantāśca pṛthaggaṇāḥ /
analyzed: te api pratyekaśaḥ saṃti hi anantāḥ ca pṛthak gaṇāḥ

original: pṛthakpṛthak ca taiḥ sākaṃ mokṣayogyāḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,10.27 //
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak ca taiḥ sākam mokṣa yogyāḥ khageśvara

original: jīvāḥ saṃti hyaneke ca pratikalpe sṛjanti te /
analyzed: jīvāḥ saṃti hi aneke ca pratikalpe sṛjanti te

original: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇaiḥ samyagyuktā vāyutvayogyakāḥ // GarP_3,10.29 // (10.28)
analyzed: dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇaiḥ samyak yuktāḥ vāyu tva yogyakāḥ

original: aṣṭāviṃśallakṣaṇaiśca girīśapadayoginaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśat lakṣaṇaiḥ ca girīśa pada yoginaḥ

original: caturviṃśatimārabhyāṣoḍaśācca surāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,10.29 //
analyzed: caturviṃśatim ārabhya ṣoḍaśāt ca surāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: aṣṭakā ṛṣayaḥ proktāstadūnāścakravartinaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭakāḥ ṛṣayaḥ proktāḥ tad ūnāḥ cakravartinaḥ

original: śatajanma samārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ // GarP_3,10.30 //
analyzed: śata janma samārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: aparokṣamiti proktaṃ tathā hyārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: aparokṣam iti proktam tathā hi ārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: ekena śatakalpena vāyutvaṃ yāti bho dvija // GarP_3,10.31 //
analyzed: ekena śata kalpena vāyu tvam yāti bho dvija

original: śatajanmani brahmatvaṃ yāti paścāddhareḥ padam /
analyzed: śata janmani brahma tvam yāti paścāt hareḥ padam

original: catvāriṃśadbrahmakalpaṃ samārabhya khageśvara // GarP_3,10.32 //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat brahmakalpam samārabhya khageśvara

original: rudrasyāpyāparokṣyaṃ syāttathā prārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: rudrasya api āparokṣyam syāt tathā prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: ekacatvāriṃśakalpe śeṣatvaṃ yāti suvrata // GarP_3,10.33 //
analyzed: ekacatvāriṃśa kalpe śeṣa tvam yāti suvrata

original: brahmaṇā saha mokṣaṃ ca yāti samyaṅ na cānyathā /
analyzed: brahmaṇā saha mokṣam ca yāti samyak na ca anyathā

original: kalpaviṃśatimārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ // GarP_3,10.34 //
analyzed: kalpa viṃśatim ārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: indrasyāpyāparokṣyaṃ syāttathā prārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: indrasya api āparokṣyam syāt tathā prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: brahmaṇaiva sahāyāti hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ param // GarP_3,10.35 //
analyzed: brahmaṇā eva saha āyāti harim nārāyaṇam param

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: pañcāśītibrahmakalpaṃ samārabhya mahāprabho /
analyzed: pañcāśīti brahmakalpam samārabhya mahā prabho

original: rudrasyāpyāparokṣyaṃ syāttathā prārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_3,10.36 //
analyzed: rudrasya api āparokṣyam syāt tathā prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: iti śrutaṃ mayā brahmanbrahmaṇoktaṃ hareḥ priyāt /
analyzed: iti śrutam mayā brahman brahmaṇā uktam hareḥ priyāt

original: itthaṃ tvayoktaṃ śrīkṛṣṇa saṃśayobādhate mama // GarP_3,10.37 //
analyzed: ittham tvayā uktam śrī kṛṣṇa saṃśayaḥ bādhate mama

original: ato me saṃśayaṃ chindhi yathā na syāttathā punaḥ /
analyzed: atas me saṃśayam chindhi yathā na syāt tathā punar

original: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt // GarP_3,10.38 //
analyzed: iti tat vacanam śrutvā kṛṣṇaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: brahmoktasya mayoktasya vivādo nāsti sarvathā /
analyzed: brahma uktasya mayā uktasya vivādaḥ nā asti sarvathā

original: saṃdehastvajñadṛṣṭīnāṃ jñānināṃ nāsti sarvathā // GarP_3,10.39 //
analyzed: saṃdehaḥ tu ajña dṛṣṭīnām jñāninām nā asti sarvathā

original: aśītihyaṣṭakā proktā aṣṭapañca khageśvara /
analyzed: aśīti hi aṣṭakā proktā aṣṭa pañca khageśvara

original: catvāriṃśadbrahmakalpa evaṃ prāha caturmukhaḥ // GarP_3,10.40 //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat brahma kalpaḥ evam prāha caturmukhaḥ

original: tattvānāṃ bahugopyatvāttathoktaṃ brahmaṇā purā /
analyzed: tattvānām bahu gopya tvāt tathā uktam brahmaṇā purā

original: abhiprāyastvevameva jñātavyo nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,10.41 //
analyzed: abhiprāyaḥ tu evam eva jñātavyaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: pañcā śītibrahmakalpaṃ ye vijānanti bho dvija /
analyzed: ye vijānanti bho dvija

original: tendhaṃ tamaḥ praviśanti satyaṃsatyaṃ mayoditam // GarP_3,10.42 //
analyzed: tamaḥ praviśanti satyam satyam mayā uditam

original: virajānantaraṃ vipraṃ tathā vyākṛtamaṃbaram /
analyzed: virajā anantaram vipram tathā vyākṛtam aṃbaram

original: anantapāraṃ tadapi lakṣmīstasyābhimāninī // GarP_3,10.43 //
analyzed: ananta pāram tat api lakṣmīḥ tasya abhimāninī

original: saṃkhyānugaṇanaṃ nāma yasya nāsti mahāprabho /
analyzed: saṃkhyā anugaṇanam nāma yasya na asti mahā prabho

original: na dānaṃ jātiproktaṃ sarvadā nāsti saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,10.44 //
analyzed: na dānam jāti proktam sarvadā na asti saṃśayaḥ

original: aṇḍābhimānī brahmā tu virāḍākhyo hyabhūttadā /
analyzed: aṇḍa abhimānī brahmā tu virāj ākhyaḥ hi abhūt tadā

original: evaṃ mataṃ sa nirmāya bhagavānharikhyayaḥ // GarP_3,10.45 //
analyzed: evam matam sa nirmāya bhagavān hari khyayaḥ

original: viśeṣāttatra garuḍa devaistattvābhimānibhiḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣāt tatra garuḍa devaiḥ tattva abhimānibhiḥ

original: adhaścordhvaṃ tadākramya haristiṣṭhati sarvadā // GarP_3,10.46 //
analyzed: adhas ca ūrdhvam tat ākramya hariḥ tiṣṭhati sarvadā

original: evaṃ prākṛtasargoktirvaikṛtaṃ śṛṇu pakṣirāṭ // GarP_3,10.47 //
analyzed: evam prākṛta sarga uktiḥ vaikṛtam śṛṇu pakṣirāj

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: sṛṣṭiruktā tvayā pūrvaṃ śrutā samyaṅ mayā hare // GarP_3,10.48 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ uktā tvayā pūrvam śrutā samyak mayā hare

original: kiṃ nāma prākṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā kiṃ vaikṛtaṃ prabho /
analyzed: kim nāma prākṛtam jñeyam tathā kim vaikṛtam prabho

original: etadvistīrya me brūhi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // GarP_3,10.49 //
analyzed: etat vistīrya me brūhi śrotum kautūhalam hi me

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: avyaktādyāḥ pṛthivyantā aṇḍācca bahirudbhavāḥ /
analyzed: avyakta ādyāḥ pṛthivī antāḥ aṇḍāt ca bahis udbhavāḥ

original: te sarve prākṛtāḥ proktāsteṣāṃ jñānādvimacyate // GarP_3,10.50 //
analyzed: te sarve prākṛtāḥ proktāḥ teṣām jñānāt vimacyate

original: brahmāḍaṃ vikṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ brahmāṇḍāntaḥ khageśvara /
analyzed: brahmāḍam vikṛtam jñeyam brahmāṇḍa antar khageśvara

original: yā sṛṣṭirucyate sadbhiḥ saivoktā vikṛteti ca // GarP_3,10.51 //
analyzed: yā sṛṣṭiḥ ucyate sadbhiḥ sā eva uktā vikṛtā iti ca

original: sṛṣṭiśca pralayaścaiva saṃsāro bhaktireva ca /
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ ca pralayaḥ ca eva saṃsāraḥ bhaktiḥ eva ca

original: devatā ṛṣimukhyāśca lokā bhūrādayastathā // GarP_3,10.52 //
analyzed: devatāḥ ṛṣi mukhyāḥ ca lokāḥ bhūḥ ādayaḥ tathā

original: anādyanantakālīnāḥ sarvadaikaprakārakāḥ /
analyzed: anādi ananta kālīnāḥ sarvadā eka prakārakāḥ

original: jagatpravāhaḥ satyo 'yaṃ naiva mithyā kathañcana // GarP_3,10.53 //
analyzed: jagat pravāhaḥ satyaḥ yam nā eva mithyā kathañcana

original: yattvetadanyathā brūyuḥ sarvahantāra eva te /
analyzed: yat tu etat anyathā brūyuḥ sarva hantāraḥ eva te

original: jagatpravāhaḥ satyo 'yaṃ harisevetisāthā // GarP_3,10.54 //
analyzed: jagat pravāhaḥ satyaḥ yam

original: satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyamuddhatya bhujamutyate /
analyzed: satyam satyam punar satyam uddhatya bhujam utyate

original: vedācchāstraṃ paraṃ nāsti na devaḥ keśavātparaḥ // GarP_3,10.55 //
analyzed: vedāt śāstram param nā asti na devaḥ keśavāt paraḥ

original: sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ keśavaṃ ca vihāyānyamupāsate /
analyzed: sarva utkṛṣṭam keśavam ca vihāya anyam upāsate

original: teṣāmandhaṃ tamo jñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ garuṇāmapi // GarP_3,10.56 //
analyzed: teṣām andham tamaḥ jñeyam pitṝṇām garuṇām api

original: idānīṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndra vaikṛtaṃ sargamuttamam /
analyzed: idānīm śṛṇu pakṣi indra vaikṛtam sargam uttamam

original: samyagjānāti yo loke sa yāti paramaṃ padam // GarP_3,10.57 //
analyzed: samyak jānāti yaḥ loke sa yāti paramam padam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe brahmāṇḍādivaikṛtaikadeśaprākṛtasṛṣṭinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe brahmāṇḍādivaikṛtaikadeśaprākṛtasṛṣṭinirūpaṇam nāma daśamaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 11
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: puruṣākhyo hariḥ sākṣādbhagavānpuruṣottamaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣa ākhyaḥ hariḥ sākṣāt bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: śiśyetvaṇḍodaka viṣṇurnṛṇāṃ sāhasravatsaram /
analyzed: śiśyetu aṇḍa udaka viṣṇuḥ nṛṇām sāhasra vatsaram

original: lakṣmīścodakarūpeṇa śayyārūpeṇa bhoṇḍajā // GarP_3,11.1 //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ ca udaka rūpeṇa śayyā rūpeṇa bhoṇḍa jā

original: vidyā taraṅgarūpeṇa vāyurūpeṇa bhoṇḍaja // GarP_3,11.2 //
analyzed: vidyā taraṅga rūpeṇa vāyu rūpeṇa bhoṇḍaja

original: tamorūpeṇa saivāsī nnānyadāsītkathañcana /
analyzed: tamaḥ rūpeṇa sā eva āsīt na anyat āsīt kathañcana

original: asīdgarbhodake caiva nānyadāsītkathañcana // GarP_3,11.3 //
analyzed: asīt garbha udake ca eva na anyat āsīt kathañcana

original: lakṣmīstuṣṭāva ca hariṃ garbhode pakṣisattama /
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ tuṣṭāva ca harim garbhode pakṣi sattama

original: lakṣmīdharābhyāṃ rūpābhyāṃ prakṛtirhariṇā tathā // GarP_3,11.4 //
analyzed: lakṣmī dharābhyām rūpābhyām prakṛtiḥ hariṇā tathā

original: śeta śrutisvarūpeṇa stauti garbhodake harim /
analyzed: śeta śruti svarūpeṇa stauti garbha udake harim

original: nārāyaṇa namaste 'stu śṛṇu vijñāpanaṃ mama // GarP_3,11.5 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa namaḥ te stu śṛṇu vijñāpanam mama

original: ajāṃ jahi mahābhāga yogyānāṃ muktimāvaha /
analyzed: ajām jahi mahābhāga yogyānām muktim āvaha

original: ajā tu prakṛtiḥ proktā cāparā prakṛtiḥ parā // GarP_3,11.6 //
analyzed: ajā tu prakṛtiḥ proktā ca aparā prakṛtiḥ parā

original: śatatovarā tu brahmāṇī brahmapatnī varānanā /
analyzed: tu brahmāṇī brahma patnī varānanā

original: umā śacyavarā tasyā avarāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,11.7 //
analyzed: umā śacī avarā tasyāḥ avarāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ

original: etāsāṃ hananaṃ naiva prārthayāmaḥ sadā hare /
analyzed: etāsām hananam nā eva prārthayāmaḥ sadā hare

original: asti pratinṛṣu brahma prakṛtī dve vyavasthite // GarP_3,11.8 //
analyzed: asti pratinṛṣu brahma prakṛtī dve vyavasthite

original: ekā tu nityasaṃsārā tvajaśabdābhidhāyikā /
analyzed: ekā tu nitya saṃsārā tu aja śabda abhidhāyikā

original: dvitīyā tu tamo 'pohyā ajaśabdābhidhāyikā // GarP_3,11.9 //
analyzed: dvitīyā tu aja śabda abhidhāyikā

original: ata eva tvaje jyeṣṭhe iti loke prakīrtite /
analyzed: atas eva tu aje jyeṣṭhe iti loke prakīrtite

original: sukhaduḥ khapradā caiva aparā duḥ khadaiva tu // GarP_3,11.10 //
analyzed: sukha duḥ kha pradā ca eva aparā duḥ kha dā eva tu

original: mokṣādhikāriṇāmeva jñānaiśvaryādayo gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: mokṣa adhikāriṇām eva jñāna aiśvarya ādayaḥ gaṇāḥ

original: teṣāmācchādikā hokā tamoṅgā sā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,11.11 //
analyzed: teṣām ācchādikā hokā tamoṅgā sā prakīrtitā

original: jīvaṃ prati mahāviṣṇuṃ pāhyācchādayati prabho /
analyzed: jīvam prati mahā viṣṇum pāhi ācchādayati prabho

original: sā parā prakṛtirjñeyā paramācchādikā smṛtā // GarP_3,11.12 //
analyzed: sā parā prakṛtiḥ jñeyā paramā ācchādikā smṛtā

original: evaṃ sā paramā duṣṭā hokā tamoṅgā tu prakīrtitā /
analyzed: evam sā paramā duṣṭā hokā tamoṅgā tu prakīrtitā

original: jīvavargeṣveva khaga brahmādernāsti sā kvacit // GarP_3,11.13 //
analyzed: jīva vargeṣu eva khaga brahma ādeḥ nā asti sā kvacid

original: piśācavatsamuddiṣṭā jīvasyetyadhikāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: piśāca vat samuddiṣṭāḥ jīvasya iti adhikāriṇaḥ

original: prerikā tu tayordevyo stvahamādyā sukhātmikā // GarP_3,11.14 //
analyzed: prerikā tu tayoḥ devyoḥ stu aham ādyā sukha ātmikā

original: tatra viṣṇo mahābhāga saguṇācchādako hitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra viṣṇo mahābhāga sa guṇa ācchādakaḥ hitaḥ

original: paramācchādikāṃ duṣṭāṃ vyāmucyaiva mahāprabho // GarP_3,11.15 //
analyzed: parama ācchādikām duṣṭām vyāmucya eva mahā prabho

original: mokṣaṃ dehi mahādeva tvadbhaktānāṃ mahāprabho /
analyzed: mokṣam dehi mahādeva tvad bhaktānām mahā prabho

original: paramācchādikā hyasmānnitya saṃsāriṇo yataḥ // GarP_3,11.16 //
analyzed: parama ācchādikāḥ hi asmān nitya saṃsāriṇaḥ yatas

original: ata eva ca nityatvāttasmāttadapasāraṇam /
analyzed: atas eva ca nitya tvāt tasmāt tad apasāraṇam

original: kuru deva mahābhāga iti vijñāyatāṃ mama // GarP_3,11.17 //
analyzed: kuru deva mahābhāgaḥ iti vijñāyatām mama

original: evaṃ stuto hariḥ kṛṣṇo suprabuddho 'pi sarbadā /
analyzed: evam stutaḥ hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ su prabuddhaḥ sarbadā

original: udvuddhavanmahā viṣṇurabhūdajñaparīkṣayā // GarP_3,11.18 //
analyzed: udvuddha vat mahā viṣṇuḥ abhūt ajña parīkṣayā

original: tasya nābherabhūtpadmaṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhuvanāśrayam /
analyzed: tasya nābheḥ abhūt padmam sauvarṇam bhuvana āśrayam

original: tatprākṛtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ bhūdevī tvabhimāninī // GarP_3,11.19 //
analyzed: tat prākṛtam ca vijñeyam bhūdevī tu abhimāninī

original: anantasūryavaccaiva prakāśakaramīritam /
analyzed: ananta sūrya vat ca eva prakāśa karam īritam

original: cidānandamayo viṣṇustasmādbhinno na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,11.20 //
analyzed: cit ānanda mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ tasmāt bhinnaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: viṣṇoḥ svarūpabhūtaṃ ca ye vijānanti te narāḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sva rūpa bhūtam ca ye vijānanti te narāḥ

original: te yānti hyadharaṃ lokaṃ tathā tatsaṃgisaṃginaḥ // GarP_3,11.21 //
analyzed: te yānti hi adharam lokam tathā tad saṃgi saṃginaḥ

original: kirīṭādikavaccaiva jñātavyaṃ ca khageśvara /
analyzed: kirīṭa ādika vat ca eva jñātavyam ca khageśvara

original: kirīṭādyā api harerdvidhā saṃti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,11.22 //
analyzed: kirīṭa ādyāḥ api hareḥ dvidhā saṃti na saṃśayaḥ

original: svarūpā hyasvarūpāśca svasvarūpani darśane /
analyzed: svarūpāḥ hi asvarūpāḥ ca darśane

original: gṛhītā iti vijñeyā na svarūpāḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,11.23 //
analyzed: gṛhītāḥ iti vijñeyāḥ na sva rūpāḥ khageśvara

original: bhmāṇḍaṃ hyasṛjattatra sarvalokavidhāyakam /
analyzed: bhmāṇḍam hi asṛjat tatra sarva loka vidhāyakam

original: pralaye muktihīnaśca supta ityucyate budhaḥ // GarP_3,11.24 //
analyzed: pralaye mukti hīnaḥ ca suptaḥ iti ucyate budhaḥ

original: tasya samivastrivaṃ ca na jñātavyā khageśvara /
analyzed: ca na jñātavyā khageśvara

original: pralayopi mahābhāga brahmavāyvorna cāsti hi // GarP_3,11.25 //
analyzed: pralayaḥ api mahābhāga brahma vāyvoḥ na ca asti hi

original: vṛttirūpaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ pādyārghyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: vṛtti rūpam param jñānam pādya arghyam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: indriyāṇāmuparatiḥ suptirityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,11.26 //
analyzed: indriyāṇām uparatiḥ suptiḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: brahmavāyvośca pāsagni vāstavaṃ syātkhageśvara /
analyzed: brahma vāyvoḥ ca vāstavam syāt khageśvara

original: kathaṃ tarhi tayorvarte hyavilatyatvamucyate // GarP_3,11.27 //
analyzed: katham tarhi tayoḥ varte hyavilatya tvam ucyate

original: tasmāttadvāstavaṃ nāsti brahmavāyvoḥ khageśvara /
analyzed: tasmāt tat vāstavam nā asti brahma vāyvoḥ khageśvara

original: svapnāvasthāyāḥ sadṛśī hyavasthā suptisaṃjñikā // GarP_3,11.28 //
analyzed: svapna avasthāyāḥ sadṛśī hi avasthā supti saṃjñikā

original: brahmaṇyamukhyayā vṛttyā hyastītyevaṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: brahmaṇya mukhyayā vṛttyā hi asti iti evam nibodha me

original: ato na vāstavamidamaṅgīkāryaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,11.29 //
analyzed: atas na vāstavam idam aṅgīkāryam khageśvara

original: vāstavaṃ ye vijānanti teṣāṃ nityaṃ dhanaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: vāstavam ye vijānanti teṣām nityam dhanam tapaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: suptistvajñānakāryatvātsuptirnāstītyudīritā // GarP_3,11.30 //
analyzed: suptiḥ tu ajñāna kārya tvāt suptiḥ na asti iti udīritā

original: yadā hi kāraṇaṃ cāsti tadā kāryamiti prabho /
analyzed: yadā hi kāraṇam ca asti tadā kāryam iti prabho

original: ityabhiprāyagarbheṇa tvaṃ samādhāsya te yadi // GarP_3,11.31 //
analyzed: iti abhiprāya garbheṇa tvam samādhāsya te yadi

original: tarhi tasya mahābhāga kathaṃ brūhi bhayādikam /
analyzed: tarhi tasya mahābhāga katham brūhi bhaya ādikam

original: bhayādikaṃ hyastu nāma kā vāsmākaṃ kṣatirbhavet // GarP_3,11.32 //
analyzed: bhaya ādikam hi astu nāma kā vā asmākam kṣatiḥ bhavet

original: evamuktastu govindobravīttatrāpi kāraṇam /
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu govindaḥ bravīt tatra api kāraṇam

original: bhayaṃ tvajñānakāryaṃ syātkāryākāraṇamatra hi // GarP_3,11.33 //
analyzed: bhayam tu ajñāna kāryam syāt kārya akāraṇam atra hi

original: prīyate matvā brahma tasmātsuptiśca tatra hi /
analyzed: prīyate matvā brahma tasmāt suptiḥ ca tatra hi

original: ajñādikaṃ yadi brahma tasya na syātkathañcana // GarP_3,11.34 //
analyzed: ajña ādikam yadi brahma tasya na syāt kathañcana

original: kathaṃ sukhī pradṛśyeta na kathañcitkariṣyati /
analyzed: katham sukhī pradṛśyeta na kathañcid kariṣyati

original: kathaṃ vā muktiparyantaṃ jñānavyaktirvadasva me // GarP_3,11.35 //
analyzed: katham vā mukti paryantam jñāna vyaktiḥ vadasva me

original: yadyajñānaṃ tasya satyaṃ na syāttarhi mahāprabho /
analyzed: yadi ajñānam tasya satyam na syāt tarhi mahā prabho

original: atyādarātkathaṃ brahmañchravaṇaṃ kurute vada // GarP_3,11.36 //
analyzed: ati ādarāt katham brahman śravaṇam kurute vada

original: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt /
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: bhayaṃ ca vāstavaṃ tasya na jānīhi mahāmate // GarP_3,11.37 //
analyzed: bhayam ca vāstavam tasya na jānīhi mahāmate

original: dṛśyate madbhayaṃ tasya hariprītyarthameva ca /
analyzed: dṛśyate mad bhayam tasya hari prīti artham eva ca

original: bhayākāmavatīvānamuvāstavamīritam // GarP_3,11.38 //
prāptaprābdhaleśasta tasya nāsti khageśvara /
analyzed: tasya nā asti khageśvara

original: duḥ khājñānādikaṃ kiñcitkathaṃ tasmin bhaviṣyati // GarP_3,11.39 //
analyzed: duḥ kha ajñāna ādikam kiñcid katham tasmin bhaviṣyati

original: viṣṇorājñānusāreṇa bhayāyānukarotyasau /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ ājñā anusāreṇa bhayāya anukaroti asau

original: tena prīṇāti ca haristasya nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,11.40 //
analyzed: tena prīṇāti ca hariḥ tasya nā asti atra saṃśayaḥ

original: śṛṇoti satataṃ brahmā na cintyāttāvatājñatā /
analyzed: śṛṇoti satatam brahmā na cintyāt tāvatā ajña tā

original: kadāciddṛśyate brahmā duḥ khī na ca khageśvara // GarP_3,11.41 //
analyzed: kadācid dṛśyate brahmā duḥ khī na ca khageśvara

original: yadbrahma ca na jānīyāddhariprītyarthameva ca /
analyzed: yat brahma ca na jānīyāt hari prīti artham eva ca

original: duḥ khivaddṛśyate brahmā ājñānāṃ mohanāya ca // GarP_3,11.42 //
analyzed: dus khi vat dṛśyate brahmā ājñānām mohanāya ca

original: yogyatāmanatikramya yāvajjñānaṃ ca tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: yogyatām an atikramya yāvat jñānam ca tiṣṭhati

original: brahmaṇastāvadevāsti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,11.43 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ tāvat evā asti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: jñānasya vyaktatā nāma vidyamānasya cādarāt /
analyzed: jñānasya vyakta tā nāma vidyamānasya ca ādarāt

original: jñānasyāsādanaṃ caiva jñānavyaktiriti smṛtā // GarP_3,11.44 //
analyzed: jñānasya āsādanam ca eva jñāna vyaktiḥ iti smṛtā

original: ato jñānādikaṃ nāsti brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: atas jñāna ādikam nā asti brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: padmāddhiraṇma yājjāto brahmā tu caturānanaḥ // GarP_3,11.45 //
analyzed: padmāt hiraṇma yāt jātaḥ brahmā tu caturānanaḥ

original: sarvadā'locanāyuktastena svālocanaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: sarvadā ālocanā yuktaḥ tena sva ālocanam kṛtam

original: ajñānāṃ mohanārthāya hariprītyarthameva ca // GarP_3,11.46 //
analyzed: ajñānām mohana arthāya hari prīti artham eva ca

original: saṃkalpopi tathaivāsti na hyajñānātkṛtastathā /
analyzed: saṃkalpaḥ api tathā evā asti na hi ajñānāt kṛtaḥ tathā

original: ko vā māṃ sṛṣṭavānatra iti hyālocya sa prabhuḥ // GarP_3,11.47 //
analyzed: kaḥ vā mām sṛṣṭavān atra iti hi ālocya sa prabhuḥ

original: taṃ vicārayituṃ brahmā padmanāḍīṃ viveśa ha // GarP_3,11.48 //
analyzed: tam vicārayitum brahmā padma nāḍīm viveśa ha

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛthṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'jñānahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe śrī kṛthṇa garuḍa saṃvāde jñānahetunirūpaṇam nāma ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 12
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: nāḍīṃ samāviśya mahānubhāvaḥ śrīviṣṇubhakto tvatha puṣkarasthaḥ /
analyzed: nāḍīm samāviśya mahā anubhāvaḥ śrī viṣṇu bhaktaḥ tu atha puṣkara sthaḥ

original: vicārayāmāsa guruṃ svamūlaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ nirguṇamadvitīyam // GarP_3,12.1 //
analyzed: vicārayāmāsa gurum sva mūlam nārāyaṇam nirguṇam advitīyam

original: etāvatā haribhaktasya tasyāpyacchinnabhaktasya caturmukhasya /
analyzed: etāvatā hari bhaktasya tasya api acchinna bhaktasya caturmukhasya

original: vicārakāle ca vicintanīyo hyajñānaleśastu khageśvareśvara // GarP_3,12.2 //
analyzed: vicāra kāle ca vicintanīyaḥ hi ajñāna leśaḥ tu khageśvara īśvara

original: yathāsti viṣṇormanaḥ saṅkalpa eva tathaiva sopi prakaroti nityam /
analyzed: yathā asti viṣṇoḥ manaḥ saṅkalpaḥ eva tathā eva saḥ api prakaroti nityam

original: ālocane tasya sadāsti bhūmansvayogyatāmanatikramya caiva // GarP_3,12.3 //
analyzed: ālocane tasya sadā asti bhūman sva yogyatām an atikramya ca eva

original: hareḥ svarūpe ca tathā prapañcaḥ svasminsvarūpe ca khagasti jñānam /
analyzed: hareḥ svarūpe ca tathā prapañcaḥ svasmin svarūpe ca khagaḥ asti jñānam

original: yathāpi nityaṃ paricāravāri ca ajñātavaddṛśyate viṣṇunā ca // GarP_3,12.4 //
analyzed: yathā api nityam paricāra vāri ca ajñāta vat dṛśyate viṣṇunā ca

original: hareḥ prītyarthaṃ kurute sau kadāccittatrāpi kaścidviśeṣo 'sti vīndra /
analyzed: hareḥ prīti artham kurute sau kadāccid tatra api kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti vi indra

original: śṛṇuṣva samyaṅnigṛhītacitto yathā provāca sa vijānāti devaḥ // GarP_3,12.5 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva samyak nigṛhīta cittaḥ yathā provāca sa vijānāti devaḥ

original: sadā tvadoṣaṃ praviśeṣeśca muktavedāstathā vā pavijānanti nityam /
analyzed: sadā tu adoṣam mukta vedāḥ tathā vā nityam

original: tasya svarūpaṃ na tathā hariṃ ca svayogyatāmanatikramya vedhāḥ // GarP_3,12.6 //
analyzed: tasya sva rūpam na tathā harim ca sva yogyatām an atikramya vedhāḥ

original: hareḥ svarūpaṃ na vijānāti sarvaṃ svayo gyarūpaṃ sarvadā vetti viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: hareḥ svarūpam na vijānāti sarvam svayo gya rūpam sarvadā vetti viṣṇoḥ

original: tatrājñānaṃ nāsti kiñciddvijendra yāvatsvarūpaṃ ca tathaiva lakṣmyāḥ // GarP_3,12.7 //
analyzed: tatra ajñānam nā asti kiñcid dvijendra yāvat svarūpam ca tathā eva lakṣmyāḥ

original: vedhā na jānāti kutastadanye tayoḥ svarūpaṃna vijānāti sarvam /
analyzed: vedhāḥ na jānāti kutas tad anye tayoḥ svarūpam na vijānāti sarvam

original: tathāpi vedānekadeśena veda jānāti lakṣmīrharirūpaṃ ca yāvat // GarP_3,12.8 //
analyzed: tathā api vedān eka deśena veda jānāti lakṣmīḥ hari rūpam ca yāvat

original: tāvanna jānāti vidhiḥ khagendra jñāne vidhātuśca svayogyabhūte /
analyzed: tāvat na jānāti vidhiḥ khaga indra jñāne vidhātuḥ ca sva yogya bhūte

original: ato viriñcasya na cintanīyo hyajñānaleśaḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle // GarP_3,12.9 //
analyzed: atas viriñcasya na cintanīyaḥ hi ajñāna leśaḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle

original: nāḍīṃ samāviśya tadā viriñco na veda nārāyaṇamekavacca /
analyzed: nāḍīm samāviśya tadā viriñcaḥ na veda nārāyaṇam eka vat ca

original: tadā śṛṇottaṃ kamalāsanaṃ prabhustapastapa dvyakṣaraṃ sādareṇa // GarP_3,12.10 //
analyzed: tadā śṛṇot tam kamalāsanam prabhuḥ tapaḥ tapa dvi akṣaram sa ādareṇa

original: abhiprāyaṃ tasya samyagvidittvā tapaḥ kuru tvaṃ harituṣṭyarthameva /
analyzed: abhiprāyam tasya samyak vidittvā tapaḥ kuru tvam hari tuṣṭi artham eva

original: tapo 'karoddharipādaika niṣṭho hareḥ prītyarthaṃ divyasahasravarṣam // GarP_3,12.11 //
analyzed: tapaḥ karot hari pāda eka niṣṭhaḥ hareḥ prīti artham divya sahasra varṣam

original: tato hariḥ prādurāsītkhagendra varaṃ dātuṃ bhaktavarasya divyam /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ prādurāsīt khaga indra varam dātum bhakta varasya divyam

original: sadā viṣṇuṃ devadevo dadarśa caturbhujaṃ taṃ jalajāyatākṣam // GarP_3,12.12 //
analyzed: sadā viṣṇum devadevaḥ dadarśa catur bhujam tam jala jāyata akṣam

original: śrīvatsalakṣmaṃ galaśobhikaustubhaṃ saṃpaśyantaṃ suprasannārdradṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: śrīvatsa lakṣmam gala śobhi kaustubham saṃpaśyantam su prasanna ārdra dṛṣṭyā

original: dṛṣṭvā hariṃ brahma nārāyaṇaṃ ca puraḥ sthitaṃ bhaktavaśyaṃ dayālum // GarP_3,12.13 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā harim brahma nārāyaṇam ca puras sthitam bhakta vaśyam dayālum

original: samarcayāmāsa mahāvibhūtyā bhaktyā hareḥ pādatīrthaṃ dadhāra /
analyzed: samarcayāmāsa mahā vibhūtyā bhaktyā hareḥ pāda tīrtham dadhāra

original: astaunmahābhāgavatapradhāno hariṃ guruṃ bhaktivivardhitātmā // GarP_3,12.14 //
analyzed: astaut mahā bhāgavata pradhānaḥ harim gurum bhakti vivardhita ātmā

original: brahmovāca /
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: rameśa lokeśa jagannivāsa tava svarūpaṃ na vijānāti devī /
analyzed: rama īśa lokeśa jagannivāsa tava sva rūpam na vijānāti devī

original: tava prasādātsuvijānāti devī guṇānvedoktānsarvadā vīndra sarvān // GarP_3,12.15 //
analyzed: tava prasādāt su vijānāti devī guṇān veda uktān sarvadā vi indra sarvān

original: tathāpi sā na vijānāti devī sākalyenāśeṣitaḥ sadguṇāṃśca /
analyzed: tathā api sā na vijānāti devī sākalyena aśeṣitaḥ sat guṇān ca

original: yadyapyanuktaṃ pañcabhirnāsti vedaistathāpi deve 'tra viśeṣa āste // GarP_3,12.16 //
analyzed: yadi api anuktam pañcabhiḥ na asti vedaiḥ tathā api deve viśeṣaḥ āste

original: tattvecchavaḥ pravijānanti nityaṃ vede sūktānkvāpyanuktāṃśca sarvān /
analyzed: tattva icchavaḥ pravijānanti nityam vede sūktān kvāpi anuktān ca sarvān

original: ādau jānantyatra vedā murāre ṛgādayaḥ suṣṭhu catvāra eva // GarP_3,12.17 //
analyzed: ādau jānanti atra vedāḥ murāre ṛk ādayaḥ suṣṭhu catvāraḥ eva

original: vedā hyete vedayantīti deva tathā purāṇaṃ bhārataṃ pañcarātram /
analyzed: vedāḥ hi ete vedayanti iti deva tathā purāṇam bhāratam pañcarātram

original: kramādito vicintya sā viṣṇuguṇānsvayogyānsadā vijānāti ramāpi devī // GarP_3,12.18 //
analyzed: kramāt itas vicintya sā viṣṇu guṇān sva yogyān sadā vijānāti ramā api devī

original: viśeṣato hyuktaguṇā nṛgādiṣu svayogyabhūtānsaṃvijānāti devī /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ hi ukta guṇā nṛga ādiṣu sva yogya bhūtān saṃvijānāti devī

original: sāmānyataḥ pravijānāti devī harerguṇānna viśeṣācca nityam // GarP_3,12.19 //
analyzed: sāmānyatas pravijānāti devī hareḥ guṇān na viśeṣāt ca nityam

original: ahaṃ vijānāmi ramāpra sādāttava prasādācca guṇānsadaiva /
analyzed: aham vijānāmi ramā pra sādāt tava prasādāt ca guṇān sadā eva

original: svayogyabhūtāñchrutipūktān guṇāṃśca kāṃścidvijānāti harerna kaścit // GarP_3,12.20 //
analyzed: sva yogya bhūtān śrutipu uktān guṇān ca kāṃścid vijānāti hareḥ na kaścid

original: tava prasādācca mama prasādātkālāntare tāṃśca jānāti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tava prasādāt ca mama prasādāt kāla antare tān ca jānāti śeṣaḥ

original: duṣkarmaleśānna tirohitān guṇānyāneva pūrvaṃ viditān svayogyān // GarP_3,12.21 //
analyzed: duṣkarma leśāt na tirohitān guṇān yān eva pūrvam viditān sva yogyān

original: tāneva jñātvā punareva śeṣastiro hitāṃllabdhaguṇastataḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tān eva jñātvā punar eva śeṣaḥ tiras hitān labdha guṇaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ

original: sadā svayogyāṃśca harerguṇāṃśca umāpatiścāpi tava prasādāt // GarP_3,12.22 //
analyzed: sadā sva yogyān ca hareḥ guṇān ca umāpatiḥ ca api tava prasādāt

original: yadā vijānāti hare murāre aprāptalabdheti tadocyate haraḥ /
analyzed: yadā vijānāti hare murāre aprāpta labdha iti tadā ucyate haraḥ

original: mamāpi lokaṃ ca yadā murāre tadā vijānāti tava svarūpam // GarP_3,12.23 //
analyzed: mama api lokam ca yadā murāre tadā vijānāti tava svarūpam

original: govinda nityāvyaya citsupūrṇa tava prasādānnāsti śateṣu tanmamayeye hi devāśca śarīradhāriṇaste jñānahīnā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ // GarP_3,12.24
analyzed: govinda nitya avyaya cit su pūrṇa tava prasādāt na asti śateṣu tat mama yeye hi devāḥ ca śarīra dhāriṇaḥ te jñāna hīnāḥ viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ

original: yeye devā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāstete devā bahirarthabhāvāḥ /
analyzed: ye ye devāḥ viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ te ite devāḥ bahirartha bhāvāḥ

original: yeye devā bahirarthabhāvā mokṣā danye pralapantaḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,12.25 //
analyzed: ye ye devāḥ bahirartha bhāvāḥ mokṣāḥ danye pralapantaḥ sadā eva

original: tava svarūpe ca jagatsvarūpe tavāsamānaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva /
analyzed: tava sva rūpe ca jagat sva rūpe tava asamānam na asti viṣṇo sadā eva

original: yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho yato jñānaṃ nāsti nāstye va nityam // GarP_3,12.26 //
analyzed: yatas tava prākṛtaḥ nā asti dehaḥ yatas jñānam nā asti nityam

original: pūrṇānandajñānadeho 'pi nityaṃ sadā śarīrī bhāṣyate bhaktimadbhiḥ /
analyzed: nityam sadā śarīrī bhāṣyate bhaktimadbhiḥ

original: yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho hyatopi nityamaśarīrīti ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.27 //
analyzed: yatas tava prākṛtaḥ nā asti dehaḥ hi atas api nityam aśarīrī iti ca smṛtaḥ

original: nato 'haṃ sarvadāsmiñśarīre 'haṃmametyabhimānena śūnyaḥ /
analyzed: nataḥ ham sarvadā asmin śarīre ham mama iti abhimānena śūnyaḥ

original: atto 'pyahaṃ tvaśarīrī sadaiva tathaiva nityaṃ bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ // GarP_3,12.28 //
analyzed: attaḥ pi aham tu aśarīrī sadā eva tathā eva nityam bahis arthaiḥ ca śūnyaḥ

original: svabhogabhāryāsatyalokādibhogaḥ svayogyabhogo vastramālyādibhogaḥ /
analyzed: sva bhoga bhāryā satya loka ādi bhogaḥ sva yogya bhogaḥ vastra mālya ādi bhogaḥ

original: ete hi sarve bahirarthasaṃjñakāḥ naisargakāmāḥ sarvadā me hi viṣṇo // GarP_3,12.29 //
analyzed: ete hi sarve bahirartha saṃjñakāḥ naisarga kāmāḥ sarvadā me hi viṣṇo

original: tathāpyahaṃ kāmahīno hi nityaṃ rudrādayaḥ kāmavanto yatotaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api aham kāma hīnaḥ hi nityam rudra ādayaḥ kāmavantaḥ yatas utas

original: śarīriṇaste bahirarthabhāvā ajñānavanto 'pi ca saṃsmṛtāḥ khaga // GarP_3,12.30 //
analyzed: śarīriṇaḥ te bahirartha bhāvāḥ ajñānavantaḥ ca saṃsmṛtāḥ khaga

original: svadārabhoge kevalāṃ prītimevaṃ harerevaṃ sarvadāhaṃ karoti /
analyzed: sva dāra bhoge kevalām prītim evam hareḥ evam sarvadā aham karoti

original: stambāstrādīndhāriyiṣye sadaiva viṣṇoḥ prītyarthaṃ naiva gātrārthameva // GarP_3,12.31 //
analyzed: stamba astra ādīn dhāriyiṣye sadā eva viṣṇoḥ prīti artham nā eva gātra artham eva

original: nityānandādanyakāmo na mesti ataḥ sadā bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ /
analyzed: nitya ānandāt anya kāmaḥ na me sti atas sadā bahis arthaiḥ ca śūnyaḥ

original: mamāpi bhāryā bahirarthaśūnyā amūḍhabhāvā mūḍhavatīva dṛśyate // GarP_3,12.32 //
analyzed: mama api bhāryā bahirartha śūnyā amūḍha bhāvā mūḍhavatī iva dṛśyate

original: amūḍhabhūtā jñānināṃ sarvadaiva tathājñānāṃ jñānahīneti bhāti /
analyzed: amūḍha bhūtā jñāninām sarvadā eva tathā ajñānām jñāna hīnā iti bhāti

original: yāvajjñānaṃ cāsti me vāstudeva tāvajjñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti // GarP_3,12.33 //
analyzed: yāvat jñānam ca asti me vāstudeva tāvat jñānam vāsudevasya ca asti

original: yāvajjñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti tāvajjñānaṃ jñānavatāmṛjūnām /
analyzed: yāvat jñānam vāsudevasya ca asti tāvat jñānam jñānavatām ṛjūnām

original: krameṇaivājñānināṃ vānṛjūnāmaspaṣṭarūpo jñānagato viśeṣaḥ // GarP_3,12.34 //
analyzed: krameṇa eva ajñāninām vā anṛjūnām aspaṣṭa rūpaḥ jñāna gataḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: sauriprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā mama jñānagato viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: sauriprakāśe ca yathā eva darśanam tathā mama jñāna gataḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: dīpaprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti // GarP_3,12.35 //
analyzed: dīpa prakāśe ca yathā eva darśanam tathā jñānam vāsudevasya ca asti

original: aspaṣṭaparūpā nyūnatā hyasti vāyau tathā jñānaṃ naiva saṃcintanīyam /
analyzed: nyūna tā hi asti vāyau tathā jñānam na eva saṃcintanīyam

original: etādṛśī jñānaśaktirmurārervāyvādīnāṃ mokṣaparyantamasti // GarP_3,12.36 //
analyzed: etādṛśī jñānaśaktiḥ murāreḥ vāyu ādīnām mokṣa paryantam asti

original: jñānaṃ tvṛjūnāṃ mokṣakāle pipañcavāyvādīnāṃ pralayenādrādīrna /
analyzed: jñānam tu ṛjūnām mokṣa kāle pi pañca vāyu ādīnām pralayena adrādīḥ na

original: vāyormama pralaye sṛṣṭikāle tathā gāyatryā nāstināstyeva mohaḥ // GarP_3,12.37 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ mama pralaye sṛṣṭi kāle tathā gāyatryāḥ mohaḥ

original: gāyatrīvadbhāratyā devadeva jñātavyamevaṃ haritattvavedibhiḥ /
analyzed: gāyatrī vat bhāratyā devadeva jñātavyam evam hari tattva vedibhiḥ

original: mamājñānaṃ dṛśyate yatra kutra daityādīnāṃ mohanārtha sadaiva // GarP_3,12.38 //
analyzed: mama ajñānam dṛśyate yatra kutra daitya ādīnām mohana artha sadā eva

original: tena prītirdevadevasya viṣṇarbhaviṣyatītyeva viniścitātmā /
analyzed: tena prītiḥ devadevasya viṣṇar bhaviṣyati iti eva viniścita ātmā

original: praśrādikaṃ tvajñavatsarvadaivaṃ kariṣyehaṃ mohanāyādhamānām // GarP_3,12.39 //
analyzed: tu ajña vat sarvadā evam kariṣye iham mohanāya adhamānām

original: sūryodaye nāsti yathā tamaśca tathājñānaṃ nāstināstyeva deva /
analyzed: sūrya udaye nā asti yathā tamaḥ ca tathā ajñānam nā asti nā asti eva deva

original: karomyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ sarvadaiva hariprītyarthaṃ niścatārthaṃ satāṃ hi // GarP_3,12.40 //
analyzed: karomi aham śravaṇam sarvadā eva hari prīti artham niścata artham satām hi

original: śatajanmagatānāṃ tvanṛjūnāṃ pūrvameva tu /
analyzed: śata janma gatānām tu anṛjūnām pūrvam eva tu

original: aparokṣābhāva eva hyajñānaṃ samudīritam // GarP_3,12.41 //
analyzed: aparokṣa abhāvaḥ eva hi ajñānam samudīritam

original: aparokṣānantaraṃ tu nāstyajñānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: aparokṣa anantaram tu na asti ajñānam na saṃśayaḥ

original: śatajanmasu deveśa aparokṣeṇa sarvadā // GarP_3,12.42 //
analyzed: śata janmasu deveśa aparokṣeṇa sarvadā

original: pūrṇajñānaṃ mamāstyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: pūrṇa jñānam mama asti eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śatajanmasu pūrvaṃ tu parokṣeṇa mama prabho // GarP_3,12.43 //
analyzed: śata janmasu pūrvam tu parokṣeṇa mama prabho

original: pūrṇaṃ jñānaṃ sadāpyastītyevamāhurmaharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: pūrṇam jñānam sadā api asti iti evam āhuḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: saṃjñājanmagatāyāśca sarasvatyā mahāprabho // GarP_3,12.44 //
analyzed: saṃjñā janma gatāyāḥ ca sarasvatyāḥ mahā prabho

original: nājñānaṃ cintanīyaṃ hi brahmayvośca deva hi /
analyzed: na ajñānam cintanīyam hi deva hi

original: atra kaścidviśeṣosti jñātavyastatvamicchubhiḥ // GarP_3,12.45 //
analyzed: atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ usti jñātavyaḥ tatvam icchubhiḥ

original: avatāreṣu bhāratyāḥ kadācijjñānapūrvakam /
analyzed: avatāreṣu bhāratyāḥ kadācid jñāna pūrvakam

original: sarvadā jñānarūpā sā sarvaduḥ khavivarjitā // GarP_3,12.46 //
analyzed: sarvadā jñāna rūpā sā sarva duḥ kha vivarjitā

original: daityānāṃ mohanārthāya aṃśe duḥ khīva dṛśyate /
analyzed: daityānām mohana arthāya aṃśe duḥ khī iva dṛśyate

original: tasyā duḥ khādikaṃ kiñcinnāstināstyeva sarvathā // GarP_3,12.47 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ duḥ kha ādikam kiñcid na asti na asti eva sarvathā

original: aparokṣatirobhāva īṣatkāle pradṛśyate /
analyzed: aparokṣa tirobhāvaḥ īṣat kāle pradṛśyate

original: tāvanmātreṇa vājñānaṃ tasyāṃ naivāhitaṃ ca yat // GarP_3,12.48 //
analyzed: tāvat mātreṇa vā ajñānam tasyām nā eva āhitam ca yat

original: mūlarūpe tu nāstyeva bhāratyā jñānavismṛtiḥ /
analyzed: mūla rūpe tu na asti eva bhāratyāḥ jñāna vismṛtiḥ

original: bhāratyāstu yathā nāsti sarasvatyāstu kiṃ punaḥ // GarP_3,12.49 //
analyzed: bhāratyāḥ tu yathā nā asti sarasvatyāḥ tu kim punar

original: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ nāsti sarasvatyāḥ kadācana /
analyzed: aṃśāvataraṇam na asti sarasvatyāḥ kadācana

original: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ nāsti mamāpi madhusūdana // GarP_3,12.50 //
analyzed: aṃśāvataraṇam nā asti mama api madhusūdana

original: tathaiva jñānamastyeva harernārāyaṇasya ca /
analyzed: tathā eva jñānam asti eva hareḥ nārāyaṇasya ca

original: vāyoraṃśāvatārosti yathā mūle tathaiva ca // GarP_3,12.51 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ aṃśa avatāraḥ asti yathā mūle tathā eva ca

original: balajñānā dikaṃ sarvaṃ cintanīyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: bala jñānāḥ dikam sarvam cintanīyam na saṃśayaḥ

original: tathāpi vāyau dṛśyante balajñānādivyaktayaḥ // GarP_3,12.52 //
analyzed: tathā api vāyau dṛśyante bala jñāna ādi vyaktayaḥ

original: avatāreṣu vāyostu samyak śaktyātmanāsti hi /
analyzed: avatāreṣu vāyoḥ tu samyak śakti ātmanā asti hi

original: aparokṣatirobhāvau nāṃśāvataraṇeṣvapi // GarP_3,12.53 //
analyzed: aparokṣa tirobhāvau na aṃśa avataraṇeṣu api

original: balajñānādikaṃ yāvanmūlarūpe pradṛśyate /
analyzed: bala jñāna ādikam yāvat mūla rūpe pradṛśyate

original: tretāyugasvarūpe ca na darśayati tādṛśam // GarP_3,12.54 //
analyzed: tretā yuga svarūpe ca na darśayati tādṛśam

original: tretāyugasvarūpe ca yādṛk cādarśayatprabho /
analyzed: tretā yuga svarūpe ca yādṛś ca adarśayat prabho

original: dvāparasthe svarūpe tattaddarśayati tādṛśam /
analyzed: dvāpara sthe svarūpe tat tat darśayati tādṛśam

original: tretāyugasvarūpe ca yādṛk cādarśayatprabho // GarP_3,12.55 //
analyzed: tretā yuga svarūpe ca yādṛś ca adarśayat prabho

original: dvāparasthe vāyurūpe yādṛgvā darśayatprabhuḥ /
analyzed: dvāpara sthe vāyu rūpe yādṛś vā darśayat prabhuḥ

original: vāyuḥ kaliyuge rūpe taddarśayati tādṛśam // GarP_3,12.56 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ kali yuge rūpe tat darśayati tādṛśam

original: tathā darśayate vāyurdaityānāṃ mohanāya ca /
analyzed: tathā darśayate vāyuḥ daityānām mohanāya ca

original: avatāreṣu vāyośca antaraṃ ye viduḥ prabho // GarP_3,12.57 //
analyzed: avatāreṣu vāyoḥ ca antaram ye viduḥ prabho

original: te 'dhaṃ tamaḥ praviśante te daityā na ca te surāḥ /
analyzed: te dham tamaḥ praviśante te daityāḥ na ca te surāḥ

original: vāyāvapyantaraṃ nāsti haritattvavinirṇaye // GarP_3,12.58 //
analyzed: vāyau api antaram na asti hari tattva vinirṇaye

original: nindāṃ kurvanti ye viṣṇorjihvāchedaṃ karomyaham /
analyzed: nindām kurvanti ye viṣṇoḥ jihvā chedam karomi aham

original: tadarthameva vāyośca avatāraḥ sadā bhuvi // GarP_3,12.59 //
analyzed: tad artham eva vāyoḥ ca avatāraḥ sadā bhuvi

original: guṇapūrṇasya viṣṇostu nirguṇatvavicintanam /
analyzed: guṇa pūrṇasya viṣṇoḥ tu nirguṇa tva vicintanam

original: jātānandādipūrṇāṅkhyaṃ sohamityādicintanam // GarP_3,12.60 //
analyzed: jāta ānanda ādi pūrṇa āṅkhyam saḥ ham ityādi cintanam

original: cidānandātmake dehe utpattyādivicintanam /
acchedyābhedyagātreṣu cchedabhedādicintanam // GarP_3,12.61 //
analyzed: acchedya abhedya gātreṣu cheda bheda ādi cintanam

original: devyā nityāviyoginyā viyogādivicintanam /
analyzed: devyāḥ nitya aviyoginyāḥ viyoga ādi vicintanam

original: kleśaśokādiśūnyasya hareḥ kleśādicintanam // GarP_3,12.62 //
analyzed: kleśa śoka ādi śūnyasya hareḥ kleśa ādi cintanam

original: vyāsarāmādirūpeṣvanṛṣivipratvacintanam /
analyzed: vyāsa rāma ādi rūpeṣu an ṛṣi vipra tva cintanam

original: kṛṣṇarāmādirūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam // GarP_3,12.63 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāma ādi rūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam

original: rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam /
analyzed: rāma kṛṣṇa ādi rūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam

original: rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu parājayavicintanam // GarP_3,12.64 //
analyzed: rāma kṛṣṇa ādi rūpeṣu parājaya vicintanam

original: santānārthaṃ tu kṛṣṇe na śivapūjādicintanam /
analyzed: santāna artham tu kṛṣṇe na śiva pūjā ādi cintanam

original: rāmeṇa duḥ khayuktena liṅgasya sthāpanaṃ kṛtam // GarP_3,12.65 //
analyzed: rāmeṇa duḥ kha yuktena liṅgasya sthāpanam kṛtam

original: pañcadhātumaye kṛṣṇe harirūpavicintanam /
analyzed: pañca dhātu maye kṛṣṇe hari rūpa vicintanam

original: svayaṃ vyaktasthale cāpi cidā nandatvakalpanam // GarP_3,12.66 //
analyzed: svayam vyakta sthale ca api cit ā nanda tva kalpanam

original: pitṛmātṛdvijātīnāṃ harirūpatvacintanam /
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ dvijātīnām hari rūpa tva cintanam

original: asvatantreṇa rudreṇa hareraikyadicintanam // GarP_3,12.67 //
analyzed: asvatantreṇa rudreṇa hareḥ aikya di cintanam

original: viṣṇoḥ sūryeṇa sākaṃ ca abhedā divicintanam /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sūryeṇa sākam ca abhedāḥ

original: sarvottamaḥ sūrya eva viṣṇvādyāstasya kiṅkarāḥ // GarP_3,12.68 //
analyzed: sarva uttamaḥ sūryaḥ eva viṣṇu ādyāḥ tasya kiṅkarāḥ

original: ityādicintanaṃ doṣo harinindeti cocyate /
analyzed: ityādi cintanam doṣaḥ hari nindā iti ca ucyate

original: asvayaṃ vyaktiliṅgeṣu aśvatthatulasīṣu ca // GarP_3,12.69 //
analyzed: a svayam vyakti liṅgeṣu aśvattha tulasīṣu ca

original: śālagrāmaṃ vihāyaiva namanaṃ ye prakurvate /
analyzed: śālagrāmam vihāya eva namanam ye prakurvate

original: te sarve harinindāyāmavikāriṇa eva hi // GarP_3,12.70 //
analyzed: te sarve hari nindāyām avikāriṇaḥ eva hi

original: mokṣādhikāriṇo ye tu ajñānātparameśvaram /
analyzed: mokṣa adhikāriṇaḥ ye tu ajñānāt parameśvaram

original: pārthakyanayanaṃ yeṣu kurvanti yarhi vā prabho // GarP_3,12.71 //
analyzed: pārthakya nayanam yeṣu kurvanti yarhi vā prabho

original: tarhi teṣāṃ hi kāleṣu duḥ khaṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tarhi teṣām hi kāleṣu duḥ kham yāti na saṃśayaḥ

original: ataḥ prārthakyanayanaṃ ye kurvantyeṣu sarvadā // GarP_3,12.72 //
analyzed: atas prārthakya nayanam ye kurvanti eṣu sarvadā

original: te sarve tvabudhā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: te sarve tu abudhāḥ jñeyāḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: asvayaṃvyaktaliṅgeṣu namanaṃ ye prakurvate // GarP_3,12.73 //
analyzed: a svayam vyakta liṅgeṣu namanam ye prakurvate

original: te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nānyathā tu kathañcana /
analyzed: te sarve hi asurāḥ jñeyāḥ na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: vihāya śūnyamaśvatthaṃ namanaṃ ye prakurvate // GarP_3,12.74 //
analyzed: vihāya śūnyam aśvattham namanam ye prakurvate

original: dvimāsahīnāṃ tulasīmaprasūtāṃ ca gāṃ navām /
analyzed: dvi māsa hīnām tulasīm aprasūtām ca gām navām

original: te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,12.75 //
analyzed: te sarve hi asurāḥ jñeyāḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: gulmādyāśca manuṣyāntāste jñeyā brahmabāhavaḥ /
analyzed: gulma ādyāḥ ca manuṣya antāḥ te jñeyāḥ brahma bāhavaḥ

original: asmacchatāyuḥ paryantameka eva kaliḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.76 //
analyzed: asmad śata āyuḥ paryantam ekaḥ eva kaliḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kalau saṃti kalpamānaṃ kalerante saṃti ca /
analyzed: kalau saṃti kalpamānam kaleḥ ante saṃti ca

original: tasmindine brahmarūpe gacchanti ca tamontikam // GarP_3,12.77 //
analyzed: tasmin dine brahma rūpe gacchanti ca tamaḥ ntikam

original: tatra sthitvā lokamārgaṃ pratīkṣante na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sthitvā loka mārgam pratīkṣante na saṃśayaḥ

original: sādhakairviṣṇukāryāṇāṃ vāyudāsaiḥ prapīḍitāḥ // GarP_3,12.78 //
analyzed: sādhakaiḥ viṣṇu kāryāṇām vāyudāsaiḥ prapīḍitāḥ

original: śatavarṣānantaraṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kalinā saha /
analyzed: śata varṣa anantaram ca sarveṣām kalinā saha

original: vāyorgadāprahāreṇa liṅgabhaṅgo bhaviṣyati // GarP_3,12.79 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ gadā prahāreṇa liṅga bhaṅgaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tamondhaṃ praviśantyete tāratamyena sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ ndham praviśanti ete tāratamyena sarvaśas

original: tamasyandhepi saṃsāre nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,12.80 //
analyzed: tamasi andhe api saṃsāre nā atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: sarveṣāmuttamonte yaḥ kalireva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣām uttamaḥ nte yaḥ kaliḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: dūṣako viṣṇubhaktānāṃ tatsamo nāsti sarvadā // GarP_3,12.81 //
analyzed: dūṣakaḥ viṣṇu bhaktānām tad samaḥ nā asti sarvadā

original: saṃsāre vāndhatamasi sarvatra haridūṣakaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāre vā andha tamasi sarvatra hari dūṣakaḥ

original: mithyādāne jñānabuddhirduḥ khe ca sukhabuddhimān // GarP_3,12.82 //
analyzed: mithyā dāne jñāna buddhiḥ duḥkhe ca sukha buddhimān

original: tasmātkalisamo loke śivabhakto na kutracit /
analyzed: tasmāt kali samaḥ loke śiva bhaktaḥ na kutracid

original: duryodhanaḥ sa evokto duḥ khānantyasvarūpavān // GarP_3,12.83 //
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ duḥ kha ānantya sva rūpavān

original: tasmācchataguṇāṃśena kalibhāryā tu sarvadā /
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇa aṃśena kali bhāryā tu sarvadā

original: alakṣmīriti vikhyātā sā loke mantharā smṛtā // GarP_3,12.84 //
analyzed: alakṣmīḥ iti vikhyātā sā loke mantharā smṛtā

original: tasmāddaśaguṇāṃśono vipracittistu sarvadā /
analyzed: tasmāt daśaguṇa aṃśa ūnaḥ vipracittiḥ tu sarvadā

original: jarāsaṃdhaḥ sa evoktaḥ kālanemistataḥ param // GarP_3,12.85 //
analyzed: jarāsaṃdhaḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ kālanemiḥ tatas param

original: tasmācchataguṇāṃśonaḥ sa tu kaṃseti viśrutaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇa aṃśa ūnaḥ sa tu kaṃsa iti viśrutaḥ

original: tasmātpañcaguṇairhīnau madhukraiṭabhasaṃjñakau // GarP_3,12.86 //
analyzed: tasmāt pañcaguṇaiḥ hīnau madhu kraiṭabha saṃjñakau

original: tāveva haṃsahiḍaṃbakau jñeyau tau ca janārdana /
analyzed: tau eva haṃsa hiḍaṃbakau jñeyau tau ca janārdana

original: vipracittisamo jñeyo bhaumo vai bhūtale smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.87 //
analyzed: vipracitti samaḥ jñeyaḥ bhaumaḥ vai bhū tale smṛtaḥ

original: tasmādaṣṭa guṇairucyo hariṇyakaśiṣuḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt aṣṭa guṇaiḥ ucyaḥ hariṇyakaśiṣuḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tasmācca triguṇairhīno hiraṇyākṣo mahāsuraḥ // GarP_3,12.88 //
analyzed: tasmāt ca triguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: maṇimāṃstatsamo jñeyaḥ kiñcidūno bakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: maṇimān tad samaḥ jñeyaḥ kiñcid ūnaḥ bakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tasmādviṃśadguṇairhīnastārakākhyo mahāsuraḥ // GarP_3,12.89 //
analyzed: tasmāt viṃśadguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ tāraka ākhyaḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: tasmātṣaḍguṇato hīnaḥ śaṃbaro lokakaṇṭakaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ṣaḍguṇataḥ hīnaḥ śaṃbaraḥ loka kaṇṭakaḥ

original: śaṃbarasya samo jñeyaḥ śālvo daityeṣu cādhamaḥ // GarP_3,12.90 //
analyzed: śaṃbarasya samaḥ jñeyaḥ śālvaḥ daityeṣu ca adhamaḥ

original: śaṃbarāttu dviguṇato hiḍiṃbo nyūna ucyate /
analyzed: śaṃbarāt tu dviguṇataḥ hiḍiṃbaḥ nyūnaḥ ucyate

original: bāṇastato 'dhamo jñeyaḥ sa tu kīcakanāmataḥ // GarP_3,12.91 //
analyzed: bāṇaḥ tatas dhamaḥ jñeyaḥ sa tu kīcaka nāmataḥ

original: dvāpārakhyo mahāhāsobāṇāsurasamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
tasmāddaśaguṇairhīno namucidaityasattamaḥ // GarP_3,12.92 //
analyzed: tasmāt daśaguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ namuci daitya sattamaḥ

original: namucestusamau jñeyau pāka ilvala ityubhau /
analyzed: namuceḥ tu samau jñeyau pākaḥ ilvalaḥ iti ubhau

original: tasmāccaturguṇairhīno vātāpirdānavādhamaḥ // GarP_3,12.93 //
analyzed: tasmāt caturguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ vātāpiḥ dānava adhamaḥ

original: tasmātsārdhaguṇairhīno dhenuko nāma daityarāṭ /
analyzed: tasmāt sārdha guṇaiḥ hīnaḥ dhenukaḥ nāma daitya rāj

original: dhenukādardhaguṇataḥ keśī daityastu cāvaraḥ // GarP_3,12.94 //
analyzed: dhenukāt ardha guṇataḥ keśī daityaḥ tu ca avaraḥ

original: keśīdaityasamo jñeyastṛṇāvarto mahāsuraḥ /
analyzed: keśī daitya samaḥ jñeyaḥ tṛṇāvartaḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: tasmāddaśaguṇairhīno haṃso nāmaramāpate // GarP_3,12.95 //
analyzed: tasmāt daśaguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ haṃsaḥ nāma ramāpate

original: tririkastu samo jñeyastatsamaḥ paurukasmṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tririkaḥ tu samaḥ jñeyaḥ tad samaḥ pauruka smṛtaḥ

original: vetaḥ sa eva vijñeyaḥ pūrvajanmani sattama // GarP_3,12.96 //
analyzed: vetaḥ saḥ eva vijñeyaḥ pūrva janmani sattama

original: tasmādekaguṇairhīnau kuṃbhāṇḍakakuparṇakau /
analyzed: tasmāt eka guṇaiḥ hīnau kuṃbhāṇḍaka kuparṇakau

original: duḥ śāsanastu vijñeyo jarāsaṃdhasamaḥ prabho // GarP_3,12.97 //
analyzed: duḥ śāsanaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ jarāsaṃdha samaḥ prabho

original: kaṃsena tulyo vijñeyo vikarṇo daityasattamaḥ /
analyzed: kaṃsena tulyaḥ vijñeyaḥ vikarṇaḥ daitya sattamaḥ

original: kuṃbhakarṇācchataguṇairhīnau kradhyeti viśrutaḥ // GarP_3,12.98 //
analyzed: kuṃbhakarṇāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnau kradhyā iti viśrutaḥ

original: tasmācchataguṇairhīnaḥ śatadhanvā mahāsuraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ śatadhanvā mahā asuraḥ

original: samānastasya vijñeyaḥ karmārirdaityasattamaḥ // GarP_3,12.99 //
analyzed: samānaḥ tasya vijñeyaḥ karmāriḥ daitya sattamaḥ

original: kālakeyastu vijñeyaḥ sadā venasamo mataḥ /
analyzed: kālakeyaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ sadā vena samaḥ mataḥ

original: adhamānāṃ tu daityānāmuttamaiḥ sāmyamucyate // GarP_3,12.100 //
analyzed: adhamānām tu daityānām uttamaiḥ sāmyam ucyate

original: tatrāveśācca vijñeyaṃ devānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra āveśāt ca vijñeyam devānām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tasmācchatagurṇaihīnaścittamānasuro mahān // GarP_3,12.101 //
analyzed: tasmāt śata gurṇaiḥ hīnaḥ cittamāna suraḥ mahān

original: taccharīrābhimānī tu tasmācchataguṇairvaraḥ /
analyzed: tad śarīra abhimānī tu tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ varaḥ

original: tasmācchataguṇaihīṃno hastamānasuro mahān // GarP_3,12.102 //
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ ihi naḥ hastamāna suraḥ mahān

original: tasmācchataguṇairhīnaḥ pādamānasuro mahān /
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ pādamāna suraḥ mahān

original: netrendriyābhimānī tu tasmācchataguṇo varaḥ // GarP_3,12.103 //
analyzed: netra indriya abhimānī tu tasmāt śataguṇaḥ varaḥ

original: cakṣurindriyamānī tu tasmācchataguṇo varaḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ indriya mānī tu tasmāt śataguṇaḥ varaḥ

original: tasmācchaguṇairhīnaḥ sparśamānasuro mahān // GarP_3,12.104 //
analyzed: tasmāt śaguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ sparśamāna suraḥ mahān

original: tasmācchatagurṇaihīnaścaṇḍamānasuro mahān /
analyzed: tasmāt śata gurṇaiḥ hīnaḥ caṇḍamāna suraḥ mahān

original: tasmācchatagurṇairhīnaḥ śiśramānasuro mahān // GarP_3,12.105 //
analyzed: tasmāt śata gurṇaiḥ hīnaḥ śiśramāna asuraḥ mahān

original: tasmācchataguṇairhīnaḥ karmamānasuraḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ karma māna suraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kalpādyaiḥ preritāḥ sarve rudrādyā adhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,12.106 //
analyzed: kalpa ādyaiḥ preritāḥ sarve rudra ādyāḥ adhikāriṇaḥ

original: kadācitsuviruddhaṃ ca kurvanti tava sattama /
analyzed: kadācid su viruddham ca kurvanti tava sattama

original: kadāpyahaṃ ca vāyuśca viruddhaṃ nācareva bhoḥ // GarP_3,12.107 //
analyzed: kadāpi aham ca vāyuḥ ca viruddham na ācara iva bhoḥ

original: mūleṣvaṃśāvatāreṣu rudrādīnā mahāprabho /
analyzed: mūleṣu aṃśa avatāreṣu rudra ādīnām mahā prabho

original: buddhirvinaśyate yasmāttasmācchinnā hi te 'khilāḥ // GarP_3,12.108 //
analyzed: buddhiḥ vinaśyate yasmāt tasmāt chinnāḥ hi te khilāḥ

original: mahīpate ca madbuddhistasmādacchinnasaṃjñikaḥ /
analyzed: mahīpate ca mad buddhiḥ tasmāt acchinna saṃjñikaḥ

original: etādṛśopyahaṃ deva na ca śaktistu nastave // GarP_3,12.109 //
analyzed: etādṛśā upi aham deva na ca śaktiḥ tu nastave

original: mahyamacchinnabhaktāya dayāṃ kuru mahāprabho /
analyzed: mahyam acchinna bhaktāya dayām kuru mahā prabho

original: iti stutvā hariṃ brahmā sthitaḥ prāñja liragrataḥ // GarP_3,12.110 //
analyzed: iti stutvā harim brahmā sthitaḥ prāñja liḥ agratas

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde brahmastutivarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde brahmastutivarṇanam nāma dvādaśaḥ dyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 13
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: iti stutaḥ sa bhagavān svapūtreṇa dayānidhiḥ /
analyzed: iti stutaḥ sa bhagavān sva pūtreṇa dayā nidhiḥ

original: medhagaṃbhīrayā vācā provāca madhusūdanaḥ // GarP_3,13.1 //
analyzed: medha gaṃbhīrayā vācā provāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: sṛja brahmannimāndevānmatprasādātkrameṇa ca /
analyzed: sṛja brahman imān devān mad prasādāt krameṇa ca

original: yathā vai prākkṣaṇetadvatsṛja sarvaṃ mahāprabho // GarP_3,13.2 //
analyzed: yathā vai prāk kṣaṇā itadvat sṛja sarvam mahā prabho

original: nāsti prayojanaṃ tena tava matprītaye sṛja /
analyzed: na asti prayojanam tena tava mad prītaye sṛja

original: evamuktastu hāriṇā brahmā stutvā hariṃ param // GarP_3,13.3 //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu hāriṇā brahmā stutvā harim param

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ mano dadhre prīṇayanneva mādhavam /
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kartum manaḥ dadhre prīṇayan eva mādhavam

original: mahattatvātmako brahmā vāyuṃ jīvabhimāninam // GarP_3,13.4 //
analyzed: mahat tatva ātmakaḥ brahmā vāyum jīva abhimāninam

original: ādau sasarja garuḍa puruṣātmā sa eva ca /
analyzed: ādau sasarja garuḍa puruṣa ātmā saḥ eva ca

original: tato dakṣiṇahastāttu brahmāṇīṃ bhārantī tathā // GarP_3,13.6 // (13.5)
analyzed: tatas dakṣiṇa hastāt tu brahmāṇīm bhārantī tathā

original: asṛjatte mahābhāge avyaktasya niyāmike /
analyzed: asṛjat te mahābhāge avyaktasya niyāmike

original: vāmahastātsatyaputro mahattatvātmako 'nalaḥ // GarP_3,13.6 //
analyzed: vāma hastāt satya putraḥ mahat tatva ātmakaḥ nalaḥ

original: brahmaṇo dakṣiṇāddhastādahaṅkārātmako haraḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ dakṣiṇāt hastāt ahaṅkāra ātmakaḥ haraḥ

original: ādau śeṣastato jajñe garuḍatadanantaram // GarP_3,13.7 //
analyzed: ādau śeṣaḥ tatas jajñe garuḍa tad anantaram

original: tadanantarajo rudraḥ sa evaṃ sṛṣṭavānprabhuḥ /
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ rudraḥ saḥ evam sṛṣṭavān prabhuḥ

original: svotpattyanantaraṃ brahmā daśavarṣānmahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.8 //
analyzed: sva utpatti anantaram brahmā daśa varṣāt mahā prabhuḥ

original: vāyumuttpādrayāmāsa vatsarānantare prabhuḥ /
analyzed: vāyum uttpādrayāmāsa vatsara anantare prabhuḥ

original: gāyatrīṃ janayāmāsa vāyorutpattyanantaram // GarP_3,13.9 //
analyzed: gāyatrīm janayāmāsa vāyoḥ utpatti anantaram

original: saṃvatsarānantare tu bhāratīmasṛjatprabhuḥ /
analyzed: saṃvatsara anantare tu bhāratīm asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: bhāratyanantaraṃ śeṃ divyasāhasravatsarāt // GarP_3,13.10 //
analyzed: bhāratī anantaram śeṃ divya sāhasra vatsarāt

original: anantaraṃ saṃbabhūva garuḍastu tataḥ param /
analyzed: anantaram saṃbabhūva garuḍaḥ tu tatas param

original: divyasāhasravarṣāttu tathā rudrañca sṛṣṭavān // GarP_3,13.11 //
analyzed: divya sāhasra varṣāt tu tathā rudran ca sṛṣṭavān

original: śeṣasyānantaraṃ devīṃ vāruṇīṃ ca mahāprabhuḥ /
analyzed: śeṣasya anantaram devīm vāruṇīm ca mahā prabhuḥ

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu hyasṛjatkamalāsanaḥ // GarP_3,13.12 //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu hi asṛjat kamalāsanaḥ

original: garuḍānantaraṃ devīṃ sauparṇīmasṛjatprabhuḥ /
analyzed: garuḍa anantaram devīm sauparṇīm asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ ca pārvatīṃ ca tathaiva saḥ // GarP_3,13.13 //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram ca pārvatīm ca tathā eva saḥ

original: pārvatyanantaraṃ candraṃ manastattvaniyāmakam /
daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu vāsavaṃ hyasṛjattataḥ // GarP_3,13.14 //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu vāsavam hi asṛjat tatas

original: abhimānī dakṣiṇasya bāhośca parameṣṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: abhimānī dakṣiṇasya bāhoḥ ca parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu śacī tāmasṛjatprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.15 //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu śacī tām asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: indrasyānantaraṃ kāmaṃ triṃśadvarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: indrasya anantaram kāmam triṃśat varṣāt anantaram

original: asṛjadvāmabāhoścamanastatvābhimāninam // GarP_3,13.16 //
analyzed: asṛjat vāma bāhoḥ camanaḥ tatva abhimāninam

original: tadanantarajāṃ devīṃ daśavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: tad anantara jām devīm daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: ratiṃ sa janayāmāsa kāmabhāryāṃ mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.17 //
analyzed: ratim sa janayāmāsa kāma bhāryām mahā prabhuḥ

original: kāmasyāpyabhimānī tu sa eva parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: kāmasya api abhimānī tu saḥ eva parikīrtitaḥ

original: brahmāhaṅkārikaṃ prāṇaṃ kāryotpatteranantaram // GarP_3,13.18 //
analyzed: brahma āhaṅkārikam prāṇam kārya utpatteḥ anantaram

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu nirmame nāsika tataḥ /
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu nirmame nāsika tatas

original: tasya bhāryāṃ nāsikasyaḥ pañcavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.19 //
analyzed: tasya bhāryām nāsikasyaḥ pañca varṣāt anantaram

original: nirmame nāsikāṃ vāmāṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: nirmame nāsikām vāmām brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: ahaṅkārādanu brahmā sajñānaṃ ca bṛhaspatim // GarP_3,13.20 //
analyzed: ahaṅkārāt anu brahmā sa jñānam ca bṛhaspatim

original: nirmame ca varṣayugmapañcavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: nirmame ca varṣa yugma pañca varṣāt anantaram

original: pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu tārāṃ bhāryāṃ vinirmame // GarP_3,13.21 //
analyzed: pañca varṣa anantaram tu tārām bhāryām vinirmame

original: guroranantaraṃ brahmā pañcaviṃśādanantaram /
analyzed: guroḥ anantaram brahmā pañcaviṃśāt anantaram

original: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ manuṃ caiva nirmame manasā vibhuḥ // GarP_3,13.22 //
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuvam manum ca eva nirmame manasā vibhuḥ

original: pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu śatarūpāṃ vinirmame /
analyzed: pañca varṣa anantaram tu śatarūpām vinirmame

original: śatarūpānantaraṃ tu viṃśadvarṣadināntaram // GarP_3,13.23 //
analyzed: śata rūpa anantaram tu viṃśat varṣa dina antaram

original: dakṣaḥ śiṣyātmako jajñe dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhataḥ prabhoḥ /
analyzed: dakṣaḥ śiṣya ātmakaḥ jajñe dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭhataḥ prabhoḥ

original: pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu vāmāṅguṣṭhāccaturmukhaḥ // GarP_3,13.24 //
analyzed: pañca varṣa anantaram tu vāma aṅguṣṭhāt caturmukhaḥ

original: prasūtimasṛjadbrahmā sṛṣṭyarthaṃ paramādarāt /
analyzed: prasūtim asṛjat brahmā sṛṣṭi artham parama ādarāt

original: dakṣasyānantaraṃ brahmā pañcaviṃśādanantaram // GarP_3,13.25 //
analyzed: dakṣasya anantaram brahmā pañcaviṃśāt anantaram

original: nirmame hyaniruddhaṃ ca madhyamāṅguliparvataḥ /
analyzed: nirmame hi aniruddham ca madhyamāṅguli parvataḥ

original: pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu sasarja bhagavānajaḥ // GarP_3,13.26 //
analyzed: pañca varṣa anantaram tu sasarja bhagavān ajaḥ

original: virājasaṃjñakāṃ bhāryāṃ madhyamāṅguliparvataḥ /
analyzed: virāja saṃjñakām bhāryām madhyamāṅguli parvataḥ

original: aniruddhānantara tu śatavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.27 //
analyzed: tu śata varṣāt anantaram

original: nirmame pravahaṃ vāyuṃ kaniṣṭhāṅguliparvataḥ /
analyzed: nirmame pravaham vāyum kaniṣṭhā aṅguli parvataḥ

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu pravāhīṃ nirmame prabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.28 //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu pravāhīm nirmame prabhuḥ

original: kaniṣṭhāṅguliparvācca vāmadevaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: kaniṣṭhā aṅguli parvāt ca vāmadevam na saṃśayaḥ

original: pravahānantaraṃ tabrahmā śatavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.29 //
analyzed: pravaha anantaram śata varṣāt anantaram

original: yamaṃ vinirmame pṛṣṭhādaṣṭavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: yamam vinirmame pṛṣṭhāt aṣṭa varṣāt anantaram

original: tadbhāryāṃ śāmalāṃ devīṃ tasmādeva mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.30 //
analyzed: tad bhāryām śāmalām devīm tasmāt eva mahā prabhuḥ

original: yamasyānantaraṃ candraṃ triṃśadvarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: yamasya anantaram candram triṃśat varṣāt anantaram

original: asṛjaddakṣiṇācchotrācchotratattvaniyāmakam // GarP_3,13.31 //
analyzed: asṛjat dakṣiṇāt śotrāt śotra tattva niyāmakam

original: navavarṣānantaraṃ tu rohiṇīsamṛjatprabhuḥ /
analyzed: nava varṣa anantaram tu rohiṇī samṛjat prabhuḥ

original: vāmaśrotrācca garuḍaṃ vāmaśrotrābhimāninam // GarP_3,13.32 //
analyzed: vāma śrotrāt ca garuḍam vāma śrotra abhimāninam

original: candrasyānantaraṃ sūryaṃ viṃśadvarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: candrasya anantaram sūryam viṃśat varṣāt anantaram

original: samyagvinirmame brahmā dakṣiṇākṣṇaśca devatām // GarP_3,13.33 //
analyzed: samyak vinirmame brahmā dakṣiṇa akṣṇaḥ ca devatām

original: vāmākṣṇo nirmame saṃjñāṃ ṣaḍvarṣānantaraṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: nirmame saṃjñām ṣaṣ varṣa anantaram prabhuḥ

original: sūryasyānantaraṃ brahmā śatavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.34 //
analyzed: sūryasya anantaram brahmā śata varṣāt anantaram

original: rasanendriyācca varuṇaṃ nirmame tasya māninam /
analyzed: rasanā indriyāt ca varuṇam nirmame tasya māninam

original: viṃśadvarṣānantaraṃ tu tasmādevedriyātprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.35 //
analyzed: viṃśat varṣa anantaram tu tasmāt evedriyāt prabhuḥ

original: gaṅgāṃ vinirmame brahmā rasanendriyadevatām /
analyzed: gaṅgām vinirmame brahmā rasana indriya devatām

original: varuṇasyānantaraṃ tu daśavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.36 //
analyzed: varuṇasya anantaram tu daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: utsaṃgānnirmame brahmā nāradaṃ bhagavatpriyam /
analyzed: utsaṃgāt nirmame brahmā nāradam bhagavat priyam

original: nāradasyānantaraṃ tu ṣaṣṭivarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.37 //
analyzed: nāradasya anantaram tu ṣaṣṭi varṣāt anantaram

original: agniṃ vinirmame brahmātvagindriyataḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: agnim vinirmame brahmā tvac indriyataḥ prabhuḥ

original: ato vāgabhimānī saṃ pañcavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.38 //
analyzed: atas vāc abhimānī sam pañca varṣāt anantaram

original: svāhāṃ vinirmame brahmā tāmāhurmantradevatām /
analyzed: svāhām vinirmame brahmā tām āhuḥ mantradevatām

original: agneranantaraṃ vīndra bhṛguṃ brahmarṣisattamam // GarP_3,13.39 //
analyzed: agneḥ anantaram vi indra bhṛgum brahma ṛṣi sattamam

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu bhruvormadhyādvinirmame /
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu bhruvoḥ madhyāt vinirmame

original: saṃvatsarānantaraṃ tu bhṛgubhāryāṃ vinirmame // GarP_3,13.40 //
analyzed: saṃvatsara anantaram tu bhṛgu bhāryām vinirmame

original: bhṛgoranantaraṃ brahmā śatavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ anantaram brahmā śata varṣāt anantaram

original: kaśyapañjanayāmāsa manasā ca svayaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.41 //
analyzed: kaśyapam janayāmāsa manasā ca svayam prabhuḥ

original: saṃvatsarānantaraṃ tu aditiṃ nirmame prabhuḥ /
analyzed: saṃvatsara anantaram tu aditim nirmame prabhuḥ

original: kaśyapānantaraṃ cātriṃ daśavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.42 //
analyzed: kaśyapa anantaram ca atrim daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: atreranantaraṃ brahmā daśavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: atreḥ anantaram brahmā daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: ajījanadbharadvājaṃ vasiṣṭha tadanataram // GarP_3,13.43 //
analyzed: ajījanat bharadvājam vasiṣṭha tad anataram

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu teṣāṃ bhāryāḥ krameṇa tu /
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu teṣām bhāryāḥ krameṇa tu

original: saṃvatsarānantareṇa asṛjatkamalāsanaḥ // GarP_3,13.44 //
analyzed: saṃvatsara anantareṇa asṛjat kamalāsanaḥ

original: vasiṣṭhasyānantaraṃ tu gautamaṃ hyasṛjatprabhuḥ /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya anantaram tu gautamam hi asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: daśavarṣānantareṇa jamadagniṃ tato 'sṛjat // GarP_3,13.45 //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantareṇa jamadagnim sṛjat

original: daśavarṣānantareṇa manurvaivasvato 'bhavat /
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantareṇa manuḥ vaivasvataḥ bhavat

original: manoranantaraṃ jajñe śatavarṣādanantaram // GarP_3,13.46 //
analyzed: manoḥ anantaram jajñe śata varṣāt anantaram

original: viṣvakseno mahābhāgo vāyuputro mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: viṣvaksenaḥ mahābhāgaḥ vāyuputraḥ mahā balaḥ

original: tasmāccaturdaśe varṣe gaṇapo hyabhavadvibhoḥ // GarP_3,13.47 //
analyzed: tasmāt caturdaśe varṣe gaṇapaḥ hi abhavat vibhoḥ

original: tadanantarajo vīndra aṣṭavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ vīndra aṣṭa varṣāt anantaram

original: dhanapo hyabhavattatra tadbhāryā vatsare pare // GarP_3,13.48 //
analyzed: dhanapaḥ hi abhavat tatra tad bhāryā vatsare pare

original: viṣvaksenānantaraṃ tu daśavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: viṣvaksena anantaram tu daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: jayādīnbha gavadbhaktānsṛṣṭavān kamalāsanaḥ // GarP_3,13.49 //
analyzed: jaya ādīn bha gavat bhaktān sṛṣṭavān kamalāsanaḥ

original: jayādyānantaraṃ brahmā vallādyāḥ karmadevatāḥ /
analyzed: jaya ādya anantaram brahmā valla ādyāḥ karma devatāḥ

original: śatavarṣānantaraṃ tu sṛṣṭavāñchivavāhanam // GarP_3,13.50 //
analyzed: śata varṣa anantaram tu sṛṣṭavān śiva vāhanam

original: karmadevānantaraṃ tu triṃśadvarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: karma deva anantaram tu triṃśat varṣāt anantaram

original: parjanyamasṛjbrahmā mantrayantrābhimāninam // GarP_3,13.51 //
analyzed: parjanyam asṛj brahmā mantra yantra abhimāninam

original: parjanyānantaraṃ brahmā daśavarṣādanantaram /
analyzed: parjanya anantaram brahmā daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: puṣkaraṃ janayāmāsa karmatattvābhimāninam // GarP_3,13.52 //
analyzed: puṣkaram janayāmāsa karma tattva abhimāninam

original: evaṃ vinirmame brahmā matprasādātkhageśvara /
analyzed: evam vinirmame brahmā mad prasādāt khageśvara

original: evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,13.53 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā mokṣam eti na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devotpattinirūpaṇam nāma trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 14
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīgaruḍa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: avatārānhare brūhi tathā lakṣmyā divaukasām /
analyzed: avatārān hare brūhi tathā lakṣmyāḥ divaukasām

original: guṇānāmantara brūhi śiṣyasya mama savrata // GarP_3,14.1 //
analyzed: guṇānām antara brūhi śiṣyasya mama savrata

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: yo mūlarūpī bhagavānananto brahmādibhiḥ purṇaguṇaḥ svatantraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ mūla rūpī bhagavān anantaḥ brahma ādibhiḥ purṇa guṇaḥ svatantraḥ

original: purātanaḥ pūrṇatanurmadātmā na tādṛśāḥ saṃti kadāpi vīdra // GarP_3,14.2 //
analyzed: purātanaḥ pūrṇa tanuḥ mad ātmā na tādṛśāḥ saṃti kadāpi

original: pādaśca pūrṇaḥ pādatalaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ nakhāśca pūrṇāḥ kaṭikaṇṭhau ca pūrṇau /
analyzed: pādaḥ ca pūrṇaḥ pāda talam ca pūrṇam nakhāḥ ca pūrṇāḥ kaṭi kaṇṭhau ca pūrṇau

original: ūrū ca pūrṇe udaraṃ ca pūrṇaṃ labdhvāpi pūrṇāñjagṛhe tathāpyuraḥ // GarP_3,14.3 //
analyzed: ūrū ca pūrṇe udaram ca pūrṇam labdhvā api pūrṇān jagṛhe tathā api uraḥ

original: skandhaḥ supūrṇāḥ sakalāśca bāhavaḥ pūrṇāḥ keśāḥ śmaśrudantāśca pūrṇāḥ /
analyzed: skandhaḥ su pūrṇāḥ sakalāḥ ca bāhavaḥ pūrṇāḥ keśāḥ śmaśru dantāḥ ca pūrṇāḥ

original: lomāni pūrṇāni tathaiva romakūpāśca pūrṇāstu tathaiva śiśraḥ // GarP_3,14.4 //
analyzed: lomāni pūrṇāni tathā eva romakūpāḥ ca pūrṇāḥ tu tathā eva śiśraḥ

original: aṇḍaśca pūrṇo hyaṇḍaromāṇi kakṣāścakṣuśca śrotre sarva ete ca pūrṇāḥ /
analyzed: aṇḍaḥ ca pūrṇaḥ hi aṇḍa romāṇi kakṣāḥ cakṣuḥ ca śrotre sarve ete ca pūrṇāḥ

original: kiṃ varṇaye mūlarūpaṃ hareśca yāvadvalaṃ pūrṇaṃ samagradehe // GarP_3,14.5 //
analyzed: kim varṇaye mūla rūpam hareḥ ca yāvat valam pūrṇam samagra dehe

original: tāvadbralaṃ hyekaromādikeṣu saṃtitvime hi yataḥ sa eva pūrṇaḥ /
analyzed: tāvat bralam hi eka roma ādikeṣu hi yatas saḥ eva pūrṇaḥ

original: sa eva tu sarvasya kartā sa eva harthā sa tu sārāṃśabhoktā // GarP_3,14.6 //
analyzed: saḥ eva tu sarvasya kartā saḥ eva harthā sa tu sāra aṃśa bhoktā

original: asārāṃśaṃ naiva bhoktā haristu sārānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndra samyak /
analyzed: asāra aṃśam nā eva bhoktā hariḥ tu sārān vakṣye śṛṇu pakṣi indra samyak

original: drākṣekṣusāraṃ nārikelasya sāraṃ cūtasya sāraṃ panasasyāpi sāram // GarP_3,14.7 //
analyzed: drākṣā ikṣu sāram nārikelasya sāram cūtasya sāram panasasya api sāram

original: nāraṅgasāraṃ kramukasyāpi sāraṃ kharjūrasāraṃ kadalīphalasya /
analyzed: nāraṅga sāram kramukasya api sāram kharjūra sāram kadalī phalasya

original: nārāyaṇo bījarūpasya sāraṃ gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhaktavaryo dayāluḥ // GarP_3,14.8 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ bīja rūpasya sāram gṛhṇāti nityam bhakta varyaḥ dayāluḥ

original: tāmbūlasāraṃ khadirasya sāraṃ puṣpasya sāraṃ candanasyāpi sāram /
analyzed: tāmbūla sāram khadirasya sāram puṣpasya sāram candanasya api sāram

original: godhūmasāraṃ yavānāṃ ca sāraṃ māṣasya sāraṃ hareṇośca sāram // GarP_3,14.9 //
analyzed: godhūma sāram yavānām ca sāram māṣasya sāram hareṇoḥ ca sāram

original: śuddhaṃ tathā vrīhinīvārasāraṃ śyāmākasāraṃ śuddhadhānyasya sāram // GarP_3,14.10 //
analyzed: śuddham tathā vrīhi nīvāra sāram śyāmāka sāram śuddha dhānyasya sāram

original: niṣiddhānsarvaśākasya sārāṃstathā nipiddhāllāṃvaṇasvāpi sārān /
analyzed: niṣiddhān sarva śākasya sārān tathā sārān

original: gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ paramādareṇa annasya sāraṃ bhakṣyabhojyasya sāram // GarP_3,14.11 //
analyzed: gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ parama ādareṇa annasya sāram bhakṣya bhojyasya sāram

original: sūpasya sāraṃ paramānnasya sāraṃ dugdhasya sāraṃ dadhitakrasya sāram /
analyzed: sūpasya sāram paramānnasya sāram dugdhasya sāram dadhi takrasya sāram

original: ghṛtasya sāraṃ rāmaṭhasyāpi sāraṃ gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ sarṣapasyāpi sāram // GarP_3,14.12 //
analyzed: ghṛtasya sāram rāmaṭhasya api sāram gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ sarṣapasya api sāram

original: marīcasāraṃ jīrakasyāpi sāraṃ tathā havirghṛtapakvasya sāram /
analyzed: marīca sāram jīrakasya api sāram tathā haviḥ ghṛta pakvasya sāram

original: taileṣu pakvasya ca bharjitasya guḍasya sāraṃ navanītasya sāram // GarP_3,14.13 //
analyzed: taileṣu pakvasya ca bharjitasya guḍasya sāram navanītasya sāram

original: lavaṅgasāraṃ śarkarāyāśca sāramityādisārān vāsudevastu bhukte /
analyzed: lavaṅga sāram śarkarāyāḥ ca sāram iti ādi sārān vāsudevaḥ tu bhukte

original: lakṣmīpatiḥ sarvajagannivā sastasyājñayā vāsudevopi nityam // GarP_3,14.14 //
analyzed: lakṣmīpatiḥ sarva jagat nivā saḥ tasya ājñayā vāsudevaḥ api nityam

original: taccheṣasārānapi cāvanīśo mahātmanoṃśāñchṛṇu śiṣyavarya /
analyzed: tad śeṣa sārān api mahātmanaḥ oṃśān śṛṇu śiṣya varya

original: evaṃ vimūḍhā vāsudevasya bhaktāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ viṣṇubhaktā hi loke // GarP_3,14.15 //
analyzed: evam vimūḍhāḥ vāsudevasya bhaktāḥ kim vaktavyam viṣṇu bhaktāḥ hi loke

original: kalyāṇāste sārabhoktāra eva naiṣāṃ bhavettena duḥ khābhivṛddhiḥ /
analyzed: kalyāṇāḥ te sāra bhoktāraḥ eva nā eṣām bhavet tena duḥ kha abhivṛddhiḥ

original: bhuñjanti ye vaiśvadevaṃ vihāya duṣṭāṃstānvai bhukticinttāṃśca viddhi // GarP_3,14.16 //
analyzed: bhuñjanti ye vaiśvadevam vihāya duṣṭān tān vai bhukti cinttān ca viddhi

original: vakṣye viśeṣaṃ vaiśvadeve khagendra gopyaṃ no vadānyatra vidvān /
analyzed: vakṣye viśeṣam vaiśvadeve khaga indra gopyam naḥ vadāni atra vidvān

original: sūryādīnāṃ ye ca dāne ca dadyurvinā vāyorantarasthaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,14.17 //
analyzed: sūrya ādīnām ye ca dāne ca dadyuḥ vinā vāyoḥ antara stham harim ca

original: te vai sadā sārabhoktāra eva jñeyāstvato viṣṇureko mahātmā /
analyzed: te vai sadā sāra bhoktāraḥ eva jñeyāḥ tu atas viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ mahātmā

original: sārāṃśabhoktā na tu sarvasya bhoktā bhunakti sarvaṃ tvaviruddhaśaktiḥ // GarP_3,14.18 //
analyzed: sāra aṃśa bhoktā na tu sarvasya bhoktā bhunakti sarvam tu aviruddha śaktiḥ

original: vakṣye ha sārānpunaranyānkhagendra śṛṇuṣva guhyaṃ paramādareṇa /
analyzed: vakṣye ha sārān punar anyān khaga indra śṛṇuṣva guhyam parama ādareṇa

original: drākṣādayaḥ sarva eva tvasārāḥ kālādiduṣṭā bhāvaduṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ // GarP_3,14.19 //
analyzed: drākṣā ādayaḥ sarve eva tu asārāḥ kāla ādi duṣṭāḥ bhāva duṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ

original: atipakvānantaraṃ tu tathā dinacatuṣṭaye /
analyzed: ati pakva anantaram tu tathā dina catuṣṭaye

original: asārāḥ kaluṣā jñeyāstathā jaṃbūphalaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,14.20 //
analyzed: asārāḥ kaluṣāḥ jñeyāḥ tathā jaṃbū phalam smṛtam

original: māsasyānantaraṃ vīndra tvasāraṃ panasaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: māsasya anantaram vīndra tu asāram panasam smṛtam

original: ṣaṇmāsānantaraṃ vīndra kharjūraṃ tiktavatsmṛtam // GarP_3,14.21 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsa anantaram vīndra kharjūram tikta vat smṛtam

original: ārdraṃ pūtaṃ nārikelaṃ sphoṭanānantaraṃ prabho /
analyzed: ārdram pūtam nārikelam sphoṭana anantaram prabho

original: ahorātrānantaraṃ tu asāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.22 //
analyzed: ahar rātra anantaram tu asāram parikīrtitam

original: śuṣkabhūtaṃ nārikelaṃ khajūraṃ tu yathā tathā /
analyzed: śuṣka bhūtam nārikelam khajūram tu yathā tathā

original: pakṣasyānantaraṃ cūtamasāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.23 //
analyzed: pakṣasya anantaram cūtam asāram parikīrtitam

original: varṣasyānantaraṃ vīndra pūgīphalamudāhṛtam /
analyzed: varṣasya anantaram vīndra pūgī phalam udāhṛtam

original: ghaṭikānantaraṃ vīndra tāṃbūlaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.24 //
analyzed: ghaṭikā anantaram vīndra tāṃbūlam parikīrtitam

original: yāmasyānantaraṃ cānnaṃ sūpānnaṃ pāyasaṃ tathā /
analyzed: yāmasya anantaram ca annam sūpa annam pāyasam tathā

original: bhakṣyaṃ ca kvathitaṃ vīndra asāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.25 //
analyzed: bhakṣyam ca kvathitam vīndra asāram parikīrtitam

original: tripakṣānantaraṃ vīndra tailapakvaṃ tathā smṛtam /
analyzed: tri pakṣa anantaram vīndra taila pakvam tathā smṛtam

original: caturyāmānantaraṃ ca tvasāraṃ ghṛtapakvakam // GarP_3,14.26 //
analyzed: catur yāma anantaram ca tu asāram ghṛta pakvakam

original: triyāmānantaraṃ śākā niḥ sārāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: tri yāma anantaram śākāḥ niḥ sārāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: jaṃbīraṃ śṛṅgabere dhātrī karpūraṃ ca cūtakam // GarP_3,14.27 //
analyzed: jaṃbīram śṛṅgabere dhātrī karpūram ca cūtakam

original: vatsarānantaraṃ vīndra niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: vatsara anantaram vīndra niḥ sāram parikīrtitam

original: parpaṭaḥ pakṣamātreṇa niḥ sāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,14.28 //
analyzed: parpaṭaḥ pakṣa mātreṇa niḥ sāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: tulasī sarvadā sārā ekādaśyāmapi dvija /
analyzed: tulasī sarvadā sārā ekādaśyām api dvija

original: ārdrā vāpyathavā śuṣkā sārdrā sāravatī smṛtā // GarP_3,14.29 //
analyzed: ārdrā vā api athavā śuṣkā sārdrā sāravatī smṛtā

original: ekādaśyāṃ tu tulasī sārā grāhyā manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: ekādaśyām tu tulasī sārā grāhyā manīṣibhiḥ

original: tvacā nāseṃdriyeṇāpi na tu jihvendriyeṇa ca // GarP_3,14.30 //
analyzed: tvacā nāsā iṃdriyeṇa api na tu jihvā indriyeṇa ca

original: ekādaśyāṃ harerannaṃ niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: ekādaśyām hareḥ annam niḥ sāram parikīrtitam

original: ekādaśyāṃ harestīrthaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,14.31 //
analyzed: ekādaśyām hareḥ tīrtham manuṣyāṇām khageśvara

original: ekavāre ca sāraṃ syāddvivāre ca tatodhikam /
analyzed: eka vāre ca sāram syāt dvi vāre ca tatas adhikam

original: ekādaśyāṃ mahābhāga tīrthaṃ gandhādimiśritam // GarP_3,14.32 //
analyzed: ekādaśyām mahābhāga tīrtham gandha ādi miśritam

original: asāramiti saṃproktaṃ tathā svādūdamiśritam /
analyzed: asāram iti saṃproktam tathā svādu uda miśritam

original: ekādaśyāṃ hareḥ sāraṃ kṣīraṃ sarpirmadhūdakam // GarP_3,14.33 //
analyzed: ekādaśyām hareḥ sāram kṣīram sarpiḥ madhu udakam

original: niḥ sāraṃ manujendrāṇāmiti vedavidāṃ matam /
analyzed: niḥ sāram manuja indrāṇām iti veda vidām matam

original: āṣāḍhamāse garuḍa śāko niḥ sāra ucyate // GarP_3,14.34 //
analyzed: āṣāḍha māse garuḍa śākaḥ niḥ sāraḥ ucyate

original: māsi bhādrapade vīndra hyasāraṃ dadhi cocyate /
analyzed: māsi bhādrapade vi indra hi asāram dadhi ca ucyate

original: kṣīraṃ tu hyāśvine māse niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.35 //
analyzed: kṣīram tu hi āśvine māse niḥ sāram parikīrtitam

original: ūrdhvapuṇḍragadāhīnā nāryasāreti gīyate /
analyzed: ūrdhva puṇḍra gadā hīnā nāryasārā iti gīyate

original: haribhaktivihīnā ye hyasurāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,14.36 //
analyzed: hari bhakti vihīnāḥ ye hi asurāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: harināmavihīnaṃ tu mukhaṃ niḥ sāramucyate /
analyzed: hari nāma vihīnam tu mukham niḥ sāram ucyate

original: harinaivedyahīnastu pāko niḥ sāra ucyate // GarP_3,14.37 //
analyzed: hari naivedya hīnaḥ tu pākaḥ niḥ sāraḥ ucyate

original: tridinaiścātasīpuṣpaṃ niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: tri dinaiḥ ca atasī puṣpam niḥ sāram parikīrtitam

original: praharaṃ mallikā sāraṃ jātī tu praharārdhakam // GarP_3,14.38 //
triyāmaṃ śatapatraṃ syātkaravīramaharniśam /
analyzed: tri yāmam śata patram syāt karavīram aharniśam

original: ghaṭikāvadhi sāraṃ syātpārijātaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,14.39 //
analyzed: ghaṭikā avadhi sāram syāt pārijātam khageśvara

original: trivarṣaṃ kesaraṃ phalga sāramityucyate budhaiḥ /
analyzed: tri varṣam kesaram phalga sāram iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: kastūrī daśavarṣaṃ tu karpūraṃ varṣamātrakam // GarP_3,14.40 //
analyzed: kastūrī daśa varṣam tu karpūram varṣa mātrakam

original: sasāramiti saṃproktaṃ candanaṃ sarvadā smṛtam /
analyzed: sasāram iti saṃproktam candanam sarvadā smṛtam

original: śuddhanniḥ sārabhūtāṃśca vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara // GarP_3,14.41 //
analyzed: sāra bhūtān ca vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara

original: tuṣā medhyā āranālaṃ puṇyakaṃ bhiḥ saṭā tathā /
analyzed: tuṣāḥ medhyāḥ āranālam puṇyakam bhiḥ saṭā tathā

original: upodvrajī alābūśca bṛhatkośātakī tathā // GarP_3,14.42 //
analyzed: upodvrajī alābūḥ ca bṛhatkośātakī tathā

original: vṛntākaṃ cukraśākaśca bilvamauduṃvaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: vṛntākam cukra śākaḥ ca bilvam auduṃvaram tathā

original: palāñjurlaśunaṃ vṛntaṃ kalañjaṃ ca tathā dvijā // GarP_3,14.43 //
analyzed: palāñjuḥ laśunam vṛntam kalañjam ca tathā dvijāḥ

original: etatsarvatra kāle ca niḥ sāramiti kīrtitam /
analyzed: etat sarvatra kāle ca niḥ sāram iti kīrtitam

original: ekādaśyāṃ vaiśvadevaṃ śrāddhaṃ tarpaṇameva ca // GarP_3,14.44 //
analyzed: ekādaśyām vaiśvadevam śrāddham tarpaṇam eva ca

original: mantreṇa pretadahanamasāraṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: mantreṇa preta dahanam asāram parikīrtitam

original: havirnārāyaṇo devo etāṃśca hyaśubhānra sān // GarP_3,14.45 //
analyzed: haviḥ nārāyaṇaḥ etān ca hi aśubhān ra sān

original: na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti hariḥ svayam /
analyzed: na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti hariḥ svayam

original: tathāpi sarvaṃ jānāti jīvānāṃ pāpakarmaṇām // GarP_3,14.46 //
analyzed: tathā api sarvam jānāti jīvānām pāpa karmaṇām

original: āsvādanaṃ kārayati svayaṃ nāsvādate hariḥ /
analyzed: āsvādanam kārayati svayam na āsvādate hariḥ

original: asārabhojanaṃ caiva jīvānāṃ karmajaṃ phalam // GarP_3,14.47 //
analyzed: asāra bhojanam ca eva jīvānām karma jam phalam

original: amukhyabhojino jīvāḥ kuntyādyā mukhyabhojinaḥ /
analyzed: amukhya bhojinaḥ jīvāḥ kuntī ādyāḥ mukhya bhojinaḥ

original: śubhāni ca pibedviṣṇuraśubhaṃ no pibedvibhuḥ // GarP_3,14.48 //
analyzed: śubhāni ca pibet viṣṇuḥ aśubham no pibet vibhuḥ

original: ko vadettasya ceṣṭāṃ tu pūrṇānando hariḥ svayam /
analyzed: kaḥ vadet tasya ceṣṭām tu pūrṇānandaḥ hariḥ svayam

original: na tena sadṛśaḥ kopi deśe kāle ca vidyate /
analyzed: na tena sadṛśaḥ kaḥ api deśe kāle ca vidyate

original: tasyāvatārānvakṣyahaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama // GarP_3,14.49 //
analyzed: tasya avatārān vakṣi aham śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vaiśvadevārthakasārāsāravastuviveko nāma caturdaśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vaiśvadevārthakasārāsāravastuvivekaḥ nāma caturdaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 15
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: athāvatā rānpuruṣākhyo hariśca gato dhyānaṃ kartumīśo mahātmā /
analyzed: atha avatā rān puruṣa ākhyaḥ hariḥ ca gataḥ dhyānam kartum īśaḥ mahātmā

original: prādurbabhūvākhilasadguṇārṇavaḥ sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa ca bījabhūtaḥ // GarP_3,15.1 //
analyzed: prādurbabhūva akhila sat guṇa arṇavaḥ saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ sa ca bīja bhūtaḥ

original: yo bījabhūtaḥ puruṣākhya viṣṇuḥ sa evābhūdvāsudevo mahātmā /
analyzed: yaḥ bīja bhūtaḥ viṣṇuḥ saḥ eva abhūt vāsudevaḥ mahātmā

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ puruṣākhyasya vāyormāyākhyāyāṃ mūlarūpo yathā'sa // GarP_3,15.2 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kartum puruṣa ākhyasya vāyoḥ māyā ākhyāyām mūla rūpaḥ yathā āsa

original: yo vāsudevastu sa eva jātaḥ saṃkarṣaṇākhyo khilasadguṇātmā /
