analyzed: yaḥ vāsudevaḥ tu saḥ eva jātaḥ saṃkarṣaṇa ākhyaḥ khila sat guṇa ātmā

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ sūtrabhūtasya vāyorjayākhyāyaṃ pūrṇasaṃvitparātmā // GarP_3,15.3 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kartum sūtra bhūtasya vāyoḥ jaya ākhyā ayam pūrṇa saṃvid parātmā

original: sa evaṃ saṃkarṣaṇanāmadheyaḥ pradyumnanāmā ca sa eva viśrutaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ evam saṃkarṣaṇa nāmadheyaḥ pradyumna nāmā ca saḥ eva viśrutaḥ

original: sarasvatībhāratīsarjanārthaṃ sa eva devyā mūlarūpo babhūva // GarP_3,15.4 //
analyzed: sarasvatī bhāratī sarjana artham saḥ eva devyāḥ mūla rūpaḥ babhūva

original: sṛṣṭvā yuktaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kalābhirmahattattvaṃ sūkṣmarūpaṃ sa eva /
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā yuktam ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kalābhiḥ mahat tattvam sūkṣma rūpam saḥ eva

original: sāhaṅkāraṃ krīḍayāmāsa devaḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai ṣoḍaśākhyāḥ kalāśca // GarP_3,15.5 //
analyzed: sa ahaṅkāram krīḍayāmāsa devaḥ śṛṇu tvam vai ṣoḍaśa ākhyāḥ kalāḥ ca

original: bhūtāni karmendriyapañcakāni jñānendriyāṇīha tathā manaśca /
analyzed: bhūtāni karmendriya pañcakāni jñānendriyāṇi iha tathā manaḥ ca

original: tato babhūva hyaniruddhasaṃjñako jīvāṃśca saṃgṛhya supūrṇaśaktiḥ // GarP_3,15.6 //
analyzed: tatas babhūva hi aniruddha saṃjñakaḥ jīvān ca saṃgṛhya su pūrṇa śaktiḥ

original: soyaṃ viriñcyādisamastadevān sthūlena dehena sasarja nāthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ayam viriñci ādi samasta devān sthūlena dehena sasarja nāthaḥ

original: tathā sa viṣṇuḥ puruṣābhidhastu sanatkumāratvamavāpa vīndra // GarP_3,15.7 //
analyzed: tathā sa viṣṇuḥ puruṣa abhidhaḥ tu sanatkumāra tvam avāpa vīndra

original: ananyasādhyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca kartuṃ daśendriyāṇāṃ śoṣaṇārthaṃ sadaiva /
analyzed: an anya sādhyam brahmacaryam ca kartum daśa indriyāṇām śoṣaṇa artham sadā eva

original: sanandanādau paṭhitaḥ kumārastasmānnānyo nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,15.8 //
analyzed: sanandana ādau paṭhitaḥ kumāraḥ tasmāt na anyaḥ na atra vicāryam asti

original: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sūkaratvaṃ hyavāpa kṣopaṇīmuddhartuṃ daityavapurnihantum /
analyzed: saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ sūkara tvam hi avāpa kṣopaṇīm uddhartum daitya vapuḥ nihantum

original: hiraṇyākṣaṃ sajjanānāṃ khagendra tathā bhūmeḥ sthāpanārthaṃ ca devaḥ // GarP_3,15.9 //
analyzed: hiraṇyākṣam sat janānām khaga indra tathā bhūmeḥ sthāpana artham ca devaḥ

original: tato harirmadvidāsatvamāpānṛṣerbhāryāyāṃ yāminyāṃ yo mahātmā /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ mad vidāsa tvam āpāt ṛṣeḥ bhāryāyām yāminyām yaḥ mahātmā

original: tatrāvatāre pañcarātraṃ samagramupādeṣṭuṃ nāpa dānaṃ svatantraḥ // GarP_3,15.10 //
analyzed: tatra avatāre pañcarātram samagram upādeṣṭum na apa dānam svatantraḥ

original: sa eva viṣṇuḥ samabhūdbradaryāṃ nārāyaṇākhyaḥ śamalāpahaśca /
analyzed: saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ samabhūt bradaryām nārāyaṇa ākhyaḥ śamala apahaḥ ca

original: tapastaptuṃ śikṣayituṃ tvṛṣīṇāṃ tiraskartuṃ hyapsarasāṃ sahasram // GarP_3,15.11 //
analyzed: tapaḥ taptum śikṣayitum tu ṛṣīṇām tiraskartum hi apsarasām sahasram

original: tato hariḥ kapilatvaṃ hyavāpya tirohitānkālabalena tattvān /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ kapila tvam hi avāpya tirohitān kāla balena tattvān

original: caturviśatiṃ saṃśayaṃ coddhariṣyannupādiśaccāsuraye mahātmā // GarP_3,15.12 //
analyzed: caturviśatim saṃśayam ca uddhariṣyan upādiśat ca asuraye mahātmā

original: sa eva dataḥ samabhūdrameśonasūyāyāmatrirūpaḥ parātmā /
analyzed: saḥ eva dataḥ samabhūt ramā īśa unasūyāyām atri rūpaḥ parātmā

original: ānvīkṣikiṃ nāma sutarkavidyāmalarkanāmne pradadāttāṃ mahātmā // GarP_3,15.13 //
analyzed: ānvīkṣikim nāma su tarka vidyām alarka nāmne pradadāt tām mahātmā

original: sa eva vaṃśepyabhavadraveśca ākūtyāṃ yaḥ saccidānandarūpaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ākūtyām yaḥ saccidānanda rūpaḥ

original: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ yattu manvantaraṃ ca devaiḥ sākaṃ pālayāmāsa vīndra // GarP_3,15.14 //
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuvam yat tu manvantaram ca devaiḥ sākam pālayāmāsa vi indra

original: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa urukramobhūdāgnīdhraputryāṃ merudevyāṃ ca nābheḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ saḥ urukramaḥ bhūt āgnīdhraputryām merudevyām ca nābheḥ

original: vidyāratānāṃ mānināṃ sarvadaivamatyāścaryaṃ darśayituṃ ca vīndra // GarP_3,15.15 //
analyzed: vidyā ratānām māninām sarva daivam ati āścaryam darśayitum ca vi indra

original: tato harirjagṛhe kūrmarūpaṃ surāsurāṇāmudadhiṃ vimathnatām /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ jagṛhe kūrma rūpam sura asurāṇām udadhim vimathnatām

original: pṛṣṭhe dhartuṃ mandaraṃ parvataṃ ca brahmāṇḍaṃ vā dhartumīśo mahātmā // GarP_3,15.16 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe dhartum mandaram parvatam ca brahmāṇḍam vā dhartum īśaḥ mahātmā

original: tato hariḥ prādurabhūnmahātmā dhanvantarirnāma harinmaṇidyutiḥ /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ prādurabhūt mahātmā dhanvantariḥ nāma harit maṇi dyutiḥ

original: apathyadoṣānparihartumeva haste gṛhītvā pūrṇakubhaṃ sudhābhiḥ // GarP_3,15.17 //
analyzed: apathya doṣān parihartum eva haste gṛhītvā pūrṇakubham sudhābhiḥ

original: tato harirjagṛhe śrīvapuśca yanmohinīti pravadanti loke /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ jagṛhe śrī vapuḥ ca yat mohinī iti pravadanti loke

original: udvṛttānāṃ ditijānāṃ mahātmā samyakteṣāṃ vañcayituṃ harirbalam // GarP_3,15.18 //
analyzed: udvṛttānām ditijānām mahātmā samyak teṣām vañcayitum hariḥ balam

original: tato hariḥ prādurabhūnmahātmā nṛsiṃhanāmā bhagavānanantaḥ /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ prādurabhūt mahātmā nṛsiṃha nāmā bhagavān anantaḥ

original: daityo hiraṇyakaśipuśca tathorudeśe saṃsthāpitaḥ karajairdāritaśca // GarP_3,15.19 //
analyzed: daityaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca tathā ūru deśe saṃsthāpitaḥ karajaiḥ dāritaḥ ca

original: tato harirbhagavānvāmanobhūdadityāṃ vai kaśyapāddavadevaḥ /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ bhagavān vāmanaḥ bhūt adityām vai kaśyapāt davadevaḥ

original: indrāyedaṃ dātukāmaḥ khagendra tadarthaṃ vai pāvituṃ sovituṃ ca // GarP_3,15.20 //
analyzed: indrāya idam dātu kāmaḥ khaga indra tad artham vai pāvitum sovitum ca

original: tato harirjamadagneḥ sutobhūlloke sarve parśurāmaṃ vadanti /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ jamadagneḥ sutaḥ bhūt loke sarve parśurāmam vadanti

original: brahmadviṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vīndra bhūmiṃ niḥ kṣatrāṃ kartukāmo maheśaḥ // GarP_3,15.21 //
analyzed: brahma dviṣām kṣatriyāṇām ca vi indra bhūmim niḥ kṣatrām kartu kāmaḥ maheśaḥ

original: tatobhavadvyāsarūpī sa viṣṇuścaturvāraṃ rāghavāsyāpi pūrṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatobhavat vyāsa rūpī sa viṣṇuḥ catur vāram rāghava asya api pūrṇaḥ

original: parāśarātsatyavatyāṃ babhūva pailādibhirvedabhāgāṃśca kartum // GarP_3,15.22 //
analyzed: parāśarāt satyavatyām babhūva paila ādibhiḥ veda bhāgān ca kartum

original: tato harī raghuvaṃśevatīrṇaḥ kausalyāyāṃ rāghavaḥ sūryavaṃśe /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ raghu vaṃśa ivatīrṇaḥ kausalyāyām rāghavaḥ sūryavaṃśe

original: samudrādorvigrahaṃ kartumīśo haṃ tuṃ bhūmyāṃ rāvaṇādīṃśca vīndra // GarP_3,15.23 //
analyzed: samudra ādoḥ vigraham kartum īśaḥ ham tum bhūmyām rāvaṇa ādīn ca vi indra

original: tato harirvyāsarūpī babhūva aṣṭāviṃśe dvapare jñānarūpī /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ vyāsa rūpī babhūva aṣṭāviṃśe dvi apare jñāna rūpī

original: parāśarātsatyavatyāṃ mahātmā svayaṃ vedān saṃvibhaktuṃ ca devaḥ // GarP_3,15.24 //
analyzed: parāśarāt satyavatyām mahātmā svayam vedān saṃvibhaktum ca devaḥ

original: tato hariḥ kṛṣṇarūpī babhūva devakyāṃ vai vasudevātsa viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ kṛṣṇa rūpī babhūva devakyām vai vasudevāt sa viṣṇuḥ

original: kaṃsādīnvai nitarāṃ hantukāmaḥ samyakpātuṃ pāṇḍavāṃścāpi vīndra // GarP_3,15.25 //
analyzed: kaṃsa ādīn vai nitarām hantu kāmaḥ samyak pātum pāṇḍavān ca api vīndra

original: tataḥ kalau saṃpravṛtte haristu saṃmohanārthaṃ cāsurāṇāṃ khagendra /
analyzed: tatas kalau saṃpravṛtte hariḥ tu saṃmohana artham ca asurāṇām khaga indra

original: nāmnā buddho kīkaṭeṣu prajāto vedapramāṇaṃ nirākartumeva // GarP_3,15.26 //
analyzed: nāmnā buddhaḥ kīkaṭeṣu prajātaḥ veda pramāṇam nirākartum eva

original: tato hariḥ kalkisaṃjñaśca vīndra utpatsyate yugayormadhyasaṃdhau /
analyzed: tatas hariḥ kalki saṃjñaḥ ca vīndraḥ utpatsyate yugayoḥ madhya saṃdhau

original: dasyuprāyānbhūmipānvai nihantuṃ nāmnā harirviṣṇuguptasya gehe // GarP_3,15.27 //
analyzed: dasyu prāyān bhūmipān vai nihantum nāmnā hariḥ viṣṇuguptasya gehe

original: keśavādyāścaturviṃśatirvai saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ /
analyzed: keśava ādyāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ vai saṃkarṣaṇa ādayaḥ

original: viśvādaya sahasraṃ ca parādyā amitāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,15.28 //
analyzed: viśva ādaya sahasram ca para ādyāḥ amitāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: avatārā hyasaṃkhyātā viṣṇornārāyaṇasya ca /
analyzed: avatārāḥ hi asaṃkhyātāḥ viṣṇoḥ nārāyaṇasya ca

original: svayaṃ nārāyaṇāste te nāṇumātraṃ vibhidyate // GarP_3,15.29 //
analyzed: svayam nārāyaṇāḥ te te na aṇu mātram vibhidyate

original: balatorūpataścāpi guṇataśca kathañcana /
analyzed: balataḥ rūpataḥ ca api guṇataḥ ca kathañcana

original: anantonantaguṇataḥ pūrṇo viṣṇurna cānyathā // GarP_3,15.30 //
analyzed: anantaḥ unanta guṇataḥ pūrṇaḥ viṣṇuḥ na ca anyathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe viṣṇoravatāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe viṣṇoravatāranirūpaṇam nāma pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 16
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: mahālakṣmyāḥ svarūpaṃ ca avatārānkhageśvara /
analyzed: mahālakṣmyāḥ svarūpam ca avatārān khageśvara

original: śṛṇu samyaṅ mahābhāga tajjñānasya vinirṇayam // GarP_3,16.1 //
analyzed: śṛṇu samyak mahābhāga tad jñānasya vinirṇayam

original: īśādanyasya jagato hyātmo locana eva tu /
analyzed: īśāt anyasya jagataḥ hi ātmaḥ locanaḥ eva tu

original: viṣayīkurute tatsyājjñānaṃ lakṣmyāḥ prakīrtitam // GarP_3,16.2 //
analyzed: viṣayīkurute tat syāt jñānam lakṣmyāḥ prakīrtitam

original: nityāviyoginī devī haripādaikasaṃśrayā /
nityamuktā nityabuddhā mahālakṣmīḥ prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.3 //
analyzed: nitya muktā nitya buddhā mahā lakṣmīḥ prakīrtitā

original: mūlasya ca harerbhāryā lakṣmīḥ saṃprakīrtitā /
analyzed: mūlasya ca hareḥ bhāryā lakṣmīḥ saṃprakīrtitā

original: puṃso hibhāryā prakṛtiḥ prakṛteścā bhimāninī // GarP_3,16.4 //
analyzed: puṃsaḥ hi bhāryā prakṛtiḥ prakṛteḥ ca abhimāninī

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ guṇānvīndra puruṣeṇa saha prabho /
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kartum guṇān vīndra puruṣeṇa saha prabho

original: tamaḥ pānaṃ tathā kartuṃ prakṛtyākhyā tadābhavat // GarP_3,16.5 //
analyzed: tamaḥ pānam tathā kartum prakṛti ākhyā tadā bhavat

original: vāsudevasya bhāryā tu māyā nāmnī prakīrtitā /
analyzed: vāsudevasya bhāryā tu māyā nāmnī prakīrtitā

original: saṃkarṣaṇasya bhāryā tu jayeti parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.6 //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇasya bhāryā tu jayā iti parikīrtitā

original: aniruddhasya bhāryā tu śāntā nāmnīti kīrtitā /
analyzed: aniruddhasya bhāryā tu śāntā nāmnī iti kīrtitā

original: kṛtiḥ pradyumnabhāryāpiṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ babhūvaha // GarP_3,16.7 //
analyzed: kṛtiḥ pradyumna bhāryā āpim sṛṣṭim kartum babhūvaha

original: viṣṇupatnī kīrtitā ca śrīdevī sattvamāninī /
analyzed: viṣṇu patnī kīrtitā ca śrī devī sattva māninī

original: tamobhimāninī durgā kanyaketi prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.8 //
analyzed: tamaḥ abhimāninī durgā kanyakā iti prakīrtitā

original: kṛṣṇāvatāre kanyeva nandaputrānujā hi sā /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa avatāre kanyā iva nanda putra anujā hi sā

original: rajobhimānibhūdevī bhāryā sā sūkarasya ca // GarP_3,16.9 //
analyzed: rajobhimāni bhūdevī bhāryā sā sūkarasya ca

original: vedābhimāninī vīndra annapūrṇā prakīrtitā /
analyzed: veda abhimāninī vīndra anna pūrṇā prakīrtitā

original: nārāyaṇasya bhāryā tu lakṣmīrūpā tvajā smṛtā // GarP_3,16.10 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇasya bhāryā tu lakṣmī rūpā tu ajā smṛtā

original: yajñākhyasya harerbhāryā dakṣiṇā saṃprakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.11 //
analyzed: yajña ākhyasya hareḥ bhāryā dakṣiṇā saṃprakīrtitā

original: jayantī vṛṣabhasyaiva patnī saṃparikīrtitā /
analyzed: jayantī vṛṣabhasya eva patnī saṃparikīrtitā

original: videhaputrī sītā tu rāmabhāryā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.12 //
analyzed: videha putrī sītā tu rāma bhāryā prakīrtitā

original: rukmiṇīsatyabhāmā ca bhārye kṛṣṇasya kīrtite /
analyzed: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca bhārye kṛṣṇasya kīrtite

original: ityādikā hyanantāścāpyāvatārāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ // GarP_3,16.13 //
analyzed: ityādikāḥ hi anantāḥ ca api āvatārāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: ramāyāḥ saṃti viprendra bhedahīnāḥ parasparam /
analyzed: ramāyāḥ saṃti vipra indra bheda hīnāḥ parasparam

original: anantānantaguṇakādviṣṇornyūnāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,16.14 //
analyzed: ananta ananta guṇakāt viṣṇoḥ nyūnāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: atha brahmā ca vāyuśca śriyaḥ koṭiguṇādhamau /
analyzed: atha brahmā ca vāyuḥ ca śriyaḥ koṭi guṇa adhamau

original: vakṣye ca brahmaṇo rūpaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama // GarP_3,16.15 //
analyzed: vakṣye ca brahmaṇaḥ rūpam śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: vāsudevātsamutpanno māyāyāṃ ca khageśvara /
analyzed: vāsudevāt samutpannaḥ māyāyām ca khageśvara

original: sa eva puruṣonāma viriñca iti kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.16 //
analyzed: saḥ eva puruṣaḥ nāma viriñcaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ

original: aniruddhāttu śāntāyāṃ mahattattvatanustvabhūt /
analyzed: aniruddhāt tu śāntāyām mahat tattva tanuḥ tu abhūt

original: tadā mahānviriñceti saṃjñāmāpa khageśvara // GarP_3,16.17 //
analyzed: tadā mahān viriñca iti saṃjñām āpa khageśvara

original: rajasātra samutpanno māyāyāṃ vāsudevataḥ /
analyzed: rajasā atra samutpannaḥ māyāyām vāsudevataḥ

original: vidhisaṃjño viriñcaḥ sa jñātavyaḥ pakṣisattama // GarP_3,16.18 //
analyzed: vidhi saṃjñaḥ viriñcaḥ sa jñātavyaḥ pakṣi sattama

original: brahmāṇḍāntaḥ padmanābho yo jātaḥ kamalāsanaḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa antar padmanābhaḥ yaḥ jātaḥ kamalāsanaḥ

original: sa cartumukhasaṃjñāṃ cāpyavāpa khagasattama // GarP_3,16.19 //
analyzed: sa cartumukha saṃjñām ca api avāpa khaga sattama

original: evaṃ catvārirūpāṇi brahmaṇaḥ kīrtitāni ca /
analyzed: evam catvāri rūpāṇi brahmaṇaḥ kīrtitāni ca

original: vāyornāmāni vakṣyehaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama // GarP_3,16.20 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ nāmāni vakṣye iham śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: saṃkarṣaṇācca garuḍa jayāyāṃ yo vabhūva ha /
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇāt ca garuḍa jayāyām yaḥ vabhūva ha

original: sa vāyuḥ prathamo jñeyo pradhāna iti kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.21 //
analyzed: sa vāyuḥ prathamaḥ pradhānaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ

original: lokaceṣṭāpradatvātsa sūtranāmnāpi kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: loka ceṣṭā prada tvāt sa sūtra nāmnā api kīrtitaḥ

original: badarīsthasya viṣṇośca dhairyeṇa stavanāya saḥ // GarP_3,16.22 //
analyzed: badarī sthasya viṣṇoḥ ca dhairyeṇa stavanāya saḥ

original: dhṛtirūpaṃ yayau vāyustasmāddhṛtiriti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛti rūpam yayau vāyuḥ tasmāt dhṛtiḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: yogyānāṃ haribhaktānāṃ dhṛtirūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_3,16.23 //
analyzed: yogyānām hari bhaktānām dhṛti rūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ

original: yato hṛdi sthito vāyustato vai dhṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /
analyzed: yatas hṛdi sthitaḥ vāyuḥ tatas vai dhṛti saṃjñakaḥ

original: sarveṣāṃ ca dṛdi sthitvā smarate sarvadā harim // GarP_3,16.24 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca dṛdi sthitvā smarate sarvadā harim

original: ato vāyuḥsthitirnāma babhūva khagasattama /
analyzed: atas vāyuḥsthitiḥ nāma babhūva khaga sattama

original: athavā vāyurevaikaḥ śvetadvīpagataṃ harim // GarP_3,16.25 //
analyzed: athavā vāyuḥ eva ekaḥ śvetadvīpa gatam harim

original: sadā smarati vai vīndra atosau smṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /
analyzed: sadā smarati vai vi indra atas asau smṛti saṃjñakaḥ

original: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdisthitvā jñāto viṣṇorudīraṇāt // GarP_3,16.26 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca hṛdi sthitvā jñātaḥ viṣṇoḥ udīraṇāt

original: ato me muktināmābhūdvāyureva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: atas me mukti nāmā abhūt vāyuḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: jñānadvāreṇa bhaktānāṃ muktido madanujñayā // GarP_3,16.27 //
analyzed: jñāna dvāreṇa bhaktānām mukti daḥ mad anujñayā

original: yato sau vāyurevaiko muktināmā bhūvaha /
analyzed: yatas sau vāyuḥ eva ekaḥ mukti nāmā bhūvaha

original: viṣṇau bhaktiṃ vardhyati bhaktānāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_3,16.28 //
analyzed: viṣṇau bhaktim vardhyati bhaktānām hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ

original: atosau viṣṇubhaktaśca kīrtito nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: atas asau viṣṇu bhaktaḥ ca kīrtitaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: eṣosau sarvajīvānāṃ cittasaṃjñānameva ca // GarP_3,16.29 //
analyzed: eṣā usau sarva jīvānām citta saṃjñānam eva ca

original: cittarūpo yato vāyurataścittamiti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: citta rūpaḥ yatas vāyuḥ atas cittam iti smṛtaḥ

original: prabhuḥ prabhūṇāṃ garuḍa sodarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,16.30 //
analyzed: prabhuḥ prabhūṇām garuḍa sodarāṇām ca sarvaśas

original: atastu vāyurevaiko mahāprabhuriti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: atas tu vāyuḥ eva ekaḥ mahā prabhuḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛhi sthitvā balaṃ paśyati sattama // GarP_3,16.31 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca hṛhi sthitvā balam paśyati sattama

original: ato balamiti hyākhyāmavāpa vinatāsuta /
analyzed: atas balam iti hi ākhyām avāpa vinatā suta

original: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdi sthitvā putrapautrādikairjanaiḥ // GarP_3,16.32 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca hṛdi sthitvā putra pautra ādikaiḥ janaiḥ

original: yājanaṃ kurute nityamatosau yaṣṭṛsaṃjñakaḥ /
analyzed: yājanam kurute nityam atas asau yaṣṭṛ saṃjñakaḥ

original: anantakalpamārabhya vāyuparyantameva ca // GarP_3,16.33 //
analyzed: ananta kalpam ārabhya vāyu paryantam eva ca

original: vakratvaṃ nāsti yogasya ṛjuryogya iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vakra tvam na asti yogasya ṛjuḥ yogyaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: yogasya vakratā nāma kāmyatā haripūjane /
analyzed: yogasya vakra tā nāma kāmya tā hari pūjane

original: īśarudrādikānāṃ ca kāmyena haripūjanam // GarP_3,16.34 //
analyzed: īśa rudra ādikānām ca kāmyena hari pūjanam

original: kasyacittvatha pakṣīndra hyatastvanṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,16.35 //
analyzed: kasyacid tu atha pakṣi indra hi atas tu anṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ṛṣyādīnāṃ ca madhyepi kāmyena haripūjanam /
analyzed: ṛṣi ādīnām ca madhye api kāmyena hari pūjanam

original: ato na ṛjavo jñeyā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kā kathā // GarP_3,16.36 //
analyzed: atas na ṛjavaḥ jñeyāḥ manuṣyāṇām ca kā kathā

original: yāvatkāmyasaparyāṃ vai na jahāti narottamaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat kāmya saparyām vai na jahāti narottamaḥ

original: tathā ṛṣyādayaścaiva mokṣasya paripanthinīm // GarP_3,16.37 //
analyzed: tathā ṛṣi ādayaḥ ca eva mokṣasya paripanthinīm

original: anādikālamārabhya karmajanyā ca vāsanā /
analyzed: anādi kālam ārabhya karma janyā ca vāsanā

original: mokṣādhikāriṇaḥ sarve kurvate kasya pūjanam // GarP_3,16.38 //
analyzed: mokṣa adhikāriṇaḥ sarve kurvate kasya pūjanam

original: naṣṭaprāyaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ guroḥ saṃjñānabodhakāt /
analyzed: naṣṭa prāyam ca tat sarvam guroḥ saṃjñāna bodhakāt

original: prāpyayogaṃ samācarya ante mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_3,16.39 //
analyzed: prāpya yogam samācarya ante mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: kāmyena pūjanaṃ viṣṇoraiśvaryaṃ pradadāti ca /
analyzed: kāmyena pūjanam viṣṇoḥ aiśvaryam pradadāti ca

original: jñānaṃ ca viparītaṃ syāttena yātyadharaṃ tamaḥ // GarP_3,16.40 //
analyzed: jñānam ca viparītam syāt tena yāti adharam tamaḥ

original: tadeva viparītaṃ cejjñānāya parikīrtitam /
analyzed: tat eva viparītam ced jñānāya parikīrtitam

original: śilāyāṃ viṣṇubuddhistu viṣṇubuddhirdvije tathā // GarP_3,16.41 //
analyzed: śilāyām viṣṇu buddhiḥ tu viṣṇu buddhiḥ dvije tathā

original: salile tīrthabuddhistu roṇukāyāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: salile tīrtha buddhiḥ tu roṇukāyām tathā eva ca

original: śive sūrye paṇmukhe ca viṣṇubuddhiḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,16.42 //
analyzed: śive sūrye paṇmukhe ca viṣṇu buddhiḥ khageśvara

original: ityādyamakhilaṃ jñānaṃ viparītamiti smṛtam /
analyzed: iti ādyam akhilam jñānam viparītam iti smṛtam

original: śilādyeṣu ca sarveṣu aikyenava vicintanam // GarP_3,16.43 //
analyzed: śilā ādyeṣu ca sarveṣu vicintanam

original: viṣṇubuddhiriti proktaṃ na tu tatrasthavedanam /
analyzed: viṣṇu buddhiḥ iti proktam na tu tatrastha vedanam

original: anādyanantakālepi kāmyena haripūjanam // GarP_3,16.44 //
yato nāsti tato vāyurṛjuryogyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: yatas nā asti tatas vāyuḥ ṛjuḥ yogyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: anyeṣāṃ sarvadā nāsti ato na ṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,16.45 //
analyzed: anyeṣām sarvadā na asti atas na ṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: hariṃ darśayate vāpi aparokṣeṇa sarvadā /
analyzed: harim darśayate vā api aparokṣeṇa sarvadā

original: mokṣādhikāriṇāṃ kāle ataḥ prajñeti kathyate // GarP_3,16.46 //
analyzed: mokṣa adhikāriṇām kāle atas prajñā iti kathyate

original: parokṣeṇāpi sarveṣāṃ hariṃ darśayate sadā /
analyzed: parokṣeṇa api sarveṣām harim darśayate sadā

original: ato vāyuḥ sadā vīndra jñānamityeva kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.47 //
analyzed: atas vāyuḥ sadā vi indra jñānam iti eva kīrtitaḥ

original: hitāhitopadeṣṭṛtvādbhaktānāṃ hṛdaye sthitaḥ /
analyzed: hita ahita upadeṣṭṛ tvāt bhaktānām hṛdaye sthitaḥ

original: tataśca gurusaṃjñāṃ cāpyavāpa sa ca mārutaḥ // GarP_3,16.48 //
analyzed: tatas ca guru saṃjñām ca api avāpa sa ca mārutaḥ

original: yogināṃ hṛdaye sthitvā sadhyāyati hariṃ param /
analyzed: yoginām hṛdaye sthitvā sa dhyāyati harim param

original: pārthakyenāpi taṃ dhyāyanmahādhyāteti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.49 //
analyzed: pārthakyena api tam dhyāyan mahādhyātā iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: yadyogyatānusāreṇa vijānāti paraṃ harim /
analyzed: yad yogyatā anusāreṇa vijānāti param harim

original: rudrādau vidyamānāṃśca guṇāñjānāti sarvadā // GarP_3,16.50 //
analyzed: rudra ādau vidyamānān ca guṇān jānāti sarvadā

original: ato vai vijñanāmāsau prokto hi khagasattama /
analyzed: atas vai vijña nāmā asau proktaḥ hi khaga sattama

original: kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tyāgādvirāga iti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.51 //
analyzed: kāmyānām karmaṇām tyāgāt virāgaḥ iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: athavāyogināṃ nityaṃ hṛdi sthitvā sa mārutaḥ /
analyzed: athavā ayoginām nityam hṛdi sthitvā sa mārutaḥ

original: vairāgyaṃ saṃjanayati virāga iti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.52 //
analyzed: vairāgyam saṃjanayati virāgaḥ iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: devānāṃ puṇyapāpābhyāṃ sukhamevottarottaram /
analyzed: devānām puṇya pāpābhyām sukham eva uttarottaram

original: tatsukhaṃ tūttareṣāṃ ca vāyuparyantameva ca // GarP_3,16.53 //
analyzed: tat sukham tu uttareṣām ca vāyu paryantam eva ca

original: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca uttamānāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā /
analyzed: devānām ca ṛṣīṇām ca uttamānām nṛṇām tathā

original: sukhāṃśaṃ janayedvāyuryatotaḥ sukhasaṃjñakaḥ // GarP_3,16.54 //
analyzed: sukha aṃśam janayet vāyuḥ yatas utas sukha saṃjñakaḥ

original: bhunakti sarvadā vīdraṃ tatra mukhyastu mārutaḥ /
analyzed: bhunakti sarvadā vīdram tatra mukhyaḥ tu mārutaḥ

original: duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiñciddevānāṃ bhavati prabho // GarP_3,16.55 //
analyzed: duḥ kha śoka ādikam kiñcid devānām bhavati prabho

original: taccāsurāveśavaśādityavehi na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca asura āveśa vaśāt iti avehi na saṃśayaḥ

original: tajjīvasya bhavetkiñciddaityānāṃ kramaśo bhavet // GarP_3,16.56 //
analyzed: tat jīvasya bhavet kiñcid daityānām kramaśas bhavet

original: yataḥ kaliścādhikaḥ syādato duḥ khīti sa smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yatas kaliḥ ca adhikaḥ syāt atas duḥ khī iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: daityānāṃ puṇyapāpābhyāṃ duḥ kha mevottarottaram // GarP_3,16.57 //
analyzed: daityānām puṇya pāpābhyām duḥkham eva uttarottaram

original: tadduḥ khamuttareṣāṃ ca kaliparyantameva ca /
analyzed: tat duḥ kham uttareṣām ca kali paryantam eva ca

original: bhunakti sarvadā vīndra tataḥ kaliriti smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.58 //
analyzed: bhunakti sarvadā vi indra tatas kaliḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: sukhaharṣādikaṃ kiṃ ciddaityānāṃ bhavati prabho /
analyzed: sukha harṣa ādikam kim cit daityānām bhavati prabho

original: devāveśo bhavettasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.59 //
analyzed: deva āveśaḥ bhavet tasya na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: devānāṃ nirayo nāsti daityānāṃ vinatāsuta /
analyzed: devānām nirayaḥ nā asti daityānām vinatā suta

original: sukhasvarūpaṃ tannāsti viṣayotthamapi dvija // GarP_3,16.60 //
analyzed: sukha sva rūpam tat nā asti viṣaya uttham api dvija

original: viṣayotthaṃ kiñcidapi devāveśādudīritam /
analyzed: viṣaya uttham kiñcid api deva āveśāt udīritam

original: tamo nāstyeva devānāṃ duḥ khaṃ nāsti svarūpataḥ // GarP_3,16.61 //
analyzed: tamaḥ na asti eva devānām duḥ kham nā asti svarūpataḥ

original: viṣayotthaṃ mahāduḥ khaṃ devānāṃ nāsti sarvadā /
analyzed: viṣaya uttham mahā duḥ kham devānām nā asti sarvadā

original: duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiṃ cidasurāveśato bhavet // GarP_3,16.62 //
analyzed: duḥ kha śoka ādikam kim cit asura āveśataḥ bhavet

original: ataḥ kaliḥ sadā duḥ khī sukhī vāyustu sarvadā /
analyzed: atas kaliḥ sadā duḥ khī sukhī vāyuḥ tu sarvadā

original: manuṣyāṇā mṛṣīṇāṃ ca sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,16.63 //
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām mṛṣīṇām ca sukham duḥ kham khageśvara

original: bhavettatpuṇyipāpābhyāṃ puṇyabhogī ca mārutaḥ /
analyzed: bhavet tat puṇyi pāpābhyām puṇya bhogī ca mārutaḥ

original: kaṣṭabhaṅgaḥ kalilayo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.64 //
analyzed: kaṣṭa bhaṅgaḥ kali layaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: prāṇādisukhaparyantā aṃśā ekonaviṃśatiḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa ādi sukha paryantāḥ aṃśāḥ ekonaviṃśatiḥ

original: praviṣṭāḥ saṃti lokeṣu pṛthaksaṃti khageśvara // GarP_3,16.65 //
analyzed: praviṣṭāḥ saṃti lokeṣu pṛthak saṃti khageśvara

original: mārutarevatārāṃśca śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama /
analyzed: māruta revat tārān ca śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: caturdaśasu candreṣu dvitīyauyo virocanaḥ // GarP_3,16.66 //
analyzed: caturdaśasu candreṣu dvitīyauyaḥ virocanaḥ

original: sa vāyuriti saṃprokta indrādīnāṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: sa vāyuḥ iti saṃproktaḥ indra ādīnām khageśvara

original: haritattveṣu sarveṣu sa viṣvagyāvyatekṣaṇaḥ // GarP_3,16.67 //
analyzed: hari tattveṣu sarveṣu sa

original: ato rocananāmāsau marudaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ rāmāvatāre hanumānrāmakāryārthasādhakaḥ /
analyzed: atas rocana nāmā asau marut aṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ rāma avatāre hanumān rāma kārya artha sādhakaḥ

original: sa eva bhīmasenastu jāto bhūmyāṃ mahābalaḥ // GarP_3,16.68 //
analyzed: saḥ eva bhīmasenaḥ tu jātaḥ bhūmyām mahā balaḥ

original: kṛṣṇāvatāre vijñeyo marudaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.69 //
maṇimānnāma daityastu saṃrākhyo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: maṇimān nāma daityaḥ tu saṃra ākhyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sarveṣāṃ saṃkaraṃ yastu kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,16.70 //
analyzed: sarveṣām saṃkaram yaḥ tu kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: tena saṃkaranāmāsau bhaviṣyati khageśvara /
analyzed: tena saṃkara nāmā asau bhaviṣyati khageśvara

original: dharmānbhāgavatānsarvānvināśayati sarvathā // GarP_3,16.71 //
analyzed: dharmān bhāgavatān sarvān vināśayati sarvathā

original: tadā bhūmau vāsudevo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tadā bhūmau vāsudevaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: yajñārthaiḥ sadṛśo yasya nāsti loke caturdaśe // GarP_3,16.72 //
analyzed: yajña arthaiḥ sadṛśaḥ yasya na asti loke caturdaśe

original: ataḥ sa prajñayā pūrṇo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: atas sa prajñayā pūrṇaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: avatārāstrayo vāyormataṃ bhāgavatābhidham // GarP_3,16.73 //
analyzed: avatārāḥ trayaḥ vāyoḥ matam bhāgavata abhidham

original: sthāpanaṃ duṣṭadamanaṃ dvayameva prayojanam /
analyzed: sthāpanam duṣṭa damanam dvayam eva prayojanam

original: nānyatprayojanaṃ vāyostathā vairocanātmake // GarP_3,16.74 //
analyzed: na anyat prayojanam vāyoḥ tathā vairocana ātmake

original: avatāratraye vīndra duḥ khaṃ garbhādisaṃbhavam /
analyzed: avatāra traye vi indra duḥ kham garbha ādi saṃbhavam

original: nāsti nāstyeva vāyostu tathā vairocanādike // GarP_3,16.75 //
analyzed: na asti na asti eva vāyoḥ tu tathā vairocana ādike

original: śukraśoṇitasaṃbandho hyavatāracatuṣṭaye /
analyzed: śukra śoṇita saṃbandhaḥ hi avatāra catuṣṭaye

original: nāsti nāstyeva pakṣīndra yato nāstyaśubhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_3,16.76 //
analyzed: na asti na asti eva pakṣi indra yatas na asti aśubham tatas

original: pūrvaṃ garbhaṃ samāśoṣya samaye prabhavasya ca /
analyzed: pūrvam garbham samāśoṣya samaye prabhavasya ca

original: prādurbhavati deveśī hyavatāracatuṣṭaye // GarP_3,16.77 //
analyzed: prādurbhavati deveśī hi avatāra catuṣṭaye

original: trayoviṃśatirūpāṇāṃ vāyoścaiva khageśvara /
analyzed: trayoviṃśati rūpāṇām vāyoḥ ca eva khageśvara

original: rūpairṛjusvarūpaiśca brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ // GarP_3,16.78 //
analyzed: rūpaiḥ ṛju svarūpaiḥ ca brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: satyameva na saṃdeho nityānandasukhādiṣu /
analyzed: satyam eva na saṃdehaḥ nitya ānanda sukha ādiṣu

original: evameva vijānīyānnānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,16.79 //
analyzed: evam eva vijānīyāt na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: etasya śravaṇādeva mokṣaṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: etasya śravaṇāt eva mokṣam yānti na saṃśayaḥ

original: tadanantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama // GarP_3,16.80 //
analyzed: tad anantara jān vakṣye śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: kṛtau pradyumnataścaiva samutpanne khageśvara /
analyzed: kṛtau pradyumnataḥ ca eva samutpanne khageśvara

original: striyau dve yamale caiva tayormadhye tu yadyikā // GarP_3,16.81 //
analyzed: striyau dve yamale ca eva tayoḥ madhye tu yadyikā

original: vāṇītisaṃjñakāṃ vīndra brahmāṇīsaṃjñakāṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: vāṇī iti saṃjñakām vīndra brahmāṇī saṃjñakām viduḥ

original: puruṣākhyaviriñcasya bhāryā sāvitrikā matā /
analyzed: puruṣa ākhya viriñcasya bhāryā sāvitrikā matā

original: caturmukhasya bhāryā tu kīrtitā sā sarasvatī // GarP_3,16.82 //
analyzed: caturmukhasya bhāryā tu kīrtitā sā sarasvatī

original: evaṃ trirūpaṃ vijñeyaṃ vāṇyāśca khagasattama /
analyzed: evam tri rūpam vijñeyam vāṇyāḥ ca khaga sattama

original: vakṣye 'vatārān bhāratyāḥ samāhitamanāḥ śṛṇu // GarP_3,16.83 //
analyzed: vakṣye vatārān bhāratyāḥ samāhita manāḥ śṛṇu

original: sarvavedābhimānitvātsarvavedātmikā smṛtā /
analyzed: sarva veda abhimāni tvāt sarva veda ātmikā smṛtā

original: mahādhyātuśca vāyostu bhāryāsā parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.84 //
analyzed: mahādhyātuḥ ca vāyoḥ tu bhāryā asā parikīrtitā

original: jñānarūpasya vāyostu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā /
analyzed: jñāna rūpasya vāyoḥ tu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā

original: sadā sukhasvarūpatvādbhāratī tu sukhātmikā // GarP_3,16.85 //
analyzed: sadā sukha sva rūpa tvāt bhāratī tu sukha ātmikā

original: sukhasvarūpa vāyostu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā /
analyzed: vāyoḥ tu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā

original: gurustu vāyurevoktastasmin bhaktiyutā satī // GarP_3,16.86 //
analyzed: guruḥ tu vāyuḥ eva uktaḥ tasmin bhakti yutā satī

original: tatastu bhāratī nityā gurubhaktiriti smṛtā /
analyzed: tatas tu bhāratī nityā guru bhaktiḥ iti smṛtā

original: mahāgurorhi vāyośca bhāryā vai parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.87 //
analyzed: mahā guroḥ hi vāyoḥ ca bhāryā vai parikīrtitā

original: harau snehayutatvācca hariprītiriti smṛtā /
analyzed: harau sneha yuta tvāt ca hariprītiḥ iti smṛtā

original: dhṛtirūpasya vāyośca bhāryā sā parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.88 //
analyzed: dhṛti rūpasya vāyoḥ ca bhāryā sā parikīrtitā

original: sarvamantrābhimānitvātsarvamantrātmikā smṛtā /
analyzed: sarva mantra abhimāni tvāt sarva mantra ātmikā smṛtā

original: mahāprabhośca vāyośca bhāryā vai sā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.89 //
analyzed: mahā prabhoḥ ca vāyoḥ ca bhāryā vai sā prakīrtitā

original: bhujyante sarvabhogāstu viṣṇuprītyarthamevaca /
analyzed: bhujyante sarva bhogāḥ tu viṣṇu prīti artham eva ca

original: atastu bhāratī jñeyā bhujināmnā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.90 //
analyzed: atas tu bhāratī jñeyā bhuji nāmnā prakīrtitā

original: citrarūpasya vāyostu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā /
analyzed: citra rūpasya vāyoḥ tu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā

original: rocanendrasya bhāryā ca śraddhākhyā parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.91 //
analyzed: rocanā indrasya bhāryā ca śraddhā ākhyā parikīrtitā

original: hanumāṃśca tadā jajñe tretāyāṃ pakṣisattama /
analyzed: hanumān ca tadā jajñe tretāyām pakṣi sattama

original: tadā śivākhyaviprācca jajñe sā bhāratī smṛtā // GarP_3,16.92 //
analyzed: tadā śiva ākhya viprāt ca jajñe sā bhāratī smṛtā

original: na kevalaṃ bhāratī sāśacyādyaiścaiva saṃyutā /
analyzed: na kevalam bhāratī sā a śacī ādyaiḥ ca eva saṃyutā

original: tasminsaṃjanitāḥ sarvāḥ prāpuryogaṃ svabhartṛbhiḥ // GarP_3,16.93 //
analyzed: tasmin saṃjanitāḥ sarvāḥ prāpuḥ yogam sva bhartṛbhiḥ

original: anyageti ca vijñeyā kanyā tanmatisaṃjñikā /
analyzed: anyagā iti ca vijñeyā kanyā tad mati saṃjñikā

original: tretānte saiva pakṣīndra śacyādyaiścaiva saṃyutā // GarP_3,16.94 //
analyzed: tretā ante sā eva pakṣi indra śacī ādyaiḥ ca eva saṃyutā

original: damayantyanalājjātā indraseneti cocyate /
analyzed: damayantī analāt jātā indrasenā iti ca ucyate

original: nalaṃ nandayate yasmāttasmācca nalanandinī // GarP_3,16.95 //
analyzed: nalam nandayate yasmāt tasmāt ca nalanandinī

original: tatra svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ naiva cāpa khageśvara /
analyzed: tatra sva bhartṛ saṃyogam nā eva cāpa khageśvara

original: tatrānyagātvaṃ vijñeyaṃ puruṣasthena vāyunā // GarP_3,16.96 //
analyzed: tatra anya gā tvam vijñeyam puruṣa sthena vāyunā

original: kiñcitkālaṃ tathā sthitvā kanyaiva mṛti māpa sā /
analyzed: kiñcid kālam tathā sthitvā kanyā eva mṛti māpa sā

original: śacyādisaṃyutā saiva drupadasya mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,16.97 //
analyzed: śacī ādi saṃyutā sā eva drupadasya mahātmanaḥ

original: vedimadhyātsamudbhūtā bhīmasenārthameva ca /
analyzed: vedi madhyāt samudbhūtā bhīmasena artham eva ca

original: tatrānyagātvaṃ nāstyeva yogaśca saha bhartṛbhiḥ // GarP_3,16.98 //
analyzed: tatra anya gā tvam nā asti eva yogaḥ ca saha bhartṛbhiḥ

original: kevalā bhāratī jñeyā kāśirājasya kanyakā /
analyzed: kevalā bhāratī jñeyā kāśi rājasya kanyakā

original: kālī nāmnā tu sā jñeyā bhīmasenapriyā sadā // GarP_3,16.99 //
analyzed: kālī nāmnā tu sā jñeyā bhīmasena priyā sadā

original: vācyādibhiḥ saṃyutaivadraupadī drupadātmajā /
analyzed: vācya ādibhiḥ saṃyutā eva draupadī drupada ātmajā

original: dehaṃ tyaktvāviśiṣṭaiva kāraṭīgrāmasaṃjñakai // GarP_3,16.100 //
analyzed: deham tyaktvā a viśiṣṭā eva kāraṭīgrāma saṃjñakaiḥ

original: saṃkarasya gṛhe vīndra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge /
analyzed: saṃkarasya gṛhe vīndra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge

original: vāyostṛtīyarūpārthaṃ sā kanyaiva mṛtiṃ gatā // GarP_3,16.101 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ tṛtīya rūpa artham sā kanyā eva mṛtim gatā

original: ityādyā vāyubhāryāśca brahmabhāryāśca satama /
analyzed: ityādyāḥ vāyu bhāryāḥ ca brahma bhāryāḥ ca satama

original: svabhartṛbhyāṃ ca pakṣīndra guṇaiścaiva śatādhamāḥ // GarP_3,16.102 //
analyzed: sva bhartṛbhyām ca pakṣi indra guṇaiḥ ca eva śata adhamāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe mahālakṣmyavatārādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe mahālakṣmyavatārādinirūpaṇam nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 17
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: caturjanmasu vai kṛṣṇa śacyādyaiḥ saha bhāratī /
analyzed: catur janmasu vai kṛṣṇa śacī ādyaiḥ saha bhāratī

original: ekadeha viśiṣṭaiva bhuvi jāteti coktavān // GarP_3,17.1 //
analyzed: eka deha viśiṣṭā eva bhuvi jātā iti ca uktavān

original: kāraṇaṃ brūhi me brahman śiṣyāya tava suvrata /
analyzed: kāraṇam brūhi me brahman śiṣyāya tava suvrata

original: garuḍenaivamuktastamuvāca madhusūdanaḥ // GarP_3,17.2 //
analyzed: garuḍena evam uktaḥ tam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: viśiṣṭadehasaṃ prāptau bhāratyāḥ pakṣisattama /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa dehasam prāptau bhāratyāḥ pakṣi sattama

original: vakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ vīndra sāvadhānamanāḥ śṛṇu // GarP_3,17.3 //
analyzed: vakṣyāmi kāraṇam vi indra sa avadhāna manāḥ śṛṇu

original: purā kṛtayuge vīndra rudrabhāryā ca pārvatī /
analyzed: purā kṛta yuge vīndra rudra bhāryā ca pārvatī

original: indrabhāryā śacī devī yama bhāryāca śāmalā // GarP_3,17.4 //
analyzed: indra bhāryā śacī devī yama bhāryā ca śāmalā

original: aśvibhāryā uṣā devī bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā khaga /
analyzed: aśvi bhāryā uṣāḥ devī bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā khaga

original: brahmalokaṃ yayustatra brahmāṇaṃ dadṛśustadā // GarP_3,17.5 //
analyzed: brahma lokam yayuḥ tatra brahmāṇam dadṛśuḥ tadā

original: hāvaṃ bhāvaṃ vilāsaṃ ca darśayāmāsurañjasā /
analyzed: hāvam bhāvam vilāsam ca darśayāmāsuḥ añjasā

original: dṛṣṭvā tā uddhatā brahmā śaśāpa khagasattama // GarP_3,17.6 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tāḥ uddhatāḥ brahmā śaśāpa khaga sattama

original: uddhatāśca yato yūyaṃ mānuṣīṃ yonimāpsyatha /
analyzed: uddhatāḥ ca yatas yūyam mānuṣīm yonim āpsyatha

original: tatra svabhartṛsaṃyogamavāpsyatha khageśvara // GarP_3,17.7 //
analyzed: tatra sva bhartṛ saṃyogam avāpsyatha khageśvara

original: evaṃ śaptāstu tāḥ sarvā ājagmurmeruparvatam /
analyzed: evam śaptāḥ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ ājagmuḥ meru parvatam

original: tatropaviṣṭaṃ brahmāṇaṃ vañcayāmāsurañjasā // GarP_3,17.8 //
analyzed: tatra upaviṣṭam brahmāṇam vañcayāmāsuḥ añjasā

original: tūṣṇīmeva sthite vīndra vañcayantyaḥ sthitāḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: tūṣṇīm eva sthite vi indra vañcayantyaḥ sthitāḥ punar

original: tatastūṣṇīṃ sthitaṃ vīndra vañcayāmāsurañjasā // GarP_3,17.9 //
analyzed: tatas tūṣṇīm sthitam vīndra vañcayāmāsuḥ añjasā

original: trivārānantaraṃ brahmā śaptavāṃstā mahāprabhuḥ /
analyzed: tri vāra anantaram brahmā śaptavān tāḥ mahā prabhuḥ

original: trivāraṃ vañcanaṃ yasmādekavāraṃ ca darśanam // GarP_3,17.10 //
analyzed: tri vāram vañcanam yasmāt eka vāram ca darśanam

original: kiṃ cāśrutvātaḥ paścāccaturjanmasu bhūtale /
analyzed: kim ca a śrutvā atas paścāt catur janmasu bhū tale

original: ekadehānmānuṣatvaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,17.11 //
analyzed: eka dehāt mānuṣa tvam bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: dvitīye janmani tathā anyagātvamavāpsyatha /
analyzed: dvitīye janmani tathā anya gā tvam avāpsyatha

original: tṛtīye janmani tathā bhartṛsaṃyoga māpsyatha // GarP_3,17.12 //
analyzed: tṛtīye janmani tathā bhartṛ saṃyoga māpsyatha

original: janmanyādye caturthe ca nānyagātvamavāpsyatha /
analyzed: janmani ādye caturthe ca nā anya gā tvam avāpsyatha

original: tathā svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ nāvāpsyatha ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,17.13 //
analyzed: tathā sva bhartṛ saṃyogam nā avāpsyatha ca sarvaśas

original: evaṃ śaptāstu tāḥ sarvā brahmaṇā pakṣisattama /
analyzed: evam śaptāḥ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ brahmaṇā pakṣi sattama

original: tadā vicārayāmāsurmilitvā merumūrdhani // GarP_3,17.14 //
analyzed: tadā vicārayāmāsuḥ militvā meru mūrdhani

original: brahmaśāpastvanirvāya upāyaiḥ śataśopi ca /
analyzed: brahma śāpaḥ tu anirvāyaḥ upāyaiḥ śataśas upi ca

original: nīcaiḥ samāgamo nindyastathaiva ca vipattidaḥ // GarP_3,17.15 //
analyzed: nīcaiḥ samāgamaḥ nindyaḥ tathā eva ca vipatti daḥ

original: uttamena ca saṃgena daivenāpyarthado bhavet /
analyzed: uttamena ca saṃgena daivena api artha daḥ bhavet

original: devānāmuttamo vāyustadarthaṃ saṃgamācaret // GarP_3,17.16 //
analyzed: devānām uttamaḥ vāyuḥ tad artham saṃgam ācaret

original: vicāryaivamumādyā bhāratyāḥ sevāṃ tu cakrire /
analyzed: vicārya evam umā ādyāḥ bhāratyāḥ sevām tu cakrire

original: sahasravatsarānte sā bhāratī toṣitābravīt // GarP_3,17.17 //
analyzed: sahasra vatsara ante sā bhāratī toṣitā bravīt

original: matsevāṃ ca kimarthaṃ vai hyācariṣyanti suvratāḥ /
analyzed: mad sevām ca kimartham vai hi ācariṣyanti suvratāḥ

original: tasyāṃ raktāśca tā devyastvabruvansvacikīrṣitam // GarP_3,17.18 //
analyzed: tasyām raktāḥ ca tāḥ devyaḥ tu abruvan sva cikīrṣitam

original: purā vayaṃ tu śaptāḥ sma brahmaṇā krodharūpiṇā /
analyzed: purā vayam tu śaptāḥ sma brahmaṇā krodha rūpiṇā

original: ekadehānmānuṣatvamavāpsyatha varāṅganāḥ // GarP_3,17.19 //
analyzed: eka dehāt mānuṣa tvam avāpsyatha vara aṅganāḥ

original: caturthajanmanyapyevaṃ dvitīye janmani prabho /
analyzed: caturtha janmani api evam dvitīye janmani prabho

original: samāpsyathānyagātvaṃ cetyevaṃ śaptā ha bhāmini // GarP_3,17.20 //
analyzed: samāpsyatha anya gā tvam ca iti evam śaptā ha bhāmini

original: asmākaṃ vāyunā devenānyagātvaṃ na doṣabhāk /
analyzed: asmākam vāyunā devena anya gātvam na doṣa bhāj

original: atastvayaikadehatvamicchāmo devi janmasu // GarP_3,17.21 //
analyzed: atas tvayā eka deha tvam icchāmaḥ devi janmasu

original: hatyuktā tābhiratha ca tathaityuktvā dvijottama /
analyzed: hatī uktā tābhiḥ atha ca tathā eti uktvā dvijottama

original: sā pārvatyādibhiryuktā bhāratītyabhavadbhuvi // GarP_3,17.22 //
analyzed: sā pārvatī ādibhiḥ yuktā bhāratī iti abhavat bhuvi

original: śivanāmno dvijasyaiva gṛhe sā tu kumārikā /
analyzed: śiva nāmnaḥ dvijasya eva gṛhe sā tu kumārikā

original: karmaikyārthaṃ tapaścakreḥ viṣṇośca śivasaṃjñinaḥ // GarP_3,17.23 //
analyzed: karma aikya artham tapaḥ cakreḥ viṣṇoḥ ca śiva saṃjñinaḥ

original: tapasā toṣitā viṣṇuḥ śiva saṃjño mahāprabhuḥ /
analyzed: tapasā toṣitā viṣṇuḥ śiva saṃjñaḥ mahā prabhuḥ

original: varaṃ prādāttṛtīyesminkṛṣṇajanmani bho striyaḥ // GarP_3,17.24 //
analyzed: varam prādāt tṛtīye ismin kṛṣṇa janmani bho striyaḥ

original: samyaktvabhartṛsaṃyogo bhaviṣyati vinā bhavam /
analyzed: samyaktva bhartṛ saṃyogaḥ bhaviṣyati vinā bhavam

original: yatonayā ca pārvatyā preritā eva sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,17.25 //
analyzed: yatas unayā ca pārvatyā preritāḥ eva sarvaśas

original: vilāsaṃ darśayāmāsa brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: vilāsam darśayāmāsa brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: ataḥ sā pārvātī śreṣṭhā brahmadehe na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,17.26 //
analyzed: atas sā pārvātī śreṣṭhā brahma dehe na saṃśayaḥ

original: kṛṣṇadehepi tasyāstu na bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa dehe pi tasyāḥ tu na bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ

original: anyagātvaṃ dvitīyesminbhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,17.27 //
analyzed: anya gā tvam dvitīye smin bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: rudrāntaḥ stho hariścaiva vahaṃ dattvā striyāṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: rudra antar sthaḥ hariḥ ca eva vaham dattvā striyām prabhuḥ

original: antardhānaṃ yayau śrīmānsvalokaṃ gatavānabhūt // GarP_3,17.28 //
analyzed: antardhānam yayau śrīmān sva lokam gatavān abhūt

original: visṛjya tāśca taṃ dehaṃ babhūvurnalakanyakāḥ /
analyzed: visṛjya tāḥ ca tam deham babhūvuḥ nala kanyakāḥ

original: indraseneti saṃjñāṃ ca labdhvā tāśca tapovanam // GarP_3,17.29 //
analyzed: indrasenā iti saṃjñām ca labdhvā tāḥ ca tapaḥ vanam

original: yayustatra carantyastā dadṛśurmudgalaṃ tvṛṣim /
analyzed: yayuḥ tatra carantyaḥ tāḥ dadṛśuḥ mudgalam tu ṛṣim

original: tasya darśanamātreṇa babhūvuḥ kāmamohitāḥ // GarP_3,17.30 //
analyzed: tasya darśana mātreṇa babhūvuḥ kāma mohitāḥ

original: mudgalasyābhimānaṃ hi nāśayitvā ca mārutaḥ /
analyzed: mudgalasya abhimānam hi nāśayitvā ca mārutaḥ

original: ramayāmāsa tatrasthā bhāratyādivarāṅganāḥ // GarP_3,17.31 //
analyzed: ramayāmāsa tatrasthāḥ bhāratī ādi vara aṅganāḥ

original: taddehena visṛṣṭā sā babhūva draupadīti ca /
analyzed: tad dehena visṛṣṭā sā babhūva draupadī iti ca

original: yasmātsā drupadājjātā tasmātsā draupadī smṛtā // GarP_3,17.32 //
analyzed: yasmāt sā drupadāt jātā tasmāt sā draupadī smṛtā

original: vedimadhyātsamudbhūtā tasmātsāyonijā smṛtā /
analyzed: vedi madhyāt samudbhūtā tasmāt sā ayonijā smṛtā

original: kṛṣṇavarṇā yatastasmātsā kṛṣṇā bhūtale smṛtā // GarP_3,17.33 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa varṇā yatas tasmāt sā kṛṣṇā bhū tale smṛtā

original: kṛṣṇādehapi bhāratyā abhimānaḥ sadā smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bhāratyāḥ abhimānaḥ sadā smṛtaḥ

original: śacyāderabhimānastu tasmindehe kadācana // GarP_3,17.34 //
analyzed: śacī ādeḥ abhimānaḥ tu tasmin dehe kadācana

original: yasyāḥ svabhartṛsaṃyogakāle ca khagasattama /
analyzed: yasyāḥ sva bhartṛ saṃyoga kāle ca khaga sattama

original: abhimānastadaiva syāttasyā eva na cānyathā // GarP_3,17.35 //
analyzed: abhimānaḥ tadā eva syāt tasyāḥ eva na ca anyathā

original: etāsāṃ ramaṇe kāle umāyāḥ pakṣisattama /
analyzed: etāsām ramaṇe kāle umāyāḥ pakṣi sattama

original: abhimānaśca nāstyeva svāpa eva ratāḥ sadā // GarP_3,17.36 //
analyzed: abhimānaḥ ca na asti eva svāpe eva ratāḥ sadā

original: pārthasya ramaṇe kāle draupadyāśca kalevare /
analyzed: pārthasya ramaṇe kāle draupadyāḥ ca kalevare

original: bhāratyāśca tathā śacyā abhimānadvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,17.37 //
analyzed: bhāratyāḥ ca tathā śacyāḥ abhimāna dvayam smṛtam

original: umādeḥ śyāma lādeśca abhimānakṣatistadā /
analyzed: umā ādeḥ lādeḥ ca abhimāna kṣatiḥ tadā

original: sarvāsāṃ svāpa eva syānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,17.38 //
analyzed: sarvāsām svāpaḥ eva syāt na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: arjunaṃ vīrarūpeṇa praviṣṭo vāyureva ca /
analyzed: arjunam vīra rūpeṇa praviṣṭaḥ vāyuḥ eva ca

original: bhāratīṃ ramate nityaṃ śāmalāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // GarP_3,17.39 //
analyzed: bhāratīm ramate nityam śāmalām ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: suṃdareṇa ca rūpeṇa praviṣṭo nakule marut /
analyzed: suṃdareṇa ca rūpeṇa praviṣṭaḥ nakule marut

original: ramate bhāratīṃ nityaṃ nakulaścāpyuṣāṃ khaga // GarP_3,17.40 //
analyzed: ramate bhāratīm nityam nakulaḥ ca api uṣām khaga

original: nītirūpeṇa cāviṣṭo sahadeve ca mārutaḥ /
analyzed: nīti rūpeṇa ca āviṣṭaḥ sahadeve ca mārutaḥ

original: draupadīṃ ramate nityaṃ sahadevotpayuṣāṃ khaga // GarP_3,17.41 //
analyzed: draupadīm ramate nityam khaga

original: śacyādyā draupadīdehe nāpuḥ saṃgaṃ ca mārutaḥ /
analyzed: śacī ādyāḥ draupadī dehe na āpuḥ saṃgam ca mārutaḥ

original: tāsāmatonyagāmitvaṃ kṛṣṇādehe na cintayet // GarP_3,17.42 //
analyzed: tāsām atonya gāmi tvam kṛṣṇā dehe na cintayet

original: dharmādidehasaṃgaṃ ca bhāratyā naiva cintayet /
analyzed: dharma ādi deha saṃgam ca bhāratyāḥ nā eva cintayet

original: manujasya ca dehasya tāsāṃ saṃgaṃ cintayet // GarP_3,17.43 //
analyzed: manujasya ca dehasya tāsām saṃgam cintayet

original: aparokṣavatīnāṃ tu tāsāṃ lepo na sarvathā /
analyzed: aparokṣavatīnām tu tāsām lepaḥ na sarvathā

original: athavā mudgalasyeva ratikāle khageśvara // GarP_3,17.44 //
analyzed: athavā mudgalasya iva rati kāle khageśvara

original: ramaṇaṃ cakrurevaṃ tā ato doṣo na vidyate /
analyzed: ramaṇam cakruḥ evam tāḥ atas doṣaḥ na vidyate

original: ekasmindivase vīndra dharmo vāyuśca tāvubhau // GarP_3,17.45 //
analyzed: ekasmin divase vi indra dharmaḥ vāyuḥ ca tau ubhau

original: ramaṇaṃ cakratuḥ samyakkṛṣṇādehe 'pi mānada /
analyzed: ramaṇam cakratuḥ samyak kṛṣṇā dehe mānada

original: tathāpyananyāgāmitvaṃ cintanīyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,17.46 //
analyzed: tathā api ananya āgāmi tvam cintanīyam na saṃśayaḥ

original: surāṇāṃ surabhogyāśca bhogaṃ jānanti devatāḥ /
analyzed: surāṇām sura bhogyāḥ ca bhogam jānanti devatāḥ

original: na jānantyeva martyāṃstu teṣu deheṣu te punaḥ // GarP_3,17.47 //
analyzed: na jānanti eva martyān tu teṣu deheṣu te punar

original: nīrakṣīravivikaṃ ca haṃso vetti na cāparaḥ /
analyzed: nīra kṣīra vivikam ca haṃsaḥ vetti na ca aparaḥ

original: ataḥ svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ kṛṣṇādehena cintayet kṛṣṇādehenyagāmitvaṃ naiva cintyaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,17.48 //
analyzed: atas sva bhartṛ saṃyogam kṛṣṇā dehena cintayet na eva cintyam khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhāratyā viśiṣṭadeha saṃprāptyai kāraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhāratyāḥ viśiṣṭa deha saṃprāptyai kāraṇanirūpaṇam nāma saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 18
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: athānantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama /
analyzed: atha anantara jān vakṣye śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: śṛṇu tānsāvadhānena śrutvā tānavadhāraya // GarP_3,18.1 //
analyzed: śṛṇu tān sa avadhānena śrutvā tān avadhāraya

original: puruṣākhyaviriñcānujātaḥ śeṣo mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣa ākhya viriñca anujātaḥ śeṣaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: hare ramāyāśca yasya svasminnidrāṃ prakurvataḥ // GarP_3,18.2 //
analyzed: hareḥ ramāyāḥ ca yasya svasmin nidrām prakurvataḥ

original: śayanārthamabhūdeṣa tena kṛtyaṃ harerna tu /
analyzed: śayana artham abhūt eṣa tena kṛtyam hareḥ na tu

original: sarvadā haridāsohaṃ sarvadā haripūjakaḥ // GarP_3,18.3 //
analyzed: sarvadā hari dāsaḥ aham sarvadā hari pūjakaḥ

original: hare sadā namāmi tvāṃ bahu janmani janmani /
analyzed: hare sadā namāmi tvām bahu janmani janmani

original: evaṃ buddhā tu garuḍo hyabhūcca śayanaṃ hareḥ // GarP_3,18.4 //
analyzed: evam tu garuḍaḥ hi abhūt ca śayanam hareḥ

original: sūtranāmnastathā vāyoḥ sadāyaṃ vinatāsuta /
analyzed: sūtra nāmnaḥ tathā vāyoḥ sadā ayam vinatā suta

original: kālanāmā ca garuḍo vāhanārthaṃ harerabhūt // GarP_3,18.5 //
analyzed: kāla nāmā ca garuḍaḥ vāhana artham hareḥ abhūt

original: tato mahattattvatanorviriñcāttu khageśvara /
analyzed: tatas mahat tattva tanoḥ viriñcāt tu khageśvara

original: ahaṃ kārātmako rudraḥ samabhūtsovituṃ harim // GarP_3,18.6 //
analyzed: aham kārā ātmakaḥ rudraḥ samabhūt sovitum harim

original: traya ete mahābhāga parasparasamāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ ete mahābhāga paraspara samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: gāyatrībhāratībhyāṃ te trayaḥ śataguṇā varāḥ // GarP_3,18.7 //
analyzed: gāyatrī bhāratībhyām te trayaḥ śataguṇāḥ varāḥ

original: śeṣaḥ sa eva vijñeyo bhakto nārāyaṇasya ca /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ saḥ eva vijñeyaḥ bhaktaḥ nārāyaṇasya ca

original: viṣṇorvāyoranantasya tribhiraṃśairyutaḥ sadā // GarP_3,18.8 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ anantasya tribhiḥ aṃśaiḥ yutaḥ sadā

original: sumitrāṃśo daśarathājjāto yo lakṣmaṇaḥ khaga /
analyzed: sumitra aṃśaḥ daśarathāt jātaḥ yaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ khaga

original: sopi śeṣastu vijñeyo vāyvanantāṃśasaṃyutaḥ // GarP_3,18.9 //
analyzed: saḥ api śeṣaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ vāyu ananta aṃśa saṃyutaḥ

original: rāmasya sevāṃ kartuṃ sā sītā bhūmyāṃ khagādhipa /
analyzed: rāmasya sevām kartum sā sītā bhūmyām khaga adhipa

original: balabhadrastu rohiṇyāṃ vasudevādabhūtkhaga // GarP_3,18.10 //
analyzed: balabhadraḥ tu rohiṇyām vasudevāt abhūt khaga

original: soyamepa tu vijñeyastvaṃśadvayasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ uyam epa tu vijñeyaḥ tu aṃśa dvaya samanvitaḥ

original: āviṣṭaḥ śuklakṛṣṇe hariṇā rohiṇīsutaḥ // GarP_3,18.11 //
analyzed: āviṣṭaḥ śukla kṛṣṇe hariṇā rohiṇīsutaḥ

original: traya ete māhābhāgāvatārāḥ phaṇinaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ ete māhābhāga avatārāḥ phaṇinaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: na vīndrāsyāvatārosti bhūmyāṃ cājñā tathā hareḥ // GarP_3,18.12 //
analyzed: na vi indra asya avatāraḥ asti bhūmyām ca ājñā tathā hareḥ

original: rudrāvatārānvakṣyehaṃ tāñchṛṇu tvaṃ samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: rudra avatārān vakṣya iham tān śṛṇu tvam samāhitaḥ

original: yohaṅkārātmako rudraḥ sa evābhūtkhageśvara // GarP_3,18.13 //
analyzed: yaḥ uhaṅkāra ātmakaḥ rudraḥ saḥ eva abhūt khageśvara

original: sadāśiva iti tvākhyāmavāpa sa vināśakaḥ /
analyzed: sadāśivaḥ iti tu ākhyām avāpa sa vināśakaḥ

original: tamobhimānī sa jñeyastvaśivatvātsadāśivaḥ // GarP_3,18.14 //
analyzed: tamaḥ abhimānī sa jñeyaḥ tu aśiva tvāt sadāśivaḥ

original: kapālamālāmaśivāṃ sadā dhārayate yataḥ /
analyzed: kapāla mālām aśivām sadā dhārayate yatas

original: ataḥ sadāśaivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.15 //
analyzed: atas sadāśaivaḥ jñeyaḥ na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ

original: gajājinaṃ cāpavitraṃ yato dhārayate haraḥ /
analyzed: gaja ajinam ca apavitram yatas dhārayate haraḥ

original: lokānamaṅgalānsarvānharate ca sadā haraḥ // GarP_3,18.16 //
analyzed: lokān amaṅgalān sarvān harate ca sadā haraḥ

original: haryājñayā sadā lokānvipayāsaktacetasaḥ /
analyzed: hari ājñayā sadā lokān vipaya āsakta cetasaḥ

original: vimukhānkurute yasmādviṣṇostasmātsadāśivaḥ // GarP_3,18.17 //
analyzed: vimukhān kurute yasmāt viṣṇoḥ tasmāt sadāśivaḥ

original: kadācidasurāveśādviruddhaṃ kurute haraḥ /
analyzed: kadācid asura āveśāt viruddham kurute haraḥ

original: ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.18 //
analyzed: atas sadāśivaḥ jñeyaḥ na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ

original: soyaṃ śmaśānavasatiṃ kartumaicchadyato haraḥ /
analyzed: saḥ uyam śmaśāna vasatim kartum aicchat yatas haraḥ

original: ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.19 //
analyzed: atas sadāśivaḥ jñeyaḥ na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ

original: daśavarṣaṃ tapaḥ kartuṃ viveśa lavaṇāṃbhasi /
analyzed: daśa varṣam tapaḥ kartum viveśa lavaṇāṃbhasi

original: ato rudrastapaḥ saṃjñāmavāpa ca khagottama // GarP_3,18.20 //
analyzed: rudraḥ tapaḥ saṃjñām avāpa ca khaga uttama

original: vyāsaputraḥ śukaḥ prokto vāyorāveśasaṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: vyāsa putraḥ śukaḥ proktaḥ vāyoḥ āveśa saṃyutaḥ

original: rudrāvatāro vijñeyo jñānārthamabhavadbhuvi // GarP_3,18.21 //
analyzed: rudra avatāraḥ vijñeyaḥ jñāna artham abhavat bhuvi

original: atripatnyanusūyāyāṃ jajñe rudro mahātapāḥ /
analyzed: atri patnī anusūyāyām jajñe rudraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: durvāsāstu sa vijñeyo mānabhaṅgāya bhūbhṛtām // GarP_3,18.22 //
analyzed: durvāsāḥ tu sa vijñeyaḥ māna bhaṅgāya bhūbhṛtām

original: droṇājjāto drauṇisaṃjño rudra eva prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: droṇāt jātaḥ drauṇi saṃjñaḥ rudraḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: prārabdhaṃ bhoktukāmosau parapakṣaprakāśakaḥ // GarP_3,18.23 //
analyzed: prārabdham bhoktu kāmaḥ asau parapakṣa prakāśakaḥ

original: īśānakoṇe saṃsthito yastu rudro hyavāpa vai vāmadeveti saṃjñām /
analyzed: īśāna koṇe saṃsthitaḥ yaḥ tu rudraḥ hi avāpa vai vāmadeva iti saṃjñām

original: svavāmabhāge saṃsthitaṃ caiva vāyustaṃ yogyabhaktaṃ sevate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,18.24 //
analyzed: sva vāma bhāge saṃsthitam ca eva vāyuḥ tam yogya bhaktam sevate sarvadā eva

original: ato rudro vāmadeveti saṃjñā mavāpa śiṣṭatvamathottamatvam /
analyzed: atas rudraḥ vāmadeva iti saṃjñā m avāpa śiṣṭa tvam atha uttama tvam

original: kālātmakatvaṃ ca balātmakatvamavāpa rudro na tu suṃdaratvataḥ // GarP_3,18.25 //
analyzed: kāla ātmaka tvam ca bala ātmaka tvam avāpa rudraḥ na tu suṃdara tvataḥ

original: sadā rudro tripurasthāṃśca daityānviṣṇuduho hantu kāmo mahātmā /
analyzed: sadā tripura sthān ca daityān viṣṇu duhaḥ hantu kāmaḥ mahātmā

original: aghorarūpaṃ dhṛpavānrudra eva tatastvaghoreti sa āpa saṃjñām // GarP_3,18.26 //
analyzed: aghora rūpam dhṛpavān rudraḥ eva tatas tu aghora iti saḥ āpa saṃjñām

original: sevāṃ kartuṃ tvicchato daityasaṃghānkiñcitkālaṃ tapasā kliśyamānān /
analyzed: sevām kartum tu icchataḥ daitya saṃghān kiñcid kālam tapasā kliśyamānān

original: varāndātuṃ sadya evābhijātaḥ sadyojātetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa // GarP_3,18.27 //
analyzed: varān dātum sadyas eva abhijātaḥ sadyojāta iti eva saṃjñām avāpa

original: uroḥ putrastu aurvaśca rudra eva prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: uroḥ putraḥ tu aurvaḥ ca rudraḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: ityakṛṣṭavācitvādrusturodanavācakaḥ // GarP_3,18.28 //
analyzed: iti akṛṣṭa vāci tvāt rustu rodana vācakaḥ

original: urū rudro hyataḥ proktastatputraścaurvasaṃjñakaḥ /
analyzed: uruḥ rudraḥ hi atas proktaḥ tad putraḥ ca aurva saṃjñakaḥ

original: rudramurvaritaṃ kartumaurvobhūdrudra eva saḥ // GarP_3,18.29 //
analyzed: rudram urvaritam kartum aurvaḥ bhūt rudraḥ eva saḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: rodanaṃ kurute kasmādurusaṃjño hare haraḥ /
analyzed: rodanam kurute kasmāt uru saṃjñaḥ hare haraḥ

original: rudamurvaritaṃ kasmātkurute aurvākārakaḥ // GarP_3,18.30 //
analyzed: rudam urvaritam kasmāt kurute aurvā kārakaḥ

original: etadvistārya mebrūhi pautrāya tava suvrata /
analyzed: etat vistārya me brūhi pautrāya tava suvrata

original: ityuktastena sa hariruvāca karuṇānidhiḥ // GarP_3,18.31 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tena sa hariḥ uvāca karuṇā nidhiḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: dṛṣṭvā svabiṃbaṃ suguṇaistu pūrṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇākhyaṃ natapādapadm /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sva biṃbam su guṇaiḥ tu pūrṇam saṃkarṣaṇa ākhyam nata pāda padmam

original: śrībrahmaśeṣairjiṣṇukāmaistathānyairbhāratyā vai svasti paiścāpi nityam // GarP_3,18.32 //
analyzed: śrī brahma śeṣaiḥ jiṣṇu kāmaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ bhāratyāḥ vai svasti paiḥ ca api nityam

original: dṛṣṭvā hariṃ pulakāṅgastu rudraḥ sabhāṣpacakṣū ruddhakaṇṭhaśca hṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā harim pulaka aṅgaḥ tu rudraḥ sa bhāṣpa cakṣūḥ ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ ca hṛṣṭaḥ

original: anādyanantabrahmakalpeṣu naiva kṛtaṃ yayā smaraṇaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,18.33 //
analyzed: anādi ananta brahma kalpeṣu nā eva kṛtam yayā smaraṇam sarvadā eva

original: pādāravinde sunakhairvibhūṣite dṛṣṭe mayā kena puṇyena deva /
analyzed: pāda aravinde su nakhaiḥ vibhūṣite dṛṣṭe mayā kena puṇyena deva

original: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapadmaṃ murāreḥ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva // GarP_3,18.34 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā pāda padmam murāreḥ punar punar ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva

original: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punardarśanaṃ me prabhoḥ syāt /
analyzed: ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ katham punar darśanam me prabhoḥ syāt

original: mukunda nārāyaṇa viśvamūrte vāgindriyeṇa stavanaṃ me kathaṃ syāt // GarP_3,18.35 //
analyzed: mukunda nārāyaṇa viśvamūrte vāc indriyeṇa stavanam me katham syāt

original: maddarśanaṃ sarvadā pāpuyuktaṃ tathā madvāk sarvadā pāpayuktā /
analyzed: mad darśanam sarvadā pāpu yuktam tathā mad vāc sarvadā pāpa yuktā

original: maddarśanaṃ sarvadā strīṣu saktamabhūcca te darśanaṃ me hyasaktam // GarP_3,18.36 //
analyzed: mad darśanam sarvadā strīṣu saktam abhūt ca te darśanam me hi asaktam

original: āsaktatā putradārādikānāṃ samyak śaktistavane nāsti viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: āsakta tā putra dāra ādikānām samyak śakti stavane na asti viṣṇoḥ

original: viṣṇustutau nāvakāśosti vāco dṛṣṭohaṃ tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva // GarP_3,18.37 //
analyzed: viṣṇu stutau na avakāśaḥ asti vācaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ uham tvam kena puṇyena deva

original: anantakarṇeśa sucandrasaṃjña śrotreṇa nityaṃ na kathā śrutā te /
analyzed: ananta karṇa īśa sucandra saṃjña śrotreṇa nityam na kathā śrutā te

original: śrutā mayā bahudhā lokavārtā dṛṣṭo mayā tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva // GarP_3,18.38 //
analyzed: śrutāḥ mayā bahudhā loka vārtāḥ dṛṣṭaḥ mayā tvam kena puṇyena deva

original: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapīṭhaṃ hareśca punaḥ punā ruddhaṅkaṭho babhūva /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā pāda pīṭham hareḥ ca punar ruddhaṅkaṭhaḥ babhūva

original: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ śravaṇaṃ syātkathāyāḥ // GarP_3,18.39 //
analyzed: ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ katham punar śravaṇam syāt kathāyāḥ

original: tvamīśa vaikuṇṭha suvāyusaṃjñastvadarpitaṃ gandhapuṣpādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: tvam īśa vaikuṇṭha suvāyu saṃjñaḥ tvad arpitam gandha puṣpa ādikam ca

original: sadā na liptaṃ ca bhujairviliptaṃ tanmūtraviṣṭhādimakardamāmbubhiḥ // GarP_3,18.40 //
analyzed: sadā na liptam ca bhujaiḥ viliptam tad mūtra viṣṭhā ādi makardama ambubhiḥ

original: strīṇāṃ kucodaiśca kacodakaiścakakṣodakair gātrajalairmukunda /
analyzed: strīṇām kuca udaiḥ ca kaca udakaiḥ cakakṣa udakaiḥ gātra jalaiḥ mukunda

original: anarpitairvastragandhādikaiśca dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva // GarP_3,18.41 //
analyzed: an arpitaiḥ vastra gandha ādikaiḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ mayā kena puṇyena deva

original: spṛṣṭvāspṛṣṭvā harinirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā a spṛṣṭvā hari nirmālya gandham punar punar ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva

original: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ sparśanaṃ syātsadā me // GarP_3,18.42 //
analyzed: ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ katham punar sparśanam syāt sadā me

original: nṛsiṃha nāsāsthita nāsikeśa mannāsayā kvāpi supadmasaurabham /
analyzed: nṛsiṃha nāsā sthita nāsikeśa mad nāsayā kvāpi su padma saurabham

original: nāghrātamitthaṃ punarāghrātameva hyanarpitaṃ gandhapuṣpādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,18.43 //
analyzed: na āghrātam ittham punar āghrātam eva hi anarpitam gandha puṣpa ādikam ca

original: sunāsikaṃ suṣṭhudantaṃ murāre dṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ kena puṇyena deva /
analyzed: su nāsikam suṣṭhu dantam murāre dṛṣṭam mukham kena puṇyena deva

original: ghrātvā ghrātvā viṣṇunirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva // GarP_3,18.44 //
analyzed: ghrātvā ghrātvā viṣṇu nirmālya gandham punar punar ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva

original: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgo jighrāmi nirmālyamidaṃ kathaṃ te /
analyzed: ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ jighrāmi nirmālyam idam katham te

original: jihvāsthito jihva saṃjño murāre jihvendriyeṇāpi tathārpitaṃ ca // GarP_3,18.45 //
analyzed: jihvā sthitaḥ jihva saṃjñaḥ murāre jihvā indriyeṇa api tathā arpitam ca

original: naivedyaśeṣaṃ tulasīvimiśritaṃ viśeṣataḥ pādajalena siktam /
analyzed: naivedya śeṣam tulasī vimiśritam viśeṣataḥ pāda jalena siktam

original: yo snāti nityaṃ purato murāreḥ prāpnoti yajñāyutakoṭipuṇyam // GarP_3,18.46 //
analyzed: yaḥ snāti nityam puratas murāreḥ prāpnoti yajña ayuta koṭi puṇyam

original: etādṛśaṃ tava naivedyaśeṣaṃ na bhuktaṃ vai sarvadādityarūpam /
analyzed: etādṛśam tava naivedya śeṣam na bhuktam vai sarvadā āditya rūpam

original: anarpitaṃ tava devasya viṣṇorbhuktaṃ mayā bahuvāraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,18.47 //
analyzed: an arpitam tava devasya viṣṇoḥ bhuktam mayā bahu vāram mukunda

original: pādāravinde nārpitaṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva /
analyzed: pāda aravinde na arpitam bhakṣya bhojyam dṛṣṭaḥ mayā kena puṇyena deva

original: bhuktvābhuktvā harinairavedyajātaṃ sukhaṃ tvadīyaṃ ramayā lālitaṃ ca // GarP_3,18.48 //
analyzed: bhuktvā a bhuktvā hari nairavedya jātam sukham tvadīyam ramayā lālitam ca

original: dyubhvāśrayaṃ tava mūrdhānamāhuḥ kirīṭayuktaṃ kuṭilaiḥ kuntalaiśca /
analyzed: dyu bhvā āśrayam tava mūrdhānam āhuḥ kirīṭa yuktam kuṭilaiḥ kuntalaiḥ ca

original: anekajanmārjitapuṇyasaṃcayairdṛṣṭaṃ mayā sajjanasaṃgamācca // GarP_3,18.49 //
analyzed: aneka janma arjita puṇya saṃcayaiḥ dṛṣṭam mayā sat jana saṃgamāt ca

original: anekajanmārjitapāpasaṃcayairadarśanaṃ yāsyati devadeva /
analyzed: aneka janma arjita pāpa saṃcayaiḥ adarśanam yāsyati devadeva

original: evaṃ subhaktyā ca ruroda rudro dṛṣṭvā hariṃ survaguṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇam // GarP_3,18.50 //
analyzed: evam su bhaktyā ca ruroda rudraḥ dṛṣṭvā harim surva guṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇam

original: pādāravindaṃ tava viśvamūrte yogīśvarairhṛdaye saṃgṛhītam /
analyzed: pāda aravindam tava viśvamūrte yogi īśvaraiḥ hṛdaye saṃgṛhītam

original: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā dayayā vāsudeva drakṣye kathaṃ punaritthaṃ ruroda // GarP_3,18.51 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam mayā dayayā vāsudeva drakṣye katham punar ittham ruroda

original: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tvarivale bhavināśiśaṅkhacakrādikaistrijagatāpi ca deva pūrṇam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam mayā tu ari vale bhavi nāśi śaṅkha cakra ādikaiḥ trijagatā api ca deva pūrṇam

original: etādṛśaṃ tvadudaraṃ ca kathaṃ rameśa drakṣye punaḥ punarahaṃ tviti saṃruroda // GarP_3,18.52 //
analyzed: etādṛśam tvad udaram ca katham rama īśa drakṣye punar punar aham tu iti saṃruroda

original: ānandapūrṇa nakhapūrṇa sukeśapūrṇa lomādipūrṇa guṇapūrṇa sughoṇapūrṇa /
analyzed: ānanda pūrṇa nakha pūrṇa su keśa pūrṇa loma ādi pūrṇa guṇa pūrṇa su ghoṇa pūrṇa

original: vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ tava vibhostu viśālabhūtaṃ sadbhūṣaṇaṃ vimalakaustubhaśobhi lakṣmyā // GarP_3,18.53 //
analyzed: vakṣaḥ sthalam tava vibhoḥ tu viśāla bhūtam sat bhūṣaṇam vimala kaustubha śobhi lakṣmyā

original: sukomalaṃ śrītulasyāstathaiva supuṣpitaṃ canda naiścarcitaṃ ca /
analyzed: su komalam śrī tulasyāḥ tathā eva su puṣpitam canda naiḥ carcitam ca

original: etādṛśaṃ tava vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tava kāruṇyadṛṣṭyā // GarP_3,18.54 //
analyzed: etādṛśam tava vakṣaḥ sthalam ca dṛṣṭam mayā tava kāruṇya dṛṣṭyā

original: punaḥ punardarśanaṃ me kathaṃ syādevaṃ rudraḥ sa ca bhaktyā ruroda /
analyzed: punar punar darśanam me katham syāt evam rudraḥ sa ca bhaktyā ruroda

original: atastūrurnāma saṃprāpya rudrastatputrobhūddaurvasaṃjñaḥ sa eva // GarP_3,18.55 //
analyzed: atas tūruḥ nāma saṃprāpya rudraḥ tad putraḥ bhūt daurva saṃjñaḥ saḥ eva

original: yasmādrudaṃ corvaritaṃ vai cakāra tasmātsa rudrastvaurvasaṃjño babhūva /
analyzed: yasmāt rudam ca urvaritam vai cakāra tasmāt sa rudraḥ tu aurva saṃjñaḥ babhūva

original: aurvastu lokānmokṣayogyāṃśca dṛṣṭvā hyatyantaṃ vai viṣayeṣveva niṣṭhān // GarP_3,18.56 //
analyzed: aurvaḥ tu lokān mokṣa yogyān ca dṛṣṭvā hi atyantam vai viṣayeṣu eva niṣṭhān

original: stūddaiva caurvo viṣṇupādāravidaṃ smṛtvāsmṛtvā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva /
analyzed: caurvaḥ viṣṇu pāda āra vidam smṛtvā a smṛtvā ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva

original: te pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāparūpānbhajanto dinedine durviṣayānkadindriyaiḥ // GarP_3,18.57 //
analyzed: te pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāpa rūpān bhajantaḥ dine dine durviṣayān kad indriyaiḥ

original: kadā caitānheyabuddhyā vimuñce na jānehaṃ ceti samyag ruroda /
analyzed: kadā ca etān heya buddhyā vimuñce na jāna iham ca iti samyak ruroda

original: ete hi mūrkhā viṣayānarthalabdhyai kurvanti yatnaṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,18.58 //
analyzed: ete hi mūrkhāḥ viṣaya anartha labdhyai kurvanti yatnam parama ādareṇa

original: kadindriyārthaṃ hi dhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti ca sarve viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: kad indriya artham hi dhana ādikam ca tyajanti ca sarve viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ

original: tvanmāyayā mohitānnaṣṭabuddhīnkadā caitānmuñcase viśvamūrte // GarP_3,18.59 //
analyzed: tvad māyayā mohitān naṣṭa buddhīn kadā ca etān muñcase viśvamūrte

original: smṛtvāsmṛtvā vāsudevasya māyāṃ ruroda caurvo bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ /
analyzed: smṛtvā a smṛtvā vāsudevasya māyām ruroda caurvaḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ

original: atīva kaṣṭena ca lokavṛttyā śritā dainyaṃ svīyakāryaṃ vihāya // GarP_3,18.60 //
analyzed: atīva kaṣṭena ca loka vṛttyā śritāḥ dainyam svīya kāryam vihāya

original: atīva dainyena dhanādikaṃ ca saṃpādya sarve 'pi supāpaśīlāḥ /
analyzed: atīva dainyena dhana ādikam ca saṃpādya sarve su pāpa śīlāḥ

original: kaṣṭārjitaṃ dravyadhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti sarve paśavo vyarthameva // GarP_3,18.61 //
analyzed: kaṣṭa arjitam dravya dhana ādikam ca tyajanti sarve paśavaḥ vyartham eva

original: satpātrabhūte viṣṇubuddhyā kadāpi tyajanti naite māyayā vai murāreḥ /
analyzed: sat pātra bhūte viṣṇu buddhyā kadāpi tyajanti na ete māyayā vai murāreḥ

original: eṣāmāyurvyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ kathaṃ naṣṭā iti samyagruroda // GarP_3,18.62 //
analyzed: eṣām āyuḥ vyartham āhuḥ mahāntaḥ katham naṣṭāḥ iti samyak ruroda

original: eṣāmāyurvyarthamevaṃ gataṃ ca eṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā yauvanaṃ tu dhruvaṃ ca /
analyzed: eṣām āyuḥ vyartham evam gatam ca eṣām dṛṣṭvā yauvanam tu dhruvam ca

original: skandhasthamṛtyurhasate kṛṣṇa viṣṇo taṃ vai na jānanti vimūḍhacetasaḥ // GarP_3,18.63 //
analyzed: skandha stha mṛtyuḥ hasate kṛṣṇa viṣṇo tam vai na jānanti vimūḍha cetasaḥ

original: gṛhaṃ madīyaṃ śatavarṣaṃ ca jīvetputrā madīyā śavatavarṣaṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: gṛham madīyam śata varṣam ca jīvet putrā madīyā tathā eva

original: ahaṃ ca jīve śatavarṣaṃ sukhena madīyabhāryāpi sulakṣaṇā'ste // GarP_3,18.64 //
analyzed: aham ca jīve śata varṣam sukhena madīya bhāryā api su lakṣaṇāḥ te

original: gāvaśca me saṃti sadugdhapūrṇā mitrāṇi me saṃti mudā hi yuktāḥ /
analyzed: gāvaḥ ca me saṃti sa dugdha pūrṇāḥ mitrāṇi me saṃti mudā hi yuktāḥ

original: dāsye sutaṃ vāraṇārthaṃ tu vadhvai putrīṃ vivāhārthamahaṃ dadāmi // GarP_3,18.65 //
analyzed: dāsye sutam vāraṇa artham tu vadhvai putrīm vivāha artham aham dadāmi

original: dāsye cāhaṃ satsu putrīṃ dhanaṃ vā dāsye cāhaṃ dhanikeṣveva nityam /
analyzed: dāsye ca aham satsu putrīm dhanam vā dāsye ca aham dhanikeṣu eva nityam

original: adṛṣṭaśūnyān bhagavānvāsudevo dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā hasate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,18.66 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa śūnyān bhagavān vāsudevaḥ dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā hasate sarvadā eva

original: nāhaṃ kariṣye śravaṇaṃ kathāyā madbhāgyanā śaśca bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: na aham kariṣye śravaṇam kathāyāḥ mad bhāgya nā śaḥ ca bhaviṣyati iti

original: nāhaṃ hariṃ pūjayiṣye sadaiva putrādināśaśca bhaviṣyatīti // GarP_3,18.67 //
analyzed: na aham harim pūjayiṣye sadā eva putra ādi nāśaḥ ca bhaviṣyati iti

original: kālekāle diṣṭanāmā haristu phalaprado vāsudevo 'khilasya /
analyzed: kālekāle diṣṭa nāmā hariḥ tu phala pradaḥ khilasya

original: etādṛśānmūrkhajanāṃśca dṛṣṭvā ruroda caurvo vāsudevaikaniṣṭhaḥ // GarP_3,18.68 //
analyzed: etādṛśān mūrkha janān ca dṛṣṭvā ruroda caurvaḥ vāsudeva ekaniṣṭhaḥ

original: atastvaurvo rudrarūpī khagendra jānīhi nityaṃ kṛṣṇasuśikṣitārthaḥ /
analyzed: atas tu aurvaḥ rudra rūpī khaga indra jānīhi nityam kṛṣṇa su śikṣita arthaḥ

original: yadā satī dakṣaputrī khagendra dakṣādhvare svaśarīraṃ visṛjya // GarP_3,18.69 //
analyzed: yadā satī dakṣa putrī khaga indra dakṣa adhvare sva śarīram visṛjya

original: jajñe punarmenakāyāṃ himādrestadā rudrastvaurvasaṃjñā mavāpa /
analyzed: jajñe punar menakāyām himādreḥ tadā rudraḥ tu aurva saṃjñā m avāpa

original: ūrdhvaretā bhavetyuktvā ūrdhvaretā babhūva ha // GarP_3,18.70 //
analyzed: ūrdhvaretāḥ bhava iti uktvā ūrdhvaretāḥ babhūva ha

original: pāṇigrāhaṃ rudradevo mahātmā yadā himādreḥ kanyakāyāścakāra /
analyzed: pāṇigrāham rudra devaḥ mahātmā yadā himādreḥ kanyakāyāḥ cakāra

original: tasyāṃ paraṃ laṃpaṭaḥ saṃbabhūva ato rudraḥ parasaṃjñāmavāpa // GarP_3,18.71 //
analyzed: tasyām param laṃpaṭaḥ saṃbabhūva atas rudraḥ para saṃjñām avāpa

original: sadāśivādyā daśa rudrabhrātaraḥ saumitreyo hauhiṇeyastrayaśca /
analyzed: sadāśiva ādyāḥ daśa rudra bhrātaraḥ saumitreyaḥ hauhiṇeyaḥ trayaḥ ca

original: samā ete mokṣakāle sṛtau ca śatairguṇairnyūnabhūtāśca tābhyām // GarP_3,18.72 //
analyzed: samāḥ ete mokṣa kāle sṛtau ca śataiḥ guṇaiḥ nyūna bhūtāḥ ca tābhyām

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: ānandanirṇayaṃ brūhi kṛṣṇa pūrṇadayānighe /
analyzed: ānanda nirṇayam brūhi kṛṣṇa pūrṇa dayā nighe

original: nirṇetuṃ jñānināṃ yadvajjñāpanārthaṃ tathā mama // GarP_3,18.73 //
analyzed: nirṇetum jñāninām yadvat jñāpana artham tathā mama

original: brūhi śiṣyāya dayayā uddhartuṃ māṃ ca sarvadā /
analyzed: brūhi śiṣyāya dayayā uddhartum mām ca sarvadā

original: pūrṇakāmasya te kṛṣṇa kā spṛhā vidyate prabho // GarP_3,18.74 //
analyzed: pūrṇa kāmasya te kṛṣṇa kā spṛhā vidyate prabho

original: evamukto hṛṣīkeśaḥ pakṣīśena mahātmanā /
analyzed: evam uktaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pakṣīśena mahātmanā

original: uvāca kṛpayā kṛṣṇaḥ prasannaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ // GarP_3,18.75 //
analyzed: uvāca kṛpayā kṛṣṇaḥ prasannaḥ kamala īkṣaṇaḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: gāyatryāśca śatānanda ekānandastu vedhasaḥ etādṛśaḥ śatānando brahmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,18.76 //
analyzed: gāyatryāḥ ca śatānandaḥ ekānandaḥ tu vedhasaḥ etādṛśaḥ śatānandaḥ brahmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: śeṣādeśca śatānandaḥ sarasvatyāḥ khagottama /
analyzed: śeṣa ādeḥ ca śata ānandaḥ sarasvatyāḥ khaga uttama

original: ekānandastu vijñeyo bhāratyā vinatāsuta // GarP_3,18.77 //
analyzed: ekānandaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ bhāratyāḥ vinatā suta

original: evaṃ tu nirṇayo jñeya ānandasya sadā khaga /
analyzed: evam tu nirṇayaḥ jñeyaḥ ānandasya sadā khaga

original: evamuktaṃ mayā sarvaṃ kimanyacchrotumicchasi // GarP_3,18.78 //
analyzed: evam uktam mayā sarvam kim anyat śrotum icchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe rudrarodanahetvānanantānandatāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe rudrarodanahetvānanantānandatāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 19
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: tvayoktaṃ kṛṣṇa govinda rudrācchataguṇādapi /
analyzed: tvayā uktam kṛṣṇa govinda rudrāt śataguṇāt api

original: brahmāṇī bhāratī cobhe adhike devasattama // GarP_3,19.1 //
analyzed: brahmāṇī bhāratī ca ubhe adhike deva sattama

original: mayā śrutaṃ viriñcena umāparyantameva ca /
analyzed: mayā śrutam viriñcena umā paryantam eva ca

original: anantāṃśairvihīnatvaṃ viriñcoktaṃ surādhipa // GarP_3,19.2 //
analyzed: ananta aṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam viriñca uktam surādhipa

original: sahasrāṃśairvihīnatvaṃ tvayoktaṃ kṛṣṇa mādhava /
analyzed: sahasra aṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam tvayā uktam kṛṣṇa mādhava

original: sarveṣāṃ caiva pūrveṣāmavekṣyaiva hare vibho // GarP_3,19.3 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca eva pūrveṣām avekṣya eva hare vibho

original: jñānānandabalādīnāṃ vāyuparyantameva ca /
analyzed: jñāna ānanda bala ādīnām vāyu paryantam eva ca

original: sahasrāṃśairvihīnatvaṃ jñānādīnāṃ maheśvara // GarP_3,19.4 //
analyzed: sahasra aṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam jñāna ādīnām maheśvara

original: nirṇayaṃ brṛhi govinda sarvajñosi na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: nirṇayam brṛhi govinda sarva jñaḥ asi na saṃśayaḥ

original: garuḍenaivamuktastu vāsudevobravīddhruvam // GarP_3,19.5 //
analyzed: garuḍena evam uktaḥ tu vāsudevaḥ bravīt dhruvam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: ānandāṃśairvihīnatvamapekṣyaiva khagādhipa /
analyzed: ānanda aṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam apekṣya eva khagādhipa

original: uttareṣāmuttareṣāṃ yogādevamiti sphuṭam // GarP_3,19.6 //
analyzed: uttareṣām uttareṣām yogāt evam iti sphuṭam

original: parimāṇe śataguṇe ānande sphuṭatāvaśāt /
analyzed: parimāṇe śataguṇe ānande sphuṭa tā avaśāt

original: anantaguṇavattvaṃ ca brahmaṇā samudīritam // GarP_3,19.7 //
analyzed: ananta guṇavat tvam ca brahmaṇā samudīritam

original: sahasraguṇitatvaṃ ca vāyunā samudīritam /
analyzed: sahasra guṇita tvam ca vāyunā samudīritam

original: yathānande tathā jñāne viṣṇau bhaktau balādhike // GarP_3,19.8 //
analyzed: yathā ānande tathā jñāne viṣṇau bhaktau bala adhike

original: sarve guṇaiḥ śataguṇāḥ krameṇoktā nu te 'khilāḥ /
analyzed: sarve guṇaiḥ śataguṇāḥ krameṇa uktāḥ nu te khilāḥ

original: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ sukhaṃ bhaktibalādhike // GarP_3,19.9 //
analyzed: bhāratyāḥ ca śatam jñānam sukham bhakti bala adhike

original: evaṃ jñānaṃ suvijñeyaṃ mārutestu balādikam /
analyzed: evam jñānam su vijñeyam māruteḥ tu bala ādikam

original: evaṃ jñānaṃ śataṃ jñeyaṃ mārute nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,19.10 //
analyzed: evam jñānam śatam jñeyam mārute na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ balaṃ ca samudāhṛtam /
analyzed: bhāratyāḥ ca śatam jñānam balam ca samudāhṛtam

original: evameva ca vāyośca jñānaṃ caivamiti sphuṭam // GarP_3,19.11 //
analyzed: evam eva ca vāyoḥ ca jñānam ca evam iti sphuṭam

original: yathā dīpācchataguṇā agnijvālā na dīpavat /
analyzed: yathā dīpāt śataguṇā agni jvālā na dīpa vat

original: sphuṭībhavedyathaivāgnirbahulopi na sūryavat // GarP_3,19.12 //
analyzed: sphuṭībhavet yathā eva agniḥ bahu lopi na sūrya vat

original: yathaiva sūryāddviguṇaścandro naiva sphuṭībhavet /
analyzed: yathā eva sūryāt dviguṇaḥ candraḥ nā eva sphuṭībhavet

original: ānandatāratamyaṃ ca yathoktaṃ tu mayā tava // GarP_3,19.13 //
analyzed: ānanda tāratamyam ca yathā uktam tu mayā tava

original: tathaiva jānīhi khaga nānyathā tu kathañcana /
analyzed: tathā eva jānīhi khaga na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: ahaṃ vijānāmi mayi sthitān guṇānsarvairviśeṣaiśca khagendra saṃyutān // GarP_3,19.14 //
analyzed: aham vijānāmi mayi sthitān guṇān sarvaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ ca khaga indra saṃyutān

original: susūkṣmarūpāṃśca sadā khagendra mayāpyadṛṣṭo nāsti nāstyeva kaścit // GarP_3,19.15 //
analyzed: su sūkṣma rūpān ca sadā khaga indra mayā api adṛṣṭaḥ na asti na asti eva kaścid

original: sarvāvatāreṣvapi vidyamānaṃ hariṃ vijānāti ramāpi devī // GarP_3,19.16 //
analyzed: sarva avatāreṣu api vidyamānam harim vijānāti ramā api devī

original: harerguṇānsarvaviśeṣasaṃyutānakhaṇḍarūpānsā vijānāti devī /
analyzed: hareḥ guṇān sarva viśeṣa saṃyutān akhaṇḍa rūpān sā vijānāti devī

original: susūkṣmarūpānsā vijānāti devī brahmādibhyo matprasādādhikaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.17 //
analyzed: su sūkṣma rūpān sā vijānāti devī brahma ādibhyaḥ mad prasāda adhikam ca

original: svātmasvarūpaṃ pravijānāti devī susūkṣmarūpaṃ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam /
analyzed: sva ātma svarūpam pravijānāti devī su sūkṣma rūpam su viśeṣaiḥ ca yuktam

original: svānyaṃ prapañcaṃ pravijānāti lakṣmīstathāpyaśeṣaiḥ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam // GarP_3,19.18 //
analyzed: sva anyam prapañcam pravijānāti lakṣmīḥ tathā api aśeṣaiḥ su viśeṣaiḥ ca yuktam

original: brahmāpi paśyetsarvagaṃ vāsudevaṃ vāyvādibhyo hyadhikānsadguṇāṃśca /
analyzed: brahmā api paśyet sarvagam vāsudevam vāyu ādibhyaḥ hi adhikān sat guṇān ca

original: śrotraṃ na jānāti harerguṇāṃśca susūkṣmarūpāṃśca viśeṣasaṃyutān // GarP_3,19.19 //
analyzed: śrotram na jānāti hareḥ guṇān ca su sūkṣma rūpān ca viśeṣa saṃyutān

original: spaṣṭasvarūpeṇa yathā viduḥ surā muktvā brahmāṇaṃ na tathā tepyamuktāḥ /
analyzed: spaṣṭa sva rūpeṇa yathā viduḥ surāḥ muktvā brahmāṇam na tathā te api amuktāḥ

original: svātmānamanyacca sadā viśeṣaryuktaṃ vijānāti vidhiśca mārutaḥ // GarP_3,19.20 //
analyzed: sva ātmānam anyat ca sadā vijānāti vidhiḥ ca mārutaḥ

original: vāṇī vijānāti harerguṇāṃśca svayaṃbhuvo naiva tāvadviśeṣān /
analyzed: vāṇī vijānāti hareḥ guṇān ca svayaṃbhuvaḥ nā eva tāvat viśeṣān

original: traiguṇyarūpātparataḥ sadaiva paśyedviṣṇuṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,19.21 //
analyzed: traiguṇya rūpāt paratas sadā eva paśyet viṣṇum kṛṣṇa rūpam khaga indra

original: śeṣo rudro vīndra etaiśca sarve tamo mātre pravijānanti saṃstham /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ rudraḥ vi indraḥ etaiḥ ca sarve tamaḥ mātre pravijānanti saṃstham

original: vāṇīdṛṣṭānsaviśeṣān guṇāṃste jānanti no satyamevoktamaṅga // GarP_3,19.22 //
analyzed: vāṇī dṛṣṭān sa viśeṣān guṇān te jānanti no satyam eva uktam aṅga

original: umā suparṇā vāruṇī ceti tisraḥ sahaiva taḥ pravijānanti sustham /
analyzed: umā suparṇā vāruṇī ca iti tisraḥ saha eva taḥ pravijānanti sustham

original: harerviśeṣānarudra dṛṣṭānkhagendra jānanti naitāḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle // GarP_3,19.23 //
analyzed: hareḥ viśeṣān arudra dṛṣṭān khaga indra jānanti na etāḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle

original: indrādayaḥ pravijānanti vīndra ahaṅkāre vyāptarūpaṃ hariṃ ca /
analyzed: indra ādayaḥ pravijānanti vi indra ahaṅkāre vyāpta rūpam harim ca

original: dakṣādyā vai buddhitattve sthitaṃ taṃ jānanti te somasūryādayaśca // GarP_3,19.24 //
analyzed: dakṣa ādyāḥ vai buddhi tattve sthitam tam jānanti te soma sūrya ādayaḥ ca

original: viṣṇuṃ hariṃ bhūtatattve sthitaṃ ca ye cānye ca pravijānanti nityam /
analyzed: viṣṇum harim bhūtatattve sthitam ca ye ca anye ca pravijānanti nityam

original: anye ca paśyanti yathā svayogyamaṇḍāntarasthaṃ harirūpaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,19.25 //
analyzed: anye ca paśyanti yathā sva yogya maṇḍa antara stham hari rūpam khaga indra

original: kecitprapaśyanti hareśca rūpaṃ tvadīyahṛtsthaṃ hṛdi kecitsadaiva /
analyzed: kecid prapaśyanti hareḥ ca rūpam tvadīya hṛd stham hṛdi kecid sadā eva

original: evaṃprakāraṃ pravijānīhi vīndra hyatho śṛṇu tvaṃmama bhāryāḥ ṣaḍetāḥ // GarP_3,19.26 //
analyzed: evaṃprakāram pravijānīhi vi indra hi atho śṛṇu tvam mama bhāryāḥ ṣaḍ etāḥ

original: rukmiṇyādyāḥ ṣaṇmahiṣyo mamaśrīrnīlā ca yā mama bhāryā khagendra /
analyzed: rukmiṇī ādyāḥ ṣaṣ mahiṣyaḥ mama śrīḥ nīlā ca yā mama bhāryā khaga indra

original: sarge pūrvasminhavyavāhasya putrī tāstā bhaje sadya evā viśeṣāt // GarP_3,19.27 //
analyzed: sarge pūrvasmin havyavāhasya putrī tāḥ tāḥ bhaje sadyas evāḥ viśeṣāt

original: kanyaiva sā kṛṣṇapatnī ca kāmāṃstāṃstān bhajenmanasā cintitāṃśca /
analyzed: kanyā eva sā kṛṣṇa patnī ca kāmān tān tān bhajet manasā cintitān ca

original: atīva yatnaṃ kavyavāhaṃ khagendra pitṛṣvekaḥ sarvadā vai cakāra // GarP_3,19.28 //
analyzed: atīva yatnam kavya vāham khaga indra pitṛṣu ekaḥ sarvadā vai cakāra

original: tathaiva sā naiva bhartāramāpa yatastu sā kṛṣṇaniṣṭhaikacittā // GarP_3,19.29 //
analyzed: tathā eva sā nā eva bhartāram āpa yatas tu sā kṛṣṇa niṣṭhā ekacittā

original: tadābravītkavyavāhaśca putrariṃ patiṃ kimarthaṃ necchasi mūḍhabuddhe /
analyzed: tadā abravīt kavyavāhaḥ ca putra arim patim kimartham nā icchasi mūḍha buddhe

original: tadābravītkavyavāhaṃ ca puttrī hariṃ vinā sarvaguṇopapanne /
analyzed: tadā abravīt kavyavāham ca puttrī harim vinā sarva guṇa upapanne

original: janmanyasmin bhartṛtā nāsti deva yato bhartā hariravaika eva // GarP_3,19.30 //
analyzed: janmani asmin bhartṛ tā nā asti deva yatas bhartā hariḥ ava ekaḥ eva

original: yato loke sustriyaḥ sarva eva saṃdā jñeyā vidhavāste hi nityam /
analyzed: yatas loke sustriyaḥ sarve eva saṃdāḥ jñeyāḥ vidhavāḥ te hi nityam

original: anādi nityaṃ bhuvanaikasāraṃ susuṃdaraṃ mokṣadaṃ kāmadaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.31 //
analyzed: anādi nityam bhuvana eka sāram su suṃdaram mokṣa dam kāma dam ca

original: etādṛśaṃ na vijānanti yāstu sarvāstā vai vidhavāḥ sarvadaiva /
analyzed: etādṛśam na vijānanti yāḥ tu sarvāḥ tāḥ vai vidhavāḥ sarvadā eva

original: nimittabhūtaṃ bhartṛrūpaṃ ca jīvaṃ daivopetaṃ haribhaktyā vihīnam // GarP_3,19.32 //
analyzed: nimitta bhūtam bhartṛ rūpam ca jīvam daiva upetam hari bhaktyā vihīnam

original: sukaśmalaṃ navarandhraiḥ stravantaṃ durgandhayuktaṃ sarvadā kutsitaṃ ca /
analyzed: su kaśmalam nava randhraiḥ stravantam durgandha yuktam sarvadā kutsitam ca

original: etāḥ dṛśe bhartṛjīve nu tāta prayojanaṃ nāsti kṛṣṇaṃ vihāya // GarP_3,19.33 //
analyzed: etāḥ dṛśe bhartṛ jīve nu tāta prayojanam na asti kṛṣṇam vihāya

original: devastriyo nijabhartṝnvihāyu tatra sthitaṃ prīṇayantyeva nityam /
analyzed: deva striyaḥ nija bhartṝn vihāyu tatra sthitam prīṇayanti eva nityam

original: ataśca tāḥ sadhavāḥ sarvadaiva lokairvandyā nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,19.34 //
analyzed: atas ca tāḥ sa dhavāḥ sarvadā eva lokaiḥ vandyāḥ na atra vicāryam asti

original: bhartāste haribhaktā yadi syurāsāṃ strīṇāṃ janmasāphalyameva /
