analyzed: bhartāḥ te hari bhaktāḥ yadi syuḥ āsām strīṇām janma sāphalyam eva

original: anekajanmārjitapuṇyasaṃcayaistadbhartāro haribhaktā bhaveyuḥ // GarP_3,19.35 //
analyzed: aneka janma arjita puṇya saṃcayaiḥ tad bhartāraḥ hari bhaktāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: yadbhartāro haribhaktā na saṃti tābhistyājyaṃ svīyagātraṃ bhṛśaṃ hi /
analyzed: yad bhartāraḥ hari bhaktāḥ na saṃti tābhiḥ tyājyam svīya gātram bhṛśam hi

original: svabhartṛtaṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ hariṃ ca smṛtvā samyag yadi gātraṃ tyajeyuḥ // GarP_3,19.36 //
analyzed: sva bhartṛtam kṛṣṇa rūpam harim ca smṛtvā samyak yadi gātram tyajeyuḥ

original: tadā naiva hyātmahatyādidoṣāḥ strīṇāmevaṃ nirṇayoyaṃ hi śāstre /
analyzed: tadā nā eva hi ātmahatyā ādi doṣāḥ strīṇām evam nirṇayaḥ yam hi śāstre

original: yadbhartāro na vijānanti viṣṇuṃ tāsāṃ saṃgo naiva kāryaḥ kadāpi // GarP_3,19.37 //
analyzed: yad bhartāraḥ na vijānanti viṣṇum tāsām saṃgaḥ nā eva kāryaḥ kadāpi

original: aneka janmārjitapuṇyasaṃcayāttadbhartāro viṣṇubhaktā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: aneka janma arjita puṇya saṃcayāt tad bhartāraḥ viṣṇu bhaktāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: kalau yuge durlabhā viṣṇubhaktā harebhaktirdurlabhā sarvadaiva // GarP_3,19.38 //
analyzed: kalau yuge durlabhāḥ viṣṇu bhaktāḥ hare bhaktiḥ durlabhā sarvadā eva

original: hareḥ kathā durlabhā martyaloke harerdīkṣā durlabhā durlabhā ca /
analyzed: hareḥ kathā durlabhā martya loke hareḥ dīkṣā durlabhā durlabhā ca

original: harestattve nirṇayo durlabho hi harerdāsaiḥ saṃgamo durlabhaśca // GarP_3,19.39 //
analyzed: hareḥ tattve nirṇayaḥ durlabhaḥ hi hareḥ dāsaiḥ saṃgamaḥ durlabhaḥ ca

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ durlabhaṃ vai murārernamaskāro durlabho vai kalau ca /
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam durlabham vai murāreḥ namaskāraḥ durlabhaḥ vai kalau ca

original: tadbhaktānāṃ pālanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ durlabhaṃ hyannadānam // GarP_3,19.40 //
analyzed: tad bhaktānām pālanam durlabham ca sat vaiṣṇavānām durlabham hi anna dānam

original: tantroktapūjā durlabhā vai murārernāmagraho durlabhaścava viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: tantra ukta pūjā durlabhā vai murāreḥ nāma grahaḥ durlabhaḥ viṣṇoḥ

original: suvaiṣṇavānāṃ pujanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ durlabhaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.41 //
analyzed: su vaiṣṇavānām pujanam durlabham hi sat vaiṣṇavānām bhāṣaṇam durlabham ca

original: śālagrāmasparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ darśanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi /
analyzed: śālagrāma sparśanam durlabham ca sat vaiṣṇavānām darśanam durlabham hi

original: gosparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ martyaloke sadgāyanaṃ durlabhaṃ sadguruñca // GarP_3,19.42 //
analyzed: go sparśanam durlabham martya loke sat gāyanam durlabham sat gurum ca

original: sadbhāryāḥ satputrakā durlabhā hi śeṣācalasthasya hareśca darśanam /
analyzed: sat bhāryāḥ sat putrakāḥ durlabhāḥ hi śeṣa acala sthasya hareḥ ca darśanam

original: sudurlabhaṃ raṅganāthasya tīre kāveryā vai darśanaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ // GarP_3,19.43 //
analyzed: su durlabham raṅganāthasya tīre kāveryāḥ vai darśanam viṣṇupadyāḥ

original: kāñcīkṣetre varadarājasya sevā sudurlabhā darśanaṃ caiva loke /
analyzed: kāñcī kṣetre varadarājasya sevā su durlabhā darśanam ca eva loke

original: sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ rāmasetoḥ sudurlabhā madhvaśāstre ca śaktiḥ // GarP_3,19.44 //
analyzed: su durlabham darśanam rāmasetoḥ su durlabhā madhvaśāstre ca śaktiḥ

original: bhīmātīre saṃsthitasyāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: bhīmā tīre saṃsthitasya api viṣṇoḥ su durlabham darśanam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: revātīre saṃsthitasyāpi viṣṇorgayākṣetre viṣṇupādasya caiva // GarP_3,19.45 //
analyzed: revā tīre saṃsthitasya api viṣṇoḥ gayā kṣetre viṣṇupādasya ca eva

original: tathā badrau saṃsthita syāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ martyaloke sthitānām /
analyzed: tathā badrau viṣṇoḥ su durlabham martya loke sthitānām

original: śeṣācale śrīnivāsāśrame ca tapasvino durlabhā martyaloke // GarP_3,19.46 //
analyzed: śeṣa acale śrīnivāsa āśrame ca tapasvinaḥ durlabhāḥ martya loke

original: prayāgākhye mādhavasyāpi nityaṃ sudarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ hi // GarP_3,19.47 //
analyzed: prayāga ākhye mādhavasya api nityam sudarśanam durlabham vai nṛṇām hi

original: ato necchāmi bhartāraṃ kṛṣṇādanyaṃ kadācana /
analyzed: atas nā icchāmi bhartāram kṛṣṇāt anyam kadācana

original: evamuktvā sā pitaraṃ yayau śeṣācalaṃ prati // GarP_3,19.48 //
analyzed: evam uktvā sā pitaram yayau śeṣa acalam prati

original: kapilākhyamahātīrthe āruroha mahāgirim /
analyzed: kapila ākhya mahā tīrthe āruroha mahā girim

original: tatrasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā natvā mahāsatī // GarP_3,19.49 //
analyzed: tatrastham śrīnivāsam ca dṛṣṭvā natvā mahā satī

original: tridinaṃ samupoṣyātha gatvā pāpavināśanam /
analyzed: tri dinam samupoṣya atha gatvā pāpa vināśanam

original: tatrasnātvā vivāhārthamekāntaṃ prayayāvatha // GarP_3,19.50 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā vivāha artham ekāntam prayayau atha

original: tasyā uttaradigbhāge krośayugme mahātale /
analyzed: tasyāḥ uttara digbhāge krośa yugme mahā tale

original: gartabhūte ca ekānte cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,19.51 //
analyzed: garta bhūte ca ekānte cacāra tapaḥ uttamam

original: dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ tatrāsīcca kumārikā /
analyzed: dhyātvā nārāyaṇam devam tatra āsīt ca kumārikā

original: divyavarṣasahasrānte stotuṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,19.52 //
analyzed: divya varṣa sahasra ante stotum samupacakrame

original: kumāryuvāca /
analyzed: kumārī uvāca

original: tvameva mātā ca pitā tvameva bhartā ca sakhātvameva /
analyzed: tvam eva mātā ca pitā tvam eva bhartā ca sakhā tvam eva

original: tvameva putraśca gururgarīyānmitraṃ svasā tvaṃ mama vallabhaśca // GarP_3,19.53 //
analyzed: tvam eva putraḥ ca guruḥ garīyān mitram svasā tvam mama vallabhaḥ ca

original: anādyananteṣvapi janmasu prabho vicāryamāṇā na vijānepyahaṃ ca /
analyzed: anādi ananteṣu api janmasu prabho vicāryamāṇā na vijānepi aham ca

original: etai hi sarve ca nimittamātrataḥ pitrādayastvaṃ hyanimittamātrataḥ // GarP_3,19.54 //
analyzed: etaiḥ hi sarve ca nimitta mātrataḥ pitṛ ādayaḥ tvam hi animitta mātrataḥ

original: ato murāreśca tavaiva bhāryā bhūyāsamityeva tadā vrataṃ me /
analyzed: atas murāreḥ ca tava eva bhāryā bhūyāsam iti eva tadā vratam me

original: duḥ saṃgamātrādisamāgamaṃ na saṃsiddhirityeva vadānyamūrte // GarP_3,19.55 //
analyzed: duḥ saṃga mātra ādi samāgamam na saṃsiddhiḥ iti eva vadānya mūrte

original: tvaddūṣakāṇāṃ tava dāsavarya vidūṣakāṇāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi deva /
analyzed: tvad dūṣakāṇām tava dāsa varya vidūṣakāṇām darśanam chindhi deva

original: gurudruhāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi viṣṇo bhaktadruhāṃ mitratāṃ chindhi kṛṣṇa // GarP_3,19.56 //
analyzed: guru druhām darśanam chindhi viṣṇo bhakta druhām mitra tām chindhi kṛṣṇa

original: tava dhrugbhirbhāṣaṇaṃ chindhi deva tvaṃ saṃgamaṃ dehi padāravinde /
analyzed: tava dhrugbhiḥ bhāṣaṇam chindhi deva tvam saṃgamam dehi pada aravinde

original: śrīśailavāsāya namonamaste namonamaḥ śrīnivāsāya tubhyam // GarP_3,19.57 //
analyzed: śrīśaila vāsāya namaḥ namaḥ te namaḥ namaḥ śrīnivāsāya tubhyam

original: svāmin parāvara rameśa nidānamūrte kālo mahānapi gataśca nidarśanante /
analyzed: svāmin parāvara rama īśa nidāna mūrte kālaḥ mahān api gataḥ ca nidarśana ante

original: anantajanmārjitasādhanaiśca tvaddarśanaṃ syācca caturbhujasya // GarP_3,19.58 //
analyzed: ananta janma arjita sādhanaiḥ ca tvad darśanam syāt ca caturbhujasya

original: kathaṃ mama syāttava darśanaṃ prabho sarvaiśca doṣaiśca susaṃgatāyāḥ /
analyzed: katham mama syāt tava darśanam prabho sarvaiḥ ca doṣaiḥ ca su saṃgatāyāḥ

original: dāsyāspadāyāstava dāsadāsyāḥ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa // GarP_3,19.59 //
analyzed: dāsī āspadāyāḥ tava dāsa dāsyāḥ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa

original: evaṃ stutastathā viṣṇuḥ śrīnivāso dayānidhiḥ /
analyzed: evam stutaḥ tathā viṣṇuḥ śrīnivāsaḥ dayā nidhiḥ

original: prādurāsīdvaradarāṭ bhaktyā tasyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_3,19.60 //
analyzed: prādurāsīt vara da rāj bhaktyā tasyāḥ janārdanaḥ

original: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varadohamihāgataḥ /
analyzed: varam varaya bhadram te vara doham iha āgataḥ

original: hariṇodīritaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā prāha smitānanā // GarP_3,19.61 //
analyzed: hariṇā udīritam vākyam śrutvā prāha smita ānanā

original: uvāca parayā bhaktyā śrīnivāsaṃ jagatprabhum /
analyzed: uvāca parayā bhaktyā śrīnivāsam jagatprabhum

original: ahaṃ hi bhāryā bhūyāsaṃ tava mādhava suṃdara // GarP_3,19.62 //
analyzed: aham hi bhāryā bhūyāsam tava mādhava suṃdara

original: iti tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā śrīnivāso 'bravīdvacaḥ /
analyzed: iti tasyāḥ vacaḥ śrutvā śrīnivāsaḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: śrībhagavānuvāca /
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: ahaṃ kumāri subhage kṛṣṇajanmani bhūtale // GarP_3,19.63 //
analyzed: aham kumāri subhage kṛṣṇa janmani bhū tale

original: bhavāmi tava bhartāhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: bhavāmi tava bhartā aham na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: evamuktā sutā kanyā puraṇyarāśiṃ hariṃ param // GarP_3,19.64 //
analyzed: evam uktā sutā kanyā puraṇyarāśim harim param

original: uvāca paramaprītā harṣagadgadayā girā /
analyzed: uvāca parama prītā harṣa gadgadayā girā

original: kanyovāca /
analyzed: kanyā uvāca

original: kṛṣṇajanmanyahaṃ patnī bhūyāsaṃ prathamehani // GarP_3,19.65 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa janmani aham patnī bhūyāsam prathamehani

original: saṃskārātprathamaṃ cāhamaṃ ganābhyaḥ samāvṛṇe /
analyzed: saṃskārāt prathamam ca ahamam samāvṛṇe

original: omityuktaḥ punarvākyamuvāca madhusūdanaḥ // GarP_3,19.66 //
analyzed: om iti uktaḥ punar vākyam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: śrībhagavānuvāca /
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: kumāryā vidhṛtatvācca matpradānācca bhāmini /
analyzed: kumāryāḥ vidhṛta tvāt ca mad pradānāt ca bhāmini

original: teṣāṃ manobhīṣṭasiddhirbhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,19.67 //
analyzed: teṣām manaḥ abhīṣṭa siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: iti tasyai varaṃ dattvā tatraivāntaradhīyata /
analyzed: iti tasyai varam dattvā tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: dehaṃ tatraiva saṃtyajya kumārī caiva putrikā // GarP_3,19.68 //
analyzed: deham tatra eva saṃtyajya kumārī ca eva putrikā

original: kumbha kasya gṛhe jātā nīlā nāmnā tu sā smṛtā /
analyzed: kumbha kasya gṛhe jātā nīlā nāmnā tu sā smṛtā

original: kuṃbhakastu mahābhāga nandaśobhasya śālakaḥ // GarP_3,19.69 //
analyzed: kuṃbhakaḥ tu mahābhāga nanda śobhasya śālakaḥ

original: kalpavāhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ prathamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kalpavāhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ pitṝṇām prathamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tasya gatvā gṛhamahaṃ vṛṣabhācalavāsinaḥ /
analyzed: tasya gatvā gṛham aham vṛṣabhācala vāsinaḥ

original: śivasya varataścaiva tvajeyaḥ khagasattama // GarP_3,19.70 //
analyzed: śivasya varataḥ ca eva tu ajeyaḥ khaga sattama

original: ditijānvinihatyaiva nīlā prāptā khageśvara /
analyzed: ditijān vinihatya eva nīlā prāptā khageśvara

original: tato nāgnijito rājño gṛhe jātā kumārikā // GarP_3,19.71 //
analyzed: tatas nā agnijitaḥ rājñaḥ gṛhe jātā kumārikā

original: nāgnijitkavyavāhobhūtkanyā nīlāhvayābhavat /
analyzed: nā agnijit kavyavāhaḥ bhūt kanyā nīlāhvayā bhavat

original: tasyāḥ svayaṃvare cāhaṃ govṛṣānsaptasaṃkhyakān // GarP_3,19.72 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ svayaṃvare ca aham go vṛṣān sapta saṃkhyakān

original: śivasya varataścaivāpyavadhyāndevamānuṣaiḥ /
analyzed: śivasya varatas ca eva api avadhyān deva mānuṣaiḥ

original: baddhvā vṛṣānnṛpāñjitvā prāptā nīlā mahākhaga // GarP_3,19.73 //
analyzed: baddhvā vṛṣān nṛpān jitvā prāptā nīlā mahā khaga

original: kuṃbhakasya sutā nīlā dehasthāḥ prāviśan bhṛśam /
analyzed: kuṃbhakasya sutāḥ nīlāḥ deha sthāḥ prāviśan bhṛśam

original: ekāvayavato yasmāttasmāttatraiva sāviśat // GarP_3,19.74 //
analyzed: eka avayavataḥ yasmāt tasmāt tatra eva sā aviśat

original: bhūmau dvidhā saṃprajātā kumāryeva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: bhūmau dvidhā saṃprajātā kumārī eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: bhadrājanma pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama // GarP_3,19.75 //
analyzed: bhadrājanma pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe nīlāvivāhanirṇayo nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe nīlāvivāhanirṇayaḥ nāma ekonaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 20
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: yā pūrvasarge nalasaṃjñasya vīndra putrī bhūtvā viṣṇupatnī sakāmā /
analyzed: yā pūrva sarge nala saṃjñasya vīndra putrī bhūtvā viṣṇu patnī sa kāmā

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ bhramaṇaṃ vai cakāra guṇena bhadrā bhadrasaṃjñā babhūva // GarP_3,20.1 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam bhramaṇam vai cakāra guṇena bhadrā bhadra saṃjñā babhūva

original: kanyābhāve saṃsthitāṃ bhadrasaṃjñāṃ pitā nalastvabravīttāṃ sa paśyan /
analyzed: kanyā abhāve saṃsthitām bhadra saṃjñām pitā nalaḥ tu abravīt tām sa paśyan

original: bhadre kimarthaṃ gātrapīḍāṃ karoṣi phalaṃ hi tannandini me vadasva // GarP_3,20.2 //
analyzed: bhadre kimartham gātra pīḍām karoṣi phalam hi tat nandini me vadasva

original: bhadrovāca /
analyzed: bhadrā uvāca

original: śṛṇutvaṃ me tāta namaskriyādeḥ phalaṃ vaktuṃ kā samarthā bhavecca // GarP_3,20.3 //
analyzed: śṛṇutvam me tāta namaskriyā ādeḥ phalam vaktum kā samarthā bhavet ca

original: tathāpyahaṃ tava vakṣyāmi tāta yathāśaktyā śṛṇu samyagghitāya /
analyzed: tathā api aham tava vakṣyāmi tāta yathāśaktyā śṛṇu samyak hitāya

original: sadā harimarma nātho dayālurahaṃ harestava dāsānudāsī /
analyzed: sadā hari marma nāthaḥ dayāluḥ aham hareḥ tava dāsa anudāsī

original: māṃ pāhi viṣṇostava vande pade ityuktvā praṇāmaṃ cākaroddaṇḍarūpam // GarP_3,20.4 //
analyzed: mām pāhi viṣṇoḥ tava vande pade iti uktvā praṇāmam ca akarot daṇḍa rūpam

original: hareḥ praṇāmaṃ tviti kartavyaśūnyaṃ vyarthaṃ tamāhurjñāninastacchṛṇu tvam /
analyzed: hareḥ praṇāmam tu iti kartavya śūnyam vyartham tam āhuḥ jñāninaḥ tat śṛṇu tvam

original: rameśa madhveśa sarasvatīśetyevaṃ vadanpraṇamedviṣṇudevam // GarP_3,20.5 //
analyzed: rama īśa madhveśa sarasvatī īśa iti evam vadan praṇamet viṣṇu devam

original: yathā prasanno vandanāddevaddeva stathā na tuṣṭaḥ pūjanātkarmataśca /
analyzed: yathā prasannaḥ vandanāt devaddevaḥ stathā na tuṣṭaḥ pūjanāt karmataḥ ca

original: yathā nāmasmaraṇādvandanādvā pāpānniyacchetu tathā na cānyaiḥ // GarP_3,20.6 //
analyzed: yathā nāma smaraṇāt vandanāt vā pāpāt niyacchetu tathā na ca anyaiḥ

original: dehaṃ tu ye poṣayantyeva tāta hareḥ praṇāmaiḥ śūnyabhūtaṃ ca puṣṭam /
analyzed: deham tu ye poṣayanti eva tāta hareḥ praṇāmaiḥ śūnya bhūtam ca puṣṭam

original: tadevamāhurvyarthameveti tāta tatpoṣakāṇāṃ narake duḥ khamāhuḥ // GarP_3,20.7 //
analyzed: tat evam āhuḥ vyartham evā iti tāta tad poṣakāṇām narake duḥ kham āhuḥ

original: yamo 'pi taṃ tatra ulūkhale tu nidhāya piṣṭaṃ sukhalaiḥ karoti /
analyzed: yamaḥ pi tam tatra ulūkhale tu nidhāya piṣṭam su khalaiḥ karoti

original: yo vā paraṃ na karotyeva tāta pradakṣiṇaṃ devadevasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_3,20.8 //
analyzed: yaḥ vā param na karoti eva tāta pradakṣiṇam devadevasya viṣṇoḥ

original: tasyaiva pādau talayantre nidhāya yamaśca nityaṃ prakaroti piṣṭam /
analyzed: tasya eva pādau talayantre nidhāya yamaḥ ca nityam prakaroti piṣṭam

original: eṣāṃ jihvā harikṛṣṇeti nāma na vakti nityaṃ vyarthabhūtāṃ vadanti // GarP_3,20.9 //
analyzed: eṣām jihvā hari kṛṣṇā iti nāma na vakti nityam vyartha bhūtām vadanti

original: teṣāṃ jihvā yamaloke yamastu niṣkāsya piṣṭaṃ prakaroti nityam /
analyzed: teṣām jihvā yama loke yamaḥ tu niṣkāsya piṣṭam prakaroti nityam

original: kāśīnivāsena ca kiṃ prayojanaṃ kiṃ vā prayāge maraṇena tāta // GarP_3,20.10 //
analyzed: kāśīnivāsena ca kim prayojanam kim vā prayāge maraṇena tāta

original: kiṃ vāraṇāgre maraṇena saukhyaṃ kiṃ vā makhādeḥ samanuṣṭhitena /
analyzed: kim vā araṇa agre maraṇena saukhyam kim vā makha ādeḥ samanuṣṭhitena

original: samastatīrtheṣvaṭanena kiṃ kimadhītaśāstreṇa sutīkṣṇabuddhyā // GarP_3,20.11 //
analyzed: samasta tīrtheṣu aṭanena kim kim adhīta śāstreṇa su tīkṣṇa buddhyā

original: yeṣāṃ jihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti yeṣāṃ gātrairnamanaṃ nāpi viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām jihvā agre hari nāmā eva nā asti yeṣām gātraiḥ namanam nā api viṣṇoḥ

original: yeṣāṃ padbhyāṃ nāsti hareḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ teṣāṃ sarvaṃ vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,20.12 //
analyzed: yeṣām padbhyām nā asti hareḥ pradakṣiṇam teṣām sarvam vyartham āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: haryarpaṇādrihitaṃ nāma kasmātpradakṣiṇaṃ namanaṃ cāhurarghyam /
analyzed: hari arpaṇa adri hitam nāma kasmāt pradakṣiṇam namanam ca āhuḥ arghyam

original: ato viṣṇornamanaṃ kāryameva harernāmasmaraṇaṃ tāta kāryam // GarP_3,20.13 //
analyzed: atas viṣṇoḥ namanam kāryam eva hareḥ nāma smaraṇam tāta kāryam

original: janma hyetaddurlabhaṃ naśvaraṃ tu yathā jalasthaṃ tattathaiva /
analyzed: janma hi etat durlabham naśvaram tu yathā jala stham tat tathā eva

original: no visvāsaṃ kuru gātre tvadīye jīveṣvapi svaḥ paraśceti tāta // GarP_3,20.14 //
analyzed: no visvāsam kuru gātre tvadīye jīveṣu api svaḥ paraḥ ca iti tāta

original: sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ namanaṃ na tvadīyaṃ sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ smaraṇaṃ na tvadīyam /
analyzed: sadyas kṛtam namanam na tvadīyam sadyas kṛtam smaraṇam na tvadīyam

original: kadā prāpsye maraṇaṃ tanna jāne na viśvāsaṃ kuru gātre mahātman // GarP_3,20.15 //
analyzed: kadā prāpsye maraṇam tat na jāne na viśvāsam kuru gātre mahātman

original: etacchrutvā nalo vīndra putrīvākyaṃ sunirmalam /
analyzed: etat śrutvā nalaḥ vīndra putrī vākyam su nirmalam

original: namaskāraṃ ca kṛtavānyathāśaktyā pradakṣiṇam // GarP_3,20.16 //
analyzed: namaskāram ca kṛtavān yathāśaktyā pradakṣiṇam

original: sāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ cakre namaskāraṃ sadā hareḥ /
analyzed: sā api pradakṣiṇam cakre namaskāram sadā hareḥ

original: evaṃ bahudinaṃ kṛtvā dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ param // GarP_3,20.17 //
analyzed: evam bahu dinam kṛtvā dhyātvā nārāyaṇam param

original: kalevaraṃ ca tatyāja maraṇe haricintayā /
analyzed: kalevaram ca tatyāja maraṇe hari cintayā

original: matpiturvasudevasya bhaginyā udare khaga // GarP_3,20.18 //
analyzed: mad pituḥ vasudevasya bhaginyāḥ udare khaga

original: kaikeyīti ca nāmnā sā tvabhavadbhadrasaṃjñakā /
analyzed: kaikeyī iti ca nāmnā sā tu abhavat bhadra saṃjñakā

original: yasmādbhadraguṇairyuktā bhadrā sā bhadranāmikā // GarP_3,20.19 //
analyzed: yasmāt bhadra guṇaiḥ yuktā bhadrā sā bhadra nāmikā

original: tasyātmajaiśca kaikeyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ khagasattama /
analyzed: tasya ātmajaiḥ ca kaikeyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ khaga sattama

original: pratyāhṛtāmimāṃ bhadrāṃ prāptavān khagasattama // GarP_3,20.20 //
analyzed: pratyāhṛtām imām bhadrām prāptavān khaga sattama

original: vakṣyehaṃ mitravindāyāḥ pāṇigrahaṇakāraṇam /
analyzed: vakṣye iham mitravindāyāḥ pāṇigrahaṇa kāraṇam

original: sāvadhānamanā bhūtvā śṛṇu pakṣīndra sattama // GarP_3,20.21 //
analyzed: sa avadhāna manāḥ bhūtvā śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: mitravindovāca /
analyzed: mitravindā uvāca

original: yānpūrvasargepyavṛṇonnikāmato hyagnīṣomānnāmikā mitravindā /
analyzed: yān pūrva sarge api avṛṇot nikāmataḥ hi agnīṣomān nāmikā mitravindā

original: mitraṃ hariṃ prāptukāmā sadaika tatropāyaṃ cintayāmāsadevī // GarP_3,20.22 //
analyzed: mitram harim prāptu kāmā sadā eka tatra upāyam cintayāmāsa devī

original: hariprāptau sādhanāḥ saṃti teṣu mukhyaṃ kaciccintayāmāsa devī /
analyzed: hari prāptau sādhanāḥ saṃti teṣu mukhyam kacit cintayāmāsa devī

original: teṣāṃ madhye śravaṇaṃ śreṣṭhamāhuḥ purāṇānāṃ sāttvikānāṃ sadāpi // GarP_3,20.23 //
analyzed: teṣām madhye śravaṇam śreṣṭham āhuḥ purāṇānām sāttvikānām sadā api

original: viṣṇorutkarṣo vartate yatra vāyostathotkarṣaḥ sajjanānāṃ purāṇe /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ utkarṣaḥ vartate yatra vāyoḥ tathā utkarṣaḥ sat janānām purāṇe

original: śrāddhaṃ sadā viṣṇubuddhyā sadaiva nānyacchrāvyaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra caiva // GarP_3,20.24 //
analyzed: śrāddham sadā viṣṇu buddhyā sadā eva na anyat śrāvyam sādhanam tatra ca eva

original: yasmindine śravaṇaṃ nāsti viṣṇosteṣāṃ janma vyarthamāhuḥ kathāyām /
analyzed: yasmin dine śravaṇam nā asti viṣṇoḥ teṣām janma vyartham āhuḥ kathāyām

original: snāna japaḥ pañcayajñaṃ vrataṃ ca iṣṭāpūrte kṛcchracāndro ca dattam // GarP_3,20.25 //
analyzed: snāna japaḥ pañcayajñam vratam ca iṣṭāpūrte ca dattam

original: sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca dīkṣā kathāṃ vinā samyaganuṣṭhitāṃ vai /
analyzed: sarvam vyartham vaiṣṇavānām ca dīkṣā kathām vinā samyak anuṣṭhitām vai

original: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sasaṃpradāyairgurubhiḥ saṃyutaiśca // GarP_3,20.26 //
analyzed: yaiḥ na śrutam bhāgavatam purāṇam sa saṃpradāyaiḥ gurubhiḥ saṃyutaiḥ ca

original: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ yairna śrutaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ purāṇam /
analyzed: yaiḥ na śrutam bhāgavatam purāṇam yaiḥ na śrutam brahmakāṇḍam purāṇam

original: teṣāṃ janma vyarthamāhurmamahāntastasmācchrāvyā harivārtā sadaiva // GarP_3,20.27 //
analyzed: teṣām janma vyartham āhuḥ tasmāt śrāvyā hari vārtā sadā eva

original: na yatra govindakathāmahānadī na yatra nārāyaṇapādasaṃśrayaḥ /
analyzed: na yatra govinda kathā mahā nadī na yatra nārāyaṇa pāda saṃśrayaḥ

original: na yatra viṣṇoḥ satataṃ vacosti na saṃvasettatkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit // GarP_3,20.28 //
analyzed: na yatra viṣṇoḥ satatam vacaḥ asti na saṃvaset tad kṣaṇa mātram kathañcid

original: yasmin grāme bhāgavataṃ na śāstraṃ na vartate bhāgavatā rasajñāḥ /
analyzed: yasmin grāme bhāgavatam na śāstram na vartate bhāgavatāḥ rasa jñāḥ

original: yasmin gṛhe nāsti gītārthasāraḥ yasmin grāme nāma sahasrakaṃ vā // GarP_3,20.29 //
analyzed: yasmin gṛhe na asti gīta artha sāraḥ yasmin grāme nāma sahasrakam vā

original: tayo rasajñā yatra na santi tatra na saṃvasetkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit /
analyzed: tayoḥ rasajñāḥ yatra na santi tatra na saṃvaset kṣaṇa mātram kathañcid

original: yasmin dine divyakathā ca viṣṇorna vāsti jantostasya cāyurvṛthaiva // GarP_3,20.30 //
analyzed: yasmin dine divya kathā ca viṣṇoḥ na vā asti jantoḥ tasya ca āyuḥ vṛthā eva

original: garbhe gate nātra vicāryamasti tanmanyate durlabhaṃ martyaloke /
analyzed: garbhe gate na atra vicāryam asti tat manyate durlabham martya loke

original: karṇaṃ kalpairbhūṣitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca na suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryā rasajñāḥ // GarP_3,20.31 //
analyzed: karṇam kalpaiḥ bhūṣitam suṃdaram ca na suṃdaram ca āhuḥ āryāḥ rasajñāḥ

original: viṣṇoḥ kathākhyābharaṇaiśca yuktaṃ tadeva karṇaṃ suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ kathā ākhya ābharaṇaiḥ ca yuktam tat eva karṇam suṃdaram ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: tasmātsadā bhāgavatārthasāraṃ śṛṇvanti ye satataṃ vācayanti // GarP_3,20.32 //
analyzed: tasmāt sadā bhāgavata artha sāram śṛṇvanti ye satatam vācayanti

original: teṣāṃ janma svasthamāhurmahānto mahatphalaṃ cāsti tathaiva teṣām /
analyzed: teṣām janma svastham āhuḥ mahāntaḥ mahat phalam ca asti tathā eva teṣām

original: soṣṇīṣakañcukayutāśca hareḥ kathāṃ vai śṛṇvanti yepi ca paṭhanti sadaiva martyāḥ // GarP_3,20.33 //
analyzed: sa uṣṇīṣa kañcuka yutāḥ ca hareḥ kathām vai śṛṇvanti ye api ca paṭhanti sadā eva martyāḥ

original: sarvepi te pūjanīyā hi loke na vai śiśre codare caiva saktāḥ /
analyzed: sarve api te pūjanīyāḥ hi loke na vai ca udare ca eva saktāḥ

original: ye dākṣiṇyādarthalobhādvadanti sadā purāṇaṃ bhagavattattvasāram // GarP_3,20.34 //
analyzed: ye dākṣiṇyāt artha lobhāt vadanti sadā purāṇam bhagavat tattva sāram

original: pracchādayante tattvagopyāni ye tu teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: pracchādayante tattva gopyāni ye tu teṣām gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadā eva

original: ye dharmakāṇḍe karmakāṇḍe sadaiva utpādayante suruciṃ tatra nityam // GarP_3,20.35 //
analyzed: ye dharma kāṇḍe karma kāṇḍe sadā eva utpādayante su rucim tatra nityam

original: maulyena ye kathayeyuḥ purāṇaṃ teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūrya sunaḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: maulyena ye kathayeyuḥ purāṇam teṣām gatiḥ sūrya sunaḥ sadā eva

original: maulyena ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śṛṇvanti vai hariśāstrārthatattvam // GarP_3,20.36 //
analyzed: maulyena ye bhāgavatam purāṇam śṛṇvanti vai hari śāstra artha tattvam

original: maulyena vedādhyayanaṃ prakurvate teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: maulyena veda adhyayanam prakurvate teṣām gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadā eva

original: yadṛcchayā prāptadhanena ye tu saṃtuṣṭāste hyatra yogyāḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,20.37 //
analyzed: yadṛcchayā prāpta dhanena ye tu saṃtuṣṭāḥ te hi atra yogyāḥ sadā eva

original: dhanārjane ye tvatitṛṣṇābhiyuktāsteṣāṃ na vai bhāgavatedhikāraḥ /
analyzed: dhana arjane ye tu ati tṛṣṇā abhiyuktāḥ teṣām na vai bhāgavata idhikāraḥ

original: matvā loke harirevati nityamantaryāmī nāsti tadanya īśaḥ // GarP_3,20.38 //
analyzed: matvā loke hariḥ evati nityam antaryāmī na asti tad anyaḥ īśaḥ

original: evaṃ sadā ye pravicintayanti yogakṣemaṃ bibhṛyādviṣṇureṣām /
analyzed: evam sadā ye pravicintayanti yogakṣemam bibhṛyāt viṣṇuḥ eṣām

original: sadvaiṣṇavānāmaśubhaṃ nāsti nāsti pradṛśyate saṃśayajñānarūpāt // GarP_3,20.39 //
analyzed: sat vaiṣṇavānām aśubham na asti na asti pradṛśyate saṃśaya jñāna rūpāt

original: karmānusāreṇa harirdadāti phalaṃ śubhānāmaśubhasya caiva /
analyzed: karma anusāreṇa hariḥ dadāti phalam śubhānām aśubhasya ca eva

original: atastadarthaṃ naiva yatnaṃ ca kuryāddhanārthaṃ vai haritattve ca kuryāt // GarP_3,20.40 //
analyzed: atas tad artham nā eva yatnam ca kuryāt dhana artham vai hari tattve ca kuryāt

original: ataḥ snātvā divyamantraṃ japitvā visarjayitvā viṣṇunirmālyagandham /
analyzed: atas snātvā divya mantram japitvā visarjayitvā viṣṇu nirmālya gandham

original: śucirbhūtvā bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ saṃśrāvayetsarvavettāpi nityam // GarP_3,20.41 //
analyzed: śuciḥ bhūtvā bhāgavatam purāṇam saṃśrāvayet sarva vettā api nityam

original: karmānusāreṇa dhanārjanaṃ ca vedārjanaṃ śāstrasamārjanaṃ ca /
analyzed: karma anusāreṇa dhana arjanam ca veda arjanam śāstra samārjanam ca

original: bhaviṣyati śravaṇaṃ cāpi viṣṇoratyādarācchravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca // GarP_3,20.42 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati śravaṇam ca api viṣṇoḥ ati ādarāt śravaṇam durghaṭam ca

original: atyādarādbhāgavatasya sāramāsvādayeddurghaṭaṃ martyaloke /
analyzed: atyādarāt bhāgavatasya sāram āsvādayet durghaṭam martya loke

original: āsvādya tadbhāgavataṃ purāṇamānandabāṣpairyuktatā durghaṭā ca // GarP_3,20.43 //
analyzed: āsvādya tat bhāgavatam purāṇam ānanda bāṣpaiḥ yukta tā durghaṭā ca

original: śrutvā tattvā nāṃ nirṇayaṃ dhāraṇaṃ ca sudurghaṭaṃ cāhurāryāḥ samastam /
analyzed: śrutvā tattvāḥ nām nirṇayam dhāraṇam ca su durghaṭam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ samastam

original: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca // GarP_3,20.44 //
analyzed: śrutvā tattvānām dhāraṇa anantaram ca kāma krudhoḥ jāraṇam durghaṭam ca

original: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānaṃ taraṃ ta tathā yoge durghaṭaṃ saṃgataṃ ca // GarP_3,20.45 //
analyzed: śrutvā tattvānām tathā yoge durghaṭam saṃgatam ca

original: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
analyzed: śrutvā tattvānām dhāraṇa anantaram ca kāma krudhoḥ jāraṇam durghaṭam ca

original: ete doṣā jñānapūtānapīha kurvanti saṃdehayutānsadaiva // GarP_3,20.46 //
analyzed: ete doṣāḥ jñāna pūtān api iha kurvanti saṃdeha yutān sadā eva

original: ato hyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ satkathāyāḥ sadā kariṣye nātra vicāryamasti /
analyzed: atas hi aham śravaṇam sat kathāyāḥ sadā kariṣye na atra vicāryam asti

original: tenāpyahaṃ harināmābhivāñchā niścitya cittaṃ śravaṇe vai cakāra /
analyzed: tena api aham hari nāma abhivāñchā niścitya cittam śravaṇe vai cakāra

original: ādehamevaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca kṛtvā tyaktvā dehaṃ bhūtale saṃprajātā // GarP_3,20.47 //
analyzed: ādeham evam śravaṇam ca kṛtvā tyaktvā deham bhū tale saṃprajātā

original: nivastuṃ vasudevasya bhaginyā udare khaga /
analyzed: nivastum vasudevasya bhaginyāḥ udare khaga

original: sumitrā saṃjñakāyāṃ ca jātā vai mitravindikā // GarP_3,20.48 //
analyzed: sumitrā saṃjñakāyām ca jātā vai mitravindikā

original: śravaṇena hariṃ mitraṃ prāptā sā mitravindikā /
analyzed: śravaṇena harim mitram prāptā sā mitravindikā

original: ataḥ sā mitravindeti saṃjñayā saṃbabhūva ha // GarP_3,20.49 //
analyzed: atas sā mitravindā iti saṃjñayā saṃbabhūva ha

original: svayaṃvare mitravindā rājñāṃ madhye tu bhāminī /
analyzed: svayaṃvare mitravindā rājñām madhye tu bhāminī

original: mamāṃse vyasṛjanmālāṃ tāṃ gṛhītvā khageśvara /
analyzed: mama aṃse vyasṛjat mālām tām gṛhītvā khageśvara

original: vidhūya nṛpatīnsarvānpurīṃ prāptāḥ khageśvara //
analyzed: vidhūya nṛpatīn sarvān purīm prāptāḥ khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhadrākṛtabhagavatpatitvaprāpakatapaścaryādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhadrākṛtabhagavatpatitvaprāpakatapaścaryādinirūpaṇam nāma viṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 21
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: kālindyā api cotpattiṃ pravakṣyāmi khageśvara /
analyzed: kālindyāḥ api ca utpattim pravakṣyāmi khageśvara

original: vivasvānnāma sūryobhattasya putrī vyajāyata // GarP_3,21.1 //
analyzed: vivasvān nāma sūryaḥ bhattasya putrī vyajāyata

original: kālindīsaṃjñakā vīndra yamunā yānujā smṛtā /
analyzed: kālindī saṃjñakā vīndra yamunā yā anujā smṛtā

original: kṛṣṇapatnītvakāmena cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,21.2 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa patnī tva kāmena cacāra tapaḥ uttamam

original: tapa ālocanaṃ proktaṃ tattvānāṃ ca vinirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tapaḥ ālocanam proktam tattvānām ca vinirṇayaḥ

original: pūrvārjitānāṃ pāpānāmanutāpastapaḥ smṛtam // GarP_3,21.3 //
analyzed: pūrva arjitānām pāpānām anutāpaḥ tapaḥ smṛtam

original: prāyo nāma tapaḥ proktaṃ cittanigraha ucyate /
analyzed: prāyas nāma tapaḥ proktam citta nigrahaḥ ucyate

original: prāyaścittamiti proktaṃ na tu kṣauraṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,21.4 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam iti proktam na tu kṣauram khageśvara

original: anutāpayutaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṇu tvaṃ khageśvara /
analyzed: anutāpa yutam bhūtam tat śaṇu tvam khageśvara

original: pūrvaṃ na japtaṃ divyamantraṃ mukunda taptaṃ sadā kleśadāvānalena // GarP_3,21.5 //
analyzed: pūrvam na japtam divya mantram mukunda taptam sadā kleśa dāva analena

original: na vai smṛtaṃ harināmāmṛtaṃ ca sadā smṛtaṃ haridoṣādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: na vai smṛtam hari nāma amṛtam ca sadā smṛtam hari doṣa ādikam ca

original: na tu smṛtaṃ haritattvāmṛtaṃ ca samyak śrutaṃ lolavārtādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,21.6 //
analyzed: na tu smṛtam hari tattva amṛtam ca samyak śrutam lola vārttā ādikam ca

original: na pūjitaṃ haripādāravindaṃ supūjitāḥ putramitrādikāśca /
analyzed: na pūjitam hari pāda aravindam su pūjitāḥ putra mitra ādikāḥ ca

original: na vanditaṃ haripādāravindaṃ suvandito mitrapādaḥ sughoraḥ // GarP_3,21.7 //
analyzed: na vanditam hari pāda aravindam su vanditaḥ mitra pādaḥ su ghoraḥ

original: na dṛṣṭaṃ vai dhūpadhūmrairupetaṃ harervakraṃ kuntalaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: na dṛṣṭam vai dhūpa dhūmraiḥ upetam hareḥ vakram kuntalaiḥ saṃvṛtam ca

original: putrādikaṃ lālitaṃ vai mukunda na lālitaṃ tava vakraṃ murāre // GarP_3,21.8 //
analyzed: putra ādikam lālitam vai mukunda na lālitam tava vakram murāre

original: sulālitaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ putramitraṃ na lālitaṃ sarvapāpāpahāri /
analyzed: su lālitam bhūṣaṇaiḥ putra mitram na lālitam sarva pāpa apahāri

original: na bhuktaṃ vai harinairavedyaśeṣaṃ mitrālaye ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca bhuktam // GarP_3,21.9 //
analyzed: na bhuktam vai hari nairavedya śeṣam mitra ālaye ṣaṣ rasa annam ca bhuktam

original: supuṣpagandhā nārpitā te murāre samarpitāḥ putramitrādikebhyaḥ /
analyzed: su puṣpa gandhā nā arpitā te murāre samarpitāḥ putra mitra ādikebhyaḥ

original: santaptohaṃ putramitrādikeṣu kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.10 //
analyzed: santaptaḥ aham putra mitra ādikeṣu kadā drakṣye tava vaktram mukunda

original: avaiṣṇavānnaiḥ śigruśākādikaiśca hyanarpitānnaiśca tathāpyasaṃskṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: avaiṣṇava annaiḥ śigru śāka ādikaiḥ ca hi anarpita annaiḥ ca tathā api asaṃskṛtaiḥ

original: tathāpyabhakṣyai rasanā ca dagdhā kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.11 //
analyzed: tathā api abhakṣyaiḥ rasanā ca dagdhā kadā drakṣye tava vaktram mukunda

original: aṣṭākṣarīpūjayā divyatīrthairviṣṇoḥ purā bhrāmitaiḥ śaṅkhatīrthaiḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭākṣarī pūjayā divya tīrthaiḥ viṣṇoḥ purā bhrāmitaiḥ śaṅkhatīrthaiḥ

original: na pāvitaṃ maccharīraṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava va ktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.12 //
analyzed: na pāvitam mad śarīram murāre kadā drakṣye tava mukunda

original: anarpitairgandhapuṣpādikaiśca anarpitairbhūṣaṇairvastrajātaiḥ /
analyzed: an arpitaiḥ gandha puṣpa ādikaiḥ ca an arpitaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ vastra jātaiḥ

original: avaiṣṇavānāṃ digdhagandhādidoṣairgātraṃ dagdhaṃ kadā hyuddhariṣye mukunda // GarP_3,21.13 //
analyzed: avaiṣṇavānām digdha gandha ādi doṣaiḥ gātram dagdham kadā hi uddhariṣye mukunda

original: dagdhau ca pādau mama vāsudeva na gacchantau kṣetrapathaṃ hareśca /
analyzed: dagdhau ca pādau mama vāsudeva na gacchantau kṣetra patham hareḥ ca

original: netre ca dagdhe mama sarvadāpi nālokitaṃ tava deva pratīkam // GarP_3,21.14 //
analyzed: netre ca dagdhe mama sarvadā api na ālokitam tava deva pratīkam

original: dagdhau ca hastau mama vāsudeva na pūjitaṃ tava viṣṇoḥ pratīkam /
analyzed: dagdhau ca hastau mama vāsudeva na pūjitam tava viṣṇoḥ pratīkam

original: mayā kṛtaṃ pāpajātaṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava vakraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.15 //
analyzed: mayā kṛtam pāpa jātam murāre kadā drakṣye tava vakram mukunda

original: madīyadoṣāngaṇayanna pūrṇa dayāṃ kuru tvaṃ suddhadāsyānmukunda /
analyzed: madīya doṣān gaṇayan na pūrṇa dayām kuru tvam suddha dāsyāt mukunda

original: yāvanti lomāni madīyagātre saṃti prabho sarvadorṣarvidūra // GarP_3,21.16 //
analyzed: yāvanti lomāni madīya gātre saṃti prabho

original: tāvanti pāpāni madīyagātre kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda /
analyzed: tāvanti pāpāni madīya gātre kadā drakṣye tava vaktram mukunda

original: anantadehe patiputrairgṛhaiśca mitrairdhanaiḥ paśubhṛtyādikaiśca // GarP_3,21.17 //
analyzed: ananta dehe pati putraiḥ gṛhaiḥ ca mitraiḥ dhanaiḥ paśu bhṛtya ādikaiḥ ca

original: sukhaṃ nāptaṃ hyapumātraṃ mukunda sevā muktā tava devasya viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: sukham na āptam hi a pumātram mukunda sevā muktā tava devasya viṣṇoḥ

original: itaḥ paraṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca yāsye nāhaṃ tava dāsī bhavāmi // GarP_3,21.18 //
analyzed: itas param putra mitra ādikam ca yāsye na aham tava dāsī bhavāmi

original: yeye brūyuḥ putramitrādikaiśca samyak sukhaṃ jāyate martyaloke /
analyzed: ye ye brūyuḥ putra mitra ādikaiḥ ca samyak sukham jāyate martya loke

original: teṣāmāsye mūtraviṣṭhādikaṃ ca samyak sadā patitaṃ ceti jāne // GarP_3,21.19 //
analyzed: teṣām āsye mūtra viṣṭhā ādikam ca samyak sadā patitam ca iti jāne

original: mitrādīnāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ vṛthā gataṃ malarūpaṃ ca jātam /
analyzed: mitra ādīnām yat kṛtam dravya jātam vṛthā gatam mala rūpam ca jātam

original: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ hariprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ syātsadaiva // GarP_3,21.20 //
analyzed: sat vaiṣṇavānām yat kṛtam dravya jātam hari prāpteḥ kāraṇam syāt sadā eva

original: etādṛśaṃ tattu jātaṃ mukunda alaṃ hyalaṃ tena duḥkhaṃ ca bhuktam /
analyzed: etādṛśam tat tu jātam mukunda alam hi alam tena duḥkham ca bhuktam

original: saṃgaṃ dattātsajjanānāṃ sadā tvaṃ vinā ca tvaṃ durjanānāṃ ca saṃgāt // GarP_3,21.21 //
analyzed: saṃgam dattāt sat janānām sadā tvam vinā ca tvam durjanānām ca saṃgāt

original: saṃgaiḥ sadā durjanānāṃ murāre gātraṃ dagdhaṃ na virāgeṇa yuktam /
analyzed: saṃgaiḥ sadā durjanānām murāre gātram dagdham na virāgeṇa yuktam

original: etādṛśāhaṃ kāṃ gātiṃ vā mukunda yāsye na jāne dayayā māṃ ca pāhi // GarP_3,21.22 //
analyzed: etādṛśā aham kām gātim vā mukunda yāsye na jāne dayayā mām ca pāhi

original: etādṛśo hyanutāpaḥ khagendra prāyaścittaṃ na ca kṣaurādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: etādṛśaḥ hi anutāpaḥ khaga indra prāyaścittam na ca kṣaura ādikam ca

original: bhānoḥ kanyā hyanutāpaṃ ca kṛtvā vicārayāmāsa hareḥ sutattvam // GarP_3,21.23 //
analyzed: bhānoḥ kanyā hi anutāpam ca kṛtvā vicārayāmāsa hareḥ sutattvam

original: sarvottamo harirekaḥ sadaiva yataḥ pūrṇaḥ sarvaguṇaistataśca /
analyzed: sarva uttamaḥ hariḥ ekaḥ sadā eva yatas pūrṇaḥ sarva guṇaiḥ tatas ca

original: sṛṣṭau yasmājjayate viśvajātamato hariḥ sarvaguṇaiśca pūrṇaḥ // GarP_3,21.24 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭau yasmāt jayate viśva jātam atas hariḥ sarva guṇaiḥ ca pūrṇaḥ

original: yo devānāmādya akāra eva yato brahmādyā naiva pūrṇāḥ samastāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ devānām ādyaḥ akāraḥ eva yatas brahma ādyāḥ na eva pūrṇāḥ samastāḥ

original: lakṣmīprasādāccirapuṇyena jāto yathāyogyaṃ pūrṇaguṇo viriñcaḥ // GarP_3,21.25 //
analyzed: lakṣmī prasādāt cira puṇyena jātaḥ yathāyogyam pūrṇa guṇaḥ viriñcaḥ

original: na lakṣmīvadguṇapūrṇo viriñco na viṣṇuvadguṇapūrṇā ramāpi /
analyzed: na lakṣmīvat guṇa pūrṇaḥ viriñcaḥ na viṣṇu vat guṇa pūrṇā ramā api

original: na vāyuvadbhāratī cāpi pūrṇā na śeṣavadvāruṇī cāpi pūrṇā // GarP_3,21.26 //
analyzed: na vāyu vat bhāratī ca api pūrṇā na śeṣa vat vāruṇī ca api pūrṇā

original: na vai rudravatpārvatī pūrṇarūpā hyanyepyevaṃ naiva pūrṇāḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: na vai rudra vat pārvatī pūrṇa rūpā hi anye pi evam nā eva pūrṇāḥ sadā eva

original: ālocanāmevameṣā hi kṛtvā tapaścakre yamunāyāśca tīre // GarP_3,21.27 //
analyzed: ālocanām evam eṣā hi kṛtvā tapaḥ cakre yamunāyāḥ ca tīre

original: tadācāhaṃ yamunāyāśca tīraṃ pārthena sākaṃ mṛgayāṃ gataḥ khaga /
analyzed: tadā ca aham yamunāyāḥ ca tīram pārthena sākam mṛgayām gataḥ khaga

original: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ tatra tapaścarantīṃ tadābruvaṃ matsakhāyaṃ ca pārtham // GarP_3,21.28 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tām tatra tapaḥ carantīm tadā abruvam mad sakhāyam ca pārtham

original: he pārtha śīghraṃ vraja kanyāsamīpaṃ tvaṃ pṛccha kasmādatra tapaḥ karoṣi /
analyzed: he pārtha śīghram vraja kanyā samīpam tvam pṛccha kasmāt atra tapaḥ karoṣi

original: evaṃ proktastatsamīpaṃ sa gatvā pṛṣṭvā caitatkāraṇaṃ śīghrameva // GarP_3,21.29 //
analyzed: evam proktaḥ tad samīpam sa gatvā pṛṣṭvā ca etat kāraṇam śīghram eva

original: āgatya māmavadatphālgunoyaṃ sarvaṃ vṛttāṃntaṃ tvasau matsamīpe /
analyzed: āgatya mām avadat phālgunaḥ uyam sarvam vṛttāṃntam tu asau mad samīpe

original: tatastvahaṃ sumuhūrte ca tasyāḥ pāṇigrahaṃ kṛtavāṃstatra samyak // GarP_3,21.30 //
analyzed: tatas tu aham su muhūrte ca tasyāḥ pāṇigraham kṛtavān tatra samyak

original: tasyāśca tāpātsaṃtataṃ madvicārātprasannohaṃ satataṃ suprasannaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca tāpāt saṃtatam mad vicārāt prasannā aham satatam su prasannaḥ

original: pūrṇānande ramamāṇāsya nityaṃ tayā ca me kiṃ sukhaṃsyātkhagendra // GarP_3,21.31 //
analyzed: pūrṇānande ramamāṇā asya nityam tayā ca me kim sukham syāt khaga indra

original: mayā vivāhonugrahārthaṃ hi tasyā aṅgīkṛto na tu saukhyāya vīndra /
analyzed: mayā vivāhaḥ anugraha artham hi tasyāḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ na tu saukhyāya

original: tathā vakṣye lakṣmaṇāyāśca rūpaṃ pāṇigrāhe kāraṇaṃ cāpi vīndrā // GarP_3,21.32 //
analyzed: tathā vakṣye lakṣmaṇāyāḥ ca rūpam pāṇigrāhe kāraṇam ca api vīndrā

original: śṛṇuṣva tattava vakṣyāmi gopyaṃ sacchiṣyake nāsti gopyaṃ gurośca // GarP_3,21.33 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva tat tava vakṣyāmi gopyam sat śiṣyake na asti gopyam guroḥ ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavataḥ kālindyā vivāhe hetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavataḥ kālindyāḥ vivāhe hetunirūpaṇam nāma ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 22
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: yā lakṣmaṇā pūrvasarge khagendra putrī hyabhūdvahnivedasya vettuḥ /
analyzed: yā lakṣmaṇā pūrva sarge khaga indra putrī hi abhūt vahnivedasya vettuḥ

original: sulakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutatvādyataḥ sā sulakṣmaṇeti prathitā khagendra // GarP_3,22.1 //
analyzed: su lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyuta tvāt yatas sā sulakṣmaṇā iti prathitā khaga indra

original: yathā lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā yathā harirlakṣaṇairvai supūrṇaḥ /
analyzed: yathā lakṣmīḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sā su pūrṇā yathā hariḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ vai su pūrṇaḥ

original: yathā vāyurlakṣaṇaiḥ pūrṇa eva yathā gāyatrī lakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā // GarP_3,22.2 //
analyzed: yathā vāyuḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ pūrṇaḥ eva yathā gāyatrī lakṣaṇaiḥ sā su pūrṇā

original: yathā rudrādyā lakṣaṇairvai prapūrṇā rudrādillakṣmaṇā caiva pūrṇā /
analyzed: yathā rudra ādyā lakṣaṇaiḥ vai prapūrṇā ca eva pūrṇā

original: guṇenaivaṃ dharmataḥ kiñcideva tathānusaṃdhānādvriyate nāma cāpi // GarP_3,22.3 //
analyzed: guṇena evam dharmataḥ kiñcid eva tathā anusaṃdhānāt vriyate nāma ca api

original: tasmā dāhurlakṣmaṇetyeva sarve tallakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu cādau khagendra /
analyzed: tasmai dāhuḥ lakṣmaṇa iti eva sarve tad lakṣaṇam śṛṇu ca ādau khaga indra

original: nārāyaṇe pūrṇaguṇe rameśe dvātriṃśatsaṃkhyāni sulakṣaṇāni // GarP_3,22.4 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇe pūrṇa guṇe rameśe dvātriṃśat saṃkhyāni su lakṣaṇāni

original: saṃtyeva pakṣīndra vadāmyanu kramānmattaḥ śrutvā mokṣamāpnoti nityam /
analyzed: saṃti eva pakṣi indra vadāmi anu kramāt mattaḥ śrutvā mokṣam āpnoti nityam

original: yaḥ saptapādaḥ ṣaṇṇavatyaṅguloṅgaścaturhastaḥ puruṣastīkṣṇadantaḥ // GarP_3,22.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ sapta pādaḥ ṣaṇṇavati aṅgula uṅgaḥ catur hastaḥ puruṣaḥ tīkṣṇa dantaḥ

original: ya etatsarvaṃ militaṃ caikameva harerviṣṇorlakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ etat sarvam militam ca ekam eva hareḥ viṣṇoḥ lakṣaṇam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: mukhaṃ strigdhaṃ vartulaṃ puṣṭirūpaṃ dvitīyaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.6 //
analyzed: mukham strigdham vartulam puṣṭi rūpam dvitīyam tad lakṣaṇam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: hanuryasyānunnataṃ cāsti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāstṛtīyam /
analyzed: hanuḥ yasya anunnatam ca asti vi indra tat lakṣaṇam prāhuḥ āryāḥ tṛtīyam

original: yaddantā vai tīkṣṇasūkṣmāśca saṃti tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāścaturtham // GarP_3,22.7 //
analyzed: yat dantāḥ vai tīkṣṇa sūkṣmāḥ ca santi tad lakṣaṇam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ caturtham

original: yasyādhare raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: yasya adhare raktimā tu asti vi indra tad lakṣaṇam pañcamam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: yasya hastā atiraktāḥ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāśca paṣṭham // GarP_3,22.8 //
analyzed: yasya hastāḥ ati raktāḥ khaga indra tad lakṣaṇam prāhuḥ āryāḥ ca paṣṭham

original: yasminnakhāḥ saṃti raktāḥ suśobhāstallakṣaṇaṃ saptamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: yasmin nakhāḥ saṃti raktāḥ su śobhāḥ tad lakṣaṇam saptamam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: yasminkapole raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ hyaṣṭamaṃ prāhurāryā // GarP_3,22.9 //
analyzed: yasmin kapole raktimā tu asti vi indra tad lakṣaṇam hi aṣṭamam prāhuḥ āryā

original: yasminkare śaṅkhacakrādirekhā vartante tannavamaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: yasmin kare śaṅkha cakra ādi rekhāḥ vartante tat navamam prāhuḥ āryāḥ

original: yasyo daraṃ tanturūpaṃ supuṣṭaṃ valitrayairaṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca // GarP_3,22.10 //
analyzed: yasya u daram tantu rūpam su puṣṭam vali trayaiḥ aṅkitam suṃdaram ca

original: tallakṣaṇaṃ daśamaṃ prāhurāryā ekādaśaṃ nimnanābhiṃ tadāhuḥ /
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇam daśamam prāhuḥ āryāḥ ekādaśam nimnanābhim tat āhuḥ

original: ūrudvayaṃ yasya ca māṃsalaṃ vai tallakṣaṇaṃ dvādaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.11 //
analyzed: ūru dvayam yasya ca māṃsalam vai tad lakṣaṇam dvādaśam prāhuḥ āryāḥ

original: kaṭirhi dīrghā pṛthulāsti yasya trayodaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: kaṭiḥ hi dīrghā pṛthulā asti yasya trayodaśam lakṣma tat āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: yasyāsti muṣko supariṣṭhito vai caturdaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.12 //
analyzed: yasya asti muṣkaḥ supariṣṭhitaḥ vai caturdaśam lakṣma tat āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: samunnataṃ śiśramatho hi lakṣma yasyāsti tat pañcadaśaṃ vadanti /
analyzed: samunnatam śiśramathaḥ hi lakṣma yasya asti tat pañcadaśam vadanti

original: sutāmrakaṃ pādatalaṃ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.13 //
analyzed: su tāmrakam pāda talam khaga indra tad lakṣaṇam ṣoḍaśam prāhuḥ āryāḥ

original: nimnau ca gulphau saptadaśaṃ tadāhurgrī vārūpaṃ prāhuraṣṭādaśaṃ ca /
analyzed: nimnau ca gulphau saptadaśam tat āhuḥ grī vārūpam prāhuḥ aṣṭādaśam ca

original: ekonaviṃśaṃ tvakṣipadmaṃ suraktaṃ prāhurbāhuṃ jānu viṃśaṃ tathaiva // GarP_3,22.14 //
analyzed: ekonaviṃśam tu akṣi padmam su raktam prāhuḥ bāhum jānu viṃśam tathā eva

original: vistīrṇoraścaikaviṃśaṃ tadāhuḥ siṃhāskandhaṃ dvyuttaraṃ viṃśamāhuḥ /
analyzed: vistīrṇa uraḥ ca ekaviṃśam tat āhuḥ siṃhā skandham dvi uttaram viṃśam āhuḥ

original: trayoviṃśaṃ sūkṣmamāsyaṃ tadāhuścaturviśaṃ suprasanne ca dṛṣṭī // GarP_3,22.15 //
analyzed: trayoviṃśam sūkṣmam āsyam tat āhuḥ caturviśam su prasanne ca dṛṣṭī

original: hrasvaṃ liṅgaṃ mārdavaṃ cāpi vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ vadanti /
analyzed: hrasvam liṅgam mārdavam ca api vi indra tad lakṣaṇam pañcaviṃśam vadanti

original: samau ca pādau kaṭijānu corū ṣaḍviṃśamāhuśca same ca jaṅghe // GarP_3,22.16 //
analyzed: samau ca pādau kaṭi jānu ca ūrū ṣaḍviṃśam āhuḥ ca same ca jaṅghe

original: samānahastau samakarṇau militvā dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: samāna hastau sama karṇau militvā dvātriṃśatkam lakṣaṇam prāhuḥ āryāḥ

original: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai mukunde dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai ramāyām // GarP_3,22.17 //
analyzed: dvātriṃśatkam lakṣaṇam vai mukunde dvātriṃśatkam lakṣaṇam vai ramāyām

original: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇopi tadbhāratyāḥ pravadantyeva satyam /
analyzed: dvātriṃśatkam lakṣaṇam tat bhāratyāḥ pravadanti eva satyam

original: tathā ca śaṅkā samameva cakriṇetyevaṃ sadāmā kuru nirṇayaṃ bruve // GarP_3,22.18 //
analyzed: tathā ca śaṅkā samam eva cakriṇā iti evam sadā amā kuru nirṇayam bruve

original: ekasya vai lakṣaṇasyāpi viṣṇorlakṣmīrantaṃ naiva samyak prapede /
analyzed: ekasya vai lakṣaṇasya api viṣṇoḥ lakṣmīḥ antam nā eva samyak prapede

original: atonantairlakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaṃ ca hariṃ cāhurlakṣaṇajñāḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,22.19 //
analyzed: atas anantaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutam ca harim ca āhuḥ lakṣaṇa jñāḥ sadā eva

original: jānāti lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaṃ vāyurūpe svāpekṣayā hyatiriktaṃ khagendra /
analyzed: jānāti lakṣmīḥ lakṣaṇam vāyu rūpe sva apekṣayā hi atiriktam khaga indra

original: svalakṣaṇāpekṣayā bhāratī tu śatairguṇairadhikā vedhasopi // GarP_3,22.20 //
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa apekṣayā bhāratī tu śataiḥ guṇaiḥ adhikā

original: khagendra tasmāllakṣaṇe sāmyacittaṃ viśvādīnāṃ sarvadā mā kuruṣva /
analyzed: khaga indra tasmāt lakṣaṇe sāmya cittam viśva ādīnām sarvadā mā kuruṣva

original: aṣṭāviṃśatiṃ prāhū rudrādikānāṃ bhrūnetrayorlakṣaṇenaiva hīnāḥ // GarP_3,22.21 //
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśatim prāhuḥ rudra ādikānām bhrū netrayoḥ lakṣaṇena eva hīnāḥ

original: alakṣaṇaṃ manyate yaddhi tasya durlakṣaṇaṃ naiva taccintanīyam /
analyzed: alakṣaṇam manyate yat hi tasya durlakṣaṇam na eva tat cintanīyam

original: aṣṭāviṃśatiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai harasya na bhāratīvaccintanīyaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,22.22 //
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśatim lakṣaṇam vai harasya na bhāratī vat cintanīyam khaga indra

original: ato haraḥ krodharūpī sadaiva tayorabhāvātsatyamuktaṃ tathaitat /
analyzed: atas haraḥ krodha rūpī sadā eva tayoḥ abhāvāt satyam uktam tathā etat

original: ato dvayaṃ nāsti rudre khagendra śiśrodare kiñcidādhikyamasti // GarP_3,22.23 //
analyzed: atas dvayam nā asti rudre khaga indra śiśrodare kiñcid ādhikyam asti

original: saptādhikairviśatilakṣaṇaistu samāyutāḥ svastriyo lakṣmaṇādyāḥ /
analyzed: sapta adhikaiḥ viśati lakṣaṇaiḥ tu samāyutāḥ sva striyaḥ lakṣmaṇa ādyāḥ

original: ṣaḍvaviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyādyā pañcaviṃśaiśca candraḥ // GarP_3,22.24 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ vaviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ ca api yuktā vāruṇī ādyā pañcaviṃśaiḥ ca candraḥ

original: arthaścaturviṃśatibhiścaiva yukto nāsāvāyordvyadhikā viṃśatiśca lakṣaṇaiścaikaviṃśatyā śacī yuktā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.25 //
analyzed: arthaḥ caturviṃśatibhiḥ ca eva yuktaḥ na asau āyoḥ dvi adhikā viṃśatiḥ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ ca ekaviṃśatyā śacī yuktā na saṃśayaḥ

original: pravāhā viṃśakairyuktā yama ekonaviṃśakaiḥ /
analyzed: pravāhāḥ viṃśakaiḥ yuktāḥ yamaḥ ekonaviṃśakaiḥ

original: pāśyaṣṭādaśabhiryukto daśasaptayuto 'nalaḥ // GarP_3,22.26 //
analyzed: pāśī aṣṭādaśabhiḥ yuktaḥ daśa sapta yutaḥ nalaḥ

original: vaivasvataḥ ṣoḍaśabhimitraḥ pañcadaśairyutaḥ /
analyzed: vaivasvataḥ ṣoḍaśa abhimitraḥ pañcadaśaiḥ yutaḥ

original: catrurviṃśaistu dhanapaḥ pāvakastu trayodaśaiḥ // GarP_3,22.27 //
analyzed: catrurviṃśaiḥ tu dhanapaḥ pāvakaḥ tu trayodaśaiḥ

original: gaṅgā dvādaśabhiryuktā budha ekādaśairyutaḥ /
analyzed: gaṅgā dvādaśabhiḥ yuktā budhaḥ ekādaśaiḥ yutaḥ

original: śanistu daśasaṃkhyākaiḥ puṣkaro navabhiryutaḥ // GarP_3,22.28 //
analyzed: śaniḥ tu daśa saṃkhyākaiḥ puṣkaraḥ navabhiḥ yutaḥ

original: atha ṣoḍaśasāhasraṃ bhāryāratu mama vallabhāḥ /
analyzed: atha ṣoḍaśa sāhasram mama vallabhāḥ

original: aṣṭabhiścaiva saṃyuktāḥ saptabhiḥ pitarastathā // GarP_3,22.29 //
analyzed: aṣṭabhiḥ ca eva saṃyuktāḥ saptabhiḥ pitaraḥ tathā

original: ṣaḍbhiśca devagandharvāḥ pañcabhistadanantarāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ ca devagandharvāḥ pañcabhiḥ tad anantarāḥ

original: caturbhaiḥ kṣitipāḥ proktāstribhiranye ca saṃyutāḥ // GarP_3,22.30 //
analyzed: caturbhaiḥ kṣitipāḥ proktāḥ tribhiḥ anye ca saṃyutāḥ

original: udare kiñcidādhikye hrasve pāde ca karṇayoḥ /
analyzed: udare kiñcid ādhikye hrasve pāde ca karṇayoḥ

original: śikhādhikyaṃ vinā vipra bhāryāyāṃ ca śivasya ca // GarP_3,22.31 //
analyzed: śikhā ādhikyam vinā vipra bhāryāyām ca śivasya ca

original: lakṣmaṇāyāṃ pañca doṣāḥ śirogulphādikaṃ vinā /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇāyām pañca doṣāḥ śiraḥ gulpha ādikam vinā

original: nābhyādhikye sahaivāṣṭau doṣāḥ saṃtyativāhike // GarP_3,22.32 //
analyzed: na abhi ādhikye saha eva aṣṭau doṣāḥ saṃti ativāhike

original: jaṅghādhikye sahaivāṣṭau doṣāḥ śacyāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: jaṅghā ādhikye saha eva aṣṭau doṣāḥ śacyāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ

original: evameva hi doṣāścāpyūhanīyāḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,22.33 //
analyzed: evam eva hi doṣāḥ ca api ūhanīyāḥ khageśvara

original: durlakṣaṇaiḥ sadā vīndra saṃśrutaistattvavidbhavet /
analyzed: durlakṣaṇaiḥ sadā vīndra saṃśrutaiḥ tattva vid bhavet

original: mahodaro laṃbanābhirīṣāmātrogradaṃṣṭrakaḥ // GarP_3,22.34 //
andhakūpagabhīrākṣo laṃbakarṇauṣṭhanāsikaḥ /
analyzed: andhakūpa gabhīra akṣaḥ laṃba karṇa oṣṭha nāsikaḥ

original: laṃbagulpho vakrapādaḥ kunakhī śyāvadantakaḥ // GarP_3,22.35 //
dīrghajaṅgho dīrghaśiśrastvekāṇḍaścaikanāsikaḥ /
analyzed: dīrgha jaṅghaḥ eka aṇḍaḥ ca eka nāsikaḥ

original: raktaśmaśrū raktaromā vakrāsyaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.36 //
analyzed: rakta śmaśrūḥ rakta romā vakra āsyaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ

original: dagdhaparva tasaṃkāśo raktapṛṣṭhaḥ kaliḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: rakta pṛṣṭhaḥ kaliḥ smṛtaḥ

original: alomāṃso 'lomaśirā raktagaṇḍakapolakaḥ // GarP_3,22.37 //
analyzed: a loma aṃsaḥ loma śirāḥ rakta gaṇḍa kapolakaḥ

original: lalāṭe pāṇḍutā nityaṃ vāmaskandhe kare khaga /
analyzed: lalāṭe pāṇḍu tā nityam vāma skandhe kare khaga

original: krūradṛṣṭirdṛṣṭipādastathā vai ghargharasvaraḥ // GarP_3,22.38 //
analyzed: krūra dṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭi pādaḥ tathā vai gharghara svaraḥ

original: atyāśī cātipānaśca stanau śuṣkaphalopamau /
analyzed: atyāśī ca atipānaḥ ca stanau śuṣka phala upamau

original: ūrau navāñjikāromaḥ tathā pṛṣṭhe ca mastake // GarP_3,22.39 //
analyzed: ūrau navāñjikāromaḥ tathā pṛṣṭhe ca mastake

original: lalāṭe trīṇi dīrghe tu same dvau saṃprakīrtitau /
analyzed: lalāṭe trīṇi dīrghe tu same dvau saṃprakīrtitau

original: sarpākārastu yo matsyastasya śiśre prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.40 //
analyzed: sarpa ākāraḥ tu yaḥ matsyaḥ tasya śiśre prakīrtitaḥ

original: pādatrāṇopamo matsyo rasanāgre prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: pāda trāṇa upamaḥ matsyaḥ rasanā agre prakīrtitaḥ

original: śiśrākāraśca yo matsyo gude tasya praśasyate // GarP_3,22.41 //
analyzed: śiśrākāraḥ ca yaḥ matsyaḥ gude tasya praśasyate

original: vṛścikākāramatsyastu padostasya praśasyate /
analyzed: vṛścika ākāra matsyaḥ tu padoḥ tasya praśasyate

original: śvākāraścāpi matsyo vai mukhe tasya prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.42 //
analyzed: śva ākāraḥ ca api matsyaḥ vai mukhe tasya prakīrtitaḥ

original: haste tu bahurekhāḥ syurloma nāsāpuṭe smṛtam /
analyzed: haste tu bahu rekhāḥ syuḥ loma nāsāpuṭe smṛtam

original: atidīrghaṃ tu cāṅguṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ cātidīrghakam // GarP_3,22.43 //
analyzed: ati dīrgham tu ca aṅguṣṭham kaniṣṭham ca ati dīrghakam

original: durlakṣaṇaṃ tve vamādi kalāvasti hyanekaśaḥ /
analyzed: durlakṣaṇam tve vama ādi kalau asti hi anekaśas

original: sulakṣaṇānyanekāni mayi saṃti khageśvara // GarP_3,22.44 //
analyzed: su lakṣaṇāni anekāni mayi saṃti khageśvara

original: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇaṃ viṣṇorbrahmādyāpekṣayaiva tat /
analyzed: dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇam viṣṇoḥ brahma ādya apekṣayā eva tat

original: sahābhiprāya garbheṇa brahmaṇoktaṃ tava prabho // GarP_3,22.45 //
analyzed: saha abhiprāya garbheṇa brahmaṇā uktam tava prabho

original: brahmoktasya mayoktasya virodho nāsti sattama /
analyzed: brahma uktasya mayā uktasya virodhaḥ nā asti sattama

original: mayoktasyaiva sa vyāsaḥ kaṃbugrīvaḥ pradarśyate // GarP_3,22.46 //
analyzed: mayā uktasya eva sa vyāsaḥ kaṃbugrīvaḥ pradarśyate

original: raktādharaṃ rakta tālu caikīkṛtya mayoditam /
analyzed: rakta adharam tālu ca ekīkṛtya mayā uditam

original: ato virodho nāstyeva tathā jñānātpratīyate // GarP_3,22.47 //
analyzed: atas virodhaḥ na asti eva tathā jñānāt pratīyate

original: saptādhikairviṃśatilakṣaṇaistu samāyutā yāḥ striyo lakṣmaṇādyāḥ // GarP_3,22.48 //
analyzed: sapta adhikaiḥ viṃśati lakṣaṇaiḥ tu samāyutāḥ yāḥ striyaḥ lakṣmaṇa ādyāḥ

original: bhage netre ca haste ca stane kukṣau tathaiva ca /
analyzed: bhage netre ca haste ca stane kukṣau tathā eva ca

original: bhāratyapekṣayā pañcabhirnyūnā tvasti lakṣaṇaiḥ // GarP_3,22.49 //
analyzed: bhāratī apekṣayā pañcabhiḥ nyūnā tu asti lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: na rudravanna cānyāni lakṣaṇāni khageśvara /
analyzed: na rudra vat na ca anyāni lakṣaṇāni khageśvara

original: ṣaḍviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyāḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaiścaiva hīnā // GarP_3,22.50 //
analyzed: ṣaḍviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ ca api yuktā vāruṇyāḥ ṣaṣ lakṣaṇaiḥ ca eva hīnā

original: karṇe kukṣau nāsikākeśapāśe gulphe bhage kiñcidādhikyamasti /
analyzed: karṇe kukṣau nāsikā keśapāśe gulphe bhage kiñcid ādhikyam asti

original: indro yuktaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā khagendra sadā hīno lakṣaṇaiḥ saptasaṃkhyaiḥ // GarP_3,22.51 //
analyzed: indraḥ yuktaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā khaga indra sadā hīnaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sapta saṃkhyaiḥ

original: haste pāde udare karṇayośca śiśre gulphe tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
analyzed: haste pāde udare karṇayoḥ ca gulphe tu adhara uṣṭha idhikam ca

original: caturviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yukto nāstikyavāyustadvadevāṣṭabhiśca // GarP_3,22.52 //
analyzed: caturviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ ca api yuktaḥ nāstikya vāyuḥ tadvat eva aṣṭabhiḥ ca

original: nābhyāṃ gulphe hanurarṅghyośca skandhe dvije netre tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
analyzed: nābhyām gulphe hanuḥ arṅghyoḥ ca skandhe dvije netre tu adhara uṣṭha idhikam ca

original: trayoviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā śacī tathā navadoṣaiśca yuktā // GarP_3,22.53 //
analyzed: trayoviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ ca api yuktā śacī tathā nava doṣaiḥ ca yuktā

original: bhage keśe hyadharoṣṭhe ca karṇe jaṅghe gaṇḍe vakṣasi gulphayośca /
analyzed: bhage keśe hi adhara uṣṭhe ca karṇe jaṅghe gaṇḍe vakṣasi gulphayoḥ ca

original: tathottaroṣṭhe kiñcidādhikyamasti evaṃ vijānīhi khagendrasattama // GarP_3,22.54 //
analyzed: tathā uttara uṣṭhe kiñcid ādhikyam asti evam vijānīhi khaga indra sattama

original: dvāviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu daśabhirdeṣaiḥ pravaho nāma vāyuḥ /
analyzed: dvāviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaḥ tu daśabhiḥ deṣaiḥ pravahaḥ nāma vāyuḥ

original: tathāṅguṣṭhe kiñcidādhikyamasti viṃśatyekādaśabhirdeṣatorkaḥ // GarP_3,22.55 //
analyzed: tathā aṅguṣṭhe kiñcid ādhikyam asti viṃśati ekādaśabhiḥ

original: tadviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu tadā doṣerdvādaśabhiśca yuktaḥ /
analyzed: tad viṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaḥ tu tadā doṣeḥ dvādaśabhiḥ ca yuktaḥ

original: ekonaviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktastrayodaśabhistadabhāvairyutogniḥ // GarP_3,22.56 //
analyzed: ekonaviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ ca api yuktaḥ trayodaśabhiḥ tad abhāvaiḥ yutaḥ agniḥ

original: aṣṭādaśabhirlakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu vaivasvatastadabhāvaiścaturdaśabhiḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaḥ tu vaivasvataḥ tad abhāvaiḥ caturdaśabhiḥ

original: mitrastu saptadaśabhirlakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaḥ khaga // GarP_3,22.57 //
analyzed: mitraḥ tu saptadaśabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaḥ khaga

original: sadoṣaiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ saṃyukto nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sa doṣaiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ saṃyuktaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: taiśca ṣoḍaśabhiryukto dhanapo nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.58 //
analyzed: taiḥ ca ṣoḍaśabhiḥ yuktaḥ dhanapaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tadabhāvaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ saṃyuktaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: tad abhāvaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ saṃyuktaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ

original: taiḥ pañcadaśabhiścaiva yuktogrejyaṣṭhaputrakaḥ // GarP_3,22.59 //
analyzed: taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ ca eva yukta ugrā jyaṣṭha putrakaḥ

original: taiḥ saptadaśabhirdeṣaiḥ saṃyukto nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ saptadaśabhiḥ deṣaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: taiścaturdaśabhiścaiva gaṅgā saṃparikīrtitā // GarP_3,22.60 //
analyzed: taiḥ caturdaśabhiḥ ca eva gaṅgā saṃparikīrtitā

original: tathāṣṭādaśabhirdeṣaiḥ saṃyutā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā aṣṭādaśabhiḥ deṣaiḥ saṃyutā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: taistrayodaśabhiścaiva saṃyuto budha eva tu // GarP_3,22.61 //
analyzed: taiḥ trayodaśabhiḥ ca eva saṃyutaḥ budhaḥ eva tu

original: doṣairekonaviṃśatyā saṃyuto nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: doṣaiḥ ekonaviṃśatyā saṃyutaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: śanirviṃśatidoṣeṇa yuto dvādaśalakṣaṇaiḥ // GarP_3,22.62 //
analyzed: śaniḥ viṃśati doṣeṇa yutaḥ dvādaśa lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: lakṣaṇaiścaikādaśabhiḥ puṣkaraḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣaṇaiḥ ca ekādaśabhiḥ puṣkaraḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: ekaviṃśatisaṃkhyākairasadbhāvaiḥ prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.63 //
analyzed: ekaviṃśati saṃkhyākaiḥ asadbhāvaiḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: daśabhirlakṣaṇairyuktāḥ pitaro ye cirāḥ khaga /
analyzed: daśabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktāḥ pitaraḥ ye cirāḥ khaga

original: trayoviṃśatidoṣaiśca saṃyutā nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.64 //
analyzed: trayoviṃśati doṣaiḥ ca saṃyutā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: aṣṭabhirlakṣaṇairyuktā devagandharvasattamāḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktāḥ deva gandharva sattamāḥ

original: doṣaiścaturviṃśatibhiḥ saṃyuktāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,22.65 //
analyzed: doṣaiḥ caturviṃśatibhiḥ saṃyuktāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: saptalakṣaṇasaṃyuktā gandharvā mānuṣātamakāḥ /
analyzed: sapta lakṣaṇa saṃyuktāḥ gandharvāḥ mānuṣātamakāḥ

original: yaistu pañcaviṃśatibhirdeṣaiḥ saṃyuktāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,22.66 //
analyzed: yaiḥ tu pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ deṣaiḥ saṃyuktāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: ṣadguṇaiḥ kṣitipā yuktā ṣaḍviṃśatyā ca doṣataḥ /
analyzed: ṣadguṇaiḥ kṣitipā yuktā ṣaḍviṃśatyā ca doṣataḥ

original: tadanye pañcabhiryuktāścaturbhiḥ kecideva ca // GarP_3,22.67 //
analyzed: tad anye pañcabhiḥ yuktāḥ caturbhiḥ kecid eva ca

original: tribhiḥ keccittato hīnā na saṃti khagasattama /
analyzed: tribhiḥ keccid tatas hīnāḥ na saṃti khaga sattama

original: yasminnare kṣitipe vā khagendra ādhikyaṃ yaddṛśyate lakṣaṇasya // GarP_3,22.68 //
analyzed: yasmin nare kṣitipe vā khaga indre ādhikyam yat dṛśyate lakṣaṇasya

original: na te narā naiva te vai kṣitīśāḥ sarve naiva hyuttamāḥ sarvadaiva /
analyzed: na te narāḥ na eva te vai kṣitīśāḥ sarve na eva hi uttamāḥ sarvadā eva

original: ye devā ye ca daityāśca sarvepyevaṃ khagādhipa // GarP_3,22.69 //
analyzed: ye devāḥ ye ca daityāḥ ca sarve api evam khaga adhipa

original: lakṣaṇālakṣaṇaiścaiva krameṇoktā na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa alakṣaṇaiḥ ca eva krameṇa uktāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: lakṣaṇaiḥ saptaviṃśatyālakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutāḥ khaga // GarP_3,22.70 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇaiḥ saptaviṃśatyā alakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutāḥ khaga

original: ataḥ salakṣaṇā jñeyā dvātriṃśallakṣaṇairna hi /
analyzed: atas salakṣaṇā jñeyā dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇaiḥ na hi

original: piturgṛhe vardhamānā sadāpi svakuṭuṃbaṃ śreṣṭhayituṃ khagendra // GarP_3,22.71 //
analyzed: pituḥ gṛhe vardhamānā sadā api sva kuṭuṃbam śreṣṭhayitum khaga indra

original: uvāca sā pitaraṃ dīyamānamannādikaṃ tramitrādikeṣu /
analyzed: uvāca sā pitaram dīyamānam annādikam

original: sadāpi ye tvanusaṃdhānena yuktā antargate tatratatra sthite ca // GarP_3,22.72 //
analyzed: sadā api ye tu anusaṃdhānena yuktāḥ antargate tatra tatra sthite ca

original: ajñātatve cānnapānādikaṃ ca dattaṃ saṃto vyarthamevaṃ vadanti /
analyzed: ajñāta tve ca anna pāna ādikam ca dattam saṃtaḥ vyartham evam vadanti

original: hariṃ vakṣye tatratatra sthitaṃ caṃ taṃ vai śṛṇu tvādareṇādya nityam // GarP_3,22.73 //
analyzed: harim vakṣye tatra tatra sthitam caṃ tam vai śṛṇu tvā ādareṇa adya nityam

original: bālo harirbālarūpeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ kṣīrādikaṃ navanītaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: bālaḥ hariḥ bāla rūpeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ kṣīra ādikam navanītam ghṛtam ca

original: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vastrajātamevaṃ dadyātsarvadā viṣṇutuṣṭyai // GarP_3,22.74 //
analyzed: gṛhṇāti nityam bhūṣaṇam vastra jātam evam dadyāt sarvadā viṣṇu tuṣṭyai

original: mitrairhariḥ keśavākhyo mukundo bhuṅkte dattaṃ tvannaprānādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: mitraiḥ hariḥ keśava ākhyaḥ mukundaḥ bhuṅkte dattam tu anna prāna ādikam ca

original: pūrvaṃ dadyātsarvadā vai gṛhastho dhanyo bhavedanyathā vyarthameva // GarP_3,22.75 //
analyzed: pūrvam dadyāt sarvadā vai gṛhasthaḥ dhanyaḥ bhavet anyathā vyartham eva

original: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ mādhavākhyo hariścetyevaṃ jñātvā deyamannādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: gṛhṇāti nityam mādhava ākhyaḥ hariḥ ca iti evam jñātvā deyam anna ādikam ca

original: evaṃ jñātvā dīyamānena nityaṃ prīṇāti viṣṇurnānyathā vyarthameva // GarP_3,22.76 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā dīyamānena nityam prīṇāti viṣṇuḥ na anyathā vyartham eva

original: gṛhe nityaṃ vāsudevo haristu prīṇāti nityaṃ tatra tiṣṭhansuparṇa /
analyzed: gṛhe nityam vāsudevaḥ hariḥ tu prīṇāti nityam tatra tiṣṭhan suparṇa

original: evaṃ jñātvā svagṛhaṃ sarvadaiva alaṅkuryāddhāturūpaiḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,22.77 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā sva gṛham sarvadā eva alaṅkuryāt dhātu rūpaiḥ sadā eva

original: govindākhyastiṣṭhati vaṣṇavānāṃ putrairyutastiṣṭhati vāsudevaḥ /
analyzed: govinda ākhyaḥ tiṣṭhati vaṣṇavānām putraiḥ yutaḥ tiṣṭhati vāsudevaḥ

original: mitre mukundaḥ śālake cānirūddho nārāyaṇo dvijavarye sadāsti // GarP_3,22.78 //
analyzed: mitre mukundaḥ śālake ca anirūddhaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ dvija varye sadā asti

original: goṣṭhe ca nityaṃ viṣṇurūpī haristu aśve sadā tiṣṭhati vāmanākhyaḥ /
analyzed: goṣṭhe ca nityam viṣṇu rūpī hariḥ tu aśve sadā tiṣṭhati vāmana ākhyaḥ

original: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śūdravarṇe sadāsti vaiśye pradyumnastiṣṭhati sarvadaiva // GarP_3,22.79 //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śūdra varṇe sadā asti vaiśye pradyumnaḥ tiṣṭhati sarvadā eva

original: janārdanaḥ kṣattrajātau sadāsti dāśeṣu nityaṃ mahidāso haristu /
analyzed: janārdanaḥ kṣattra jātau sadā asti dāśeṣu nityam mahidāsaḥ hariḥ tu

original: mahyāṃ nityaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvadaiva hyupendrākhyo harirekaḥ suparṇa // GarP_3,22.80 //
analyzed: mahyām nityam tiṣṭhati sarvadā eva hi upendra ākhyaḥ hariḥ ekaḥ suparṇa

original: gaje sadā tiṣṭhati cakrapāṇiḥ sadāntare tiṣṭhati viśvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: gaje sadā tiṣṭhati cakra pāṇiḥ sadā antare tiṣṭhati viśva rūpaḥ

original: nityaṃ śuni tiṣṭhati bhūtabhāvanaḥ pipīlakāyāmapi sarvadaiva // GarP_3,22.81 //
analyzed: nityam śuni tiṣṭhati bhūtabhāvanaḥ pipīlakāyām api sarvadā eva

original: trivikramo harirūpyantarikṣe sarvajātāvanantarūpī hariśca /
analyzed: trivikramaḥ hari rūpī antarikṣe sarva jātau ananta rūpī hariḥ ca

original: harerna varṇosti na gotramasti na jātirīśe sarvarūpe vicitre // GarP_3,22.82 //
analyzed: hareḥ na varṇaḥ usti na gotram asti na jātiḥ īśe sarva rūpe vicitre

original: evaṃ jñātvā sarvadā lakṣmaṇā tu hariṃ sadā prīṇayāmāsa devī /
analyzed: evam jñātvā sarvadā lakṣmaṇā tu harim sadā prīṇayāmāsa devī

original: saparyayā vai kriyamāṇayā hariḥ patirmamasya diti cintayānā // GarP_3,22.83 //
analyzed: saparyayā vai kriyamāṇayā hariḥ patiḥ mama asya diti cintayānā

original: tatyāja dehaṃ viṣṇupatitvakāmā madreṣu vai vīndra putrī prajātā /
analyzed: tatyāja deham viṣṇu pati tva kāmā madreṣu vai vi indra putrī prajātā

original: svayaṃvare lakṣmaṇāyā ahaṃ ca bhittvā lakṣyaṃ bhūpatīndrāvayitvā // GarP_3,22.84 //
analyzed: svayaṃvare lakṣmaṇāyāḥ aham ca bhittvā lakṣyam bhūpatīn drāvayitvā

original: pāṇigrahaṃ lakṣmaṇāyāśca kṛtvā gatvā purīṃ ramayāmāsa devī /
analyzed: pāṇigraham lakṣmaṇāyāḥ ca kṛtvā gatvā purīm ramayāmāsa devī

original: tathaivāhaṃ jāṃbavatyā vivāhaṃ matpatnītve kāraṇaṃ tvāṃ bravīmi // GarP_3,22.85 //
analyzed: tathā eva aham jāṃbavatyāḥ vivāham mad patnī tve kāraṇam tvām bravīmi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe lakṣmaṇāvivāhahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe lakṣmaṇāvivāhahetunirūpaṇam nāma dvāviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 23
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: somasya putrī pūrvasarge babhūva bhāryā madīyā jāmbavatī mama priyā /
analyzed: somasya putrī pūrva sarge babhūva bhāryā madīyā jāmbavatī mama priyā

original: tāsāṃ madhye hyadhikā vīndra kiñcidrudrādibhyaḥ pañcaguṇairvihīnā // GarP_3,23.1 //
analyzed: tāsām madhye hi adhikā vīndra kiñcid rudra ādibhyaḥ pañcaguṇaiḥ vihīnā

original: yadāveśo balavānsyādramāyāṃ tadānāmasa priyate keśavolam /
analyzed: yadā āveśaḥ balavān syāt ramāyām

original: yadāveśāddhrāsamupaiti kāle tadā tāsāṃ sāmyamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,23.2 //
analyzed: yad āveśāt hrāsam upaiti kāle tadā tāsām sāmyam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: lakṣmyāveśaḥ kiñcidastyeva nityamatastābhyaḥ kiñcidādhikyamasti // GarP_3,23.3 //
analyzed: lakṣmī āveśaḥ kiñcid asti eva nityam atas tābhyaḥ kiñcid ādhikyam asti

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: tāsāṃ madhye jāmbavantī tu kṛṣṇa ārādhanaṃ kīdṛśaṃ sā cakāra /
analyzed: tāsām madhye jāmbavantī tu kṛṣṇaḥ ārādhanam kīdṛśam sā cakāra

original: tanme brūhi kṛpayā viśvamūrte ādhikye vai kāraṇaṃ tābhya eva // GarP_3,23.4 //
analyzed: tat me brūhi kṛpayā viśvamūrte ādhikye vai kāraṇam tābhyaḥ eva

original: garuḍenaivamuktastu bhagavān devakīsutaḥ /
analyzed: garuḍena evam uktaḥ tu bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: meghagaṃbhīrayā vācā uvāca vinatāsutam // GarP_3,23.5 //
analyzed: megha gaṃbhīrayā vācā uvāca vinatā sutam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: yā pūrvasarge somaputrī babhūva piturgṛhe vartamānāpi sādhvī /
analyzed: yā pūrva sarge soma putrī babhūva pituḥ gṛhe vartamānā api sādhvī

original: janma svakīyaṃ sārthakaṃ vai cakāra pitrā sākaṃ viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇe na ca // GarP_3,23.6 //
analyzed: janma svakīyam sārthakam vai cakāra pitrā sākam viṣṇu śuśrūṣaṇe na ca

original: śuśrāva nityaṃ satpurāṇāni caivaṃ cakre sadā viṣṇupādapraṇāmam /
analyzed: śuśrāva nityam sat purāṇāni ca evam cakre sadā viṣṇu pāda praṇāmam

original: cakre sadā tārakasyāpi viṣṇoḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ kurvatī sā // GarP_3,23.7 //
analyzed: cakre sadā tārakasya api viṣṇoḥ pradakṣiṇam smaraṇam kurvatī sā

original: pitrā sākaṃ sā tu kanyā khagendra vairāgyayuktā śravaṇātsaṃbabhūva /
analyzed: pitrā sākam sā tu kanyā khaga indra vairāgya yuktā śravaṇāt saṃbabhūva

original: keśaṃ ca mitraṃ dviradādikaṃ ca anarghyaratnāni gṛhādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,23.8 //
analyzed: keśam ca mitram dvirada ādikam ca anarghya ratnāni gṛha ādikam ca

original: sarvaṃ hyetannaśvaraṃ caiva mene mamādhīnaṃ hariṇā vai kṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: sarvam hi etat naśvaram ca eva mene mama adhīnam hariṇā vai kṛtam ca

original: yenaiva dattaṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca tenā hṛtaṃ vedanāṃ naiva cakre // GarP_3,23.9 //
analyzed: yena eva dattam putra mitra ādikam ca tena hṛtam vedanām nā eva cakre

original: adyaiva viṣṇuḥ paramo dayāluḥ dayāṃ mayi kṛtavāṃste na suṣṭhu /
analyzed: adyā eva viṣṇuḥ paramaḥ dayāluḥ dayām mayi kṛtavān te na suṣṭhu

original: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sā tu vīndra sadātmani hyamale vāsudeve // GarP_3,23.10 //
analyzed: pitrā sākam kanyakā sā tu vīndra sadā ātmani hi amale vāsudeve

original: ekāntatvaṃ suṣṭhu bhaktyā gatā sā yadṛcchayā sopapannena devī /
analyzed: ekānta tvam suṣṭhu bhaktyā gatā sā yadṛcchayā sa upapannena devī

original: akalpayantyātmano vīndra vṛttiṃ cakāra yatsāvadhirādhaṃ prathaiva // GarP_3,23.11 //
analyzed: akalpayantī ātmanaḥ vi indra vṛttim cakāra yat sā avadhirādham prathā eva

original: sā vai vittaṃ viṣṇupādāravinde duḥ khārṇavāttarāke saṃcakāra /
analyzed: sā vai vittam viṣṇu pāda aravinde duḥ kha arṇava attarāke saṃcakāra

original: vāgīndridriyaṃ khaga samyak cakāra harerguṇānāṃ varṇane vā sadaiva // GarP_3,23.12 //
analyzed: khaga samyak cakāra hareḥ guṇānām varṇane vā sadā eva

original: hastau ca viṣṇorgṛhasaṃmārjanādau cakāra devī gātramalāpahāram /
analyzed: hastau ca viṣṇoḥ gṛha saṃmārjana ādau cakāra devī gātra mala apahāram

original: śrotraṃ ca cakre harisatkathodaye mokṣādimārge hyamṛtopame ca // GarP_3,23.13 //
analyzed: śrotram ca cakre hari sat kathā udaye mokṣa ādi mārge hi amṛta upame ca

original: netraṃ ca cakre pratimādidarśane anādikālīnamalāpahariṇī /
analyzed: netram ca cakre pratimā ādi darśane anādi kālīna mala apahariṇī

original: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ sparśane caiva saṃge nirmālyagandhānuvilepane tvak // GarP_3,23.14 //
analyzed: sat vaiṣṇavānām sparśane ca eva saṃge nirmālya gandha anuvilepane tvac

original: ghrārṇedriyaṃ sā haripādasāre cakāra saṃsāravimuktide ca /
analyzed: sā hari pāda sāre cakāra saṃsāra vimukti de ca

original: jihvendriyaṃ harinaivedyaśeṣe śrīmattulasyādivimiśrite ca // GarP_3,23.15 //
analyzed: jihvā indriyam hari naivedya śeṣe śrīmat tulasī ādi vimiśrite ca

original: pādau hareḥ kṣetrapathānusarpaṇe śiro hṛṣīkeśapadābhivandane /
analyzed: pādau hareḥ kṣetra patha anusarpaṇe śiraḥ hṛṣīkeśa pada abhivandane

original: kāmaṃ hṛdāsye tu haridāsyakāmyā tathottamaślokajanāścaranti // GarP_3,23.16 //
analyzed: kāmam hṛd āsye tu hari dāsya kāmyā tathā uttamaśloka janāḥ caranti

original: niṣkāmarūpe ca matiṃ cakāra vāgindriyaṃ stavanaṃ svīcakāra /
analyzed: niṣkāma rūpe ca matim cakāra vāc indriyam stavanam svīcakāra

original: evaṃ sadā kāryasamūhamātmanā samarpayitvā parameśapādayoḥ // GarP_3,23.17 //
analyzed: evam sadā kārya samūham ātmanā samarpayitvā parameśa pādayoḥ

original: tīrthāṭanārthaṃ tu jagāma pitrā sākaṃ hareḥ prīṇanādyarthameva /
analyzed: tīrtha aṭana artham tu jagāma pitrā sākam hareḥ prīṇana ādi artham eva

original: ārādhayitvā brāhmaṇānviṣṇubhaktānādau gṛhe vastrasaṃbhūṣaṇādyaiḥ // GarP_3,23.18 //
analyzed: ārādhayitvā brāhmaṇān viṣṇu bhaktān ādau gṛhe vastra saṃbhūṣaṇa ādyaiḥ

original: paścātkalpaṃ kārayāmāsa devī viṣṇoragre tīrthayātrārthameva /
analyzed: paścātkalpam kārayāmāsa devī viṣṇoḥ agre tīrtha yātrā artham eva

original: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrā mukunda tāvatkālaṃ tūrdhvaretā bhavāmi // GarP_3,23.19 //
analyzed: yāvatkālam tīrtha yātrā mukunda tāvatkālam tu ūrdhvaretāḥ bhavāmi

original: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrāṃ kariṣye tāvaddattādvaiṣṇavānāṃ ca saṃgam /
analyzed: yāvatkālam tīrthayātrām kariṣye tāvat dattāt vaiṣṇavānām ca saṃgam

original: hareḥ kathāśravaṇaṃ syānmukunda nāvaiṣṇavānāṃ saṃgināmaṅgasaṃgam // GarP_3,23.20 //
analyzed: hareḥ kathā śravaṇam syāt mukunda na avaiṣṇavānām saṃginām aṅgasaṃgam

original: suhṛjjanaiḥ putramitrādikaiśca dīrthāṭanaṃ naiva kuryāṃ mukunda /
analyzed: suhṛd janaiḥ putra mitra ādikaiḥ ca dīrtha aṭanam nā eva kuryām mukunda

original: kurvanti ye kāmyayā tīrthayātrāṃ teṣāṃ saṃgaṃ kuru dūre mukunda // GarP_3,23.21 //
analyzed: kurvanti ye kāmyayā tīrthayātrām teṣām saṃgam kuru dūre mukunda

original: śālagrāmaṃ ye vihāyaiva yātrāṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
analyzed: śālagrāmam ye vihāya eva yātrām kurvanti teṣām kim phalam prāhuḥ āryāḥ

original: yadā tīrthānāṃ darśanaṃ syāttadaiva śālagrāmaṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā // GarP_3,23.22 //
analyzed: yadā tīrthānām darśanam syāt tadā eva śālagrāmam puratas sthāpayitvā

original: tīrthāṭanaṃ pādacairaiḥ kṛtaṃ cetpūrṇaṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ khagendra /
analyzed: tīrtha aṭanam pāda cairaiḥ kṛtam ced pūrṇam phalam prāhuḥ āryāḥ khaga indra

original: pādatrāṇaṃ pādarakṣāṃ ca kṛtvā tīrthāṭanaṃ pādahīnaṃ tadāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.23 //
analyzed: pāda trāṇam pāda rakṣām ca kṛtvā tīrtha aṭanam pāda hīnam tat āhuḥ

original: yo vāhane turage copaviṣṭastīrthāṭanaṃ kurute cārdhahīnam /
analyzed: yaḥ vāhane turage ca upaviṣṭaḥ tīrtha aṭanam kurute ca ardha hīnam

original: vṛṣādīnāṃ vāhane pādamāhuḥ parānnānāṃ bhojane vyarthamāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.24 //
analyzed: vṛṣa ādīnām vāhane pādam āhuḥ para annānām bhojane vyartham āhuḥ

original: mahātmanāṃ vedavidāṃ yatīnāṃ parānnānāṃ bhojane naiva doṣaḥ /
analyzed: mahātmanām veda vidām yatīnām para annānām bhojane na eva doṣaḥ

original: saṃkalpayitvā paramādareṇa jagāma sā tīrthayātrārthameva // GarP_3,23.25 //
analyzed: saṃkalpayitvā parama ādareṇa jagāma sā tīrtha yātrā artham eva

original: ādau snātvā harinirmātyagandhaṃ visarjayitvā śravaṇaṃ vai cakāra /
analyzed: ādau snātvā harinirmātya gandham visarjayitvā śravaṇam vai cakāra

original: pitrā sākaṃ bhojanaṃ cāpi kṛtvā agre dine krośamekaṃ jagāma // GarP_3,23.26 //
analyzed: pitrā sākam bhojanam ca api kṛtvā agre dine krośam ekam jagāma

original: tatra dvijānpūjayitvānnapāna rātrau tattvaṃ śrāvayāmāsa devī /
analyzed: tatra dvijān pūjayitvā anna pāna rātrau tattvam śrāvayāmāsa devī

original: evaṃ yātrāṃ ye prakurvanti nityaṃ teṣāṃ yātrāṃ saphalāṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,23.27 //
analyzed: evam yātrām ye prakurvanti nityam teṣām yātrām saphalām prāhuḥ āryāḥ

original: vinā dayāṃ tīrthayātrā khagendravyarthetyevaṃ vīndra cāhurmahāntaḥ /
analyzed: vinā dayām tīrtha yātrā khaga indra vyarthā iti evam vi indra ca āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: divā rātrau ye na śṛṇvanti divyāṃ hareḥ kathāṃ tīrthamārge khagendra // GarP_3,23.28 //
analyzed: divā rātrau ye na śṛṇvanti divyām hareḥ kathām tīrtha mārge khaga indra

original: vyarthaṃvyarthaṃ tasya cāhurgataṃ vai aśvādīnāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca viddhi /
analyzed: vyartham vyartham tasya ca āhuḥ gatam vai aśva ādīnām vāhanānām ca viddhi

original: aśvādīnāmaparādhaṃ vadasva gaṅgādīnāṃ darśanātpāpanāśaḥ // GarP_3,23.29 //
analyzed: aśva ādīnām aparādham vadasva gaṅgā ādīnām darśanāt pāpa nāśaḥ

original: kṣetrasthaviṣṇordarśanātpāpanāśo mārjārasyāpyaparādhaṃ vadasva /
analyzed: kṣetrastha viṣṇoḥ darśanāt pāpa nāśaḥ mārjārasya api aparādham vadasva

original: kṣetrasthaviṣṇoḥ pūjanātpāpanāśaḥ pūjāvatāmaparādhaṃ vadasva // GarP_3,23.30 //
analyzed: kṣetrastha viṣṇoḥ pūjanāt pāpa nāśaḥ pūjāvatām aparādham vadasva

original: japādīnāṃ kurvatāṃ pāpanāśo viṣṇordhyānātsadya evādhanāśaḥ /
analyzed: japa ādīnām kurvatām pāpa nāśaḥ viṣṇoḥ dhyānāt sadyas eva adha nāśaḥ

original: anusaṃdhānādrahitaṃ sarvameva kṛtaṃ vyarthameveti cāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.31 //
analyzed: anusaṃdhānāt rahitam sarvam eva kṛtam vyartham eva iti ca āhuḥ

original: ato hareḥ pāpavināśinīṃ kathāṃ śrutvā viṣṇorbhaktimānsyātvagandra /
analyzed: atas hareḥ pāpa vināśinīm kathām śrutvā viṣṇoḥ bhaktimān syāt agandra

original: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā haripādāṅkitaṃ ca smṛtvāsmṛtvā bhaktimānsyātkhagendra // GarP_3,23.32 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā hari pāda aṅkitam ca smṛtvā a smṛtvā bhaktimān syāt khaga indra

original: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sāpi vīndra śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum /
analyzed: pitrā sākam kanyakā sā api vīndra śeṣa acala stham śrīnivāsam ca draṣṭum

original: jagāma sā mārgamadhye hariṃ ca sā cintayāmāsa ramāpatiṃ ca // GarP_3,23.33 //
analyzed: jagāma sā mārga madhye harim ca sā cintayāmāsa ramā patim ca

original: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya vakṣaḥ śrīvatsaratnairbhūṣitaṃ vistṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya vakṣaḥ śrīvatsa ratnaiḥ bhūṣitam vistṛtam ca

original: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya tundaṃ valitrayeṇāṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca // GarP_3,23.34 //
analyzed: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya tundam vali trayeṇa aṅkitam suṃdaram ca

original: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya kaṇṭhaṃ maharlokasyāśrayaṃ kaṃbutulyam /
analyzed: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya kaṇṭham mahar lokasya āśrayam kaṃbu tulyam

original: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya nābhiṃ sadāntarikṣasyāśrayaṃ vai supūrṇam // GarP_3,23.35 //
analyzed: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya nābhim sadā antarikṣasya āśrayam vai su pūrṇam

original: kadā drakṣye vadanaṃ vai murārerjanalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.36 //
analyzed: kadā drakṣye vadanam vai murāreḥ janalokasya āśrayam sarvadā eva

original: śiraḥ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye satyasya lokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
analyzed: śiraḥ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye satyasya lokasya āśrayam sarvadā eva

original: kaṭiṃ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye bhūrlokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.37 //
analyzed: kaṭim kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye bhūrlokasya āśrayam sarvadā eva

original: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya coru talātalasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
analyzed: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya ca ūru talātalasya āśrayam sarvadā eva

original: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jānu sukomalaṃ sutalasyāśrayaṃ ca // GarP_3,23.38 //
analyzed: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jānu su komalam su talasya āśrayam ca

original: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jaṅghe rasātalasyāśrayeḥ sarvadaiva /
analyzed: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jaṅghe rasātalasya āśrayeḥ sarvadā eva

original: kadā drakṣye pādatalaṃ hareśca pātālalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.39 //
analyzed: kadā drakṣye pāda talam hareḥ ca pātāla lokasya āśrayam sarvadā eva

original: itthaṃ mārge cintayantī ca devī śeṣācale śeṣadevaṃ dadarśa /
analyzed: ittham mārge cintayantī ca devī śeṣa acale śeṣadevam dadarśa

original: phaṇaiḥ sahasraiḥ suvirājamānaṃ nānādrumairvānarairvānarībhiḥ // GarP_3,23.40 //
analyzed: phaṇaiḥ sahasraiḥ su virājamānam nānā drumaiḥ vānaraiḥ vānarībhiḥ

original: ananta janmārjitapuṇyasaṃcayānmayādya dṛṣṭaḥ paramācalo hi /
analyzed: ananta janma arjita puṇya saṃcayāt mayā adya dṛṣṭaḥ parama acalaḥ hi

original: taddarśanādvāṣpakalākulekṣaṇā sadyaḥ samutthāya nanāma mūrdhnā // GarP_3,23.41 //
analyzed: tad darśanāt vāṣpa kalā ākula īkṣaṇā sadyas samutthāya nanāma mūrdhnā

original: mukhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā namanaṃ ca kāryaṃ pṛṣṭhādibhāge namanaṃ na kāryam /
analyzed: mukham ca dṛṣṭvā namanam ca kāryam pṛṣṭha ādi bhāge namanam na kāryam

original: sāpi dviṣaṭkaṃ namanaṃ ca cakre śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā puro 'sya // GarP_3,23.42 //
analyzed: sā api dvi ṣaṭkam namanam ca cakre śālagrāmam sthāpayitvā

original: itthaṃ kāryaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ parvatasya tvaṃ vaiṣṇavairviparītaṃ ca kāryam /
analyzed: ittham kāryam vaiṣṇavaiḥ parvatasya tvam vaiṣṇavaiḥ viparītam ca kāryam

original: madhvāntaḥsthaḥ parvatāgresti nityaṃ ramābrahmādyaiḥ pūjitaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,23.43 //
analyzed: madhva antar sthaḥ parvata agreḥ ati nityam ramā brahma ādyaiḥ pūjitaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ

original: susattamaṃ paramaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ drakṣye 'thāhaṃ hyārurukṣe 'calañca /
analyzed: su sattamam paramam śrīnivāsam drakṣye thā aham hi ārurukṣe calan ca

original: ityevamuktvā kapilākhyatīrthe sthānaṃ cakre sā svapitrā sahaiva // GarP_3,23.44 //
analyzed: iti evam uktvā kapila ākhya tīrthe sthānam cakre sā sva pitrā saha eva

original: atraivāste śrīnivāso haristu dravyeṇa rūpeṇa na cānyatheti /
analyzed: atrā eva āste śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu dravyeṇa rūpeṇa na ca anyathā iti

original: ādausnātvā muṇḍanaṃ tatra kṛtvā tīrthaśrāddhaṃ kārayitvā sutīrthe // GarP_3,23.45 //
analyzed: ādau snātvā muṇḍanam tatra kṛtvā tīrtha śrāddham kārayitvā sutīrthe

original: gobhūhiraṇyādisamastadānaṃ dattvā śailaṃ cārurohātha sādhvī /
analyzed: go bhū hiraṇya ādi samasta dānam dattvā śailam ca āruroha atha sādhvī

original: śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā sa cāgre punaḥ praṇāmaṃ sāpi cakre subhaktyā // GarP_3,23.46 //
analyzed: śālagrāmam sthāpayitvā sa ca agre punar praṇāmam sā api cakre su bhaktyā

original: sopānānāṃ śataparyantamevamāruhya sā hyupaviṣṭā tu tatra /
analyzed: sopānānām śata paryantam evam āruhya sā hi upaviṣṭā tu tatra

original: śuśrāva sā bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śuśrāva vaiveṅkaṭādreḥ praśaṃsām // GarP_3,23.47 //
analyzed: śuśrāva sā bhāgavatam purāṇam śuśrāva vaiveṅkaṭa adreḥ praśaṃsām

original: jaigīṣavyādgurupādātsubhaktyā suśrāva tattvaṃ veṅkaṭādreśca sarvam // GarP_3,23.48 //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyāt guru pādāt su bhaktyā suśrāva tattvam veṅkaṭādreḥ ca sarvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe veṅkaṭeśagiriyātrākramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe veṅkaṭeśagiriyātrākramanirūpaṇam nāma trayoviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 24
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca

original: kanye śṛṇu tvaṃ veṅkaṭākhyācalasya smerānanāṃ puṇyamāṃrohaṇe 'sya /
analyzed: kanye śṛṇu tvam veṅkaṭa ākhya acalasya smera ānanām puṇya māṃrohaṇe sya

original: śrīgītāyāḥ paṭhanaṃ caiva kurvannārohaṇaṃ kurute sarvalokaḥ // GarP_3,24.1 //
