analyzed: śrīgītāyāḥ paṭhanam ca eva kurvan ārohaṇam kurute sarva lokaḥ

original: padepade śrīnivāsaśca devastvalaṃ hyalaṃ prīyate bhaktavargaḥ /
analyzed: pade pade śrīnivāsaḥ ca devaḥ tu alam hi alam prīyate bhakta vargaḥ

original: taṃ prīṇayanmokṣamāyānti sarve harau tuṣṭe kimalabhyaṃ ca kanye // GarP_3,24.2 //
analyzed: tam prīṇayan mokṣam āyānti sarve harau tuṣṭe kim alabhyam ca kanye

original: sopānadeśe yaḥ purāṇaṃ śṛṇoti tadā kṛtā sarvatīrthādiyātrā /
analyzed: sopāna deśe yaḥ purāṇam śṛṇoti tadā kṛtā sarva tīrtha ādi yātrā

original: tadā divā prastuvantīha mārge sadā hariṃ śrīnivāsaṃ guruṃ ca // GarP_3,24.3 //
analyzed: tadā divā prastuvanti iha mārge sadā harim śrīnivāsam gurum ca

original: sopānānāṃ mahimānaṃ ca śrutvā śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā ca tatra /
analyzed: sopānānām mahimānam ca śrutvā śālagrāmam sthāpayitvā ca tatra

original: namaskṛtvā punarevāpi sā tu sopānāni tvārurohātha sādhvī // GarP_3,24.4 //
analyzed: namaskṛtvā punar evā api sā tu sopānāni tu āruroha atha sādhvī

original: sopānānāṃ vīndra cārohaṇena tvavaiṣṇavānāṃ haritoṣo na caiva /
analyzed: sopānānām vi indra ca ārohaṇena tu avaiṣṇavānām harita ūṣaḥ na ca eva

original: tenaiva teṣāṃ sādhanaṃ bhūya eva tamasyandhe pātayituṃ khagendra // GarP_3,24.5 //
analyzed: tena eva teṣām sādhanam bhūyas eva tamasi andhe pātayitum khaga indra

original: sthalesthale evamevāpi kāryaṃ jaigīṣavyaṃ punarevāha devī /
analyzed: sthalesthale evam eva api kāryam jaigīṣavyam punar eva āha devī

original: kanyovāca /
analyzed: kanyā uvāca

original: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāso haristu brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,24.6 //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu brahma ādīnām dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ

original: jaigīṣavya kṛpayā tvaṃ vadasva jaigīṣavyo hyevamukto hariṃ tu /
analyzed: jaigīṣavya kṛpayā tvam vadasva jaigīṣavyaḥ hi evam uktaḥ harim tu

original: uvāca kanyāṃ somaputrīṃ satīṃ ca brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,24.7 //
analyzed: uvāca kanyām somaputrīm satīm ca brahma ādīnām dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ

original: anantarūpodhikakāntakāntimānrūdrādīnāṃ dṛśyate veṅkaṭeśaḥ /
analyzed: ananta rūpa udhika kānta kāntimān rūdra ādīnām dṛśyate veṅkaṭa īśaḥ

original: sasūryalakṣādhikakāntakāntito rudrādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,24.8 //
analyzed: rudra ādīnām dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ

original: sahasrasūryādhikakāntikāntaḥ savidyuttvānmānuṣāṇāṃ rameśaḥ /
analyzed: sahasra sūrya adhika kānti kāntaḥ sa vidyut tvāt mānuṣāṇām rameśaḥ

original: ṛṣyādīnāṃ dṛśyate candravacca sanmānuṣāṇāmaparokṣo haristu // GarP_3,24.9 //
analyzed: ṛṣi ādīnām dṛśyate candra vat ca sat mānuṣāṇām aparokṣaḥ hariḥ tu

original: nakṣatravaddṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ sadā ṛṣīṇāmaparokṣo haristu /
analyzed: nakṣatra vat dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ sadā ṛṣīṇām aparokṣaḥ hariḥ tu

original: sa sūryavaddṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ veṅkaṭeśaḥ khagendra // GarP_3,24.10 //
analyzed: sa sūrya vat dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ saṃsāriṇām veṅkaṭa īśaḥ khaga indra

original: saṃdohavaddṛśyate vai prakāśo mithyāvatāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ /
analyzed: saṃdoha vat dṛśyate vai prakāśaḥ mithyāvatām dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ

original: pāṣāṇavannailyarūpaprakāśaḥ śilāmātre dṛṣyate vai kalau ca // GarP_3,24.11 //
analyzed: pāṣāṇa vat nailya rūpa prakāśaḥ śilā mātre dṛṣyate vai kalau ca

original: nṛṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrīnivāso haristu kalau svarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya devī /
analyzed: nṛṇām sarveṣām śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu kalau svarūpam śrīnivāsasya devī

original: na mānuṣāḥ pravijānanti sarve yataḥ kalau tāmasā rājasāstu // GarP_3,24.12 //
analyzed: na mānuṣāḥ pravijānanti sarve yatas kalau tāmasāḥ rājasāḥ tu

original: tatsaṃginaḥ sāttvikāḥ kecideva hyato bhaktā durlabhā vai kalau ca /
analyzed: tad saṃginaḥ sāttvikāḥ kecid eva hi atas bhaktāḥ durlabhāḥ vai kalau ca

original: ye dṛśyante bhaktavatte na bhaktāḥ śiśrodarayorbharaṇe caiva saktāḥ // GarP_3,24.13 //
analyzed: ye dṛśyante bhakta vat te na bhaktāḥ śiśrodarayoḥ bharaṇe ca eva saktāḥ

original: kurvanti yātrāṃ ca tadarthameva bhaktijñānaṃ durlabhaṃ vai kalau ca /
analyzed: kurvanti yātrām ca tad artham eva bhakti jñānam durlabham vai kalau ca

original: bhaktā ye vai na viraktāḥ sadaiva teṣāṃ harerdarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca // GarP_3,24.14 //
analyzed: bhaktāḥ ye vai na viraktāḥ sadā eva teṣām hareḥ darśanam durlabham ca

original: bhaktasvarūpaṃ tava vakṣye khagendra yo jñānapūrṇaḥ parame snigdha eva /
analyzed: bhakta svarūpam tava vakṣye khaga indra yaḥ jñāna pūrṇaḥ parame snigdhaḥ eva

original: na ca dveṣairbandhuro bhaktiyuktastava dveṣāñchṛṇu vakṣye ca samyak // GarP_3,24.15 //
analyzed: na ca dveṣaiḥ bandhuraḥ bhakti yuktaḥ tava dveṣān śṛṇu vakṣye ca samyak

original: jīvābhidā hariṇāprākṛtena svatantreṇa hyasvatantrasya nityam /
analyzed: jīva a bhidā hariṇā aprākṛtena svatantreṇa hi asvatantrasya nityam

original: jñānānandaiḥ paripūrṇe harau ca guṇairapūrṇo harirityeva cintā // GarP_3,24.16 //
analyzed: jñāna ānandaiḥ paripūrṇe harau ca guṇaiḥ apūrṇaḥ hariḥ iti eva cintā

original: śrībrahmarudrādidivaukasāṃ sadā tathā dvijānāṃ saṃmānāyāśca cintā /
analyzed: śrī brahma rudra ādi divaukasām sadā tathā dvijānām saṃmānāyāḥ ca cintā

original: viṣṇoḥ sakāśādbrahmarudrādikānāṃ sadādhikyālocanaṃ dveṣa eva // GarP_3,24.17 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sakāśāt brahma rudra ādikānām sat ādhikya ālocanam dveṣaḥ eva

original: viṣṇorbhadre hastapādādikānāṃ bhedajñānaṃ dveṣamāhurmahāntaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ bhadre hasta pāda ādikānām bheda jñānam dveṣam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: avatārāṇā chedabhedādikaṃ ca tathocyate maraṇasyāpi cintā // GarP_3,24.18 //
analyzed: avatārāṇā cheda bheda ādikam ca tathā ucyate maraṇasya api cintā

original: tadbhaktānāṃ dveṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāstadvākyānāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dveṣa eva /
analyzed: tad bhaktānām dveṣaṇam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ tad vākyānām dūṣaṇam dveṣaḥ eva

original: naca dveṣaiḥ saṃyutā ye ca loke kanye dṛśyante na tu bhaktāḥ kadācit // GarP_3,24.19 //
analyzed: na ca dveṣaiḥ saṃyutāḥ ye ca loke kanye dṛśyante na tu bhaktāḥ kadācid

original: kanyovāca /
analyzed: kanyā uvāca

original: jaigīṣavya brūhi me ke ca bhaktā bhaktiṃ kathaṃ darśayāmāsurete /
analyzed: jaigīṣavya brūhi me ke ca bhaktāḥ bhaktim katham darśayāmāsuḥ ete

original: teṣāṃ hariḥ śrīnivāso mahātmā trātā sadā bhaktavarge dayāluḥ // GarP_3,24.20 //
analyzed: teṣām hariḥ śrīnivāsaḥ mahātmā trātā sadā bhakta varge dayāluḥ

original: jaigīṣavyastvevamukto mahātmā uvāca kanyāṃ saṃsmaran bhaktavaryaḥ /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ tu evam uktaḥ mahātmā uvāca kanyām saṃsmaran bhakta varyaḥ

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca

original: prahādādyā śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ kṛtvā nṛsiṃhe cottamāṃ bhaktimeva // GarP_3,24.21 //
analyzed: prahāda ādyā śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ kṛtvā nṛsiṃhe ca uttamām bhaktim eva

original: avāpa sāmrājyamanuttamaṃ ca jñānaṃ nṛsiṃhātsamavāpa paścāt /
analyzed: avāpa sāmrājyam anuttamam ca jñānam nṛsiṃhāt samavāpa paścāt

original: parāśaraḥ śrīnibāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā vyāsarūpaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,24.22 //
analyzed: parāśaraḥ śrīnibāsasya bhaktaḥ bhaktim kṛtvā vyāsa rūpam harim ca

original: stutvā tena jñānatattvaṃ hyavāpya jagāma mokṣaṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā /
analyzed: stutvā tena jñāna tattvam hi avāpya jagāma mokṣam bhakti saṃvardhita ātmā

original: yo nāradaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā garbhavāse harau ca // GarP_3,24.23 //
analyzed: yaḥ nāradaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ bhaktim kṛtvā garbha vāse harau ca

original: tayā bhaktyā brahmaputratvamāpa jñānaprāptyā tena muktiṃ jagāma /
analyzed: tayā bhaktyā brahma putra tvam āpa jñāna prāptyā tena muktim jagāma

original: yo hyaṃbarīṣaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ kṛtvā bhaktiṃ paradeva harau ca // GarP_3,24.24 //
analyzed: yaḥ hi aṃbarīṣaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ kṛtvā bhaktim paradeva harau ca

original: japtvā jñānaṃ prāpya durvāsakaścāpyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
analyzed: japtvā jñānam prāpya durvāsakaḥ ca api avāpa mokṣam tena saṃvardhita ātmā

original: mucukundo vai śrīnivāsasya bhakto vairāgyato bhaktidārḍhyaṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,24.25 //
analyzed: mucukundaḥ vai śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ vairāgyataḥ bhakti dārḍhyam ca kṛtvā

original: tattvajñānaṃ prāpya viṣṇormahātmā hyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
analyzed: tattva jñānam prāpya viṣṇoḥ mahātmā hi avāpa mokṣam tena saṃvardhita ātmā

original: sa puṇḍarīkaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ pitrādiṣṭo viṣṇubhaktiṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,24.26 //
analyzed: sa puṇḍarīkaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ pitrā ādiṣṭaḥ viṣṇu bhaktim ca kṛtvā

original: hariprāsādājjñānamanuttamaṃ cāpyavāpa mokṣaṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā /
analyzed: hari prāsādāt jñānam anuttamam ca api avāpa mokṣam bhakti saṃvardhita ātmā

original: brahmā ca vāyuśca sarasvatī ca jñātavyāḥ sarve ṛjuyoginaśca // GarP_3,24.27 //
analyzed: brahmā ca vāyuḥ ca sarasvatī ca jñātavyāḥ sarve ṛju yoginaḥ ca

original: acchinnabhaktāśca sadā murārerna kāmyaraktāḥ śuddharūpā hi te ca /
analyzed: acchinna bhaktāḥ ca sadā murāreḥ na kāmya raktāḥ śuddha rūpāḥ hi te ca

original: girīśanāgeśakhageśasaṃjñā devāḥ śukrārau gurucandrendusūryāḥ // GarP_3,24.28 //
analyzed: girīśa nāgeśa khageśa saṃjñāḥ devāḥ śukra arau guru candra indu sūryāḥ

original: jaleśognirmanudharmau kuberaḥ vighneśanāsatyamarudgaṇāśca /
analyzed: jaleśa ugniḥ manu dharmau kuberaḥ vighneśa nāsatya marut gaṇāḥ ca

original: parjanyamitrādaya eva sarve sadā hyete śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ // GarP_3,24.29 //
analyzed: parjanya mitra ādayaḥ eva sarve sadā hi ete śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ

original: viśvāmitro bhṛguraurvaśca kutso marīciratriḥ pulahaḥ kratuśca /
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ bhṛguḥ aurvaḥ ca kutsaḥ marīciḥ atriḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ ca

original: śaktirvasiṣṭho sautamīyo pulastyo bhāradvājaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ // GarP_3,24.30 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ sautamīyaḥ pulastyaḥ bhāradvājaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ

original: māndhātā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā pṛthurhaihayo ikṣvākurbharato yayātisutalau dharmo vikukṣistathā /
analyzed: māndhātā nahuṣa uṃbarīṣa sagarau rājā pṛthuḥ haihayaḥ ikṣvākuḥ bharataḥ yayāti sutalau dharmaḥ vikukṣiḥ tathā

original: uttānaśca bibhīṣaṇo daśaratho hyete mahājñāninaḥ śrīmadveṅkaṭanāyakasya ca gurorbhaktāḥ sadā saṃsmṛtāḥ // GarP_3,24.31 //
analyzed: uttānaḥ ca bibhīṣaṇaḥ daśarathaḥ hi ete mahā jñāninaḥ śrīmat veṅkaṭanāyakasya ca guroḥ bhaktāḥ sadā saṃsmṛtāḥ

original: bhāgīrathī samudraśca yamunā ca sarasvatī /
analyzed: bhāgīrathī samudraḥ ca yamunā ca sarasvatī

original: godāvarī narmadā ca kṛṣṇā bhīmarathī tathā // GarP_3,24.32 //
analyzed: godāvarī narmadā ca kṛṣṇā bhīmarathī tathā

original: sarayūphalgukāverīgaṇḍakī kapilā stathā /
analyzed: sarayū phalgu kāverī gaṇḍakī kapilāḥ

original: ityetāśca harerbhaktāḥ saṃti cātraiva bhāmini // GarP_3,24.33 //
analyzed: iti etāḥ ca hareḥ bhaktāḥ saṃti ca atrā eva bhāmini

original: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu kanye mayā sati /
analyzed: abhiprāyam tatra vakṣye śṛṇu kanye mayā sati

original: yatra pravartate mārge kathā viṣṇormahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,24.34 //
analyzed: yatra pravartate mārge kathā viṣṇoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: vartante vaiṣṇavā yatra haritattvārthabodhakāḥ /
analyzed: vartante vaiṣṇavāḥ yatra hari tattva artha bodhakāḥ

original: tatraiva bhaktāḥ sarvepi saṃti viṣṇostathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.35 //
analyzed: tatra eva bhaktāḥ sarve api saṃti viṣṇoḥ tathā eva ca

original: ye devayātrāṃ paramātmacintayā kurvanti te haribhaktāśca nānye /
analyzed: ye deva yātrām paramātma cintayā kurvanti te hari bhaktāḥ ca nā anye

original: yato harau parame vaiṣṇavānāṃ sarvaṃ niṣṭhāmeti kṛtyaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,24.36 //
analyzed: yatas harau parame vaiṣṇavānām sarvam niṣṭhām eti kṛtyam khaga indra

original: śeṣācalaṃ samāsādya hyannavastrādibhūṣaṇam /
analyzed: śeṣa acalam samāsādya hi anna vastra ādi bhūṣaṇam

original: yo na dadyādabhaktaḥ sa tataḥ ko nu paraḥ paśuḥ // GarP_3,24.37 //
analyzed: yaḥ na dadyāt abhaktaḥ sa tatas kaḥ nu paraḥ paśuḥ

original: bhaktā hareḥ śrīnivāsācale ca gaṅgādirūpeṇa ca tatratatra /
analyzed: bhaktāḥ hareḥ śrīnivāsa acale ca gaṅgā ādi rūpeṇa ca tatra tatra

original: tiṣṭhanti sevārthamurukramasya teṣāṃ pūjā naiva kāryā ca devi // GarP_3,24.38 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti sevā artham urukramasya teṣām pūjā nā eva kāryā ca devi

original: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra sthale vastragandhādidhūpaiḥ /
analyzed: abhiprāyam tatra vakṣye śṛṇu tvam tatra sthale vastra gandha ādi dhūpaiḥ

original: purāṇoktā api bhedena pūjyā dṛṣṭvā ca tānvandayetprājña eva // GarP_3,24.39 //
analyzed: purāṇa uktāḥ api bhedena pūjyāḥ dṛṣṭvā ca tān vandayet prājñaḥ eva

original: sadbrāhmaṇānvandayetpādamūle hastau ca dvau saṃpuṭīkṛtya devi /
analyzed: sat brāhmaṇān vandayet pāda mūle hastau ca dvau saṃpuṭīkṛtya devi

original: sāṣṭāṅgarupaṃ vandanaṃ caiva viṣṇoḥ kuryāttathā gurave viṣṇubuddhyā // GarP_3,24.40 //
analyzed: sa aṣṭāṅga rupam vandanam ca eva viṣṇoḥ kuryāt tathā gurave viṣṇu buddhyā

original: gaṅgādīnāṃ vandanaṃ kāryameva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ vai tulasīnāṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: gaṅgā ādīnām vandanam kāryam eva sa aṣṭāṅgam vai tulasīnām tathā eva

original: aśvatthānāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva gavādīnāṃ namanaṃ mānasena // GarP_3,24.41 //
analyzed: aśvatthānām namanam kāryam eva go ādīnām namanam mānasena

original: pūjā sadā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ kāryā bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaireva nānyaiḥ /
analyzed: pūjā sadā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ kāryā bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaiḥ eva na anyaiḥ

original: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaiva kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye // GarP_3,24.42 //
analyzed: ye nāmakāḥ jñānavantaḥ su bhaktāḥ sadā eva kāryā viṣṇu pūjā ca kanye

original: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaivaṃ kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye /
analyzed: ye nāmakāḥ jñānavantaḥ su bhaktāḥ sadā evam kāryā viṣṇu pūjā ca kanye

original: yenāmakā viṣṇubhaktāḥ sadaiva pūjā viṣṇornaiva kāryātra devi // GarP_3,24.43 //
analyzed: yenāmakāḥ viṣṇu bhaktāḥ sadā eva pūjā viṣṇoḥ nā eva kāryā atra devi

original: mohādyo vai pūjayeddevadevaṃ mahādharmādyāti cāndhaṃ tamo vai /
analyzed: mohāt yaḥ vai pūjayet devadevam mahā dharmāt yāti ca andham tamaḥ vai

original: brahmādināmāni harerhi devīṃ viṣṇoḥ svanāmāni dadau divaukasām // GarP_3,24.44 //
analyzed: brahma ādi nāmāni hareḥ hi devīm viṣṇoḥ sva nāmāni dadau divaukasām

original: nādāddhīraḥ keśavādīni kanye svakaṃ puraṃ pravihāyaiva rājā /
analyzed: na adāt dhīraḥ keśava ādīni kanye svakam puram pravihāya eva rājā

original: evaṃ mayoktaṃ kanyake sarvametadetatparaṃ samyagārohaṇīyam // GarP_3,24.45 //
analyzed: evam mayā uktam kanyake sarvam etat etat param samyak ārohaṇīyam

original: govinda nārāyaṇa mādhaveti yūyaṃ mayā sarvamārādhitavyam /
analyzed: govinda nārāyaṇa mādhava iti yūyam mayā sarvam ārādhitavyam

original: sarve militvā punarevaṃ khagendra samāruhanvaiṅkaṭādriṃ gṛṇantaḥ // GarP_3,24.46 //
analyzed: sarve militvā punar evam khaga indra samāruhan vaiṅkaṭādrim gṛṇantaḥ

original: harernāmānyatra pūrvaṃ gṛṇantastvāsvādayantaḥ śrīnivāsasya nāma /
analyzed: hareḥ nāmāni atra pūrvam gṛṇantaḥ tu āsvādayantaḥ śrīnivāsasya nāma

original: draṣṭuṃ sarve śrīnivāsaṃ tathaiva kurvantaste talaśabdaṃ nadantaḥ // GarP_3,24.47 //
analyzed: draṣṭum sarve śrīnivāsam tathā eva kurvantaḥ te tala śabdam nadantaḥ

original: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā tārkṣyaḥ kṛṣṇamuvācaha kathamāsvādanaṃ cakruretadvistīryame vada /
analyzed: iti kṛṣṇa vacaḥ śrutvā tārkṣyaḥ kṛṣṇam uvāca ha katham āsvādanam cakruḥ etat vistīrya me vada

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: bho śrīnivāsa tava nāmaiva caitannāma svāmī nanu nāmaiva svāmī /
analyzed: bho śrīnivāsa tava nāma eva ca etat nāma svāmī nanu nāma eva svāmī

original: yāṃ brahmādyā āśrayantītti yasmāttasmādramā śrīriti nāma cāpa // GarP_3,24.48 //
analyzed: yām brahma ādyāḥ āśrayanti it ti yasmāt tasmāt ramā śrīḥ iti nāma ca āpa

original: ramāśrayatvānnitarāṃ sarvadā cetyato hariḥ śrīnivāsābhidhānaḥ /
analyzed: ramā āśraya tvāt nitarām sarvadā ca iti atas hariḥ śrīnivāsa abhidhānaḥ

original: bho śrīnivāseti tu nartayanto romāñcamātrāstalaśabdakāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,24.49 //
analyzed: bho śrīnivāsa iti tu nartayantaḥ romāñca mātrāḥ tala śabda kāriṇaḥ

original: adyaiva paśyāma harestavāsyaṃ kadā vayaṃ kṛta kṛtyā bhavāmaḥ /
analyzed: adyā eva paśyāma hareḥ tava āsyam kadā vayam kṛta kṛtyāḥ bhavāmaḥ

original: bhoḥ keśavādyaiva padāravindaṃ saṃdarśayitvā sudayāṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,24.50 //
analyzed: bhoḥ keśava adya eva pada aravindam saṃdarśayitvā su dayām kuruṣva

original: brahmāṇamāhuśca purāṇamāhuḥ kaśabdavācyaṃ sarvalokeśamāhuḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇam āhuḥ ca purāṇam āhuḥ ka śabda vācyam sarva loka īśam āhuḥ

original: īśaṃ cārhaṃ rudramityeva cāhustatprerakaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārye // GarP_3,24.51 //
analyzed: īśam ca arham rudram iti eva ca āhuḥ tad prerakam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārye

original: ato hariḥ keśavanāmadheyo bhoḥ keśaveti ca nartayantaḥ /
analyzed: atas hariḥ keśava nāmadheyaḥ bhoḥ keśava iti ca nartayantaḥ

original: ānandavāpīṃ saṃstravantobhi jagmurnārāyaṇeti pravadanto hi jagmuḥ // GarP_3,24.52 //
analyzed: ānanda vāpīm jagmuḥ nārāyaṇa iti pravadantaḥ hi jagmuḥ

original: ato doṣāstadviruddhā guṇāśca nārāśca teṣāmāśrayatvānmurāriḥ /
analyzed: atas doṣāḥ tad viruddhāḥ guṇāḥ ca nārāḥ ca teṣām āśraya tvāt murāriḥ

original: nārāyaṇeti pravadantīha loke nārānubandhātsarvamuktāḥ khagendra // GarP_3,24.53 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti pravadanti iha loke nāra anubandhāt sarva muktāḥ khaga indra

original: nārāḥ proktā āśrayatvācca teṣāmatopi nārāyaṇa eva vīndra /
analyzed: nārāḥ proktāḥ āśraya tvāt ca teṣām atas api nārāyaṇaḥ eva vi indra

original: muktāśca ye tu prapadaṃnu jagmuraṇḍodakaṃ yasya kaṭākṣamātrāt // GarP_3,24.54 //
analyzed: muktāḥ ca ye tu prapadam nu jagmuḥ aṇḍa udakam yasya kaṭākṣa mātrāt

original: yadutpannaṃ tena nārāḥ khagendra teṣāṃ sadāpyāśrayatvācca vīndra /
analyzed: yat utpannam tena nārāḥ khaga indra teṣām sadā api āśraya tvāt ca vīndra

original: nārāyaṇeti pravadantīha loke hyanantabrahmāṇḍavisarjakatvāt // GarP_3,24.55 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti pravadanti iha loke hi ananta brahmāṇḍa visarjaka tvāt

original: evaṃ nanṛtuḥ pariśaṃsayanto govinda nānyo hi na caiva darśanam /
analyzed: evam nanṛtuḥ pariśaṃsayantaḥ govinda nā anyaḥ hi na ca eva darśanam

original: gośabdavācyāstu samastavāco gobhiśca sarvaiḥ pratipādyate yataḥ // GarP_3,24.56 //
analyzed: go śabda vācyāḥ tu samasta vācaḥ gobhiḥ ca sarvaiḥ pratipādyate yatas

original: ato hi govinda iti smṛtaḥ sadā bho vedavedyeti tathā na nanṛtuḥ /
analyzed: atas hi govindaḥ iti smṛtaḥ sadā bho veda vedya iti tathā na nanṛtuḥ

original: ānandabāṣpaiśca samanvitā hi hare murāre tava darśanaṃ hi // GarP_3,24.57 //
analyzed: ānanda bāṣpaiḥ ca samanvitā hi hare murāre tava darśanam hi

original: dehi prabho vai tavadāsadāsāścaturdaśe bhuvane sarvadāpi /
analyzed: dehi prabho vai tava dāsa dāsāḥ caturdaśe bhuvane sarvadā api

original: yatastvamevaṃ vasatīti vāsuścātraiva nityaṃ krīḍate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,24.58 //
analyzed: yatas tvam evam vasati iti vāsuḥ ca atra eva nityam krīḍate sarvadā eva

original: yato devetyevamāhurmahāntastvato hariṃ vāsudeveti cāhuḥ /
analyzed: yatas deva iti evam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ tu atas harim vāsudeva iti ca āhuḥ

original: bho vāsudeveti nanṛtuḥ sarvadaiva bho mādhaveti nanṛtuścaiva sarve // GarP_3,24.59 //
analyzed: bho vāsudeva iti nanṛtuḥ sarvadā eva bho mādhava iti nanṛtuḥ ca eva sarve

original: lakṣmīpate ceti vadanti sarve dhanīti śabdaḥ svābhivācī yato hi /
analyzed: lakṣmīpate ca iti vadanti sarve dhanī iti śabdaḥ sva abhivācī yatas hi

original: atopyāryā mādhaveti bruvanti lakṣmīpate pāhi tathaiva bhaktān // GarP_3,24.60 //
analyzed: atas api āryāḥ mādhava iti bruvanti lakṣmīpate pāhi tathā eva bhaktān

original: te vai bruvanto nanṛtuśca jagmurviṣṇo sadāsmānparipāhi nityam /
analyzed: te vai bruvantaḥ nanṛtuḥ ca jagmuḥ viṣṇo sadā asmān paripāhi nityam

original: sarvatra yasmādvitatosi tasmādityādināmāni gṛṇanta eva /
analyzed: sarvatra yasmāt vitataḥ asi tasmāt ityādi nāmāni gṛṇantaḥ eva

original: jagmuśca sarve dadṛśuśca tīrthaṃ bhaktyopetāḥ śrīnivāsaṃ smarantaḥ // GarP_3,24.61 //
analyzed: jagmuḥ ca sarve dadṛśuḥ ca tīrtham bhaktyā upetāḥ śrīnivāsam smarantaḥ

original: kanyovāca /
analyzed: kanyā uvāca

original: kiṃ nāmakaṃ tīrthamidaṃ munīndra kiṃ kāryamatra pravadāsmānkṛtīśa /
analyzed: kim nāmakam tīrtham idam muni indra kim kāryam atra pravada asmān kṛtīśa

original: kasmai prasanno bhagavāñchrīnivāsastvasminsutīrthaṃ vada vistareṇa // GarP_3,24.62 //
analyzed: kasmai prasannaḥ bhagavān śrīnivāsaḥ tu asmin su tīrtham vada vistareṇa

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca

original: kanye śṛṇu tvaṃ hyabhavatsubuddhimānprahrādasaṃjño haribhaktavaryaḥ /
analyzed: kanye śṛṇu tvam hi abhavat su buddhimān prahrāda saṃjñaḥ hari bhakta varyaḥ

original: niṣkāmabuddhyā tu yadā jagāma śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum // GarP_3,24.63 //
analyzed: niṣkāma buddhyā tu yadā jagāma śeṣa acala stham śrīnivāsam ca draṣṭum

original: asmiṃsthale daityakumārakānprati hareśca tattvaṃ paripṛṣṭavānprabhuḥ /
analyzed: asmin sthale daitya kumārakān prati hareḥ ca tattvam paripṛṣṭavān prabhuḥ

original: nṛsiṃharūpaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ bhajasva sudurlabhaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma kanye // GarP_3,24.64 //
analyzed: nṛsiṃha rūpam śrīnivāsam bhajasva su durlabham mānuṣam janma kanye

original: tatrāpi viṣṇornṛhare sutattvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ suṣṭhu yātrā tathaiva /
analyzed: tatra api viṣṇoḥ nṛhare sutattvam su durlabham suṣṭhu yātrā tathā eva

original: yasyāṃ yātrāyāṃ yatra kutrāpi deśe hareḥ kathā vartate daityavaryāḥ // GarP_3,24.65 //
analyzed: yasyām yātrāyām yatra kutra api deśe hareḥ kathā vartate daitya varyāḥ

original: tatra sthale harirāste sadaiva yato vyāptaḥ sarvato vai nṛsiṃhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sthale hariḥ āste sadā eva yatas vyāptaḥ sarvatas vai nṛsiṃhaḥ

original: etacchrutvā daityakumārakāste prahlādamūcurbhaktavaryaṃ hareśca // GarP_3,24.66 //
analyzed: etat śrutvā daitya kumārakāḥ te prahlādam ūcuḥ bhakta varyam hareḥ ca

original: vyāpto hariścetkathamatra vai sakhe na dṛśyate jalarūpī nṛsiṃhaḥ /
analyzed: vyāptaḥ hariḥ ced katham atra vai sakhe na dṛśyate jala rūpī nṛsiṃhaḥ

original: sa evamukto dānavānāṃ sutaiśca tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,24.67 //
analyzed: saḥ evam uktaḥ dānavānām sutaiḥ ca tuṣṭāva viṣṇum parama ādareṇa

original: tava svarūpaṃ mama darśayasva svayogyarūpaṃ dānavānāṃ sutānām /
analyzed: tava sva rūpam mama darśayasva sva yogya rūpam dānavānām sutānām

original: iti stutaḥ śrīnivāso haristu tasminnantarjalarūpaṃ samāyāt // GarP_3,24.68 //
analyzed: iti stutaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu tasmin antar jala rūpam samāyāt

original: asminsnānaṃ ye prakurvanti tīrthe teṣāṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ dṛḍhaṃ syāt /
analyzed: asmin snānam ye prakurvanti tīrthe teṣām jñānam paramam dṛḍham syāt

original: atra snāne mānuṣāṇāṃ ca tāta buddhirna hi syātkalikāle viśeṣāt // GarP_3,24.69 //
analyzed: atra snāne mānuṣāṇām ca tāta buddhiḥ na hi syāt kali kāle viśeṣāt

original: dattvāṃ varaṃ daityavarāya viṣṇurantardadhe jalapūrṇe sukuṇḍe /
analyzed: dattvā ām varam daitya varāya viṣṇuḥ antardadhe jala pūrṇe sukuṇḍe

original: adyāpyāste jalamadhye nṛsiṃhaḥ prahlādopi daityakumārakaiḥ saha // GarP_3,24.70 //
analyzed: adyā api āste jala madhye nṛsiṃhaḥ prahlādaḥ api daitya kumārakaiḥ saha

original: tasmin sutīrthe paritastatratatra jayeti śabdaḥ śrūyate cāparāhne /
analyzed: tasmin su tīrthe paritas tatra tatra jaya iti śabdaḥ śrūyate ca aparāhne

original: idaṃ tīrthaṃ nārasiṃhābhidhaṃ ca kanyesnānaṃ hyatra kāryaṃ manuṣyaiḥ // GarP_3,24.71 //
analyzed: idam tīrtham nārasiṃha abhidham ca kanyesnānam hi atra kāryam manuṣyaiḥ

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā tatra tīrthe ca samyagdīpaṃ dattvā dvijavaryāya mukhyam /
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā tatra tīrthe ca samyak dīpam dattvā dvijavaryāya mukhyam

original: draṣṭuṃ punaḥ śrīnivāsaṃ prajagmurgovindagovinda iti bruvantaḥ // GarP_3,24.72 //
analyzed: draṣṭum punar śrīnivāsam prajagmuḥ govinda govindaḥ iti bruvantaḥ

original: mukhyaprāṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ sthānamāpya apāviśattatra devī hyuvāca /
analyzed: mukhya prāṇa dhiṣṭhitam sthānam āpya apāviśat tatra devī hi uvāca

original: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ kathaṃ kāryaṃ darśanaṃ tadvadasva // GarP_3,24.73 //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ katham kāryam darśanam tat vadasva

original: jaigīṣavyaḥ prāha saṃhṛṣṭacitto bravīmi tantraṃ śṛṇu kanyake tvam /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ prāha saṃhṛṣṭa cittaḥ bravīmi tantram śṛṇu kanyake tvam

original: śrutvā mattaḥ kuru sarvaṃ mayoktamādyaṃ dvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā // GarP_3,24.74 //
analyzed: śrutvā mattaḥ kuru sarvam mayā uktam ādyam dvāram śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā

original: aparādhasahasrāṇi kriyante 'harniśaṃ mayā /
analyzed: aparādha sahasrāṇi kriyante harniśam mayā

original: tāni sarvāṇi me deva kṣamasva puruṣottama // GarP_3,24.75 //
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi me deva kṣamasva puruṣottama

original: mānasānvācikāndoṣānkāyi kānapi sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: mānasān vācikān doṣān kāyi kān api sarvaśas

original: vaiṣṇavadveṣahetūnme bhasmasātkuru mādhava // GarP_3,24.76 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇava dveṣa hetūn me bhasmasātkuru mādhava

original: ādyadvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya devi samyak smaredvijayaṃ vai jayaṃ ca /
analyzed: ādya dvāram śrīnivāsasya devi samyak smaret vijayam vai jayam ca

original: dakṣādhvare śrīnivāsasya devi caṇḍaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ saṃsmaretsamyageva // GarP_3,24.77 //
analyzed: dakṣa adhvare śrīnivāsasya devi caṇḍam pracaṇḍam saṃsmaret samyak eva

original: pāścātyabhāge śrīnivāsasya devi nandaṃ sunandaṃ saṃsmaredeva bhaktyā /
analyzed: pāścātya bhāge śrīnivāsasya devi nandam sunandam saṃsmaret eva bhaktyā

original: savyadvāre śrīnivāsasya kanye smaretkumudākṣaṃ kumudantameva // GarP_3,24.78 //
analyzed: savya dvāre śrīnivāsasya kanye smaret kumudākṣam kumudantam eva

original: yaścaiva dehaṃ praviśedbhaktipūrvaṃ kadā drakṣye sādareṇaiva devi /
analyzed: yaḥ ca eva deham praviśet bhakti pūrvam kadā drakṣye sa ādareṇa eva devi

original: pradakṣiṇadvādaśakaṃ ca kṛtvā pade pade saṃsmarecchrīnivāsam // GarP_3,24.79 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa dvādaśakam ca kṛtvā pade pade saṃsmaret śrīnivāsam

original: śrīsvāmitīrthe samyagācamya natvā snātvā natvā bhūvarāhaṃ ca devi /
analyzed: śrī svāmitīrthe samyak ācamya natvā snātvā natvā bhūvarāham ca devi

original: ayudvāraṃ privaśedbhaktipṛrvaṃ govindagovinda itibruvanvai // GarP_3,24.80 //
analyzed: govinda govindaḥ iti bruvan vai

original: paścāddharernamanaṃ kāryameva sāṣṭāṅgarūpaṃ praviśeddevageham /
analyzed: paścāt hareḥ namanam kāryam eva sa aṣṭāṅga rūpam praviśet deva geham

original: punarviśedvārataḥ saṃsthitaḥ sa pīṭhasthadevānmānasā cintayīta // GarP_3,24.81 //
analyzed: punar viśet vārataḥ saṃsthitaḥ sa pīṭha stha devān mānasā cintayīta

original: madhye pīṭhaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī nārāyaṇaṃ praṇametpūrṇameva /
analyzed: madhye pīṭham śrīnivāsam ca devī nārāyaṇam praṇamet pūrṇam eva

original: devasya savye pīṭhabhāgādvahiśca namaskāryaṃ gurudevāya caiva // GarP_3,24.82 //
analyzed: devasya savye pīṭha bhāgāt vahis ca namaskāryam guru devāya ca eva

original: pīṭhasyāgrāccāpyadhastātpradeśe āgneyakoṇe praṇamedvai khagendra /
analyzed: pīṭhasya agrāt ca api adhastāt pradeśe āgneya koṇe praṇamet vai khaga indra

original: nairṛtyabhāge vyāsadevāya devi namaskāryo vaiṣṇavaḥ sarvadāpi // GarP_3,24.83 //
analyzed: nairṛtya bhāge vyāsadevāya devi namaskāryaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ sarvadā api

original: vāyavyakoṇe bhaktipūrvaṃ sudurgāṃ namaskuryādbhaktisaṃvardhitātmā /
analyzed: vāyavya koṇe bhakti pūrvam su durgām namaskuryāt bhakti saṃvardhita ātmā

original: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ hyagnikoṇeṣu devī dharmādhibhūtāya namo yamāya // GarP_3,24.84 //
analyzed: pīṭhasya ūrdhvam hi agni koṇeṣu devī dharma adhibhūtāya namaḥ yamāya

original: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ nairṛtasyordhvakoṇe jñānādhipaṃ praṇamedvāyudevam /
analyzed: pīṭhasya ūrdhvam nairṛtasya ūrdhva koṇe jñānādhipam praṇamet vāyudevam

original: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ vāyukoṇe ca subhrūrvairāgyānāmadhipaṃ caiva rudram // GarP_3,24.85 //
analyzed: pīṭhasya ūrdhvam vāyu koṇe ca subhrūḥ vairāgyānām adhipam ca eva rudram

original: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ tvīśakoṇe ca devi aiśvaryāṇāmadhipaṃ cendradevam /
analyzed: pīṭhasya ūrdhvam tu īśa koṇe ca devi aiśvaryāṇām adhipam ca indra devam

original: pīṭhasya pūrve praṇamennairṛtiṃ ca aryāmṇānāmadhipaṃ cātra devi // GarP_3,24.86 //
analyzed: pīṭhasya pūrve praṇamet nairṛtim ca aryāmṇānām adhipam ca atra devi

original: devasya pīṭhasya ca dakṣiṇe ca durgāṃ namedugrarūpābhidhāṃ ca /
analyzed: devasya pīṭhasya ca dakṣiṇe ca durgām namet ugra rūpa abhidhām ca

original: pīṭhasya kanye praṇametpaścime vai ārogyāṇā madhipaṃ kāmadevam // GarP_3,24.87 //
analyzed: pīṭhasya kanye praṇamet paścime vai ārogyāṇām adhipam kāmadevam

original: devasya pīṭhasyottare rudradevamanaiśvaryāṇāmadhipaṃ saṃsmarecca /
analyzed: devasya pīṭhasya uttare rudra devam anaiśvaryāṇām adhipam saṃsmaret ca

original: pīṭhasya madhye praṇamedvai varāhaṃ sadā kanye paramaṃ pūruṣākhyam // GarP_3,24.88 //
analyzed: pīṭhasya madhye praṇamet vai varāham sadā kanye paramam pūruṣa ākhyam

original: tasyopariṣṭācchaktisaṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmīmādhārarūpāṃ praṇameccaiva nityam /
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt śakti saṃjñām ca lakṣmīm ādhāra rūpām praṇamet ca eva nityam

original: tasyopariṣṭādvāyukūrmau namecca tasyopariṣṭāccheṣakūrmau namecca // GarP_3,24.89 //
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt vāyu kūrmau namet ca tasya upariṣṭāt śeṣa kūrmau namet ca

original: tasyopariṣṭādabhimāninīṃ bhuvo bhūdevatāṃ praṇameccaiva subhrūḥ /
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt abhimāninīm bhuvaḥ bhūdevatām praṇamet ca eva subhrūḥ

original: tasyopariṣṭādvaruṇaṃ saṃsmarecca kṣīrodadheradhipaṃ caiva devam // GarP_3,24.90 //
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt varuṇam saṃsmaret ca kṣīrodadheḥ adhipam ca eva devam

original: tasyopariṣṭātpraṇameccaiva lakṣmīṃ śvetadvīpākhyaṃ kanyake pūjayecca /
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt praṇamet ca eva lakṣmīm śvetadvīpa ākhyam kanyake pūjayet ca

original: tasyopariṣṭātpraṇameccaiva lakṣmīṃ mahādivyāṃ maṇḍapasaṃjñakāṃ ca // GarP_3,24.91 //
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt praṇamet ca eva lakṣmīm mahā divyām maṇḍapa saṃjñakām ca

original: pīṭhasya madhye yamasaṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmīṃ samarcayedyamamadhye ca devīm /
analyzed: pīṭhasya madhye yama saṃjñām ca lakṣmīm samarcayet yama madhye ca devīm

original: yamasya devasya ca dakṣiṇe ca sūryaṃ nameddīparūpaṃ ca bhadre // GarP_3,24.92 //
analyzed: yamasya devasya ca dakṣiṇe ca sūryam namet dīpa rūpam ca bhadre

original: yamasya devasya ca vāmabhāge śriyaṃ nameddīparūpāṃ ca devīm /
analyzed: yamasya devasya ca vāma bhāge śriyam namet dīpa rūpām ca devīm

original: yamasya devasya tu cāgrabhāge hutāśanaṃ dīparūpaṃ namecca // GarP_3,24.93 //
analyzed: yamasya devasya tu ca agra bhāge hutāśanam dīpa rūpam namet ca

original: devasyāgre bhūmināmnīṃ namecca tattvābhimānāṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam /
analyzed: devasya agre bhūmi nāmnīm namet ca tattva abhimānām saṃsmaret ca eva nityam

original: paryaṅkarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇostamobhimānāṃ sannameccaiva durgām // GarP_3,24.94 //
analyzed: paryaṅka rūpam śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ tamaḥ bhimānām san namet ca eva durgām

original: pūrvādigaṃ pīṭhasopānarūpamātmānamekaṃ praṇamecca devi /
analyzed: pūrva ādi gam pīṭha sopāna rūpam ātmānam ekam praṇamet ca devi

original: dakṣasthadikpīṭhasopānarūpaṃ jñānātmakaṃ praṇameccaiva kanye // GarP_3,24.95 //
analyzed: dakṣa stha diś pīṭha sopāna rūpam jñāna ātmakam praṇamet ca eva kanye

original: padmasya pūrvasthadale ca devi strīrūpākhyaṃ vimalākhyāmimāṃ ca /
analyzed: padmasya pūrva stha dale ca devi strī rūpa ākhyam vimalā ākhyām imām ca

original: brahmādidevānpraṇamecca devi āgneyakoṇasthadale śṛṇutvam // GarP_3,24.96 //
analyzed: brahma ādi devān praṇamet ca devi āgneya koṇa stha dale śṛṇu tvam

original: utkarṣanāmnīṃ paramāṃ ca devīṃ namedramāṃ brahmavāyū ca śeṣam /
analyzed: utkarṣa nāmnīm paramām ca devīm namet ramām brahma vāyū ca śeṣam

original: dakṣasthapadmasya dalāṣṭake ca nārāyaṇākāraśeṣādikānām // GarP_3,24.97 //
analyzed: dakṣa stha padmasya dala aṣṭake ca nārāyaṇa ākāra śeṣa ādikānām

original: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva kanye mayā paścimasthe dale ca /
analyzed: strī rūpebhyaḥ namanam kāryam eva kanye mayā paścima sthe dale ca

original: gopākhyanārāyaṇabrahmavāyuviprādikānāṃ śeṣarūdrādikānām // GarP_3,24.98 //
analyzed: gopa ākhya nārāyaṇa brahma vāyu vipra ādikānām śeṣa rūdra ādikānām

original: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva īśāna koṇasthadaleṣu caiva /
analyzed: strī rūpebhyaḥ namanam kāryam eva īśāna koṇa stha daleṣu ca eva

original: īśānanārāyaṇamāviriñcavāyurviyaccheṣasurādikānām // GarP_3,24.99 //
analyzed: īśāna nārāyaṇa mā viriñca vāyuḥ viyat śeṣa sura ādikānām

original: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva tathaiva padmasya ca madhyabhāge /
analyzed: strī rūpebhyaḥ namanam kāryam eva tathā eva padmasya ca madhya bhāge

original: anugrahākhyā viṣṇulakṣmīśca devī vāyurviyaccheṣarudrādikānām // GarP_3,24.100 //
analyzed: anugraha ākhyā viṣṇu lakṣmīḥ ca devī vāyuḥ viyat śeṣa rudra ādikānām

original: strīrūpāṇāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva suyogapīṭhasya svarūpa bhūtam /
analyzed: strī rūpāṇām namanam kāryam eva suyogapīṭhasya bhūtam

original: sadā namecchrīmadanantasaṃjñamevaṃ na mecchrīnivāsaṃ ca devam // GarP_3,24.101 //
analyzed: sadā namet śrīmat ananta saṃjñam evam na met śrīnivāsam ca devam

original: śrīnivāsasya vāme tu lakṣmīṃ ca praṇamedvudhaḥ /
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya vāme tu lakṣmīm ca praṇamet vudhaḥ

original: śrīnivāsasya savye tu dharāyai praṇamecchubhe // GarP_3,24.102 //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya savye tu dharāyai praṇamet śubhe

original: pīṭhādvahiḥ pūrvabhāge kṛpolkaṃ praṇamecchubham /
analyzed: pīṭhāt vahis pūrva bhāge kṛpa ulkam praṇamet śubham

original: maholkaṃ dakṣiṇe caiva vīrolkaṃ paścime namet // GarP_3,24.103 //
analyzed: mahā ulkam dakṣiṇe ca eva vīra ulkam paścime namet

original: uttare ca namaḥ kuryādyulkāya ca mahātmane /
analyzed: uttare ca namaḥ kuryāt yulkāya ca mahātmane

original: caturṣvapi ca koṇeṣu sahasrolkaṃ nametsudhīḥ // GarP_3,24.104 //
analyzed: caturṣu api ca koṇeṣu sahasra ulkam namet sudhīḥ

original: pūrve tu vāsudevāya namaskuryācca dakṣiṇe /
analyzed: pūrve tu vāsudevāya namaskuryāt ca dakṣiṇe

original: saṃkarṣaṇāya devāya pradyumnāya ca paścime // GarP_3,24.105 //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇāya devāya pradyumnāya ca paścime

original: uttare hyaniruddhyā namaskuryādatandritaḥ /
analyzed: uttare hi aniruddhyā namaskuryāt atandritaḥ

original: āgneye ca namaskuryātkanye māyāṃ sadā śubhe // GarP_3,24.106 //
analyzed: āgneye ca namaskuryāt kanye māyām sadā śubhe

original: jayāyai ca namaskuryānnairṛtye cāpi vāyave /
analyzed: jayāyai ca namaskuryāt nairṛtye ca api vāyave

original: kṛtye caiva namaskuryādīśānye śāntisaṃjñakām // GarP_3,24.107 //
analyzed: kṛtye ca eva namaskuryāt īśānye śānti saṃjñakām

original: keśavāya namaḥ pūrve tathā nārāyaṇāya ca /
analyzed: keśavāya namaḥ pūrve tathā nārāyaṇāya ca

original: mādhavāya namaskuryānnairṛtye cāpi vāyave // GarP_3,24.108 //
analyzed: mādhavāya namaskuryāt nairṛtye ca api vāyave

original: āgneye kanyake nityaṃ bhaktyā tu prayataḥ śubhe /
analyzed: āgneye kanyake nityam bhaktyā tu prayataḥ śubhe

original: govindāya namaskuryāddakṣiṇe viṣṇave tathā // GarP_3,24.109 //
analyzed: govindāya namaskuryāt dakṣiṇe viṣṇave tathā

original: madhusūdanāya bhoḥ kanye namaskuryāttu nairṛtau /
analyzed: madhusūdanāya bhoḥ kanye namaskuryāt tu nairṛtau

original: paścime trivikramāya vāmanāya tathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.110 //
analyzed: paścime trivikramāya vāmanāya tathā eva ca

original: viṣṇave śrīdharāyātha namaskuryācca bhāmiti /
analyzed: viṣṇave śrīdharāya atha namaskuryāt ca bhām iti

original: uttare tu mahākanye hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ // GarP_3,24.111 //
analyzed: uttare tu mahā kanye hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ

original: tathā vai padmanābhāya namaskuryādatandritaḥ /
analyzed: tathā vai padmanābhāya namaskuryāt atandritaḥ

original: dāmodarāya caiśānye namaskuryācca bhāmini // GarP_3,24.112 //
analyzed: dāmodarāya ca aiśānye namaskuryāt ca bhāmini

original: caturthāvaraṇe pūrve mahākūrmāya vai namaḥ /
analyzed: caturtha āvaraṇe pūrve mahākūrmāya vai namaḥ

original: varāhāya namaskuryādāgneye kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,24.113 //
analyzed: varāhāya namaskuryāt āgneye kanyake śubhe

original: dakṣiṇe nārasiṃhāya vāmanāya namonamaḥ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe nārasiṃhāya vāmanāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: bhārgavāya namaskuryānnairṛtye śuddhacetasā // GarP_3,24.114 //
analyzed: bhārgavāya namaskuryāt nairṛtye śuddha cetasā

original: paścime mādhavāyātha tathā kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ /
analyzed: paścime mādhavāya atha tathā kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ

original: buddhāya ca namaskuryādvāyavye kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,24.115 //
analyzed: buddhāya ca namaskuryāt vāyavye kanyake śubhe

original: uttare hyulkarūpāya anantāya namostu te /
analyzed: uttare hi ulkā rūpāya anantāya namaḥ astu te

original: īśānye viśvarūpāya namaskuryādatandritaḥ // GarP_3,24.116 //
analyzed: īśānye viśvarūpāya namaskuryāt atandritaḥ

original: āgneye vāruṇīṃ caiva gāyatrīṃ caiva nairṛte /
analyzed: āgneye vāruṇīm ca eva gāyatrīm ca eva nairṛte

original: vāyavye bhāratīṃ caiva īśānye girijāṃ namet // GarP_3,24.117 //
analyzed: vāyavye bhāratīm ca eva īśānye girijām namet

original: girijāṃ vāmabhāge tu sauparṇai caiva saṃnamet /
analyzed: girijām vāma bhāge tu ca eva saṃnamet

original: prāgindrāya namaskuryātsāyudhāya tathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.118 //
analyzed: prāk indrāya namaskuryāt sa āyudhāya tathā eva ca

original: sa parigrahāya śrīviṣṇoḥ pārṣadāya namonamaḥ /
analyzed: sa parigrahāya śrīviṣṇoḥ pārṣadāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: āgneyetyagnaye tubhyaṃ sāyudhāyeti pūrvavat // GarP_3,24.119 //
analyzed: āgneya iti agnaye tubhyam sa āyudhāya iti pūrvavat

original: dakṣiṇe tu yamāyaiva nairṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ yajet /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tu yamāya eva nairṛtyām nirṛtim yajet

original: paścime varuṇāyaiva vāyavye vāyave namaḥ // GarP_3,24.120 //
analyzed: paścime varuṇāya eva vāyavye vāyave namaḥ

original: uttare ca kuberāya īśānye ca śivāya ca /
analyzed: uttare ca kuberāya īśānye ca śivāya ca

original: īśānaśakrayormadhye brahmaṇe sāyudhāya ca // GarP_3,24.121 //
analyzed: īśāna śakrayoḥ madhye brahmaṇe sa āyudhāya ca

original: nirṛtyapyatimadhye tu śeṣāya ca namonamaḥ /
analyzed: nirṛti api ati madhye tu śeṣāya ca namaḥ namaḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ praṇamecca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_3,24.122 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā namaskāram praṇamet ca punar punar

original: ityetatsarvamākhyātaṃ vidhipūrvaṃ tu darśanam /
analyzed: iti etat sarvam ākhyātam vidhi pūrvam tu darśanam

original: itaḥ parantu gantavyaṃ darśanārthaṃ ramāpate // GarP_3,24.123 //
analyzed: itas parantu gantavyam darśana artham ramāpate

original: evamuktvā tu sā devī taiḥ sārdhaṃ tu yayau mudā /
analyzed: evam uktvā tu sā devī taiḥ sārdham tu yayau mudā

original: yaduktaḥ śrīnivāsasya darśanasya vidhiḥ khaga /
analyzed: yat uktaḥ śrīnivāsasya darśanasya vidhiḥ khaga

original: kasyacinnaiva vaktavyo gopyatvācca kadācana // GarP_3,24.124 //
analyzed: kasyacid nā eva vaktavyaḥ gopya tvāt ca kadācana

original: samāgamo durghaṭa eva vīndra satāṃ ca sattattvavibodhakānām /
analyzed: samāgamaḥ durghaṭaḥ eva vīndra satām ca sat tattva vibodhakānām

original: anekajanmārjitapuṇyasaṃcayādabhūdguroḥ saṃgama eva tasya // GarP_3,24.125 //
analyzed: aneka janma arjita puṇya saṃcayāt abhūt guroḥ saṃgamaḥ eva tasya

original: payo vikāraṃ ca nijaṃ jahāti śeṣasya śeṣaṃ nalinasya ṣaṅkajam /
analyzed: payaḥ vikāram ca nijam jahāti śeṣasya śeṣam nalinasya ṣaṅkajam

original: bhāvaṃ calaṃ paṅkajanābhayogātsatsaṃgayogādaśubhāni na syuḥ // GarP_3,24.126 //
analyzed: bhāvam calam paṅkaja nābha yogāt sat saṃga yogāt aśubhāni na syuḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe śrīveṅkaṭeśagiryārohaṇakramatadbhaktatatparvatanāmādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe śrīveṅkaṭeśagiryārohaṇakramatadbhaktatatparvatanāmādinirūpaṇam nāma caturviśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 25
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sā dvāradeśe śrīnivāsasya devī svāmipuṣkariṇīṃ dadṛśe kaiśca sārdham /
analyzed: sā dvāra deśe śrīnivāsasya devī svāmipuṣkariṇīm dadṛśe kaiḥ ca sārdham

original: svāminhare śrīnivāseti sā taṃ brahmādīnāṃ tārakaṃ sampradadhyau // GarP_3,25.1 //
analyzed: svāmin hare śrīnivāsa iti sā tam brahma ādīnām tārakam sampradadhyau

original: devaiḥ sārdhaṃ pālanārthaṃ ca viṣṇurastyeva nityaṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ jaleṣu /
analyzed: devaiḥ sārdham pālana artham ca viṣṇuḥ asti eva nityam puṣkariṇyām jaleṣu

original: ataḥ svāmipuṣkariṇīti cāhustatra snānaṃ kanyakānyāśca cakruḥ // GarP_3,25.2 //
analyzed: atas svāmipuṣkariṇī iti ca āhuḥ tatra snānam kanyakā anyāḥ ca cakruḥ

original: śucirbhūtvā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devāstuptuṃ viviśuḥ śuddhabhaktyā khagendra /
analyzed: śuciḥ bhūtvā śrīnivāsam ca devāḥ tuptum viviśuḥ śuddha bhaktyā khaga indra

original: yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathaiva cakre kanyāśca sarvaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,25.3 //
analyzed: yathā upadiṣṭam guruṇā tathā eva cakre kanyāḥ ca sarvam khaga indra

original: tadā hariṃ darśayāmāsa tasyai svakaṃ rūpaṃ supratīke supūrṇam /
analyzed: tadā harim darśayāmāsa tasyai svakam rūpam supratīke su pūrṇam

original: sā kanyakā śrīnivāsasya rūpaṃ dadarśa bhaktyā svamanobhirāmam // GarP_3,25.4 //
analyzed: sā kanyakā śrīnivāsasya rūpam dadarśa bhaktyā sva manobhirāmam

original: suvarṇacitraṃ vasanaṃ vasānaṃ soṣṇīṣakaṃ kañcukaṃ saṃdadhānam // GarP_3,25.5 //
analyzed: suvarṇa citram vasanam vasānam sa uṣṇīṣakam kañcukam saṃdadhānam

original: mṛgotthamadagandhena surabhīkṛtadiṅmukham /
analyzed: mṛga uttha mada gandhena surabhīkṛta diṅmukham

original: puṇḍarīkaviśālākṣaṃ kaṃbugrīvaṃ mahābhujam // GarP_3,25.6 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīka viśāla akṣam kaṃbu grīvam mahā bhujam

original: hemayajñopavītāṅgaṃ sākṣātkandarpasannibham /
analyzed: hema yajñopavīta aṅgam sākṣāt kandarpa sannibham

original: jaganmohanasaindaryaṃ komalāṅgaṃ manoharam // GarP_3,25.7 //
analyzed: jagat mohana saindaryam komala aṅgam manoharam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca kanyā mumude romāñcitasugātrakā // GarP_3,25.8 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca kanyā mumude romāñcita su gātrakā

original: taddarśanāhlādapariplutāśayā premṇātha romāśrukulākulekṣaṇā /
analyzed: tad darśana āhlāda paripluta āśayā premṇā atha roma aśru kula ākula īkṣaṇā

original: nanarta devī puratastasya viṣṇoḥ sā dhvastadoṣā paramādareṇa /
analyzed: nanarta devī puratas tasya viṣṇoḥ sā dhvasta doṣā parama ādareṇa

original: ānanda māṃ pāhi sukhaṃ ca dattvā mukundā māṃ pāhi vimuktidānāt // GarP_3,25.9 //
analyzed: ānanda mām pāhi sukham ca dattvā mukundā mām pāhi vimukti dānāt

original: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ hyaravindanetra prasannadṛṣṭyā karuṇāsudhārdra /
analyzed: mām pāhi nityam hi aravinda netra prasanna dṛṣṭyā karuṇā sudhā ārdra

original: govinda govinda suduḥ khitāṃ māṃ jñānādidānena hi pāhi nityam // GarP_3,25.10 //
analyzed: govinda govinda su duḥ khitām mām jñāna ādi dānena hi pāhi nityam

original: janārdana tvaṃ hi suduṣṭasaṃgānkāmādirūpānsatataṃ varjayitvā /
analyzed: janārdana tvam hi su duṣṭa saṃgān kāma ādi rūpān satatam varjayitvā

original: hare hare māṃ satataṃ pāhi daityānsamāhṛtya prabalānvighnarūpān // GarP_3,25.11 //
analyzed: hare hare mām satatam pāhi daityān samāhṛtya prabalān vighna rūpān

original: rameśa māṃ pāhi caturmukheśa viśveśa māṃ pāhi sarasvatīśa /
analyzed: rama īśa mām pāhi caturmukha īśa viśveśa mām pāhi sarasvati īśa

original: rameśa māṃ pāhi nidānamūrte vṛndāravṛndairvanditapādapadma // GarP_3,25.12 //
analyzed: rama īśa mām pāhi nidāna mūrte vṛndāra vṛndaiḥ vandita pāda padma

original: evaṃ tu natvā paramādareṇa tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramaṃ purāṇam /
analyzed: evam tu natvā parama ādareṇa tuṣṭāva viṣṇum paramam purāṇam

original: lakṣmyā sadā ye 'viditā guṇāśca asaṃkhyātāḥ saṃti viṣṇau ca vīśa // GarP_3,25.13 //
analyzed: lakṣmyā sadā ye viditāḥ guṇāḥ ca asaṃkhyātāḥ saṃti viṣṇau ca vīśa

original: teṣāṃ sakāśādatibāhulyasaṃkhyā guṇā harau te 'viditā vai ramāyāḥ /
analyzed: teṣām sakāśāt ati bāhulya saṃkhyāḥ guṇāḥ harau te viditāḥ vai ramāyāḥ

original: ato hare stavane kvāsti śaktistathāpi yatnaṃ stavane te kariṣye // GarP_3,25.14 //
analyzed: atas hare stavane kva asti śaktiḥ tathā api yatnam stavane te kariṣye

original: tava prasādācca ramāprasādādvidhiprasādātbhāratīśaprasādāt /
analyzed: tava prasādāt ca ramā prasādāt vidhi prasādāt bhāratī īśa prasādāt

original: rudraprasādātstavanaṃ te kariṣye tathāpi viṣṇo mayi śāntiṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,25.15 //
analyzed: rudra prasādāt stavanam te kariṣye tathā api viṣṇo mayi śāntim kuruṣva

original: yadi prasannosi mayi tvamīśa tvatpādamūle dehi bhaktiṃ sadaiva /
analyzed: yadi prasannaḥ asi mayi tvam īśa tvad pāda mūle dehi bhaktim sadā eva

original: tvaddarśanāddeva śubhāśubhaṃ ca naṣṭaṃ madīyaṃ hyaśubhaṃ ca nityam // GarP_3,25.16 //
analyzed: tvad darśanāt deva śubha aśubham ca naṣṭam madīyam hi aśubham ca nityam

original: tvanmāyayā naṣṭamimaṃ ca lokaṃ madena mattaṃ badhiraṃ cāndhabhūtam /
analyzed: tvad māyayā naṣṭam imam ca lokam madena mattam badhiram ca andha bhūtam

original: aiśvaryayogena ca yo hi mūko jātaḥ sadā dīnāgurvādikeṣu // GarP_3,25.17 //
analyzed: aiśvarya yogena ca yaḥ hi mūkaḥ jātaḥ sadā dīna guru ādikeṣu

original: mā dehi aiśvaryamanuttamaṃ tvatpādāravindasya viruddhabhūtam /
analyzed: mā dehi aiśvaryam anuttamam tvad pāda aravindasya viruddha bhūtam

original: tvaṃ deva me dehi satāṃ ca saṃgaṃ tava svarūpapratipādakānām // GarP_3,25.18 //
analyzed: tvam deva me dehi satām ca saṃgam tava sva rūpa pratipādakānām

original: putrādīnāmaihikaṃ vāsudeva dagdhvā ca me dehi pādāravinde /
analyzed: putra ādīnām aihikam vāsudeva dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda aravinde

original: sadvaṣṇave kriyamāṇaṃ ca kopaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādaravinde // GarP_3,25.19 //
analyzed: sat vaṣṇave kriyamāṇam ca kopam dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda aravinde

original: dravyādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca lobhaṃ dagdhvā vai me dehi pādābjamūle /
analyzed: dravya ādike kriyamāṇam ca lobham dagdhvā vai me dehi pāda abja mūle

original: putrādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca mohaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle // GarP_3,25.20 //
analyzed: putra ādike kriyamāṇam ca moham dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda abja mūle

original: vidyāṃ putraṃ dravyajātaṃ madaṃ ca dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle /
analyzed: vidyām putram dravya jātam madam ca dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda abja mūle

original: sadvaiṣṇavāsahamānasvarūpaṃ dagdhvā mātsaryaṃ pāhi māṃ veṅkaṭeśa // GarP_3,25.21 //
analyzed: sat vaiṣṇava asahamāna svarūpam dagdhvā mātsaryam pāhi mām veṅkaṭeśa

original: mantraṃ ca me dehi nidānamūrte yenaiva me syāttava saṃgaśca bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: mantram ca me dehi nidāna mūrte yena eva me syāt tava saṃgaḥ ca bhūyas

original: nānyaṃ vṛṇe tava pādābjasaṃgāttadeva me dehi mama prasannaḥ // GarP_3,25.22 //
analyzed: na anyam vṛṇe tava pāda abja saṃgāt tat eva me dehi mama prasannaḥ

original: itīritaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ prasanna uvāca devo hyamṛtastravaṃ ca /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ prasannaḥ uvāca devaḥ hi amṛtaḥ travam ca

original: atraiva kanye prajapasva mantraṃ sugopyarūpaṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,25.23 //
analyzed: atrā eva kanye prajapasva mantram su gopya rūpam parama ādareṇa

original: vakṣyāmi mantraṃ paramādareṇa śṛṇvadya bhaktyā paramādareṇa /
analyzed: vakṣyāmi mantram parama ādareṇa śṛṇu adya bhaktyā parama ādareṇa

original: antaḥ sthamantyaṃ hyādyasaṃyuktameva sabindu tadvatsparśakādyena yuktam // GarP_3,25.24 //
analyzed: antar stham antyam hi ādya saṃyuktam eva sa bindu tadvat sparśaka ādyena yuktam

original: ekārayuktaṃ prathamāntaḥ sthayuktaṃ samatrikoṇe coṣmaṇā saṃyutaṃ ca /
analyzed: ekāra yuktam prathama antar stha yuktam sama trikoṇe ca ūṣmaṇā saṃyutam ca

original: takārasaktaṃ svarśamantaḥ sthayuktamādyanta oṃkārasamanvitaṃ ca // GarP_3,25.25 //
analyzed: takāra saktam sva ṛśam antar stha yuktam ādi ante oṃkāra samanvitam ca

original: anena mantreṇa tavepsitaṃ ca bhaveddhi kanye nāntra vicāryamasti /
analyzed: anena mantreṇa tava īpsitam ca bhavet hi kanye na antra vicāryam asti

original: evaṃ sa uktvā śrīnivāso haristu pratīkavaddarśayāmāsa rūpam // GarP_3,25.26 //
analyzed: evam saḥ uktvā śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu pratīka vat darśayāmāsa rūpam

original: natvā tu sā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī uvāsa ha svāmisaraḥ samīpe /
analyzed: natvā tu sā śrīnivāsam ca devī uvāsa ha svāmi saraḥ samīpe

original: tasmindine brāhmaṇādīṃśca sarvānsaṃtarpayāmāsa ca ṣaḍrasānnaiḥ // GarP_3,25.27 //
analyzed: tasmin dine brāhmaṇa ādīn ca sarvān saṃtarpayāmāsa ca ṣaṣ rasa annaiḥ

original: sāyaṅkāle śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā utsāharūpaiḥ śrīnivāsapratīkaiḥ /
analyzed: sāyaṅkāle śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā utsāha rūpaiḥ śrīnivāsa pratīkaiḥ

original: sākaṃ bhaktyā saṃpraṇamyātha devī pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāsasya suṣṭhu // GarP_3,25.28 //
analyzed: sākam bhaktyā saṃpraṇamya atha devī pradakṣiṇam śrīnivāsasya suṣṭhu

original: nanarta devī supratīkasya cāgre lajjāṃ tyaktvā jaya deveti coktvā /
analyzed: nanarta devī supratīkasya ca agre lajjām tyaktvā jaya deva iti ca uktvā

original: ānṛttakāle ca hareśca vaktraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭyā tu paraṃ nanarta // GarP_3,25.29 //
analyzed: ānṛtta kāle ca hareḥ ca vaktram dṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭyā tu param nanarta

original: mamādya gātraṃ pāvitaṃ śrīnivāsa mamādya netraṃ saphalaṃ saṃbabhūva /
analyzed: mama adya gātram pāvitam śrīnivāsa mama adya netram saphalam saṃbabhūva

original: mamādya pādau sārthakau caiva jātau pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāseśa kṛtvā // GarP_3,25.30 //
analyzed: mama adya pādau sārthakau ca eva jātau pradakṣiṇam śrīnivāsa īśa kṛtvā

original: hastau ca me sārthakāvadya jātau agre kṛtvā hastaśabdaṃ murāreḥ /
analyzed: hastau ca me sārthakau adya jātau agre kṛtvā hasta śabdam murāreḥ

original: evaṃ vadantī prīṇayantī ca devaṃ jagāmasā stotravacaḥ kadambaiḥ // GarP_3,25.31 //
analyzed: evam vadantī prīṇayantī ca devam jagāmasā stotra vacaḥ kadambaiḥ

original: devāstadā dunduṃbhayo vinedire tanmastake puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca cakruḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ tadā dunduṃbhayaḥ vinedire tad mastake puṣpa vṛṣṭim ca cakruḥ

original: tasminkāle ubhayoḥ pārśvayośca nṛtyaṃ cakrurdevatāvāranāryaḥ // GarP_3,25.32 //
analyzed: tasmin kāle ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ ca nṛtyam cakruḥ devatā vāra nāryaḥ

original: tathaiva tāstalaśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā tadā sarvā namanaṃ cāpi cakruḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva tāḥ tala śabdam ca kṛtvā tadā sarvāḥ namanam ca api cakruḥ

original: ānandaśaile sarvadā tvitthameva sā sarvadā nartayantī ca vīndra // GarP_3,25.33 //
analyzed: ānanda śaile sarvadā tu ittham eva sā sarvadā nartayantī ca vīndra

original: ānandamagnā sāpi devī jagāma svamāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham /
analyzed: ānanda magnā sā api devī jagāma svam āśramam jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham

original: yātrāmevaṃ ye na kurvanti vīndra teṣāṃ ca sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,25.34 //
analyzed: yātrām evam ye na kurvanti vi indra teṣām ca sarvam niṣphalam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: gatvāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdhaṃ guruṃ tvapṛcchadveṅkaṭeśasya mantram /
analyzed: gatvā āśramam jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham gurum tu apṛcchat veṅkaṭa īśasya mantram

original: mantrasyārthaṃ brūhi me jaigiṣavya mantrāvṛttiṃ kurvatāṃ vai phalāya // GarP_3,25.35 //
analyzed: mantrasya artham brūhi me jaigiṣavya mantra āvṛttim kurvatām vai phalāya

original: jaigīṣvya uvāca /
analyzed: jaigīṣvyaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇuṣva bhadre veṅkaṭe śasya nāmnastvarthaṃ śrutvā hṛdaye saṃnidhatsva // GarP_3,25.36 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva bhadre veṅkaṭe śasya nāmnaḥ tu artham śrutvā hṛdaye saṃnidhatsva

original: viti hyuttamavācī syādyeti jñānamudāhṛtam /
analyzed: v iti hi uttama vācī syāt yā iti jñānam udāhṛtam

original: kakāraḥ sukhavācī syāṭṭeti cittamudāhṛtam // GarP_3,25.37 //
analyzed: kakāraḥ sukha vācī syāt ṭa iti cittam udāhṛtam

original: īśatvamātmavāci syādevaṃ jñeyaṃ tu kanyake /
analyzed: īśa tvam ātma vāci syāt evam jñeyam tu kanyake

original: pūrṇajñānaṃ sukhaṃ vittaṃ vyāptatvādvyaṅkaṭābhidhaḥ // GarP_3,25.38 //
vya (ve) mindriyādikaṃ proktaṃ vyaṅgabhūtaṃ harau yataḥ /
analyzed: proktam vyaṅga bhūtam harau yatas

original: kaṭaśca samudāyārtho vyaṃ (veṃ)
analyzed: kaṭaḥ ca samudāya arthaḥ vyam veṃ

original: kaṭaścendriyaughakaḥ // GarP_3,25.39 //
analyzed: kaṭaḥ ca indriya oghakaḥ

original: svasminprerayate yasmāttasmādvyaṅkaṭanāmakaḥ /
analyzed: svasmin prerayate yasmāt tasmāt vyaṅkaṭa nāmakaḥ

original: viṣaye preṣayennityamato vyaṅkaṭanāmakaḥ // GarP_3,25.40 //
analyzed: viṣaye preṣayet nityam atas vyaṅkaṭa nāmakaḥ

original: viśiṣṭajñānarūpatvādvyeti muktāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa jñāna rūpa tvāt vyeti muktāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ

original: muktānāṃ ca samūhastu vyaṅkaṭeti prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,25.41 //
analyzed: muktānām ca samūhaḥ tu vyaṅkaṭa iti prakīrtitaḥ

original: sadā muktasamūhānāmīśatvādvyaṅkaṭābhidhaḥ /
analyzed: sadā mukta samūhānām īśa tvāt vyaṅkaṭa abhidhaḥ

original: liṅgadehamato jīvo vyaṅkaṭeti samāhṛtaḥ // GarP_3,25.42 //
liṅgānāṃ caiva svāmitvādvyaṅkaṭeśeti saṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: liṅgānām ca eva svāmi tvāt vyaṅkaṭeśa iti saṃjñitaḥ

original: daityānāṃ ca samūhāstu jñānādividhurā yataḥ /
analyzed: daityānām ca samūhāḥ tu jñāna ādi vidhurāḥ yatas

original: ato daityasamūhastu vyaṅkaṭeti prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,25.43 //
analyzed: atas daitya samūhaḥ tu vyaṅkaṭa iti prakīrtitaḥ

original: teṣāṃ saṃharaṇe īśastvato vyaṅkaṭanāmakaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām saṃharaṇe īśaḥ tu atas vyaṅkaṭa nāmakaḥ

original: ānandasya viruddhatvātkāmakrodhādayo guṇāḥ // GarP_3,25.44 //
analyzed: ānandasya viruddha tvāt kāma krodha ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: vyaṅkaṭā iti saṃproktāsteṣāṃ nāśayitā prabhuḥ /
analyzed: vyaṅkaṭāḥ iti saṃproktāḥ teṣām nāśayitā prabhuḥ

original: atastu vyaṅkaṭeśākhya evaṃ jñātvā japaṃ kuru // GarP_3,25.45 //
analyzed: atas tu vyaṅkaṭeśa ākhye evam jñātvā japam kuru

original: evaṃ vyaṅkaṭāmāhātmyaṃ śrutvā devī khageśvara /
analyzed: evam vyaṅkaṭā māhātmyam śrutvā devī khageśvara

original: nidrāṃ cakāra tatraiva rātrau pitrā sahaiva ca /
analyzed: nidrām cakāra tatra eva rātrau pitrā saha eva ca

original: brāhme muhūrte cotthayi hṛdi sasmāra kanyakā // GarP_3,25.46 //
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte hṛdi sasmāra kanyakā

original: (vyaṅkaṭeśasya prātaḥ stutiḥ) /
analyzed: vyaṅkaṭeśasya prātar stutiḥ

original: śrīvyaṅkaṭeśaśca nṛsiṃhamūrtiḥ śrīvaradarājaśca varāhamūrtiḥ /
analyzed: śrī vyaṅkaṭa īśaḥ ca nṛsiṃha mūrtiḥ śrī varada rājaḥ ca varāha mūrtiḥ

original: śrīraṅgaśāyī ca anantaśāyī kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.47 //
analyzed: śrīraṅgaśāyī ca anantaśāyī kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam

original: śrīkṛṣṇamūrtiśca gadādharaśca śrīviṣṇupādastu prayāgavāsaḥ /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇa mūrtiḥ ca gadādharaḥ ca śrī viṣṇupādaḥ tu prayāga vāsaḥ

original: nārāyaṇaḥ śrībadarīnivāsaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.48 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ śrī badarī nivāsaḥ kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: dāmodaro vai trijagannivāsaḥ śrīpāṇḍuraṅgaśca nṛsiṃhadevaḥ /
analyzed: dāmodaraḥ vai trijagannivāsaḥ śrīpāṇḍuḥ aṅgaḥ ca nṛsiṃha devaḥ

original: śrīrāmadevaśca amoghavāsaḥ kudṛ // GarP_3,25.49 //
analyzed: śrī rāmadevaḥ ca amoghavāsaḥ

original: śrīdharmaputraśca nṛsiṃhamūrtiḥ śrīpippalasthaśca muhallavāsaḥ /
analyzed: śrī dharma putraḥ ca nṛsiṃha mūrtiḥ śrī pippala sthaḥ ca muhalla vāsaḥ

original: kolānṛsiṃhaḥ śūrpakārastha siṃhaḥ kurvantudṛ // GarP_3,25.50 //
analyzed: siṃhaḥ

original: caturmukhaścārusarasvatī ca svabhāratī śarvasuparṇaśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: caturmukhaḥ cārusarasvatī ca sva bhāratī śarva suparṇa śeṣāḥ

original: amāmahedraśca śacīmukhāstāḥ kurvantu dṛ // GarP_3,25.51 //
analyzed: śacī mukhāḥ tāḥ kurvantu

original: dvārāvatī kāśikāvantikā ca prayāgakāñcyau mathurāpurī ca /
analyzed: dvārāvatī kāśikā avantikā ca prayāga kāñcyau mathurā purī ca

original: māyāvatī hastimatī purī ca kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.52 //
analyzed: māyāvatī hastimatī purī ca kurvantu sa dṛ

original: bhāgīrathī caiva sarasvatī ca godāvarī siṃdhukṛṣṇa ca veṇī /
analyzed: bhāgīrathī ca eva sarasvatī ca godāvarī siṃdhu kṛṣṇa ca veṇī

original: kalindakanyā yamunā ca narmadā kurva dṛ // GarP_3,25.53 //
analyzed: kalindakanyā yamunā ca narmadā

original: vitastikāverisatuṅgabhadrāḥ suvañjarā bhīmarathī vipāśā /
analyzed: vitasti kāveri satuṅga bhadrāḥ suvañjarāḥ bhīmarathī vipāśā

original: sutāmraparṇī ca pinākinī ca ku dṛ // GarP_3,25.54 //
analyzed: sutāmraparṇī ca pinākinī ca ku dṛ

original: svāmipuṣkariṇī caiva suvarṇamukharī tathā /
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇī ca eva suvarṇamukharī tathā

original: śrīpāṇḍavī taubaruśca kapilā pāpanāśanī // GarP_3,25.55 //
analyzed: śrīpāṇḍavī taubaruḥ ca kapilā pāpanāśanī

original: gururvasiṣṭhaḥ kraturaṅgirāśca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaśca gautamaḥ /
analyzed: guruḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ kratuḥ aṅgirāḥ ca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ ca gautamaḥ

original: raibhyo marīciścyavanaśca dakṣaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.56 //
analyzed: raibhyaḥ marīciḥ cyavanaḥ ca dakṣaḥ kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: saptārṇavāḥ sapta kulācalāśca dvīpāśca saptopavanāni sapta /
analyzed: sapta arṇavāḥ sapta kula acalāḥ ca dvīpāḥ ca sapta upavanāni sapta

original: bhūrādikāni bhuvanāni sapta kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.57 //
analyzed: bhūḥ ādikāni bhuvanāni sapta kurvantu sa dṛ

original: māndhātrā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā nalo dharmarāṭ prahlādaḥ kraturāḍ vibhīṣaṇagayau vyāso hanūmānapi /
analyzed: māndhātrā nahuṣa uṃbarīṣa sagarau rājā nalaḥ dharmarāj prahlādaḥ kraturāj vibhīṣaṇa gayau vyāsaḥ hanūmān api

original: aśvatthāma kṛpāvumā drupadajā śrījānakī tārakā mandodaryakhilāḥ prabhātasumahaṃ kurvantu nityaṃ hare // GarP_3,25.58 //
analyzed: aśvatthāma kṛpau umā drupada jā śrī jānakī tārakā mandodarī akhilāḥ prabhāta su maham kurvantu nityam hare

original: aśvatthasya vanāni kiṃ ca tulasīdhātrīvanāni prabho punnāgasya vanāni caṃpakavanānyanyāni puṣpāṇi ca /
analyzed: aśvatthasya vanāni kim ca tulasī dhātrī vanāni prabho punnāgasya vanāni caṃpaka vanāni anyāni puṣpāṇi ca

original: mandārasya vanāni yāni ca hareḥ saugandhikānyapyaho nityaṃ tāni diśantu matpramuditaṃ śrīveṅkaṭeśa prabho // GarP_3,25.59 //
analyzed: mandārasya vanāni yāni ca hareḥ saugandhikāni api aho nityam tāni diśantu mad pramuditam śrī veṅkaṭeśa prabho

original: evaṃ smṛtvā śrīnivāsasya devī kṛtvā śaucaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sākam /
analyzed: evam smṛtvā śrīnivāsasya devī kṛtvā śaucam jaigiṣavyeṇa sākam

original: snātuṃ yayau puṣkariṇīṃ hareśca snānaṃ samyak tatra cakāra deśe /
analyzed: snātum yayau puṣkariṇīm hareḥ ca snānam samyak tatra cakāra deśe

original: samyag japtvā vyaṅkaṭeśasya mantramuvāca sā jaigiṣavyaṃ guruṃ ca // GarP_3,25.60 //
analyzed: samyak japtvā vyaṅkaṭa īśasya mantram uvāca sā jaigiṣavyam gurum ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devī kṛtaveṅkaṭeśadarśanatatstutyādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devī kṛtaveṅkaṭeśadarśanatatstutyādivarṇanam nāma pañcaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 26
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: kanyovāca /
analyzed: kanyā uvāca

original: śrīnivāsaḥ kimarthaṃ vai āgatotra vadasva me /
analyzed: śrīnivāsaḥ kimartham vai āgatā utra vadasva me

original: śeṣācalopi kutrā bhūtkadāyātaśca pāpahā /
analyzed: śeṣa acalaḥ api kutra bhūt kadā āyātaḥ ca pāpa hā

original: svāmipuṣkariṇī cātra kimarthaṃ hyagatā vada // GarP_3,26.1 //
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇī ca atra kimartham hi agatā vada

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca śṛṇu bhadre mahābhāge vyaṅkaṭeśasya cāgamam /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca śṛṇu bhadre mahābhāge vyaṅkaṭa īśasya ca āgamam

original: āvayordevi pāpāni viṣamaṃ yānti bhāmini // GarP_3,26.2 //
analyzed: āvayoḥ devi pāpāni viṣamam yānti bhāmini

original: āsītpurā hiraṇyākṣaḥ kāśyapo ditinandanaḥ /
analyzed: āsīt purā hiraṇyākṣaḥ kāśyapaḥ diti nandanaḥ

original: sanakādeśca vāgdaṇḍāddvitīyadvārapālakaḥ // GarP_3,26.3 //
analyzed: sanaka ādeḥ ca vāgdaṇḍāt dvitīya dvārapālakaḥ

original: babhūva daityayonau ca devānāṃ kaṇṭako balī /
analyzed: babhūva daitya yonau ca devānām kaṇṭakaḥ balī

original: saṃjīvo vijayaḥ prokto haribhakto mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,26.4 //
analyzed: saṃjīvaḥ vijayaḥ proktaḥ hari bhaktaḥ mahā prabhuḥ

original: hariṇyākṣaḥ svayaṃ daityo haribhaktavidūṣakaḥ /
etādṛśo hiraṇyākṣastapastaptuṃ samudyataḥ // GarP_3,26.5 //
analyzed: etādṛśaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ tapaḥ taptum samudyataḥ

original: tadā mātā ditirdevī hiraṇyākṣamuvāca sā /
analyzed: tadā mātā ditiḥ devī hiraṇyākṣam uvāca sā

original: ditiruvāca /
analyzed: ditiḥ uvāca

original: vatsalastvaṃ mahābhāgamā tapasvāṣṭahāyanaḥ // GarP_3,26.6 //
analyzed: vatsalaḥ tvam mahābhāgam ā tapasva aṣṭahāyanaḥ

original: tvaṃ mā dadasva duḥ khaṃ me pālayiṣyati kovidaḥ /
analyzed: tvam mā dadasva duḥ kham me pālayiṣyati kovidaḥ

original: kṣaṇamātraṃ na jīvāmi tvāṃ vinā jīvanaṃ na hi // GarP_3,26.7 //
analyzed: kṣaṇa mātram na jīvāmi tvām vinā jīvanam na hi

original: mā tapa tvaṃ mahābhāga mama jīvanahetave /
analyzed: mā tapa tvam mahābhāga mama jīvana hetave

original: evamuktastu mātrā sa vijayovaśatobravīt // GarP_3,26.8 //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu mātrā sa vijayaḥ uvaśataḥ bravīt

original: hiraṇyākṣo mātaraṃ prāha jālaṃ hitvā viṣṇorbhajane 'laṃ kuruṣva /
analyzed: hiraṇyākṣaḥ mātaram prāha jālam hitvā viṣṇoḥ bhajane laṃ kuruṣva

original: mayisnehaṃ putrahetorvirūḍhaṃ sukhaduḥ khe ceha loke paratra // GarP_3,26.9 //
analyzed: mayi sneham putra hetoḥ virūḍham sukha duḥ khe ca iha loke paratra

original: yāvatsnehaṃ mayi mātaḥ karoṣi tāvatkleśaṃ śāśvataṃ yāsyasi tvam /
analyzed: yāvat sneham mayi mātar karoṣi tāvat kleśam śāśvatam yāsyasi tvam

original: mātaśca te mayi putratvabuddhistvayyapyeṣā mātṛbuddhirmamāpi // GarP_3,26.10 //
analyzed: mātar ca te mayi putra tva buddhiḥ tvayi api eṣā mātṛ buddhiḥ mama api

original: tāte pūjye pitṛbuddhirmamāsti tasmiṃstute bhartṛbuddhirhi mithyā /
analyzed: tāte pūjye pitṛ buddhiḥ mama asti tasmin tute bhartṛ buddhiḥ hi mithyā

original: nirmāti yasmāddharireva sarvaṃ samyak pātā niyato 'sau murāriḥ // GarP_3,26.11 //
analyzed: nirmāti yasmāt hariḥ eva sarvam samyak pātā niyataḥ sau murāriḥ

original: ato hi mātā harireva sarvadā tvanyāsāṃ vai mātṛtā copacārāt /
analyzed: atas hi mātā hariḥ eva sarvadā tu anyāsām vai mātṛ tā ca upacārāt

original: nirmātṛtvaṃ yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddroṇādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva // GarP_3,26.12 //
analyzed: nirmātṛ tvam yadi mukhyam tvayi syāt droṇa ādīnām jananī kā vadasva

original: mātṛtvaṃ vai yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddhātrādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva /
analyzed: mātṛ tvam vai yadi mukhyam tvayi syāt dhātṛ ādīnām jananī kā vadasva

original: yataḥ sadā yāti jagattatto hariḥ sadā pitā viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇaḥ // GarP_3,26.13 //
analyzed: yatas sadā yāti jagat tattaḥ hariḥ sadā pitā viṣṇuḥ ajaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: sadā pitā mukhyapitā yadi syādgarbhasthabāle pālakaḥ ko vadasva /
analyzed: sadā pitā mukhya pitā yadi syāt garbha stha bāle pālakaḥ kaḥ vadasva

original: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkūrmādīnāṃ pālakau kau vadasva // GarP_3,26.14 //
analyzed: mātā pitroḥ pālaka tvam yadi syāt kūrma ādīnām pālakau kau vadasva

original: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkṛpādīnāṃ rakṣakau kau vadasva /
analyzed: mātā pitroḥ pālaka tvam yadi syāt kṛpā ādīnām rakṣakau kau vadasva

original: punnāmakānnārakāddeha bhajāntasmāttrātāputraviṣṇuḥ purāṇaḥ // GarP_3,26.15 //
analyzed: punnāmakāt nārakāt deha bhaja antasmāt trātā putra viṣṇuḥ purāṇaḥ

original: na tārakohaṃ narakācca subhrūrna vai bhartā nāpi pitrādayaśca /
analyzed: na tārakā uham narakāt ca su bhrūḥ na vai bhartā nā api pitṛ ādayaḥ ca

original: na vai mātā nānujādiśca sarvaḥ sarvatrātā viṣṇurato na cānyaḥ // GarP_3,26.16 //
analyzed: na vai mātā na anujā ādiḥ ca sarvaḥ sarva trātā viṣṇuḥ atas na ca anyaḥ

original: māyāṃ madīyāṃ jñānaśastreṇa cchitvā bhaktyā hareḥ smaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
analyzed: māyām madīyām jñāna śastreṇa chitvā bhaktyā hareḥ smaraṇam tvam kuruṣva

original: yadbhaktirūpūrvaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇostatsarvathā pāpaharaṃ ca mātaḥ // GarP_3,26.17 //
analyzed: yat bhakti rūpūrvam smaraṇam nāma viṣṇoḥ tat sarvathā pāpa haram ca mātar

original: yo vā bhaktyā smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ karotyasau pāpaharo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yaḥ vā bhaktyā smaraṇam nāma viṣṇoḥ karoti asau pāpa haraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: ayaṃ deho durllabhaḥ karmabhūmau tatrāpi madhye bhajanaṃ viṣṇumūrteḥ // GarP_3,26.18 //
analyzed: ayam dehaḥ durllabhaḥ karma bhūmau tatra api madhye bhajanam viṣṇu mūrteḥ

original: āyurgataṃ vyarthameva tvadīyaṃ śīghraṃ bhajeḥ śrīnivāsasya pādam /
analyzed: āyuḥ gatam vyartham eva tvadīyam śīghram bhajeḥ śrīnivāsasya pādam

original: upadiśyaivaṃ mātaraṃ putravaryo daityāveśātsobhavadvai tapasvī // GarP_3,26.19 //
analyzed: upadiśya evam mātaram putra varyaḥ daitya āveśāt saḥ bhavat vai tapasvī

original: caturmukhaṃ prīṇayitvaiva bhaktyā hyavadhyatvaṃ prāpa tasmānmahātmā /
analyzed: caturmukham prīṇayitvā eva bhaktyā hi avadhya tvam prāpa tasmāt mahātmā

original: tato bhūmiṃ karavadveṣṭayitvā ninye tadā daityavaryo mahātmā // GarP_3,26.20 //
analyzed: tatas bhūmim kara vat veṣṭayitvā ninye tadā daitya varyaḥ mahātmā

original: śrīmuṣṭadeśe prādurāsīddharistu vārāhaviṣṇustvajanaḥ purāṇaḥ /
analyzed: śrī muṣṭadeśe prādurāsīt hariḥ tu vārāha viṣṇuḥ tu a janaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: bhittvācābdhiṃ viviśe taṃ mahātmā rasātale saṃsthitaṃ bhūtalaṃ ca // GarP_3,26.21 //
analyzed: bhittvā acā abdhim viviśe tam mahātmā rasātale saṃsthitam bhū talam ca

original: svadaṃṣṭrāgre sthāpayitvā'jagāma tadāgamādāgato daityavaryaḥ /
analyzed: sva daṃṣṭra agre sthāpayitvā ājagāma tad āgamāt āgataḥ daitya varyaḥ

original: taṃ karṇamūle tāḍayitvā jaghāna prasādayāmāsa ca pūrvavadbhuvam // GarP_3,26.22 //
analyzed: tam karṇa mūle tāḍayitvā jaghāna prasādayāmāsa ca pūrvavat bhuvam

original: sudiggajānsthāpayitvā ca viṣṇuḥ śrīmuṣṭe vai saṃsthitaḥ śrīvarāhaḥ /
analyzed: sudiś gajān sthāpayitvā ca viṣṇuḥ śrī muṣṭe vai saṃsthitaḥ śrīvarāhaḥ

original: tadā hariścintayāmāsa viṣṇurbhaktyā madīyaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehamadya // GarP_3,26.23 //
analyzed: tadā hariḥ cintayāmāsa viṣṇuḥ bhaktyā madīyam mānuṣam deham adya

original: ārādhayiṣyanti ca māṃ kva ete teṣāṃ dayāṃ kutra vāhaṃ kariṣye /
analyzed: ārādhayiṣyanti ca mām kva ete teṣām dayām kutra vā aham kariṣye

original: evaṃ hariścintayitvā sukanye vaikuṇṭhalokādacalaṃ śeṣa saṃjñam /
analyzed: evam hariḥ cintayitvā sukanye vaikuṇṭha lokāt acalam

original: vīndraskandhe sthāpayitvā svayaṃ ca samāgatobhūdbhūtalaṃ bhūtaleśaḥ // GarP_3,26.24 //
analyzed: vīndra skandhe sthāpayitvā svayam ca samāgataḥ bhūt bhū talam bhū tala īśaḥ

original: suvarṇamukharītīramārabhya garuḍadhvajaḥ /
analyzed: suvarṇamukharī tīram ārabhya garuḍadhvajaḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇaveṇīparyantaṃ sthāpayā māsa taṃ girim // GarP_3,26.25 //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇa veṇī paryantam sthāpaya māsa tam girim

original: gireḥ pucche tu śrīśailaṃ madhyame 'hobalaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: gireḥ pucche tu śrīśailam madhyame hobalam smṛtam

original: mukhaṃ ca śrīnivāsasya kṣetraṃ ca samudāhṛtam // GarP_3,26.26 //
analyzed: mukham ca śrīnivāsasya kṣetram ca samudāhṛtam

original: alpena tapasābhīṣṭaṃ sidhyatyasminnahobale /
analyzed: alpena tapasā abhīṣṭam sidhyati asmin ahar bale

original: gaṅgādisarvatīrthāni puṇyāni hyatra saṃti vai // GarP_3,26.27 //
analyzed: gaṅgā ādi sarva tīrthāni puṇyāni hi atra saṃti vai

original: ya enaṃ sevate nityaṃ śraddhābhaktisamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ enam sevate nityam śraddhā bhakti samanvitaḥ

original: jñānārthī jñānamāpnoti dravyārthī dravyamāpruyāt // GarP_3,26.28 //
analyzed: jñāna arthī jñānam āpnoti dravya arthī dravyam āpruyāt

original: putrārthī putramāpnoti nṛpo rājyaṃ ca vindati /
analyzed: putra arthī putram āpnoti nṛpaḥ rājyam ca vindati

original: yaṃyaṃ kāmayate martyastantamāpnoti sarvathā // GarP_3,26.29 //
analyzed: yaṃ yam kāmayate martyaḥ tat tam āpnoti sarvathā

original: cintitaṃ sādhyate yasmāttasmāccintāmaṇiṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: cintitam sādhyate yasmāt tasmāt cintāmaṇim viduḥ

original: puṣkariṇyāśca bāhulyādgirāvasminsaraḥ su ca /
analyzed: puṣkariṇyāḥ ca bāhulyāt girau asmin saraḥ su ca

original: puṣkarādririti prāhurevaṃ tattvārthavedinaḥ // GarP_3,26.30 //
analyzed: puṣkarādriḥ iti prāhuḥ evam tattva artha vedinaḥ

original: śātakuṃbhasvarūpatvātkanakādriṃ ca taṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: śātakuṃbha svarūpa tvāt kanakādrim ca tam viduḥ

original: vaikuṇṭhādāgatenaiva vaikuṇṭhādririti smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,26.31 //
analyzed: vaikuṇṭhāt āgatena eva vaikuṇṭhādriḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: amṛtaiśvaryasaṃyukto vyaṅkaṭādririti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: amṛta aiśvarya saṃyuktaḥ vyaṅkaṭādriḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: vyaṅkaṭeśasya śailasya māhātmyaṃ yāvadasti hi // GarP_3,26.32 //
analyzed: vyaṅkaṭa īśasya śailasya māhātmyam yāvat asti hi

original: tāvadvaktuṃ samagreṇa na samarthaścaturmukhaḥ /
analyzed: tāvat vaktum samagreṇa na samarthaḥ caturmukhaḥ

original: vyaṅkaṭādrau parāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti dinedine /
analyzed: vyaṅkaṭa adrau parām bhaktim ye kurvanti dinedine

original: paṅgarjaṅghāla eva syādacakṣuḥ padmalocanaḥ // GarP_3,26.33 //
analyzed: eva syāt acakṣuḥ padma locanaḥ

original: mūko vāgmī bhavedeva badhiraḥ śrāvako bhavet /
analyzed: mūkaḥ vāgmī bhavet eva badhiraḥ śrāvakaḥ bhavet

original: vandhyā syādbahuputrā ca nirdhanaḥ sadhano bhavet // GarP_3,26.34 //
analyzed: vandhyā syāt bahu putrā ca nirdhanaḥ sa dhanaḥ bhavet

original: etatsarvaṃ girau bhaktimātreṇaiva bhaveddhruvam /
analyzed: etat sarvam girau bhakti mātreṇa eva bhavet dhruvam

original: tattvato vyaṅkaṭādrestu svarūpaṃ vetti ko bhuvi // GarP_3,26.35 //
analyzed: tattvataḥ vyaṅkaṭa adreḥ tu svarūpam vetti kaḥ bhuvi

original: yasmādasya gireḥ puṇyaṃ māhātmyaṃ vetti yaḥ pumān /
analyzed: yasmāt asya gireḥ puṇyam māhātmyam vetti yaḥ pumān

original: māyāvī paramānandaṃ tyaktvā vaikuṇṭhamuttamam /
analyzed: māyāvī parama ānandam tyaktvā vaikuṇṭham uttamam

original: svāmipuṣkariṇītīre ramayā sahamodate // GarP_3,26.36 //
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇī tīre ramayā saha modate

original: kalyāṇādbhutagātrāya kāmitārthapdāyine /
analyzed: kalyāṇa adbhuta gātrāya kāmita artha pdāyine

original: śrīmadvyaṅkaṭanāthāya śrīnivāsāya te namaḥ // GarP_3,26.37 //
analyzed: śrīmat vyaṅkaṭa nāthāya śrīnivāsāya te namaḥ

original: śrīsvāmipuṣkariṇyāśca māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu kanyake /
analyzed: śrī svāmipuṣkariṇyāḥ ca māhātmyam śṛṇu kanyake

original: svāmipuṣkariṇīmadhye śrīnivāsosti sarvadā // GarP_3,26.38 //
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇī madhye śrīnivāsaḥ asti sarvadā

original: snānaṃ kurvanti ye tatra teṣāṃ muktiḥ kare sthitā /
analyzed: snānam kurvanti ye tatra teṣām muktiḥ kare sthitā

original: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭiśca tīrthāni bhuvanatraye /
analyzed: tisraḥ tīrthāni bhuvanatraye

original: tāni sarvāṇi tatraiva saṃti tīrthe hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.39 //
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi tatra eva saṃti tīrthe hareḥ sadā

original: tattīrthaṃ śrīnivāsākhyaṃ sarvadevanamaskṛtam /
analyzed: tat tīrtham śrīnivāsa ākhyam sarva deva namaskṛtam

original: tadeva śrīnivāsasya mandiraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,26.40 //
analyzed: tat eva śrīnivāsasya mandiram parikīrtitam

original: taddarśanādeva kanye yānti pāpāni bhasmasāt /
analyzed: tad darśanāt eva kanye yānti pāpāni bhasmasāt

original: ekaikasnānamātreṇa satsaṃgo bhavati dhruvam // GarP_3,26.41 //
analyzed: ekaika snāna mātreṇa sat saṃgaḥ bhavati dhruvam

original: satsaṃgājjñānamāsādya jñānānmokṣaṃ ca vindati /
analyzed: sat saṃgāt jñānam āsādya jñānāt mokṣam ca vindati

original: adhikāriṇāṃ bhavedevaṃ viparītamayoginām // GarP_3,26.42 //
analyzed: adhikāriṇām bhavet evam viparītam ayoginām

original: tīrthānāṃ snānamātreṇa mokṣaṃ yāntīti ye viduḥ /
analyzed: tīrthānām snāna mātreṇa mokṣam yānti iti ye viduḥ

original: te sarve asurā jñeyāste yānti hyadhamāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.43 //
analyzed: te sarve asurāḥ jñeyāḥ te yānti hi adhamām gatim

original: śrīnivāsasya tīrthesminvāyukoṇe ca kanyake /
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya tīrthe asmin vāyukoṇe ca kanyake

original: āste vāyuḥ sadā viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ kartumanuttamām // GarP_3,26.44 //
analyzed: āste vāyuḥ sadā viṣṇoḥ pūjām kartum anuttamām

original: vāyutīrthaṃ ca tatproktaṃ hastadvādaśakāntaram /
analyzed: vāyutīrtham ca tat proktam hasta dvādaśaka antaram

original: hastaṣaṭkapramāṇaṃ ca paścime samudāhṛtam /
analyzed: hasta ṣaṭka pramāṇam ca paścime samudāhṛtam

original: uttare hastaṣaṭkaṃ tu vāyutīrthamudāhṛtam // GarP_3,26.45 //
analyzed: uttare hasta ṣaṭkam tu vāyutīrtham udāhṛtam

original: ye veṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaryāḥ snānaṃ suryustatra pūrvaṃ sukanye /
analyzed: ye vā iṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇava dāsa varyāḥ snānam suryuḥ tatra pūrvam su kanye

original: madhvāntasthāḥ śrīnivāsastu nityamatra snānātprīyatāṃ me dayāluḥ // GarP_3,26.46 //
analyzed: madhva antasthāḥ śrīnivāsaḥ tu nityam atra snānāt prīyatām me dayāluḥ

original: ye madhvatīrthe snātumicchanti devi rudrādayo vāyubhaktā mahāntaḥ /
analyzed: ye madhvatīrthe snātum icchanti devi rudra ādayaḥ vāyu bhaktāḥ mahāntaḥ

original: sadā snānaṃ tatra kurvanti devi prātaḥ kāle codayātpūrvameva // GarP_3,26.47 //
analyzed: sadā snānam tatra kurvanti devi prātar kāle codayāt pūrvam eva

original: ye vāyutīrthe visṛjanti dehajaṃ malaṃ mūtraṃ vamanaṃ śleṣmakaṃ ca /
analyzed: ye vāyutīrthe visṛjanti deha jam malam mūtram vamanam śleṣmakam ca

original: ye 'pānaśuddhiṃ liṅgaśuddhiṃ ca kanye kurvanti te hyasurā rākṣasāśca // GarP_3,26.48 //
analyzed: ye pāna śuddhim liṅga śuddhim ca kanye kurvanti te hi asurāḥ rākṣasāḥ ca

original: śṛṇvanti ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ kiṃ varṇaye tasya puṇyaṃ tu devi /
analyzed: śṛṇvanti ye bhāgavatam purāṇam kim varṇaye tasya puṇyam tu devi

original: ye kṛṣṇamantraṃ tu japanti devi hyaṣṭā kṣaraṃ mantravaraṃ sugopyam // GarP_3,26.49 //
analyzed: ye kṛṣṇa mantram tu japanti devi hi aṣṭa kṣaram mantra varam su gopyam

original: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ madhvāntastho nātra vicāryamasti /
analyzed: teṣām hariḥ prīyate madhu anta sthaḥ na atra vicāryam asti

original: evaṃ dānaṃ tatra kurvanti ye vai dvijāgryāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ vidāṃ ca // GarP_3,26.50 //
analyzed: evam dānam tatra kurvanti ye vai dvijāgryāṇām vaiṣṇavānām vidām ca

original: teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ naiva jānanti devā jānātyevaṃ śrīnivāso haristu /
analyzed: teṣām puṇyam nā eva jānanti devāḥ jānāti evam śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu

original: śālagrāmaṃ vāyutīrthe dadante teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ vetti sa vyaṅkaṭeśaḥ // GarP_3,26.51 //
analyzed: śālagrāmam vāyutīrthe dadante teṣām puṇyam vetti sa vyaṅkaṭa īśaḥ

original: sudurlabho vāyutīrthe 'bhiṣeko niṣkāmabuddhyā vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca devi /
analyzed: su durlabhaḥ vāyutīrthe bhiṣekaḥ niṣkāma buddhyā vaiṣṇavānām ca devi

original: tatrāpi tīrthe labhyate bhāgyayogādbhāgavatasya śravaṇaṃ viṣṇudāsaiḥ // GarP_3,26.52 //
analyzed: tatra api tīrthe labhyate bhāgya yogāt bhāgavatasya śravaṇam viṣṇu dāsaiḥ

original: tathaiva tīrthe durlabhaṃ tatra devi śālagrāmasya dvijavarye ca dānam /
analyzed: tathā eva tīrthe durlabham tatra devi śālagrāmasya dvija varye ca dānam

original: jaṃbūphalākārasunīlavarṇaṃ mukhadvayaṃ cakracatuṣṭayānvitam // GarP_3,26.53 //
analyzed: jaṃbū phala ākāra su nīla varṇam mukha dvayam cakra catuṣṭaya anvitam

original: sukesaraiḥ saṃyutaṃ svarṇacihnadhvajāṃ kuśairvajracihnairyavaiśca /
analyzed: su kesaraiḥ saṃyutam svarṇa cihna dhvajām kuśaiḥ vajra cihnaiḥ yavaiḥ ca

original: jānārdanīṃ mūrtimāhurmahānto dānaṃ tasyā durlabhaṃ tatra tīrthe // GarP_3,26.54 //
analyzed: jānārdanīm mūrtim āhuḥ mahāntaḥ dānam tasyāḥ durlabham tatra tīrthe

original: atyuttamaṃ mūrtidānaṃ tu bhadre sudurllabhaṃ paramaṃ nātra lobhaḥ /
analyzed: atyuttamam mūrti dānam tu bhadre su durllabham paramam na atra lobhaḥ

original: sudurlabhaṃ bahudogdhyāśca gṛṣṭerdānaṃ tathā vastraratnādikānām // GarP_3,26.55 //
analyzed: su durlabham bahu dogdhyāḥ ca gṛṣṭeḥ dānam tathā vastra ratna ādikānām

original: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi svāpekṣitaṃ dānamāhurmahāntaḥ /
analyzed: atyuttamam dravya dānam ca devi sva apekṣitam dānam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: svasyānapekṣaṃ phaladānaṃ ca vastrādānaṃ tasya vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,26.56 //
analyzed: svasya anapekṣam phala dānam ca vastra ādānam tasya vyartham āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: atyuttamaṃ gṛṣṭidānaṃ ca puṇyaṃ naivāpyate dugdhadohāśca gāvaḥ /
analyzed: atyuttamam gṛṣṭi dānam ca puṇyam na eva āpyate dugdha dohāḥ ca gāvaḥ

original: atyuttame vastradāne subuddhiḥ sudurghaṭā paramā vai janānām // GarP_3,26.57 //
analyzed: atyuttame vastra dāne su buddhiḥ su durghaṭā paramā vai janānām

original: atyuttamaṃ bhāgavatasya pustakaṃ sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ ca kanye /
analyzed: atyuttamam bhāgavatasya pustakam su durghaṭam vāyutīrtham ca kanye

original: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ nṛṇāṃ hi /
analyzed: atyuttamam dravya dānam ca devi su durghaṭam vāyutīrtham nṛṇām hi

original: sudurlabho vaiṣṇavaistattvavidbhirharervicāro vāyutīrthe ca kanye // GarP_3,26.58 //
analyzed: su durlabhaḥ vaiṣṇavaiḥ tattva vidbhiḥ hareḥ vicāraḥ vāyutīrthe ca kanye

original: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya uttarasyāṃ diśi sthitam /
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya uttarasyām diśi sthitam

original: candratīrtha miti proktaṃ tatrāste candramāḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.59 //
analyzed: candratīrtham iti proktam tatra āste candramāḥ sadā

original: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ ca tatra sthitvā karotyayam /
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya pūjām ca tatra sthitvā karoti ayam

original: tatra snānaṃ prakurvanti puṇyadeśe ca kanyake // GarP_3,26.60 //
analyzed: tatra snānam prakurvanti puṇya deśe ca kanyake

original: gurutalpādipāpebhyo mucyante nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: gurutalpa ādi pāpebhyaḥ mucyante na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tatra snātvā pūrvabhāge śālagrāmaṃ dadāti yaḥ // GarP_3,26.61 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā pūrva bhāge śālagrāmam dadāti yaḥ

original: jñānadvārā mokṣameti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: jñāna dvārā mokṣam eti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: dadhivāmanamūrteśca dānaṃ tatra sudurlabham // GarP_3,26.62 //
analyzed: dadhi vāmana mūrteḥ ca dānam tatra su durlabham

original: badarīphalamātraṃ tu vatulaṃ nīlavarṇakam /
analyzed: badarī phala mātram tu vatulam nīla varṇakam

original: prasannavadanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ susnigdhaṃ kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,26.63 //
analyzed: prasanna vadanam sūkṣmam su snigdham kanyake śubhe

original: cakradvayasamāyuktaṃ gaupūraiḥ pañcabhiryutam /
analyzed: cakra dvaya samāyuktam gaupūraiḥ pañcabhiḥ yutam

original: cāpabāṇasamāyuktamanataṃ kuṇḍalākṛtim // GarP_3,26.64 //
analyzed: cāpa bāṇa samāyuktam anatam kuṇḍala ākṛtim

original: vanamāla sukhayutaṃ mūrdhnasāhasrasaṃyutam /
analyzed: vanamāla sukha yutam mūrdhna sāhasra saṃyutam

original: raupyabindusamāyuktaṃ savye bhadrārdhamātrakam // GarP_3,26.65 //
analyzed: raupya bindu samāyuktam savye bhadra ardha mātrakam

original: candreṇa sahitaṃ devi dadhivāmanamucyate /
analyzed: candreṇa sahitam devi dadhi vāmanam ucyate

original: etādṛśaṃ kalau nṝṇāṃ durlabhaṃ bahubhāgyadam /
analyzed: etādṛśam kalau nṝṇām durlabham bahu bhāgya dam

original: lakṣmīnārāyaṇasamāṃ tāṃ mūrtiṃ viddhi bhāmini // GarP_3,26.66 //
analyzed: lakṣmī nārāyaṇa samām tām mūrtim viddhi bhāmini

original: sudurlabhaṃ tasya mūrteśca dānaṃ taccandratīrthe śravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
analyzed: su durlabham tasya mūrteḥ ca dānam tat candratīrthe śravaṇam durghaṭam ca

original: samyak svarūpaṃ dadhivāmanasya sudurghaṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ vaiṣṇavācca // GarP_3,26.67 //
analyzed: samyak sva rūpam dadhivāmanasya su durghaṭam śravaṇam vaiṣṇavāt ca

original: tatra snātvā vāmanasya svarūpaśravaṇādvidurdānaphalaṃ samaṃ ca /
analyzed: tatra snātvā vāmanasya sva rūpa śravaṇāt viduḥ dāna phalam samam ca

original: daśahastapramāṇaṃ tu candratīrthamudāhṛtam // GarP_3,26.68 //
analyzed: daśa hasta pramāṇam tu candratīrtham udāhṛtam

original: madhyāhne durlabhaṃ snānaṃ nṛṇāṃ tatra sumaṅgale /
analyzed: madhyāhne durlabham snānam nṛṇām tatra sumaṅgale

original: tatra sthitvā dhanyanaraḥ sadā bhajati vai harim // GarP_3,26.69 //
analyzed: tatra sthitvā dhanya naraḥ sadā bhajati vai harim

original: varāhamūrtidānaṃ tu śālagrāmasya durlabham /
analyzed: varāha mūrti dānam tu śālagrāmasya durlabham

original: jaṃbūphalapramāṇaṃ tu etadvai kukkuṭāṇḍavat // GarP_3,26.70 //
analyzed: jaṃbū phala pramāṇam tu etat vai kukkuṭa aṇḍa vat

original: vadanaṃ valayākāraṃ pramāṇaṃ caṇakādivat /
analyzed: vadanam valaya ākāram pramāṇam caṇaka ādi vat

original: devasya vāmabhāge ca madhyadeśaṃ vihāya ca // GarP_3,26.71 //
analyzed: devasya vāma bhāge ca madhyadeśam vihāya ca

original: cakradvayasamāyuktaṃmūrdhadeśe ca bhāmini /
analyzed: cakra dvaya samāyuktam mūrdha deśe ca bhāmini

original: suvarṇabindunā yuktaṃ bhūvarāhākhyamucyate // GarP_3,26.72 //
analyzed: suvarṇa bindunā yuktam bhūvarāha ākhyam ucyate

original: pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhūvarāhasya marterdānaṃ dattvā śravaṇaṃ cāpi kṛtvā /
analyzed: pūjām kṛtvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ dānam dattvā śravaṇam ca api kṛtvā

original: tatra sthitaṃ bhūvarāhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sa vai naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo hi loke // GarP_3,26.73 //
analyzed: tatra sthitam bhūvarāham ca dṛṣṭvā sa vai naraḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ hi loke
