original: tatra snātvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ śṛṇoti yo lakṣaṇaṃ samyageva /
analyzed: tatra snātvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ śṛṇoti yaḥ lakṣaṇam samyak eva

original: sa tena puṇyaṃ samupaiti devi sa muktibhāṅ nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,26.74 //
analyzed: sa tena puṇyam samupaiti devi sa mukti bhāj na atra vicāryam asti

original: īśānakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi raudraṃ tīrthaṃ paramaṃ pāvanaṃ ca /
analyzed: īśāna koṇe śrīnivāsasya devi raudram tīrtham paramam pāvanam ca

original: tatra sthitvā rudradevo mahātmā pūjāṃ karoti śrīnivāsasya nityam // GarP_3,26.75 //
analyzed: tatra sthitvā rudra devaḥ mahātmā pūjām karoti śrīnivāsasya nityam

original: hastāṣṭakaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ vadanti tatra snānaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryameva /
analyzed: hasta aṣṭakam tad pramāṇam vadanti tatra snānam vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryam eva

original: tatra snātvā prayato vai murāreḥ kathāṃ divyāṃ śṛṇuyādādareṇa /
analyzed: tatra snātvā prayataḥ vai murāreḥ kathām divyām śṛṇuyāt ādareṇa

original: snānaṃ pānaṃ tatra dānaṃ ca kuryāllakṣmīnṛsiṃhaprīyate devi nityam3,26.76 //
analyzed: snānam pānam tatra dānam ca kuryāt lakṣmī nṛsiṃha prīyate devi

original: badarīphalamātraṃ ca vartulaṃ bindusaṃyutam // GarP_3,26.77 //
analyzed: badarī phala mātram ca vartulam bindu saṃyutam

original: devasya vāmabhāge tu cakradvayasamanvitam /
analyzed: devasya vāma bhāge tu cakra dvaya samanvitam

original: suvarṇarekhāsaṃyuktaṃ kiñcidraktasamanvitam // GarP_3,26.78 //
analyzed: suvarṇa rekhā saṃyuktam kiñcid rakta samanvitam

original: vaiśyavarṇaṃ savadanaṃ padmarekhādicihnitam /
analyzed: vaiśya varṇam sa vadanam padma rekhā ādi cihnitam

original: lakṣmīnṛsiṃhaṃ taṃ viddhi bhuktimuktipradāyakam // GarP_3,26.79 //
etā dṛśaṃ gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyā mūrterdānaṃ durghaṭaṃ viddhi vīndra /
analyzed: etāḥ dṛśam gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyāḥ mūrteḥ dānam durghaṭam viddhi vi indra

original: tatra snātvā śrīnṛsiṃhasvarūpaṃ lakṣmīpateḥ śṛṇuyādbhaktiyuktaḥ // GarP_3,26.80 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā śrī nṛsiṃha sva rūpam lakṣmīpateḥ śṛṇuyāt bhakti yuktaḥ

original: mūrterdānātphalamāpnoti devi satyaṃsatyaṃ nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,26.81 //
analyzed: mūrteḥ dānāt phalam āpnoti devi satyam satyam na atra vicāryam asti

original: īśānaśakrayormadhye brahmatīrthamudāhṛtam /
analyzed: īśāna śakrayoḥ madhye brahmatīrtham udāhṛtam

original: durlabhaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu snānaṃ sarvārthasādhakam // GarP_3,26.82 //
analyzed: durlabham mānuṣāṇām tu snānam sarva artha sādhakam

original: śālagrāmasya dānaṃ tu durlabhaṃ tatra vai nṛṇām /
analyzed: śālagrāmasya dānam tu durlabham tatra vai nṛṇām

original: lakṣmīnārāyaṇasyaiva mūrterdānaṃ sudurlabham // GarP_3,26.83 //
analyzed: lakṣmī nārāyaṇasya eva mūrteḥ dānam su durlabham

original: sthalamauduṃbarasamaṃ tatpramāṇamudāhṛtam /
analyzed: sthalam auduṃbara samam tat pramāṇam udāhṛtam

original: chattrākāraṃ vartulaṃ ca prasannavadanaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.84 //
analyzed: chattra ākāram vartulam ca prasanna vadanam śubham

original: caṇakapradeśamātraṃ ca vadanaṃ samudāhṛtam /
analyzed: caṇaka pradeśa mātram ca vadanam samudāhṛtam

original: savye dakṣiṇapārśve ca samayoḥ puṣkalānvitam // GarP_3,26.85 //
analyzed: savye dakṣiṇa pārśve ca samayoḥ puṣkala anvitam

original: goyūthavatsavarṇaṃ ca catuścakrasamanvitam /
analyzed: go yūtha vat savarṇam ca catur cakra samanvitam

original: gokhuraiśca samāyuktaṃ suvarṇakiṇasaṃyutam // GarP_3,26.86 //
analyzed: go khuraiḥ ca samāyuktam suvarṇa kiṇa saṃyutam

original: vanamālābhisaṃyuktaṃ vajrapuṅkhaiśca saṃyutam /
analyzed: vanamālā abhisaṃyuktam vajra puṅkhaiḥ ca saṃyutam

original: etādṛśīṃ darermūrti lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ // GarP_3,26.87 //
analyzed: etādṛśīm dareḥ mūrti lakṣmī nārāyaṇam viduḥ

original: kalau nṛṇāṃ tasya lābho durlabhaḥ saṃsmṛto bhuvi /
analyzed: kalau nṛṇām tasya lābhaḥ durlabhaḥ saṃsmṛtaḥ bhuvi

original: dānaṃ ca sutarāṃ devi darlabhaṃ kiṃ vadāmi te // GarP_3,26.88 //
analyzed: dānam ca sutarām devi darlabham kim vadāmi te

original: brahmatīrthe ca saṃsnāya śrotavyā vai hareḥ kathā /
analyzed: brahmatīrthe ca saṃsnāya śrotavyā vai hareḥ kathā

original: gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyāśca lakṣmīnārāyaṇasya tu // GarP_3,26.89 //
analyzed: gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyāḥ ca lakṣmīnārāyaṇasya tu

original: lakṣaṇaṃ yo vijānāti tadā tatsadṛśaṃ phalam /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam yaḥ vijānāti tadā tad sadṛśam phalam

original: prāpnotyeva na saṃdeho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.90 //
analyzed: prāpnoti eva na saṃdehaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya pūrve syādindratīrthakam /
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya pūrve syāt indratīrthakam

original: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ tu kartumāste śacīpatiḥ // GarP_3,26.91 //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya pūjām tu kartum āste śacīpatiḥ

original: śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ kartavyaṃ śrotriyāyavai /
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā dānam kartavyam

original: śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ hatyākoṭivināśanam // GarP_3,26.92 //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā dānam hatyā koṭi vināśanam

original: tasmiṃstīrthe tu yo devi sītārāmaśilābhidhām /
analyzed: tasmin tīrthe tu yaḥ devi sītārāmaśilā abhidhām

original: dadāti bhūtale bhadre bhūpateḥ sadṛśo bhavet // GarP_3,26.93 //
analyzed: dadāti bhū tale bhadre bhūpateḥ sadṛśaḥ bhavet

original: sītārāmaśilā devi dvividhā saṃprakīrtitā /
analyzed: sītārāmaśilā devi dvividhā saṃprakīrtitā

original: pañcacakrayutā kācitṣaṭracakreṇa ca saṃyutā // GarP_3,26.94 //
analyzed: pañca cakra yutā kācid ṣaṭra cakreṇa ca saṃyutā

original: tatrāpi ṣaṭracakrayutā hyuttamā saṃprakīrtitā /
analyzed: tatra api ṣaṭra cakra yutā hi uttamā saṃprakīrtitā

original: pañcacakrayutāyāśca phalaṃ dviguṇamīritam // GarP_3,26.95 //
analyzed: pañca cakra yutāyāḥ ca phalam dviguṇam īritam

original: kukkuṭāṇḍapramāṇaṃ ca susigdhaṃ nīlavarṇakam /
analyzed: kukkuṭa aṇḍa pramāṇam ca su sigdham nīla varṇakam

original: vadanatrayasaṃyuktaṃ saṭcakraiḥ kesarairyutam // GarP_3,26.96 //
analyzed: vadana traya saṃyuktam saṭā cakraiḥ kesaraiḥ yutam

original: svarṇarekhāsamāyuktaṃ dhvajavajrāṅkuśairyutam /
analyzed: svarṇa rekhā samāyuktam dhvaja vajra aṅkuśaiḥ yutam

original: etādṛśaṃ tu vai bhadre sītārāmābhidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,26.97 //
analyzed: etādṛśam tu vai bhadre sītārāma abhidham smṛtam

original: vadanevandane devi sītārāmasya kośakam /
analyzed: vadanevandane devi sītārāmasya kośakam

original: durlabhaṃ tu kalau nṝṇāṃ svasāmrājyapradaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.98 //
analyzed: durlabham tu kalau nṝṇām sva sāmrājya pradam śubham

original: indratīrthe mahādevi sītārāma bhidhāśilā /
analyzed: indratīrthe mahādevi sītārāma bhidhā śilā

original: yā taddānaṃ durlabhaṃ tannālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_3,26.99 //
analyzed: yā tat dānam durlabham tat na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam

original: dānasya śaktyabhāve tu śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: dānasya śakti abhāve tu śrotavyam lakṣaṇam hareḥ

original: śālagrāma śilādānādyatphalaṃ tatphalaṃ labhet // GarP_3,26.100 //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā dānāt yat phalam tat phalam labhet

original: āgneyakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi tīrthaṃ tvāste vahnisaṃjñaṃ suśastam /
analyzed: āgneya koṇe śrīnivāsasya devi tīrtham tu āste vahni saṃjñam su śastam

original: sa vahnidevaḥ śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ kartuṃ hyāste sarvadā tīrthamadhye // GarP_3,26.101 //
analyzed: sa vahnidevaḥ śrīnivāsasya pūjām kartum hi āste sarvadā tīrtha madhye

original: yo vā tīrthe vahnisaṃjñe ca devi bhaktyā snānaṃ kurute 'jaṃ smaranhi /
analyzed: yaḥ vā tīrthe vahni saṃjñe ca devi bhaktyā snānam kurute jam smaran hi

original: jñānadvārā mokṣamāpnoti devi tatra snānaṃ durllabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ ca // GarP_3,26.102 //
analyzed: jñāna dvārā mokṣam āpnoti devi tatra snānam durllabham vai nṛṇām ca

original: jñātvā snānaṃ duṣkaraṃ tīrtharāje bhaktistasmindurllabhā caiva devi /
analyzed: jñātvā snānam duṣkaram tīrtha rāje bhaktiḥ tasmin durllabhā ca eva devi

original: śālagrāme tacchilāyāśca dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ vāsudevābhidhāyāḥ // GarP_3,26.103 //
analyzed: śālagrāme tad śilāyāḥ ca dānam su durlabham vāsudeva abhidhāyāḥ

original: hrasvaṃ tathā vartulaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ mukhaṃ mukhacakraṃ suśuddham /
analyzed: hrasvam tathā vartulam nīla varṇam sūkṣmam mukham mukha cakram su śuddham

original: suveṇuyuktaṃ vāsudevābhidheyaṃ dānaṃ kalau durlabhaṃ tasya bhadre // GarP_3,26.104 //
analyzed: suveṇu yuktam vāsudeva abhidheyam dānam kalau durlabham tasya bhadre

original: dāne tasyāḥ śaktya bhāve ca devi snātvā tīrthe vāsudevābhidhasya /
analyzed: dāne tasyāḥ śakti a bhāve ca devi snātvā tīrthe vāsudeva abhidhasya

original: samyak śrāvyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai śilāyāstayostulyaṃ phalamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,26.105 //
analyzed: samyak śrāvyam lakṣaṇam vai śilāyāḥ tayoḥ tulyam phalam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: dakṣiṇe śrīnivāsasya yamatīrthaṃ ca saṃsmṛtam /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe śrīnivāsasya yamatīrtham ca saṃsmṛtam

original: tatrāste yamarājastu pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.106 //
analyzed: tatra āste yama rājaḥ tu pūjām kartum hareḥ sadā

original: tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ cāpyakṣayaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: tatra snānam ca dānam ca api akṣayam paramam smṛtam

original: śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ kāryaṃ tatra mahāmune // GarP_3,26.107 //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā dānam kāryam tatra mahā mune

original: paṭṭābhirāmasaṃjñāyāḥ śilāyā dānamiṣyate /
analyzed: paṭṭābhirāma saṃjñāyāḥ śilāyāḥ dānam iṣyate

original: taccūtaphalavatsthūlaṃ vadanatrayasaṃyutam // GarP_3,26.108 //
analyzed: tat cūta phalavat sthūlam vadanatraya saṃyutam

original: śiraścakreṇa rahitaṃ saptacakraiḥ samanvitam /
analyzed: śiraḥ cakreṇa rahitam sapta cakraiḥ samanvitam

original: nīlavarṇaṃ svarṇarekhaṃ gośurādyaiḥ samanvitam // GarP_3,26.109 //
analyzed: nīla varṇam svarṇa rekham gośura ādyaiḥ samanvitam

original: paṭṭavardhanarāmaṃ tu durlabhaṃ bahubhāgyadam /
analyzed: paṭṭavardhana rāmam tu durlabham bahu bhāgya dam

original: paṭṭavardhanarāmaṃ tu yo dadāti ca tatra vai /
analyzed: paṭṭavardhana rāmam tu yaḥ dadāti ca tatra vai

original: paṭṭābhiṣikto bhavati nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.110 //
analyzed: paṭṭa abhiṣiktaḥ bhavati na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śrīnivāsasya nairṛtye nairṛtaṃ tīrthamuttamam /
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya nairṛtye nairṛtam tīrtham uttamam

original: āste hi nirṛtistatra pūjāṃ kurtuṃ ca sarvadā // GarP_3,26.111 //
analyzed: āste hi nirṛtiḥ tatra pūjām kurtum ca sarvadā

original: tatra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ punarjanma na vidyate /
analyzed: tatra snānam prakartavyam punarjanma na vidyate

original: śālagrāmaśilāyāścaḥ puruṣottamasaṃjñikām // GarP_3,26.112 //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilāyāḥ ca puruṣottama saṃjñikām

original: mūrtiṃ dadāti yo martyaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: mūrtim dadāti yaḥ martyaḥ sa yāti paramām gatim

original: auduṃbaraphalākāraṃ prasannavadanaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.113 //
analyzed: auduṃbara phala ākāram prasanna vadanam śubham

original: cakradvyasamāyuktaṃ śiraścakrasamanvitam /
analyzed: cakra dvya samāyuktam śiraḥ cakra samanvitam

original: suvarṇabindusaṃyuktaṃ vajrāṅkuśasamānvatam // GarP_3,26.114 //
analyzed: suvarṇa bindu saṃyuktam vajra aṅkuśa samānvatam

original: tanmūrtidānaṃ durlabhaṃ tatra devaḥ prīṇāti yasmācchrīnivāso mahātmā /
analyzed: tad mūrti dānam durlabham tatra devaḥ prīṇāti yasmāt śrīnivāsaḥ mahātmā

original: yadā dānaṃ durghaṭaṃ syācca devi tadā śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya mūrteḥ // GarP_3,26.115 //
analyzed: yadā dānam durghaṭam syāt ca devi tadā śrotavyam lakṣaṇam tasya mūrteḥ

original: pāśinairṛtayormadhye śeṣatīrthaṃ paraṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: pāśi nairṛtayoḥ madhye śeṣa tīrtham param smṛtam

original: tatra snātvā śeṣamūrtiṃ pradadāti dvijātaye // GarP_3,26.116 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā śeṣa mūrtim pradadāti dvijātaye

original: sa yāti paramaṃ lokaṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam /
analyzed: sa yāti paramam lokam punarāvṛtti varjitam

original: auduṃbaraphalākāraṃ kuṇḍalākṛtimeva ca // GarP_3,26.117 //
analyzed: auduṃbara phala ākāram kuṇḍala ākṛtim eva ca

original: śeṣavadvadanaṃ tasya tasmiṃścakradvayaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: śeṣavat vadanam tasya tasmin cakra dvayam smṛtam

original: phalaṃ tamekacakreṇa saṃyutaṃ valmikānvitam // GarP_3,26.118 //
analyzed: phalam tam eka cakreṇa saṃyutam valmikā anvitam

original: kiñcidvarṇasamāyuktaṃ śeṣamūrti matisphuṭam /
analyzed: kiñcid varṇa samāyuktam śeṣa mūrti mati sphuṭam

original: suptā prabuddhā dvividhā śeṣamūrtirudāhṛtā // GarP_3,26.119 //
analyzed: suptā prabuddhā dvividhā śeṣa mūrtiḥ udāhṛtā

original: phaṇonnatā prabuddhā syātsaptalakṣaphaṇānvitā /
analyzed: phaṇa unnatā prabuddhā syāt sapta lakṣa phaṇa anvitā

original: tatrāpi durlabhā suptā mahābhāgyakarīsmṛtā // GarP_3,26.120 //
analyzed: tatra api durlabhā suptā mahābhāgya karī smṛtā

original: iha loke paratrāpi mokṣadā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: iha loke paratra api mokṣa dāḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: navacakrādupakramya viṃśatyantaṃ ca yatra saḥ // GarP_3,26.121 //
analyzed: nava cakrāt upakramya viṃśati antam ca yatra saḥ

original: ananta iti vijñeyo hyanantaphaladāyakaḥ /
analyzed: anantaḥ iti vijñeyaḥ hi ananta phala dāyakaḥ

original: viśvaṃbharaḥ sa vijñeyo viṃśatyūrdhvaṃ varānane // GarP_3,26.122 //
analyzed: viśvaṃbharaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ viṃśati ūrdhvam varānane

original: tatrāpi kesaraiścaikrarlakṣaṇaiśca samanvitam /
analyzed: tatra api kesaraiḥ ca ekrar lakṣaṇaiḥ ca samanvitam

original: kalau tu durlabhaṃ naṇāṃ taddānaṃ cātidurlabham // GarP_3,26.123 //
analyzed: kalau tu durlabham tad dānam ca ati durlabham

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā śeṣatīrthe viśuddhenaiva cetasā /
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā śeṣa tīrthe viśuddhena eva cetasā

original: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā prayāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.124 //
analyzed: eteṣām lakṣaṇam śrutvā prayāti paramām gatim

original: tataḥ paraṃ mahābhāge vāruṇaṃ tīrthamuttamam /
analyzed: tatas param mahābhāge vāruṇam tīrtham uttamam

original: tatrāste varuṇo devaḥ pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.125 //
analyzed: tatra āste varuṇaḥ devaḥ pūjām kartum hareḥ sadā

original: tatra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ dātavyaṃ dānamuttamam /
analyzed: tatra snānam prakartavyam dātavyam dānam uttamam

original: śiśumāraṃ ca matsyaṃ ca trivikramamathāpi vā /
analyzed: śiśumāram ca matsyam ca trivikramam atha api vā

original: dātavyaṃ bhūtikāmena tīrthesminviravarṇini // GarP_3,26.126 //
analyzed: dātavyam bhūti kāmena tīrthe asmin viravarṇini

original: jaṃbūphalasamākārā pucche sūkṣmā sabindukā /
analyzed: jaṃbū phala sama ākārā pucche sūkṣmā sa bindukā

original: cakratrayā ca vadane pucchopari sacakrakā // GarP_3,26.127 //
analyzed: cakra trayā ca vadane puccha upari sa cakrakā

original: śrīvatsabindumālāḍhyā matsyamūrtirudāhṛtā /
analyzed: śrīvatsa bindu mālā āḍhyā matsya mūrtiḥ udāhṛtā

original: pucchādadhaścakrayutaṃ śiśumāramudāhṛtam // GarP_3,26.128 //
analyzed: pucchāt adhas cakra yutam śiśumāram udāhṛtam

original: vakracakrayutaścetsyāttrivikrama udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vakra cakra yutaḥ ced syāt trivikramaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā vāruṇe tīrtha uttame // GarP_3,26.129 //
analyzed: eteṣām lakṣaṇam śrutvā vāruṇe tīrthe uttame

original: etaddānaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇumandire /
analyzed: etat dāna phalam prāpya modate viṣṇu mandire

original: pūrvauktā mūrtayo yasmin gṛhe tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
analyzed: pūrva uktāḥ mūrtayaḥ yasmin gṛhe tiṣṭhanti bhāmini

original: bhāgīrathī tīrthavarā saṃnidhatte na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,26.130 //
analyzed: bhāgīrathī tīrtha varā saṃnidhatte na saṃśayaḥ

original: svāmi puṣkariṇīsnānaṃ durghaṭaṃ tu kalau nṛṇām /
analyzed: svāmi puṣkariṇī snānam durghaṭam tu kalau nṛṇām

original: tatra sthitānāṃ tīrthānāṃ snānaṃ cāpyatidurghaṭam // GarP_3,26.131 //
analyzed: tatra sthitānām tīrthānām snānam ca api ati durghaṭam

original: śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca tathā smṛtām /
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā dānam durghaṭam ca tathā smṛtām

original: svāmipuṣkariṇītīre kanyādānaṃ sudurghaṭam // GarP_3,26.132 //
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇī tīre kanyā dānam su durghaṭam

original: durghaṭaṃ kapilādānaṃ bhakṣyadānaṃ sudurghaṭam /
analyzed: durghaṭam kapilā dānam bhakṣya dānam su durghaṭam

original: svāmipuṣkariṇītīrthe tīrtheṣvanyeṣu bhāmini // GarP_3,26.133 //
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇītīrthe tīrtheṣu anyeṣu bhāmini

original: snānaṃ kuru yathānyā yaṃ śayyādānaṃ tathā kuru /
analyzed: snānam kuru yathā anyā yam śayyā dānam tathā kuru

original: jaigīṣavyena muninā tvevamuktā ca kanyakā // GarP_3,26.134 //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyena muninā tu evam uktā ca kanyakā

original: svāmipuṣkariṇīsnānaṃ sā cakāra dhṛtavratā /
analyzed: svāmi puṣkariṇī snānam sā cakāra dhṛta vratā

original: tīrtheṣveteṣu susnātā dānaṃ cakre subhāminī // GarP_3,26.135 //
analyzed: tīrtheṣu eteṣu su snātā dānam cakre su bhāminī

original: uvāsa tatra sā davī triḥ saptakandināni ca /
analyzed: uvāsa tatra sā davī tris sapta kandināni ca

original: svāmipuṣkaraṇītīramahimānaṃ śṛṇoti yaḥ /
analyzed: svāmi puṣkaraṇī tīra mahimānam śṛṇoti yaḥ

original: sa yāti paramāṃ bhaktiṃ śrīnivāse jaganmaye // GarP_3,26.136 //
analyzed: sa yāti paramām bhaktim śrīnivāse jagat maye

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vyaṅkaṭagirimāhātmye svāmipuṣkariṇyāditīrthatatratyadevatadīyaśālagrāmalakṣaṇa  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vyaṅkaṭagiri māhātmye svāmipuṣkariṇī ādi tīrtha tatratya deva tadīya śālagrāma lakṣaṇa

original: taddānādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: taddānādivarṇanam nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 27
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: sā gatā snātukāmātha nandāṃ pāpanivāriṇīm /
analyzed: sā gatā snātu kāmā atha nandām pāpa nivāriṇīm

original: papraccha taṃ guruṃ vipraṃ vinayāvanatā sudhīḥ // GarP_3,27.1 //
analyzed: papraccha tam gurum vipram vinaya avanatā sudhīḥ

original: kinnāmeyaṃ nadī vipra kiṃ kāryaṃ cātra me vada /
analyzed: kinnāmā iyam nadī vipra kim kāryam ca atra me vada

original: jaigīṣavyastvevamukto vākyametaduvāca ha // GarP_3,27.2 //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ tu evam uktaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu bhadre pravakṣyāmi māhātmyaṃ pāpanāśanam /
analyzed: śṛṇu bhadre pravakṣyāmi māhātmyam pāpa nāśanam

original: iyaṃ nadī mahābhāge sadā pāpavināśinī // GarP_3,27.3 //
analyzed: iyam nadī mahābhāge sadā pāpa vināśinī

original: brahmahatyādipāpaugho yatra snānena naśyati /
analyzed: brahmahatyā ādi pāpa oghaḥ yatra snānena naśyati

original: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate hyatra snānaṃ kartuṃ samudyataiḥ // GarP_3,27.4 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam dṛśyate hi atra snānam kartum samudyataiḥ

original: jalaṃ cāśubhrarūpeṇa pāpaiśca paridṛśyate /
analyzed: jalam ca aśubhra rūpeṇa pāpaiḥ ca paridṛśyate

original: yāvacchubhrodakaṃ devi tāvatsanānaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_3,27.5 //
analyzed: yāvat śubhra udakam devi tāvat sa nānam ca kārayet

original: yāvacchubhrodakaṃ naiva tāvatpāpaṃ na naśyati /
analyzed: yāvat śubhra udakam na eva tāvat pāpam na naśyati

original: śuddhodake samāyāte pāpaṃ naṣṭamiti dhruvam // GarP_3,27.6 //
analyzed: śuddha udake samāyāte pāpam naṣṭam iti dhruvam

original: kalāvitthaṃ viśālākṣi mahimā dṛśyate bhuvi /
analyzed: kalau ittham viśāla akṣi mahimā dṛśyate bhuvi

original: atra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ dātavyaṃ dāna muttamam /
analyzed: atra snānam prakartavyam dātavyam dānam uttamam

original: tataśca jñānamāsādya viviṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_3,27.7 //
analyzed: tatas ca jñānam āsādya viviṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: gurustrīgamanāccandra ahalyāyāṃ gato hariḥ /
analyzed: guru strī gamanāt candra ahalyāyām gataḥ hariḥ

original: surāpānācca śukrastu suvarṇaharaṇādbaliḥ // GarP_3,27.8 //
analyzed: surā pānāt ca śukraḥ tu suvarṇa haraṇāt baliḥ

original: brahmahatyāyāśca rudro nāgo dattāpahārakaḥ /
analyzed: brahmahatyāyāḥ ca rudraḥ nāgaḥ datta apahārakaḥ

original: sūtasya hananādrāmo nirmukto hyatra bhāmini // GarP_3,27.9 //
analyzed: sūtasya hananāt rāmaḥ nirmuktaḥ hi atra bhāmini

original: nānena sadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: na anena sadṛśam tīrtham na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati

original: snānaṃ kuru mahābhāge tena siddhiṃ hyavāpsyasi // GarP_3,27.10 //
analyzed: snānam kuru mahābhāge tena siddhim hi avāpsyasi

original: jaigīṣavyeṇa muninā pitrā saha ca kanyakā /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyeṇa muninā pitrā saha ca kanyakā

original: snānaṃ cakāra vidhivadudatiṣṭhacca bhāmini // GarP_3,27.11 //
analyzed: snānam cakāra vidhivat udatiṣṭhat ca bhāmini

original: yāvacca pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ tāvatkālaṃ hi tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: yāvat ca pauruṣam sūktam tāvatkālam hi tiṣṭhati

original: paścājjaptvā mahāmantraṃ veṅkaṭeśābhidhaṃ param // GarP_3,27.12 //
analyzed: paścāt japtvā mahā mantram veṅkaṭeśa abhidham param

original: dvijātīnprīṇayitvā sā vastradravyādibhūṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: dvijātīn prīṇayitvā sā vastra dravya ādi bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: tasmācca prayayau devī kamārītīrthamuttamam // GarP_3,27.13 //
analyzed: tasmāt ca prayayau devī kamārītīrtham uttamam

original: kumārīmahimānaṃ ca śrutvā snānaṃ cakāra sā /
analyzed: kumārī mahimānam ca śrutvā snānam cakāra sā

original: punarāvṛtya sā devī hyantarā virajānadīm // GarP_3,27.14 //
analyzed: punar āvṛtya sā devī hi antarā virajā nadīm

original: dṛṣṭvā papraccha sā devī jaigīṣavyaṃ guruṃ prabhum /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā papraccha sā devī jaigīṣavyam gurum prabhum

original: kiṃ saṃjñikeyaṃ viprendra kiṃ kāryaṃ hyatra me vada // GarP_3,27.15 //
analyzed: kim saṃjñikā iyam vipra indra kim kāryam hi atra me vada

original: jaigīṣavyaḥ pṛṣṭa eva muvāca karuṇānidhiḥ /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ eva m uvāca karuṇā nidhiḥ

original: iyaṃ bhāgīrathī kanye āyāti hyantareṇa tu // GarP_3,27.16 //
analyzed: iyam bhāgīrathī kanye āyāti hi antareṇa tu

original: ataḥ sā procyate hyantargaṅgeti paramarṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: atas sā procyate hi antar gaṅgā iti parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: kanye tvasyāstu salilaṃ śrīninivāsapriyaṃ sadā // GarP_3,27.17 //
analyzed: kanye tu asya astu salilam śrīninivāsa priyam sadā

original: atra snānaṃ yaḥ karoti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: atra snānam yaḥ karoti sa yāti paramām gatim

original: snānaṃ cakāra sā kanyā jale paramapāvane // GarP_3,27.18 //
analyzed: snānam cakāra sā kanyā jale parama pāvane

original: dānādikaṃ tathā jñātvā jajāpa paramaṃ manum /
analyzed: dāna ādikam tathā jñātvā jajāpa paramam manum

original: śrīnivāsasamīpaṃ tu punarāgatya bhāminī // GarP_3,27.19 //
analyzed: śrīnivāsa samīpam tu punar āgatya bhāminī

original: aṅgapradakṣiṇaṃ cakre bhaktyā veṅkaṭanāyakam /
analyzed: aṅga pradakṣiṇam cakre bhaktyā veṅkaṭa nāyakam

original: brāhmaṇādīnprīṇayitvā vastragandhādibhūṣaṇaiḥ // GarP_3,27.20 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādīn prīṇayitvā vastra gandha ādi bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: punaḥ paradine prātaḥ svāmipuṣkariṇījale /
analyzed: punar para dine prātar svāmi puṣkariṇī jale

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā mahābhāgā yayau tuṃburusaṃjñikām // GarP_3,27.21 //
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā mahābhāgā yayau tuṃburu saṃjñikām

original: papraccha taṃ guruṃ devī nāthaṃ kinnāmikā tvayam /
analyzed: papraccha tam gurum devī nātham kinnāmikā tu ayam

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca

original: iyaṃ tuṃbarukābhijñā nārī vai varavarṇinī // GarP_3,27.22 //
analyzed: iyam tuṃbaruka abhijñā nārī vai varavarṇinī

original: purā tuṃ buruṇā sākaṃ nāradastapasi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: purā tum buruṇā sākam nāradaḥ tapasi sthitaḥ

original: atra prādurabhūdviṣṇurnāradasya hitāya ca // GarP_3,27.23 //
analyzed: atra prādurabhūt viṣṇuḥ nāradasya hitāya ca

original: snānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyatra sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: snānam yaḥ kurute hi atra sa yāti paramām gatim

original: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kalau // GarP_3,27.24 //
analyzed: atra snānam manuṣyāṇām sarveṣām durlabham kalau

original: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam /
analyzed: atra snānam manuṣyāṇām na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam

original: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca dattvā dānānyakeśaḥ // GarP_3,27.25 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca dattvā dāna anya keśaḥ

original: punarāgatya sā devī śrīnivāsaṃ nanāma ha /
analyzed: punar āgatya sā devī śrīnivāsam nanāma ha

original: tasmimandine brāhmaṇāṃśca tarpayāmāsa bhamini // GarP_3,27.26 //
analyzed: tasmimandine brāhmaṇān ca tarpayāmāsa bhamini

original: svāmipuṣkariṇīṃ prāpya dīpānprājvālayatsatī /
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇīm prāpya dīpān prājvālayat satī

original: sopāneṣu mahābhāgā dīpāvalibhirañjasā /
analyzed: sopāneṣu mahābhāgāḥ dīpa āvalibhiḥ añjasā

original: prīṇayāmāsa deveśaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ jagadgurum // GarP_3,27.27 //
analyzed: prīṇayāmāsa deveśam śrīnivāsam jagadgurum

original: punaḥ paradine prāpte śakratīrthamanuttamam /
analyzed: punar para dine prāpte śakratīrtham anuttamam

original: kapilākhyordhvadeśe tu tattīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,27.28 //
analyzed: kapila ākhyā ūrdhva deśe tu tat tīrtham pāvanam smṛtam

original: tatra snātvā mahābhāgā tadūrdhvaṃ snāpayetsvayam /
analyzed: tatra snātvā mahābhāgā tad ūrdhvam snāpayet svayam

original: viṣvasenasarastatra sarvapāpavināśanam // GarP_3,27.29 //
analyzed: viṣvasenasaraḥ tatra sarva pāpa vināśanam

original: tata ūrdhvaṃ mahābhāgā yayau tatra dadarśa sā /
analyzed: tatas ūrdhvam mahābhāgā yayau tatra dadarśa sā

original: pañcāyudhānāṃ tīrthāni teṣu snānaṃ cakāra sā // GarP_3,27.30 //
analyzed: pañca āyudhānām tīrthāni teṣu snānam cakāra sā

original: tadūrdhvaṃ cāgnikuṇḍaṃ syāddurārohaṃ tatogrataḥ /
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam ca agnikuṇḍam syāt durāroham tatas ugratas

original: tasyopari brahmatīrthaṃ brahmahatyāvimocanam // GarP_3,27.31 //
analyzed: tasya upari brahmatīrtham brahmahatyā vimocanam

original: saptarṣīṇāṃ tadūrdhvaṃ tu puṇyatīrthaṃ ca satphalam /
analyzed: saptarṣīṇām tad ūrdhvam tu puṇya tīrtham ca sat phalam

original: daśādhikaphalaṃ teṣā tīrthānāmuttarottaram // GarP_3,27.32 //
analyzed: daśa adhika phalam teṣām uttarottaram

original: eteṣāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ ko vā vaktumihārhati /
analyzed: eteṣām ca eva māhātmyam kaḥ vā vaktum iha arhati

original: ṛṣitīrtheṣu sā kanyā cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,27.33 //
analyzed: ṛṣi tīrtheṣu sā kanyā cacāra tapaḥ uttamam

original: mamāvatāraparyantaṃ caritvā tapa uttamam /
analyzed: mama avatāra paryantam caritvā tapaḥ uttamam

original: yogadhāraṇa yā dehaṃ tyaktvā jāṃbavato gṛhe // GarP_3,27.34 //
analyzed: yoga dhāraṇa yā deham tyaktvā jāṃbavataḥ gṛhe

original: jātā jāṃbavatī nāma vavṛdhe tasya veśmani /
analyzed: jātā jāṃbavatī nāma vavṛdhe tasya veśmani

original: tasyāḥ pitā jāṃbavānsa samādātkanyakāṃ tadā /
analyzed: tasyāḥ pitā jāṃbavān sa samādāt kanyakām tadā

original: rukmyā anaṃ tarā saiṣā mama bhāryā khageśvara // GarP_3,27.35 //
analyzed: rukmyāḥ tarā sā eṣā mama bhāryā khageśvara

original: idaṃ hi paramākhyānaṃ veṅkaṭādrermahāgireḥ /
analyzed: idam hi param ākhyānam veṅkaṭa adreḥ mahā gireḥ

original: ko vā varṇayituṃ śakto madanyaḥ puruṣo bhuvi // GarP_3,27.36 //
analyzed: kaḥ vā varṇayitum śaktaḥ mad anyaḥ puruṣaḥ bhuvi

original: veṅkaṭeśasya naivedyaṃ sadā lakṣmīḥ karoti vai /
analyzed: veṅkaṭa īśasya naivedyam sadā lakṣmīḥ karoti vai

original: brahmā pūjayate nityamevaṃ śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ // GarP_3,27.37 //
analyzed: brahmā pūjayate nityam evam śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ

original: naivedyabhakṣiṇāṃ puṃsāmupahāsaṃ na kārayet /
analyzed: naivedya bhakṣiṇām puṃsām upahāsam na kārayet

original: svasya prāśastyabhāve tu naivedyādi guḍādikam /
analyzed: svasya prāśastya bhāve tu naivedya ādi guḍa ādikam

original: grāhyameva na saṃdeho anyathā nārakī bhavet // GarP_3,27.38 //
analyzed: grāhyam eva na saṃdehaḥ anyathā nārakī bhavet

original: śrīnivāsātparo devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: śrīnivāsāt paraḥ devaḥ na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: svayaṃ ca pācayitvātvaṃ ghṛtapakvādikaṃ tathā /
analyzed: svayam ca ghṛta pakva ādikam tathā

original: śrīnivāsasya naivedyaṃ dattvā bhojanamācaret // GarP_3,27.39 //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya naivedyam dattvā bhojanam ācaret

original: idaṃ tu paramaṃ gopyaṃ tavoktaṃ ca khageśvara /
analyzed: idam tu paramam gopyam tava uktam ca khageśvara

original: na kasyāpi ca vaktavyaṃ gopyatvātkhagasattama /
analyzed: na kasya api ca vaktavyam gopya tvāt khaga sattama

original: itaḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tāratamyaṃ śṛṇu prabho // GarP_3,27.40 //
analyzed: itas param pravakṣyāmi tāratamyam śṛṇu prabho

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe utta dṛ tṛ dṛ brahma dṛ kanyākṛtanānātīrthayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe brahma dṛ kanyākṛtanānātīrthayātrādinirūpaṇam nāma saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 28
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yā pūrvasarge dakṣaputrī satī tu rudrasya patnī dakṣayajñe svadeham /
analyzed: yā pūrva sarge dakṣa putrī satī tu rudrasya patnī dakṣa yajñe sva deham

original: visṛjya sā menakāyāṃ ca jajñe dharādharāddhemavato vai sakāśāt // GarP_3,28.1 //
analyzed: visṛjya sā menakāyām ca jajñe dharādharāt hemavataḥ vai sakāśāt

original: sā pārvatā rudrapatnī khagendra yā śeṣapatnī vāruṇī nāma pūrvā /
analyzed: sā pārvatā rudra patnī khaga indra yā śeṣa patnī vāruṇī nāma pūrvā

original: saivāgatā balabhadreṇa rantuṃ dvirūpamāsthāya mahāpativratā // GarP_3,28.2 //
analyzed: sā eva āgatā balabhadreṇa rantum dvi rūpam āsthāya mahā pativratā

original: śrīrityākhyā indirāveśayuktā tasyā dvitīyā pratimā megharūpā /
analyzed: śrīḥ iti ākhyā indirā āveśa yuktā tasyāḥ dvitīyā pratimā megha rūpā

original: śeṣaṇa rūpeṇa yadā hi vīndra tapaścacāra viṣṇunā sārdhameva // GarP_3,28.3 //
analyzed: śeṣaṇa rūpeṇa yadā hi vi indra tapaḥ cacāra viṣṇunā sārdham eva

original: tadaiva devī vāruṇī śeṣapatnī tapaśca kre indirāprītaye ca /
analyzed: tadā eva devī vāruṇī śeṣa patnī tapaḥ ca kre indirā prītaye ca

original: tadā prītā indirā suprasannā uvāca tāṃ vāruṇīṃ śeṣapatnīm // GarP_3,28.4 //
analyzed: tadā prītā indirā su prasannā uvāca tām vāruṇīm śeṣa patnīm

original: yadā rāmo vaiṣṇavāṃśena yuktaḥ saṃpatsyate bhūtale rauhiṇeyaḥ /
analyzed: yadā rāmaḥ vaiṣṇava aṃśena yuktaḥ saṃpatsyate bhū tale rauhiṇeyaḥ

original: mayyāveśātsaṃyutā tvaṃ tu bhadre śrīrityākhyā valabhadrasya rantum // GarP_3,28.5 //
analyzed: mayi āveśāt saṃyutā tvam tu bhadre śrīḥ iti ākhyā valabhadrasya rantum

original: saṃpatsyase nātra vicāryamastītyuktvā sā vai prayayau viṣṇuloke /
analyzed: saṃpatsyase na atra vicāryam asti iti uktvā sā vai prayayau viṣṇu loke

original: śrīlakṣmyaṃśācchrīritīḍyāṃ samākhyāṃ labdhvā loke śeṣapatnī babhūva // GarP_3,28.6 //
analyzed: śrī lakṣmī aṃśāt śrīḥ iti iḍyām samākhyām labdhvā loke śeṣa patnī babhūva

original: yadāhīśo vipulāmuddharecca tadā rāmaḥ śrībhidāsaṃgame ca /
analyzed: yadā ahi īśaḥ vipulām uddharet ca tadā rāmaḥ śrī bhidā saṃgame ca

original: karoti toṣatsarvadā vai ramāyāstasyāpyāveśo vyaṃstritamonasaṃgam // GarP_3,28.7 //
analyzed: karoti toṣat sarvadā vai ramāyāḥ tasya api āveśaḥ

original: yā revatī raivatasyaiva putrī sā vāruṇī balabhadrasya patnī /
analyzed: yā revatī raivatasya eva putrī sā vāruṇī balabhadrasya patnī

original: sauparṇanāmnī balapatnī khagendra yāstāstisraḥ ṣaḍviṣṇośca strībhyaḥ /
analyzed: sauparṇa nāmnī bala patnī khaga indra yāḥ tāḥ tisraḥ ṣaḍ viṣṇoḥ ca strībhyaḥ

original: dviguṇādhamā rudraśeṣādikebhyo daśādhamā tvaṃ vijānīhi pautra // GarP_3,28.8 //
analyzed: dviguṇa adhamā rudra śeṣa ādikebhyaḥ daśa adhamā tvam vijānīhi pautra

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: rāmeṇa rantuṃ sarvadā vāruṇī tu putrītvamāpe revatasyaiva subhrūḥ /
analyzed: rāmeṇa rantum sarvadā vāruṇī tu putrī tvam āpe revatasya eva subhrūḥ

original: evaṃ trirūpā vāruṇī śeṣapatnī dvirūpabhūtā pārvatī rudrapatnī // GarP_3,28.9 //
analyzed: evam tri rūpā vāruṇī śeṣa patnī dvi rūpa bhūtā pārvatī rudra patnī

original: nīcāyā jāṃbavatyāśca śeṣasāmyaṃ ca kutracit /
analyzed: nīcāyāḥ jāṃbavatyāḥ ca śeṣa sāmyam ca kutracid

original: śrūyate ca mayā kṛṣṇa nimittaṃ brūhi me prabho // GarP_3,28.10 //
analyzed: śrūyate ca mayā kṛṣṇa nimittam brūhi me prabho

original: umāyāśca tathā rudraḥ sadā bahuguṇādhikaḥ /
analyzed: umāyāḥ ca tathā rudraḥ sadā bahu guṇa adhikaḥ

original: evaṃ tvayoktaṃ bhagavanniścayārthaṃ mama prabho // GarP_3,28.11 //
analyzed: evam tvayā uktam bhagavat niścaya artham mama prabho

original: revatī śrīyutā śrīśca śeṣarūpā ca vāruṇī /
analyzed: revatī śrī yutā śrīḥ ca śeṣa rūpā ca vāruṇī

original: sauparṇi pārvatī caiva tisraḥ śeṣāśato varāḥ // GarP_3,28.12 //
analyzed: sauparṇi pārvatī ca eva tisraḥ śeṣāśataḥ varāḥ

original: ityapi śrūyate kṛṣṇa kutracinmadhusūdana /
analyzed: iti api śrūyate kṛṣṇa kutracid madhusūdana

original: nimittaṃ brūhi me kṛṣṇa tavaśiṣyāya suvrata // GarP_3,28.13 //
analyzed: nimittam brūhi me kṛṣṇa tava śiṣyāya suvrata

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: vijñāya jāṃbavatyāśca tadanyeṣāṃ khagādhipa /
analyzed: vijñāya jāṃbavatyāḥ ca tat anyeṣām khaga adhipa

original: uttamānāṃ ca sāmyaṃ tu uttamāveśato bhavet // GarP_3,28.14 //
analyzed: uttamānām ca sāmyam tu uttama āveśataḥ bhavet

original: avarāṇāṃ guṇasyāpi hyuttamānāmadhīnatā /
analyzed: avarāṇām guṇasya api hi uttamānām adhīna tā

original: astīti dyotanāyaiva śatāṃśādhikamucyate // GarP_3,28.15 //
analyzed: asti iti dyotanāya eva śata aṃśa adhikam ucyate

original: yathā mayocyate vīndra tathā jānīhi nānyathā /
analyzed: yathā mayā ucyate vi indra tathā jānīhi na anyathā

original: tadanantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu kāśyapajottama // GarP_3,28.16 //
analyzed: tad anantara jā anvakṣye śṛṇu kāśyapa ja uttama

original: caturdaśasu cendreṣu saptamo yaḥ purandaraḥ /
analyzed: caturdaśasu ca indreṣu saptamaḥ yaḥ purandaraḥ

original: vṛtrādīnāṃ śarīraṃ tu puramityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,28.17 //
analyzed: vṛtra ādīnām śarīram tu puram iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: taṃ dārayati vajreṇa yasmāttasmātpurandaraḥ /
analyzed: tam dārayati vajreṇa yasmāt tasmāt purandaraḥ

original: caturdaśasu cendreṣu mantradyumnastu ṣaṣṭhakaḥ // GarP_3,28.18 //
analyzed: caturdaśasu ca indreṣu mantradyumnaḥ tu ṣaṣṭhakaḥ

original: mantrānaṣṭa mahāvīndra devo dyotayate yataḥ /
analyzed: mantrān aṣṭa mahāvī indra devaḥ dyotayate yatas

original: mantradyumnastato loke ubhāvapyeka eva tu // GarP_3,28.19 //
analyzed: mantradyumnaḥ tatas loke ubhau api ekaḥ eva tu

original: mantradyumnāvatārobhūtkuntīputrorjuno bhuvi /
analyzed: mantradyumna avatāraḥ bhūt kuntī putraḥ ūrjunaḥ bhuvi

original: viṣṇorvāyoranantasya cendrasya khagasattama // GarP_3,28.20 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ anantasya ca indrasya khaga sattama

original: pārthaścaturbhiḥ saṃyukta indra eva prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: pārthaḥ caturbhiḥ saṃyuktaḥ indraḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: caturthepi ca vāyośca viśeṣosti sadārjuna // GarP_3,28.21 //
analyzed: caturthe pi ca vāyoḥ ca viśeṣaḥ usti sadā arjuna

original: vālirnāmā vānarastu purandara iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vāliḥ nāmā vānaraḥ tu purandaraḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: candravaṃśe samutpanno gādhirājo vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_3,28.22 //
analyzed: candra vaṃśe samutpannaḥ gādhirājaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: mantradyumnāvatāraḥ sa viśvāmitrapitā smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: mantradyumna avatāraḥ sa viśvāmitra pitā smṛtaḥ

original: vedoktamantrā gāḥ proktā dhiyā saṃdhārayedyataḥ // GarP_3,28.23 //
analyzed: veda ukta mantrāḥ gāḥ proktāḥ dhiyā saṃdhārayet yatas

original: ato gādhiriti proktastadarthaṃ bhūtale hyabhūt /
analyzed: atas gādhiḥ iti proktaḥ tad artham bhū tale hi abhūt

original: ikṣvākuputro vīndra vikukṣiriti viśrutaḥ // GarP_3,28.24 //
analyzed: ikṣvāku putraḥ vi indra vikukṣiḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: sa evendrāvatārobhūddharisevārthameva ca /
analyzed: saḥ eva indra avatāraḥ bhūt hari sevā artham eva ca

original: viśeṣeṇa hariṃ kukṣau vijñānācca hariḥ sadā // GarP_3,28.25 //
analyzed: viśeṣeṇa harim kukṣau vijñānāt ca hariḥ sadā

original: ato vikukṣināmāsau bhūloke viśrutaḥ sadā /
analyzed: atas vikukṣi nāmā asau bhū loke viśrutaḥ sadā

original: rāmaputraḥ kuśaḥ prokta indra eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.26 //
analyzed: rāma putraḥ kuśaḥ proktaḥ indraḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: vālmīkiṛṣiṇā yasmātkuśenaiva vinirmitaḥ /
analyzed: vālmīki ṛṣiṇā yasmāt kuśena eva vinirmitaḥ

original: ataḥ kuśa iti prokto jānakīnandanaḥ prabhuḥ // GarP_3,28.27 //
analyzed: atas kuśaḥ iti proktaḥ jānakīnandanaḥ prabhuḥ

original: indradyumnaḥ puredrastu gādhī vālī tathārjunaḥ /
analyzed: indradyumnaḥ puredraḥ tu gādhī vālī tathā arjunaḥ

original: vikukṣiḥ kuśa evaite sapta cendrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,28.28 //
analyzed: vikukṣiḥ kuśaḥ eva ete sapta ca indrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: yaḥ kṛṣṇaputtraḥ pradyumnaḥ kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kṛṣṇa puttraḥ pradyumnaḥ kāmaḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: prakṛṣṭaprakāśarūpatvātpradyumna iti nāmavān // GarP_3,28.29 //
analyzed: prakṛṣṭa prakāśa rūpa tvāt pradyumnaḥ iti nāmavān

original: yā rāmabhrātā bharataḥ kāma evābhavadbhuvi /
analyzed: yā rāma bhrātā bharataḥ kāmaḥ evā abhavat bhuvi

original: rāmājñāṃ bharate yasmāttasmādbharatanāmakaḥ // GarP_3,28.30 //
analyzed: rāma ājñām bharate yasmāt tasmāt bharata nāmakaḥ

original: cakrābhimāni kāmastu sudarśana iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: cakra abhimāni kāmaḥ tu sudarśanaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: brahmaiva kṛṣṇaputrastu sāṃbo jāmbavatīsutaḥ // GarP_3,28.31 //
analyzed: brahmā eva kṛṣṇa putraḥ tu sāṃbaḥ jāmbavatī sutaḥ

original: kāmāvatāro vijñeyaḥ saṃdeho nātra vidyate /
analyzed: kāmāvatāraḥ vijñeyaḥ saṃdehaḥ na atra vidyate

original: yo rudraputraḥ skandastu kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.32 //
analyzed: yaḥ rudra putraḥ skandaḥ tu kāmaḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: ripūnāskaṃ date nityamataḥ skanda iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ripūn āskam date nityam atas skandaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: yo vā sanatkumārastu brahmaputraḥ khagādhipa /
analyzed: yaḥ vā sanatkumāraḥ tu brahma putraḥ khaga adhipa

original: kāmāvatāro vijñeyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,28.33 //
analyzed: kāmāvatāraḥ vijñeyaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: sudarśanaśca paramaḥ pradyumnaḥ sāṃba eva ca /
analyzed: sudarśanaḥ ca paramaḥ pradyumnaḥ sa aṃbaḥ eva ca

original: sanatkumāraḥ sāṃbaścaṣaḍete kāmarūpakāḥ // GarP_3,28.34 //
analyzed: sanatkumāraḥ sāṃbaḥ ca ṣaṭ ete kāmarūpakāḥ

original: tataśca indrakāmāvapyumādibhyo daśāvarau /
analyzed: tatas ca indra kāmau api umā ādibhyaḥ daśa avarau

original: tayormadhye tu garuḍa kāma indrādhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,28.35 //
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye tu garuḍa kāmaḥ indra adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: prāṇastvahaṅkāra eva ahaṅkārakasaṃjñakaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ tu ahaṅkāraḥ eva ahaṅkāraka saṃjñakaḥ

original: garutmadaṃśo vijñeyaḥ kāmendrābhyāṃ daśādhamaḥ // GarP_3,28.36 //
analyzed: garutmat aṃśaḥ vijñeyaḥ kāma indrābhyām daśa adhamaḥ

original: tadanantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu vīndra samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: tad anantara jān vakṣye śṛṇu vi indra samāhitaḥ

original: śravaṇānmokṣamāpnoti mahāpāpādvimucyate // GarP_3,28.37 //
analyzed: śravaṇāt mokṣam āpnoti mahā pāpāt vimucyate

original: kāmaputroniruddho 'pi hareranyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: hareḥ anyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: sa evābhūddhareḥ sevāṃ kartuṃ rāmānujo bhuvi // GarP_3,28.38 //
analyzed: saḥ evā abhūt hareḥ sevām kartum rāma anujaḥ bhuvi

original: śatrughna iti vikhyātaḥ śatrūnsūdayate yataḥ /
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ śatrūn sūdayate yatas

original: aniruddhaḥ kṛṣṇaputro pradyumnādyo 'janiṣṭa ha // GarP_3,28.39 //
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ pradyumnāt yaḥ janiṣṭa ha

original: saṃkarṣaṇādirūpaistu tribhirāviṣṭa eva saḥ /
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇa ādi rūpaiḥ tu tribhiḥ āviṣṭaḥ eva saḥ

original: evaṃ dvirūpo vijñeyo hyaniruddho mahāmatiḥ // GarP_3,28.40 //
analyzed: evam dvi rūpaḥ vijñeyaḥ hi aniruddhaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: kāmabhāryā ratiryā tu dvirūpā saṃprakīrtitā /
analyzed: kāma bhāryā ratiḥ yā tu dvirūpā saṃprakīrtitā

original: rugmaputrī rugmavatī kāmabhāryā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,28.41 //
atiprakāśayuktatvāttasmādrugmavatī smṛtā /
analyzed: ati prakāśa yukta tvāt tasmāt rugmavatī smṛtā

original: duryodhanasya yā putrī lakṣaṇā sā ratiḥ smṛtā // GarP_3,28.42 //
analyzed: duryodhanasya yā putrī lakṣaṇā sā ratiḥ smṛtā

original: kāṣṭhā sāṃbasya bhāryā sā lakṣaṇaṃ saṃyunaktyataḥ /
analyzed: kāṣṭhā sā aṃbasya bhāryā sā lakṣaṇam saṃyunakti atas

original: lakṣaṇābhidhayābhūmau duṣṭa vīryodbhavā hyapi // GarP_3,28.43 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇa abhidhayā abhūmau vīrya udbhavāḥ hi api

original: evaṃ dvirūpā vijñeyā kāmabhāryā ratiḥ smṛtā /
analyzed: evam dvi rūpā vijñeyā kāma bhāryā ratiḥ smṛtā

original: svāyaṃbhuvo brahmaputro manustvādyo gurau samaḥ /
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuvaḥ brahma putraḥ manuḥ tu ādyaḥ gurau samaḥ

original: rājadharmeṇa viṣṇośca jātaḥ prīṇayituṃ hareḥ // GarP_3,28.44 //
analyzed: rāja dharmeṇa viṣṇoḥ ca jātaḥ prīṇayitum hareḥ

original: bṛhaspatirdevāgururmahātmā tasyāvatārāstraya āsan khagendra /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ devāguruḥ mahātmā tasya avatārāḥ trayaḥ āsan khaga indra

original: rāmāvatāre bharatākhyo babhūva hyaṃbhojajāveśayuto bṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_3,28.45 //
analyzed: rāma avatāre bharata ākhyaḥ babhūva hi aṃbhoja ja āveśa yutaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: devāvatārānvānarāṃstārayitvā śrīrāmadivyā'caritānyavādīt /
analyzed: deva avatārān vānarān tārayitvā śrī rāma divya ācaritāni avādīt

original: ato hyasau nāranāmā babhūva hyaṅgatvamāptuṃ rāmadevasya bhūmyām // GarP_3,28.46 //
analyzed: atas hi asau nāra nāmā babhūva hi aṅga tvam āptum rāmadevasya bhūmyām

original: kṛṣṇāvatāre droṇanāmā babhūva aṃbhojajāveśayuto bṛhasyapatiḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa avatāre droṇa nāmā babhūva aṃbhoja ja āveśa yutaḥ bṛhasya patiḥ

original: yasmāddoṇātsaṃbhabhūva guruśca tasmādasau droṇasaṃjño babhūva // GarP_3,28.47 //
analyzed: yasmāt doṇāt saṃbhabhūva guruḥ ca tasmāt asau droṇa saṃjñaḥ babhūva

original: bhūbhārabhūtādyuddhṛtau hyaṅgabhūto viṣṇoḥ sevāṃ kartumevāsa bhūmau /
analyzed: bhū bhāra bhūta ādi uddhṛtau hi aṅga bhūtaḥ viṣṇoḥ sevām kartum evā āsa bhūmau

original: bṛhaspatiḥ pavanāveśapuktā sa uddhavaścetyamidhānamāpa // GarP_3,28.48 //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ saḥ uddhavaḥ ca iti amidhānam āpa

original: yasmādutkṛṣṭo hariratra samyagato hyasau budhavannāma cāpa /
analyzed: yasmāt utkṛṣṭaḥ hariḥ atra samyak atas hi asau budha vat nāma ca āpa

original: sakhā hyabhūtkṛṣṇadevasya nityaṃ mahāmatiḥ sarvalokeṣu pujvaḥ // GarP_3,28.49 //
analyzed: sakhā hi abhūt kṛṣṇa devasya nityam mahāmatiḥ sarva lokeṣu pujvaḥ

original: dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhajo dakṣo brahmaputro mahāmatiḥ /
kanyāṃ sṛṣṭvā hareḥ prīṇannāsa bhūmā prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: kanyām sṛṣṭvā hareḥ prīṇan āsa bhūmā prajāpatiḥ

original: putrānudapādayaddakṣastvato dakṣa iti smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,28.50 //
analyzed: putrān udapādayat dakṣaḥ tu atas dakṣaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: śacīṃ bharyāṃ devarājasya viddhi tasyā hyavatāraṃ śṛṇu samyak khagendra /
analyzed: śacīm bharyām devarājasya viddhi tasyāḥ hi avatāram śṛṇu samyak khaga indra

original: rāmāvatāre nāma tārā babhūva sā vālipatnī śacīsajakā ca // GarP_3,28.51 //
analyzed: rāma avatāre nāma tārā babhūva sā vāli patnī śacīsajakā ca

original: rāmānmṛte vālisaṃjñe patau hi sugrīvasaṃgaṃ sā cakārātha tārā /
analyzed: rāmāt mṛte vāli saṃjñe patau hi sugrīva saṃgam sā cakāra atha tārā

original: ato nāgātsvargalokaṃ ca tārā kva vā yāyādantarikṣe na pāpā // GarP_3,28.52 //
analyzed: atas nāgāt svarga lokam ca tārā kva vā yāyāt antarikṣe na pāpā

original: kṛṣṇāvatāre saiva tārā ca vīndra babhūva bhūmau vijayasya patnī /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa avatāre sā eva tārā ca vīndra babhūva bhūmau vijayasya patnī

original: piśaṅgadeti hyabhidhā syācca tasyāḥ sāmīpyamasyāstvajuṃnaveva cāsīt // GarP_3,28.53 //
analyzed: piśaṅgadā iti hi abhidhā syāt ca tasyāḥ sāmīpyam asyāḥ tu ajuṃnavā iva ca āsīt

original: utpādayitvā babhruvāhaṃ ca putraṃ tasyāṃ tyaktvā hyarjuno vai mahātmā /
analyzed: utpādayitvā babhruvāham ca putram tasyām tyaktvā hi arjunaḥ vai mahātmā

original: ataścobhe vāracitrāṅgade ca śacīrūpe nātra vivāryamasti // GarP_3,28.54 //
analyzed: atas ca ubhe vāra citra aṅgade ca śacī rūpe na atra vivāryam asti

original: pulomajā mantradyumnasya bhāryā yā kāśikā gādhirājasya bhāryā /
analyzed: pulomajā mantradyumnasya bhāryā yā kāśikā gādhirājasya bhāryā

original: vikukṣibhāryā sumatiśceti saṃjñā kuśasya patnī kāntimatīti saṃjñā // GarP_3,28.55 //
analyzed: vikukṣi bhāryā sumatiḥ ca iti saṃjñā kuśasya patnī kāntimatī iti saṃjñā

original: etā hi sapta hyavarāśca śacyā jānīhi vai nāsti vicāraṇātra /
analyzed: etāḥ hi sapta hi avarāḥ ca śacyāḥ jānīhi vai na asti vicāraṇā atra

original: śacī ratiścāniruddho manurdakṣo bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: śacī ratiḥ ca aniruddhaḥ manuḥ dakṣaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: ṣaḍanyonyasamāḥ proktā ahaṅkārāddaśādhamāḥ // GarP_3,28.56 //
analyzed: ṣaṭ anyonya samāḥ proktāḥ ahaṅkārāt daśa adhamāḥ

original: atha yaḥ pravaho vāyurmukhyavāyoḥ suto balī /
analyzed: atha yaḥ pravahaḥ vāyuḥ mukhya vāyoḥ sutaḥ balī

original: sa vāyuṣu mahānadya sa vai koṇādhipastathā // GarP_3,28.57 //
analyzed: sa vāyuṣu mahā nadya sa vai koṇādhipaḥ tathā

original: nāsikāsu sa evokto bhautikastulya eva ca /
analyzed: nāsikāsu saḥ evā uktaḥ bhautikaḥ tulyaḥ eva ca

original: ativāhaḥ sa evoktaḥ yato gamyo mumukṣubhiḥ // GarP_3,28.58 //
analyzed: ativāhaḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ yatas gamyaḥ mumukṣubhiḥ

original: dakṣādibhyaḥ pañcaguṇādadhamaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: dakṣa ādibhyaḥ pañcaguṇāt adhamaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: pravahaśceti saṃjñāṃ sa kimarthaṃ prāpa tadvada // GarP_3,28.59 //
analyzed: pravahaḥ ca iti saṃjñām sa kimartham prāpa tat vada

original: arthaḥ kaścāsti tannāmnaḥ pratītastaṃ vadasva me /
analyzed: arthaḥ kaḥ ca asti tad nāmnaḥ pratītaḥ tam vadasva me

original: garuḍenaivamuktastu bhagavāndevakīsutaḥ /
analyzed: garuḍena evam uktaḥ tu bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: uvāca paramaprītaḥ saṃstūya garuḍaṃ hariḥ // GarP_3,28.60 //
analyzed: uvāca parama prītaḥ saṃstūya garuḍam hariḥ

original: kṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: praharṣeṇa harestulyānsarvadā vahate yataḥ /
analyzed: praharṣeṇa hareḥ tulyān sarvadā vahate yatas

original: ataḥ pravahanāmāsau kīrtitaḥ pakṣisattama // GarP_3,28.61 //
analyzed: atas pravaha nāmā asau kīrtitaḥ pakṣi sattama

original: sarvottamo viṣṇurevāsti nāmnā brahmādayastadadhīnāḥ sadāpi /
analyzed: sarva uttamaḥ viṣṇuḥ eva asti nāmnā brahma ādayaḥ tad adhīnāḥ sadā api

original: mayoktametattu satyaṃ na mithyā gṛhṇāmi hastenoragaṃ kopayuktam // GarP_3,28.62 //
analyzed: mayā uktam etat tu satyam na mithyā gṛhṇāmi hastena uragam kopa yuktam

original: sarvaṃ nu satyaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatuhyahīndraḥ /
analyzed: sarvam nu satyam yadi mithyā bhavet tu tadā tu asau mām

original: evaṃ bruvannuragaṃ kopayuktaṃ samagrahīnnādaśatsopyuraṅgaḥ // GarP_3,28.63 //
analyzed: evam bruvan uragam kopa yuktam samagrahīt na adaśat saḥ upi uraṅgaḥ

original: etasya saṃdhāraṇādeva vīndra sa vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām /
analyzed: etasya saṃdhāraṇāt eva vi indra sa vāyuputraḥ pravaha iti āpa saṃjñām

original: yo vā loke viṣṇumūrtiṃ vihāya daityasvarūpā reṇukādyāḥ kudevāḥ // GarP_3,28.64 //
analyzed: yaḥ vā loke viṣṇu mūrtim vihāya daitya svarūpāḥ reṇukā ādyāḥ ku devāḥ

original: teṣāṃ tathā matpitṝṇāṃ ca pūjā vyarthā satyaṃ satyametadbravīmi /
analyzed: teṣām tathā mad pitṝṇām ca pūjā vyarthā satyam satyam etat bravīmi

original: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.65 //
analyzed: etat sarvam yadi mithyā bhavet tu tadā tu asau mām daśatu hi ahi indraḥ

original: pitryaṃ nayāmi pravihāyaiva ye tu pitruddeśātkevalaṃ yaḥ karoti /
analyzed: pitryam nayāmi pravihāya eva ye tu pitṛ uddeśāt kevalam yaḥ karoti

original: sa pāpātmā narakānvai prayātītyetadvākyaṃ satyametadbravīmi // GarP_3,28.66 //
analyzed: sa pāpa ātmā narakān vai prayāti iti etat vākyam satyam etat bravīmi

original: na śrīḥ svatantrā nāpi vidhiḥ svatantro na vāyudevo nāpi śivaḥ svatantraḥ /
analyzed: na śrīḥ svatantrā nā api vidhiḥ svatantraḥ na vāyudevaḥ nā api śivaḥ svatantraḥ

original: tadanye no gauripuloma jādyāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ nātra loke svatantraḥ // GarP_3,28.67 //
analyzed: tad anye no gauri puloma ja ādyāḥ kim vaktavyam na atra loke svatantraḥ

original: bravīmi satyaṃ puruṣo viṣṇureva satyaṃ satya bhujamuddhṛtya satyam /
analyzed: bravīmi satyam puruṣaḥ viṣṇuḥ eva satyam satya bhujam uddhṛtya satyam

original: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndra // GarP_3,28.68 //
analyzed: etat sarvam yadi mithyā bhavet tu tadā tu asau mām daśatu hi ahi indra

original: jīvaśca satyaḥ paramātmā ca satyastayorbhedaḥ satye e tatsadāpi /
analyzed: jīvaḥ ca satyaḥ paramātmā ca satyaḥ tayoḥ bhedaḥ satye tat sadā api

original: jaḍaścasatyo jīvajaḍayośca bhedo bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ ca jaḍaiśayorbhidā // GarP_3,28.69 //
analyzed: jaḍaḥ ca satyaḥ jīva jaḍayoḥ ca bhedaḥ bhedaḥ satyaḥ kim ca jaḍa aiśayoḥ bhidā

original: bhedaḥ satyaḥ sarvajīveṣu nityaṃ satyā jaḍānāṃ ca bhedā sadāpi /
analyzed: bhedaḥ satyaḥ sarva jīveṣu nityam satyāḥ jaḍānām ca sadā api

original: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau daśatu māṃ hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.70 //
analyzed: etat sarvam yadi mithyā bhavet tu tadā tu asau daśatu mām hi ahi indraḥ

original: evaṃ bruvannuragaṃ kopayuktaṃ samagrahīnnādaśatsopyuraṅgaḥ /
analyzed: evam bruvan uragam kopa yuktam samagrahīt na adaśat saḥ upi uraṅgaḥ

original: etasya saṃdhāraṇādevavīdre sā vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām // GarP_3,28.71 //
analyzed: etasya saṃdhāraṇāt eva vīdre sā vāyuputraḥ pravaha iti āpa saṃjñām

original: dvayaṃ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ tvaṃ svīkuruṣva dvayameva nityam /
analyzed: dvayam sva rūpam praviditvā eva pūrvam tvam svīkuruṣva dvayam eva nityam

original: snānādikaṃ ca prakaroti nityaṃ pāpī sa ātmā naiva mokṣaṃ prayāti // GarP_3,28.72 //
analyzed: snāna ādikam ca prakaroti nityam pāpī saḥ ātmā na eva mokṣam prayāti

original: tasmāddvayaṃ pravicāryaiva nityaṃ sukhī bhavennātra vicāryamasti /
analyzed: tasmāt dvayam pravicārya eva nityam sukhī bhavet na atra vicāryam asti

original: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.73 //
analyzed: etat sarvam yadi mithyā bhavet tu tadā tu asau mām daśatu hi ahi indraḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: kiṃ taddvayaṃ devadeveśa kiṃ vā tatkāraṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva /
analyzed: kim tat dvayam devadeveśa kim vā tad kāraṇam kīdṛśam me vadasva

original: dvayostyāgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva tyāgātsukhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva // GarP_3,28.74 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ tyāgam kīdṛśam me vadasva tyāgāt sukham kīdṛśam me vadasva

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: dvayaṃ cāhustvindriye dve baliṣṭhe dehe hyasmiñ śrotranetre susṛṣṭe /
analyzed: dvayam ca āhuḥ tu indriye dve baliṣṭhe dehe hi asmin śrotra netre su sṛṣṭe

original: avāntare śrotranetre khagendra dvayaṃ cāhustatsvarūpaṃ ca vakṣye // GarP_3,28.75 //
analyzed: avāntare śrotra netre khagendra dvayam ca āhuḥ tad svarūpam ca vakṣye

original: śrotrasvabhāvo loka vārtāśrutau ca hyatīva modastvādarāsvādanena /
analyzed: śrotra svabhāvaḥ vārtā śrutau ca hi atīva modaḥ tu ādara āsvādanena

original: harervārtāśravaṇe duḥ khajālaṃ śrotrasvabhāvo jaḍatā damaśca // GarP_3,28.76 //
analyzed: hareḥ vārtā śravaṇe duḥ kha jālam śrotra svabhāvaḥ jaḍa tā damaḥ ca

original: netrasvabhāvo darśane strīnarāṇāṃ hyatyādarānnāsti nidrādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: netra svabhāvaḥ darśane strī narāṇām hi ati ādarāt na asti nidrā ādikam ca

original: harerbhaktānāṃ darśane duḥ kharūpo viṣṇoḥ pūjādarśane duḥ khajālam // GarP_3,28.77 //
analyzed: hareḥ bhaktānām darśane duḥ kha rūpaḥ viṣṇoḥ pūjā darśane duḥ kha jālam

original: tayoḥ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva mūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ svarūpam praviditvā eva pūrvam punar punar svīkaroti eva mūḍhaḥ

original: śiśraṃ maurkhyāccaiva kutrāpi yonau praveśayetsarvadā hyādareṇa // GarP_3,28.78 //
analyzed: maurkhyāt ca eva kutra api yonau praveśayet sarvadā hi ādareṇa

original: bhayaṃ ca lajjā naiva cāste vadhūnāṃ tathā nṛṇāṃ vanitānāṃ yatīnām /
analyzed: bhayam ca lajjā nā eva ca āste vadhūnām tathā nṛṇām vanitānām yatīnām

original: svasāraṃ te hyaviditvā dinepi suvāma yajñena svābhāvaśca vīndra // GarP_3,28.79 //
analyzed: svasāram te hi a viditvā dine pi suvāma yajñena svābhāvaḥ ca vi indra

original: rasāsvabhāvo bhakṣaṇe sarvadāpi hyanarpitasyānnabhakṣyasya viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: rasa asvabhāvaḥ bhakṣaṇe sarvadā api hi anarpitasya anna bhakṣyasya viṣṇoḥ

original: tatho pahārasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ abhakṣyāṇāṃ bhakṣaṇe tatsvabhāvaḥ // GarP_3,28.80 //
analyzed: tathā u pahārasya ca tad svabhāvaḥ abhakṣyāṇām bhakṣaṇe tad svabhāvaḥ

original: alehyalehasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ pātuṃ tvapeyasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: a lehya lehasya ca tad svabhāvaḥ pātum tu a peyasya ca tad svabhāvaḥ

original: dvayoḥ svarūpaṃ ca vihāya mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva nityam // GarP_3,28.81 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ svarūpam ca vihāya mūḍhaḥ punar punar svīkaroti eva nityam

original: tasya snānaṃ vyarthamāhuśca yasmāttasmāttyājyaṃ na dvayoḥ kāryameva /
analyzed: tasya snānam vyartham āhuḥ ca yasmāt tasmāt tyājyam na dvayoḥ kāryam eva

original: abhiprāyaṃ hyetamevaṃ khagendra jānīhi tvaṃ prahasyaiva nityam // GarP_3,28.82 //
analyzed: abhiprāyam hi etam evam khaga indra jānīhi tvam prahasya eva nityam

original: bhāryādvayaṃ hyaviditvā svarūpaṃ svīkṛtya caikāṃ pravihāyaiva caikām /
analyzed: bhāryā dvayam hi a viditvā sva rūpam svīkṛtya ca ekām pravihāya eva ca ekām

original: snānādikaṃ kurute mūḍhabūddhiḥ vyarthaṃ cāhurmokṣabhogau ca naiva /
analyzed: snāna ādikam kurute vyartham ca āhuḥ mokṣa bhogau ca nā eva

original: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.83 //
analyzed: etat sarvam yadi mithyā bhavet tu tadā tu asau mām daśatu hi ahi indraḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca /
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: bhāryādvayaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ mamāpi tayoḥ svarūpaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ murāre /
analyzed: bhāryā dvayam kim vada tvam mama api tayoḥ svarūpam kim vada tvam murāre

original: tayormadhye grāhyabhāryāṃ vada tvamagrāhyabhāryāṃ cāpi samyagvada tvam // GarP_3,28.84 //
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye grāhya bhāryām vada tvam agrāhya bhāryām ca api samyak vada tvam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: buddhiḥ patnī sā dvirūpā khagendra duṣṭā caikā tvaparā suṣṭhurūpā /
analyzed: buddhiḥ patnī sā dvi rūpā khaga indra duṣṭā ca ekā tu aparā suṣṭhurūpā

original: tayormadhye duṣṭarūpā kaniṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā tu yā suṣṭhubuddhisvarūpā // GarP_3,28.85 //
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye duṣṭa rūpā kaniṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā tu yā suṣṭhu buddhi svarūpā

original: kaniṣṭhayā naṣṭatāṃ yāti jīvaḥ sutiṣṭhantyā yāti yogyāṃ pratiṣṭhām /
analyzed: kaniṣṭhayā naṣṭa tām yāti jīvaḥ su tiṣṭhantyā yāti yogyām pratiṣṭhām

original: kaniṣṭhāyāḥ śṛṇu vakṣye svarūpaṃ śrutvā tasyāstyāgabuddhiṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.86 //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhāyāḥ śṛṇu vakṣye svarūpam śrutvā tasyāḥ tyāga buddhim kuruṣva

original: jīvaṃ yaṃ vai prerayantī kaniṣṭhā kāmyaṃ dharmaṃ kurute sarvadāpi /
analyzed: jīvam yam vai prerayantī kaniṣṭhā kāmyam dharmam kurute sarvadā api

original: kva brāhmaṇāḥ kva ca viṣṇurmahātmā kva vai kathā kva ca yajñāḥ kvagāvaḥ // GarP_3,28.87 //
analyzed: kva brāhmaṇāḥ kva ca viṣṇuḥ mahātmā kva vai kathā kva ca yajñāḥ kva gāvaḥ

original: kva cāśvatthaḥ kva ca snānaṃ kva śaucametatsarvaṃ nāma nāśaṃ karoti /
analyzed: kva ca aśvatthaḥ kva ca snānam kva śaucam etat sarvam nāma nāśam karoti

original: mūḍhaṃ patiṃ reṇukāṃ pūjayasva māyādevyā dīpadānaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.88 //
analyzed: mūḍham patim reṇukām pūjayasva māyādevyāḥ dīpa dānam kuruṣva

original: subhairavādīn bhaja mūḍha tvamandha hāridracūrṇandhārayeḥ sarvadāpi /
analyzed: su bhairava ādīn bhaja mūḍha tvam andha sarvadā api

original: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ bhajasva bhaktyā sūtraṃ galabandhaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.89 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭha aṣṭamyām jyeṣṭha devīm bhajasva bhaktyā sūtram gala bandham kuruṣva

original: marigandhāṣṭamyāṃ marigandhaṃ bhajasva tathā sūtraṃ svagale dhārayasva /
analyzed: marigandhāṣṭamyām mari gandham bhajasva tathā sūtram sva gale dhārayasva

original: dīpastaṃbhaṃ sudine pūjayasva tatsūtrameva svagale dhārayasva // GarP_3,28.90 //
analyzed: dīpa staṃbham sudine pūjayasva tad sūtram eva sva gale dhārayasva

original: mahālakṣmīṃ cādyalakṣmīṃ ca samyak pūjāṃ kuru tvaṃ hi bhaktyātha jīva /
analyzed: mahālakṣmīm ca ādyalakṣmīm ca samyak pūjām kuru tvam hi bhaktyā atha jīva

original: lakṣmīsūtraṃ svāgale dhārayasva mahālakṣmīvān bhavasītyuttaratra // GarP_3,28.91 //
analyzed: lakṣmī sūtram svāgale dhārayasva mahā lakṣmīvān bhavasi iti uttaratra

original: vihāya mauñjīdivase bhāgyakāmaḥ suguggulāndhārayasvātibhaktyā /
analyzed: vihāya mauñjī divase bhāgya kāmaḥ su guggulān dhārayasva atibhaktyā

original: suvāsinīḥ pūjayasvāśu bhaktyā gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpadīpaiḥ pratoṣya // GarP_3,28.92 //
analyzed: suvāsinīḥ pūjayasva āśu bhaktyā gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ dhūpa dīpaiḥ pratoṣya

original: varārtikyaṃ kāṃsyapātre nidhāya kurvārtikyaṃ devatādevatānām /
analyzed: vara ārtikyam kāṃsya pātre nidhāya kuru ārtikyam devatā devatānām

original: picumandapatrāṇi vitatya bhūmau namasva tvaṃ kṣamyatāṃ ceti coktvā // GarP_3,28.93 //
analyzed: picumanda patrāṇi vitatya bhūmau namasva tvam kṣamyatām ca iti ca uktvā

original: mahādevīṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ mā dadasvāpyathānnam /
analyzed: mahādevīm pūjayasva adya bhaktyā sat vaiṣṇavānām mā dadasva api atha annam

original: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yadi vānnaṃ dadāsi bhāgyaṃ ca te paśyato nāśameti // GarP_3,28.94 //
analyzed: sat vaiṣṇavānām yadi vā annam dadāsi bhāgyam ca te paśyataḥ nāśam eti

original: svavāmahaste veṇupātre nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste pate tvam /
analyzed: sva vāma haste veṇu pātre nidhāya dīpam dhṛtvā savya haste pate tvam

original: uttiṣṭha bhoḥ pañcagṛheṣu bhikṣāṃ kuruṣva samyak pravihāyaiva lajjām // GarP_3,28.95 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha bhoḥ pañcagṛheṣu bhikṣām kuruṣva samyak pravihāya eva lajjām

original: ādau gṛhe ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca kutvā jagadgopyaṃ bhojanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
analyzed: ādau gṛhe ṣaṣ rasa annam ca kutvā jagat gopyam bhojanam tvam kuruṣva

original: taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayitvā pate tvaṃ tāsāṃ ca re śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.96 //
analyzed: tad śeṣa annam bhojayitvā pate tvam tāsām ca re śaraṇam tvam kuruṣva

original: tāsaṃ hastaṃ pustake stāpayitvā trāhityevaṃ tanmukhairvācayasva /
analyzed: tāsam hastam pustake stāpayitvā trāhiti evam tad mukhaiḥ vācayasva

original: tvaṃ khaḍgadevaṃ pūjayasvādyabhartastatsevakānpūjayasvādya samyak // GarP_3,28.97 //
analyzed: tvam khaḍgadevam pūjayasva adya bhartar tad sevakān pūjayasva adya samyak

original: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānaśabdaṃ kuruṣva haridrācūrṇaṃsarvadā tvaṃ dadhasva /
analyzed: taiḥ sārdham tvam śvāna śabdam kuruṣva haridrā cūrṇam sarvadā tvam dadhasva

original: kuruṣva tvaṃ bhīmasenasya pūjāṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiścopacāraiḥ // GarP_3,28.98 //
analyzed: kuruṣva tvam bhīmasenasya pūjām pañcāmṛtaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ ca upacāraiḥ

original: tatkaupīnaṃ raupyajaṃ kārayitvā samarpayitvā dīpamālāṃ kuruṣva /
analyzed: tat kaupīnam raupya jam kārayitvā samarpayitvā dīpa mālām kuruṣva

original: taddāsavaryān bhojayasvādya bhaktyā garjasva tvaṃ bhīmabhīmeti suṣṭhu // GarP_3,28.99 //
analyzed: tad dāsa varyān bhojayasva adya bhaktyā garjasva tvam bhīma bhīma iti suṣṭhu

original: taddāsavaryānmodayasva svavastrairmadyairmāṃsadravyajālena nityam /
analyzed: tat dāsa varyān modayasva sva vastraiḥ madyaiḥ māṃsa dravya jālena nityam

original: mahādevaṃ pūjayasvādya samyag mahārudrairatirudraiśca samyak // GarP_3,28.100 //
analyzed: mahādevam pūjayasva adya samyak mahārudraiḥ atirudraiḥ ca samyak

original: haretyuktvā jaṅgamānpūjayasvaśaivāgame nipuṇāñchūdrajātān /
analyzed: hara iti uktvā jaṅgamān pūjayasva śaiva āgame nipuṇān śūdra jātān

original: śākaṃbharīṃ vivisaḥ sarvaśākānsupācayitvā ca gṛhe gṛhe ca // GarP_3,28.101 //
analyzed: śākaṃbharīm vivisaḥ sarva śākān su pācayitvā ca gṛhe gṛhe ca

original: dadasva bhaktyā paramādareṇa svalaṅkṛtya prāstuvaṃstadguṇāṃśca /
analyzed: dadasva bhaktyā parama ādareṇa su alaṅkṛtya prāstuvan tad guṇān ca

original: kulādevaṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā tvaṃ dṛgbhyāṃ vai taddine śaṃbhubuddhyā // GarP_3,28.102 //
analyzed: kulādevam pūjayasva adya bhaktyā tvam dṛgbhyām vai tad dine śaṃbhu buddhyā

original: tadbhaktavaryānpūjayasvādya samyak tatpādamūle vandanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
analyzed: tad bhakta varyān pūjayasva adya samyak tad pāda mūle vandanam tvam kuruṣva

original: supañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ pūjāṃ kuruṣva kṣīralājādikaiśca // GarP_3,28.103 //
analyzed: su pañcamyām mṛd mayīm śeṣa mūrtim pūjām kuruṣva kṣīra lāja ādikaiḥ ca

original: sunāgapāśaṃ hi gale ca baddhvā taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayerbhoḥ punastvam /
analyzed: sunāgapāśam hi gale ca baddhvā tad śeṣa annam bhojayeḥ bhoḥ punar tvam

original: dine caturthe bhoja yasvādya bhaktyā naivedyānnaṃ bhojayasvādya suṣṭhu // GarP_3,28.104 //
analyzed: dine caturthe bhoja yasva adya bhaktyā naivedya annam bhojayasva adya suṣṭhu

original: ityādikaṃ prerayitvā patiṃ sā jīvena naṣṭaṃ prikarotyeva nityam /
analyzed: ityādikam prerayitvā patim sā jīvena naṣṭam pri karoti eva nityam

original: tasyāḥ saṃgājjīvarūpaḥ patistvāṃ samyagdaṣṭāmihaloke paratra // GarP_3,28.105 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ saṃgāt jīva rūpaḥ patiḥ tvām samyak daṣṭām ihaloke paratra

original: tasyāḥ saṃgaṃ suvidūraṃ visṛjyaceṣṭvā samagraṃ kuru sarvadā tvam /
analyzed: tasyāḥ saṃgam su vidūram visṛjya ceṣṭvā samagram kuru sarvadā tvam

original: subuddhirūpā tvīrayantī jagāda bhajasva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,28.106 //
analyzed: su buddhi rūpā tu īrayantī jagāda bhajasva viṣṇum parama ādareṇa

original: hariṃ vinānyaṃ na bhajasva nityaṃ sā reṇukā tvāṃ tu na pālayiṣyati /
analyzed: harim vinā anyam na bhajasva nityam sā reṇukā tvām tu na pālayiṣyati

original: adṛṣṭanāmā haririve hi nityaṃ phalaprado yadi na syātkhagendra // GarP_3,28.107 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa nāmā hariḥ iva i hi nityam phala pradaḥ yadi na syāt khaga indra

original: jugupsitāṃ śrutyanuktāṃ ca devīṃ patidruhāṃ sarvadā sevayitvā /
analyzed: jugupsitām śruti anuktām ca devīm pati druhām sarvadā sevayitvā

original: tasyāḥ prasādātkuṣṭhabhagandarādyairbhuktvā duḥ khaṃ saṃyaminīṃ prayāhi // GarP_3,28.108 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ prasādāt kuṣṭha bhagaṃdara ādyaiḥ bhuktvā duḥ kham saṃyaminīm prayāhi

original: tadā kudavī kutra gatā vadasvame hyataḥ pate tvaṃ na bhajasva devīm /
analyzed: tadā kudavī kutra gatā vadasva ame hi atas pate tvam na bhajasva devīm

original: pate bhaja tvaṃ brāhmaṇānvaiṣṇavāṃśca saṃsāraduḥ khāttāransuṣṭhurūpān // GarP_3,28.109 //
analyzed: pate bhaja tvam brāhmaṇān vaiṣṇavān ca saṃsāra dus khāt tāran suṣṭhurūpān

original: sevādikaṃ pravīhāyaiva svacchaṃ māyādevyā bhajanātkiṃ vadasva /
analyzed: sevā ādikam svaccham māyādevyāḥ bhajanāt kim vadasva

original: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ hyalakṣmīṃ lakṣmīti buddhyā pūjayitvā ca samyak // GarP_3,28.110 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭha aṣṭamyām jyeṣṭha devīm hi alakṣmīm lakṣmī iti buddhyā pūjayitvā ca samyak

original: tasyāḥ sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā nānāduḥ khaṃ hyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam /
analyzed: tasyāḥ sūtram gala baddham ca kṛtvā nānā duḥkham hi anubhūyāḥ pate tvam

original: yadā pate yamādūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaiḥ kaśābhiḥ // GarP_3,28.111 //
analyzed: yadā pate yamāt ūtaiḥ ca pāśaiḥ baddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaiḥ kaśābhiḥ

original: tadā hyalakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
analyzed: tadā hi alakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate sā avataḥ mūlam viṣṇu pādam bhajasva

original: pate bhaja tvaṃ sarvadā vāyutattvaṃ na cāśrayestvaṃ sūkṣmaskandaṃ ca mūḍha // GarP_3,28.112 //
analyzed: pate bhaja tvam sarvadā vāyu tattvam na ca āśrayeḥ tvam sūkṣma skandam ca mūḍha

original: tadvattaṃ tvaṃ navanītaṃ ca bhaktyā taducchiṣṭaṃ bhakṣayitvā pate hi /
analyzed: tadvat tam tvam navanītam ca bhaktyā tat ucchiṣṭam bhakṣayitvā pate hi

original: tasyāśca sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā ihaiva duḥ khānyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam // GarP_3,28.113 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca sūtram gala baddham ca kṛtvā iha eva duḥ khāni anubhūyāḥ pate tvam

original: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
analyzed: yadā pate yamadūtaiḥ ca pāśaiḥ baddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ

original: tadā skandaḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.114 //
analyzed: tadā skandaḥ kutra palāyate saḥ avataḥ mūlam viṣṇu pādam bhajasva

original: dīpastaṃbhaṃ dāpayitvā pate tvaṃ sūtraṃ ca baddhvā svagale ca bhaktyā /
analyzed: dīpa staṃbham dāpayitvā pate tvam sūtram ca baddhvā sva gale ca bhaktyā

original: tadā baddhvā yamadūtaiśca pāśairdīpastaṃbhaistāḍyamānastu samyak // GarP_3,28.115 //
analyzed: tadā baddhvā yamadūtaiḥ ca pāśaiḥ dīpa staṃbhaiḥ tāḍyamānaḥ tu samyak

original: dīpastaṃbhaḥ kutra palāyitobhūdato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
analyzed: dīpa staṃbhaḥ kutra palāyitaḥ bhūt atas mūlam viṣṇu pādam bhajasva

original: lakṣmīdine pūjayitvā ca lakṣmīṃ sūtraṃ tasyāḥ svagale dhāraya tvam // GarP_3,28.116 //
analyzed: lakṣmīdine pūjayitvā ca lakṣmīm sūtram tasyāḥ sva gale dhāraya tvam

original: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbadhvā samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
analyzed: yadā pate yamadūtaiḥ ca pāśaiḥ badhvā samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ

original: tadā lakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.117 //
analyzed: tadā lakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate sā avataḥ mūlam viṣṇu pādam bhajasva

original: vivāhamaiñjīdivase mūḍhabuddhe jugusitāndhārayitvā subhaktyā /
analyzed: vivāha maiñjī divase mūḍhabuddhe jugusitān dhārayitvā su bhaktyā

original: varārārtikaṃ kāṃsyapātre nidhāya kṛtvārtikyaṃ udaudaiti śabdam // GarP_3,28.118 //
analyzed: varārārtikam kāṃsya pātre nidhāya kṛtvā ārtikyam śabdam

original: tathaiva daṣṭvā picumandasya patraṃ sunartayitvā paramādareṇa /
analyzed: tathā eva daṣṭvā picumandasya patram su nartayitvā parama ādareṇa

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvābaddhvā tāḍyamānaśca samyak // GarP_3,28.119 //
analyzed: yadā tadā yamadūtaiḥ ca pāśaiḥ baddhvā a baddhvā tāḍyamānaḥ ca samyak

original: tava svāminkuladevo mahātmanpalāyitaḥ kutra me tadvadasva /
analyzed: tava svāmin kuladevaḥ mahātman palāyitaḥ kutra me tat vadasva

original: svadehānāṃ pūjayitvā ca samyakkaṇṭhābharaṇairvidhurāṇāṃ ca keśaiḥ // GarP_3,28.120 //
analyzed: sva dehānām pūjayitvā ca samyak kaṇṭha ābharaṇaiḥ vidhurāṇām ca keśaiḥ

original: saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtā baliṣṭhā saṃtāḍyamāne musalairbhindipālaiḥ /
analyzed: saṃtiṣṭhamāne yama dūtā baliṣṭhā saṃtāḍyamāne musalaiḥ bhindipālaiḥ

original: yadā tadā kutra palāyitā sā keśairvihīnā laṃbakarṇaṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,28.121 //
analyzed: yadā tadā kutra palāyitā sā keśaiḥ vihīnā laṃba karṇam ca kṛtvā

original: svavāmahaste veṇupātraṃ nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste ca mūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: sva vāma haste veṇu pātram nidhāya dīpam dhṛtvā savya haste ca mūḍhaḥ

original: gṛhegṛhe bhaikṣacaryāṃ ca kṛtvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhaṃ caiva devī // GarP_3,28.122 //
analyzed: gṛhe gṛhe bhaikṣa caryām ca kṛtvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne sva gṛham ca eva devī

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca mūḍha dīpaiḥ sahasrairdahyamānaśca samyak /
analyzed: yadā tadā yamadūtaiḥ ca mūḍha dīpaiḥ sahasraiḥ dahyamānaḥ ca samyak

original: nirnāsikā reṇukā mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra sā me vadasva // GarP_3,28.123 //
analyzed: nirnāsikā reṇukā mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra sā me vadasva

original: sadā mūḍhaṃ khaḍgadevaṃ ca bhaktyā taṃ bhaktavatpūjayitvā ca samyak /
analyzed: sadā mūḍham khaḍgadevam ca bhaktyā tam bhakta vat pūjayitvā ca samyak

original: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānavadgarjayitvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhe caiva nityam // GarP_3,28.124 //
analyzed: taiḥ sārdham tvam śvāna vat garjayitvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne sva gṛhe ca eva nityam

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamānastatra śabdaṃ prakurvan /
analyzed: yadā tadā yamadūtaiḥ ca samyak saṃtāḍyamānaḥ tatra śabdam prakurvan

original: saṃtiṣṭhamāne bhaktavaryaṃ vihāya tadā devaḥ kutra palāyitobhūt // GarP_3,28.125 //
analyzed: saṃtiṣṭhamāne bhakta varyam vihāya tadā devaḥ kutra palāyitaḥ bhūt

original: sa pārthakyādbhīmasenapratīkaṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ pūjayitvā ca samyak /
analyzed: sa pārthakyāt bhīmasena pratīkam pañcāmṛtaiḥ pūjayitvā ca samyak

original: suvyañjane cānnakaupīnameva dattvā mūḍhastiṣṭhamāne svagehe // GarP_3,28.126 //
analyzed: su vyañjane ca anna kaupīnam eva dattvā mūḍhaḥ tiṣṭhamāne sva gehe

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne yamamārge ca mūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tadā yama dūtaiḥ ca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne yama mārge ca mūḍhaḥ

original: bhīmaḥ sa vai kutra palāyitobhūto mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.127 //
analyzed: bhīmaḥ sa vai kutra mūlam viṣṇu pādam bhajasva

original: mahādevaṃ pūjayitvā ca samyak haretyuktvā svagṛhe vidyamāne /
analyzed: mahādevam pūjayitvā ca samyak hara iti uktvā sva gṛhe vidyamāne

original: yadā gṛhaṃ dahyate vahninā tu tadā haraḥ kutra palāyitobhūt // GarP_3,28.128 //
analyzed: yadā gṛham dahyate vahninā tu tadā haraḥ kutra

original: śākaṃ bharīdivase sarvameva śākaṃbharī sā ca devī mahātman /
analyzed: śākam bharī divase sarvam eva śākaṃbharī sā ca devī mahātman

original: palāyitā kutra me tvaṃ vadasva kulāladevaṃ pūjayitvā ca bhaktyā // GarP_3,28.129 //
analyzed: palāyitā kutra me tvam vadasva kulāladevam pūjayitvā ca bhaktyā

original: kārpāsaṃ vai tena dattaṃ gṛhītvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtaiśca samyak /
analyzed: kārpāsam vai tena dattam gṛhītvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtaiḥ ca samyak

original: saṃhanyamānastīkṣaṇadhāraiḥ kuṭhāraiḥ kulāladevaṃ ca sudaṃṣṭranetram /
analyzed: saṃhanyamānaḥ tīkṣaṇa dhāraiḥ kuṭhāraiḥ kulāla devam ca sudaṃṣṭra netram

original: vihāya vai kutra palāyitobhūnna jñāyate 'nveṣaṇāccāpi kena // GarP_3,28.1130 //
analyzed: vihāya vai kutra palāyitaḥ bhūt na jñāyate nu eṣaṇāt ca api kena

original: yadā pañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ saṃpūjya bhaktyā vidyamāne svagehe /
analyzed: yadā pañcamyām mṛd mayīm śeṣa mūrtim saṃpūjya bhaktyā vidyamāne sva gehe

original: tadā baddhvā yamadūtāśca samyak saṃnahyamāne nāgapāśaiścabaddhvā // GarP_3,28.131 //
analyzed: tadā baddhvā yama dūtāḥ ca samyak saṃnahyamāne nāgapāśaiḥ ca baddhvā

original: svabhaktavaryaṃ pravihāya nāgaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra vai saṃvada tvam /
analyzed: sva bhakta varyam pravihāya nāgaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra vai saṃvada tvam

original: dūrvāṅkurairmodakaiḥ pūjayitvā vināyakaṃ pañcakhādyaistathaiva // GarP_3,28.132 //
analyzed: dūrvā aṅkuraiḥ modakaiḥ pūjayitvā vināyakam pañca khādyaiḥ tathā eva

original: saṃtiṣṭhaṃmāne yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne taptadaṇḍaiśca mūḍha /
analyzed: saṃtiṣṭhaṃmāne yamadūtaiḥ ca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne tapta daṇḍaiḥ ca mūḍha

original: dantaṃ vihāyaiva ca vighnarājaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra me taṃ vadatvam // GarP_3,28.133 //
analyzed: dantam vihāya eva ca vighna rājaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra me tam vadatvam

original: vivāhakāle piṣṭadevīṃ subhaktyā saṃpūjayitvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
analyzed: vivāha kāle piṣṭadevīm su bhaktyā saṃpūjayitvā vidyamānaḥ gṛhe sve

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃpīḍyamāno yamamārge sa mūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,28.134 //
analyzed: yadā tadā yama dūtaiḥ ca baddhvā saṃpīḍyamānaḥ yama mārge sa mūḍhaḥ

original: viṣṭhādevī pīḍyamānaṃ ca bhaktaṃ vihāya sā kutra palāyitābhūt /
analyzed: viṣṭhā devī pīḍyamānam ca bhaktam vihāya sā kutra palāyitā abhūt

original: vivāhakāle rajakasya gehaṃ gatvā samyak prārthayitvā ca mūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,28.135 //
analyzed: vivāha kāle rajakasya geham gatvā samyak prārthayitvā ca mūḍhaḥ

original: yastaṃbhasūtraṃ kalaśe parītya pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
analyzed: yaḥ staṃbha sūtram kalaśe parītya pūjām kṛtvā vidyamānaḥ gṛhe sve

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaśca samyak taṃ staṃbhasūtraṃ tasya mukhe nidhāya // GarP_3,28.136 //
analyzed: yadā tadā yama dūtaḥ ca samyak tam staṃbha sūtram tasya mukhe nidhāya

original: saṃtāḍyamāne saṃtabhasūtrasthadevī palāyitā kutra me saṃvadasva /
analyzed: saṃtāḍyamāne saṃtabha sūtra stha devī palāyitā kutra me saṃvadasva

original: vivāhakāle pūjayitvā ca samyak caṇḍāladevīṃ bhaktavaśyāṃ ca tasyāḥ // GarP_3,28.137 //
analyzed: vivāha kāle pūjayitvā ca samyak caṇḍāladevīm bhakta vaśyām ca tasyāḥ

original: tadbhaktavaryaiḥ śūrpamadhye ca tīre saṃsevayitvā vidyamāno gṛhesve /
analyzed: tad bhakta varyaiḥ śūrpa madhye ca tīre saṃsevayitvā vidyamānaḥ gṛhesve

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāno yamamārge mahadbhiḥ // GarP_3,28.138 //
analyzed: yadā tadā yama dūtaiḥ ca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamānaḥ yama mārge mahadbhiḥ

original: cūledavī kva palāyitābhūtsumūḍhabuddhe viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
analyzed: cūledavī kva palāyitā abhūt su mūḍha buddhe viṣṇu pādam bhajasva

original: jvarādibhiḥ pīḍyamāne svaputre gṛhe sthitaṃ brahmadevaṃ ca samyak // GarP_3,28.139 //
analyzed: jvara ādibhiḥ pīḍyamāne sva putre gṛhe sthitam brahmadevam ca samyak

original: dhūrpairdīpairbhakṣyabhojyaiśca puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamānaśca gehe /
analyzed: dhūrpaiḥ dīpaiḥ bhakṣya bhojyaiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ pūjām kṛtvā vidyamānaḥ ca gehe

original: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāne veṇupāśādibhiśca // GarP_3,28.140 //
analyzed: yadā tadā yamadūtaiḥ ca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāne veṇu pāśa ādibhiḥ ca

original: sa brahmadevaḥ kva palāyitobhūtsumūḍhabuddhe viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
analyzed: sa brahmadevaḥ kva palāyitaḥ bhūt su mūḍha buddhe viṣṇu pādam bhajasva

original: santānārthaṃ bṛhatīṃ pūjayitvā galena baddhvā bṛhatīṃ vai phalaṃ ca // GarP_3,28.141 //
analyzed: santāna artham bṛhatīm pūjayitvā galena baddhvā bṛhatīm vai phalam ca

original: saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāne bṛhatīkaṇṭakaiśca /
analyzed: saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtaiḥ ca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāne bṛhatī kaṇṭakaiḥ ca

original: tadā devī bṛhatī mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra me tadvada tvam // GarP_3,28.142 //
analyzed: tadā devī bṛhatī mūḍha buddhe palāyitā kutra me tat vada tvam

original: bhajasva mūḍha paradaivataṃ ca nārāyaṇaṃ tārakaṃ sarvaduḥ khāt /
analyzed: bhajasva mūḍha para daivatam ca nārāyaṇam tārakam sarva duḥ khāt

original: sukṣudradeveṣu matiṃ ca mā kuru na ca śṛṇu tvaṃ phalguvākyaṃ tathaiva // GarP_3,28.143 //
analyzed: su kṣudra deveṣu matim ca mā kuru na ca śṛṇu tvam phalgu vākyam tathā eva

original: sukṣudradevān bhindipāle nidhāya visarjayitvā dūradeśe mahātman /
analyzed: su kṣudra devān bhindipāle nidhāya visarjayitvā dūra deśe mahātman

original: saṃdhārya tvaṃ svakulācāradharmaṃ saṃpātane narakaṃ hetubhūtam // GarP_3,28.144 //
analyzed: saṃdhārya tvam sva kula ācāra dharmam saṃpātane narakam hetu bhūtam

original: punīhi gātraṃ sarvadā mūḍhabuddhe mantrāṣṭakairjanmatīrthe pavitre /
analyzed: punīhi gātram sarvadā mūḍha buddhe mantra aṣṭakaiḥ janmatīrthe pavitre

original: hṛdi sthitāṃmārairvyamudrāṃ vihāya kṛtvābhūṣāṃ viṣṇumudrābhiragryām // GarP_3,28.145 //
analyzed: hṛdi vihāya kṛtvā ābhūṣām viṣṇu mudrābhiḥ agryām

original: sadā mūḍho harivārtāṃ bhajasva hyāyurgataṃ vyarthamevaṃ kubuddhyā /
analyzed: sadā mūḍhaḥ hari vārtām bhajasva hi āyuḥ gatam vyartham evam ku buddhyā

original: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ saṃgamo durlabhaśca kṣubdhaṃ jñānaṃ tāratamyasvarūpam // GarP_3,28.146 //
analyzed: sat vaiṣṇavānām saṃgamaḥ durlabhaḥ ca kṣubdham jñānam tāratamya svarūpam

original: hariṃ guruṃ hyanusṛtyaiva satyaṃ gatiṃ svakīyāṃ tena jānīhi mūḍha /
analyzed: harim gurum hi anusṛtya eva satyam gatim svakīyām tena jānīhi mūḍha

original: dagdhvā duṣṭāṃ buddhimevaṃ ca mūḍha subuddhirūpaṃ mā bhajasvaiva nityam // GarP_3,28.147 //
analyzed: dagdhvā duṣṭām buddhim evam ca mūḍha su buddhi rūpam mā bhajasva eva nityam

original: mayā sārdhaṃ sadguruṃ prāpya samyagvairāgyapūrvaṃ tattvamātraṃ viditvā /
analyzed: mayā sārdham sat gurum prāpya samyak vairāgya pūrvam tattva mātram viditvā

original: tenaiva mokṣaṃ prāpnumo nārjavairyattāryā viṣṇoḥ saṃprasādācca lakṣmyāḥ // GarP_3,28.148 //
analyzed: tena eva mokṣam prāpnumaḥ na ārjavaiḥ yat tāryāḥ viṣṇoḥ saṃprasādāt ca lakṣmyāḥ

original: ityāśayaṃ manasā sannidhāya tathā coktaṃ bhaktavaryo madīyaḥ /
analyzed: iti āśayam manasā sannidhāya tathā ca uktam bhakta varyaḥ madīyaḥ

original: ato bhaktaḥ pravahetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa vīndra prakṛtaṃ taṃ śṛṇu tvam // GarP_3,28.149 //
analyzed: atas bhaktaḥ pravaha iti eva saṃjñām avāpa vi indra prakṛtam tam śṛṇu tvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tāratamyanirūpaṇadvārā viṣṇorevopāsyatvamityarthanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tāratamya nirūpaṇa dvārā viṣṇoḥ eva upāsya tvam ityarthanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭāviṃśatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 29
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: pravahānantarānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama /
analyzed: pravaha anantara anvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: yo dharmo brahmaṇaḥ putro hyādisṛṣṭau tvagudbhavaḥ // GarP_3,29.1 //
analyzed: yaḥ dharmaḥ brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ hi ādi sṛṣṭau tvac udbhavaḥ

original: sajjanānsaumyarūpeṇa dhāraṇāddharmanāmakaḥ /
analyzed: sat janān saumya rūpeṇa dhāraṇāt dharma nāmakaḥ

original: sa eva sūryaputrobhūdyamasaṃjñāmavāpa saḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva sūrya putraḥ bhūt yama saṃjñām avāpa saḥ

original: pāpināṃ śikṣakattvātsa yama ityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,29.2 //
analyzed: pāpinām śikṣaka tvāt sa yamaḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca /
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: prahlādānantaraṃ gaṅgā bhāryā vai varuṇasya ca /
analyzed: prahlāda anantaram gaṅgā bhāryā vai varuṇasya ca

original: prahlādādadhamā jñeyā mahimnā varuṇādhikā // GarP_3,29.3 //
analyzed: prahlādāt adhamā jñeyā mahimnā varuṇa adhikā

original: svarūpādadhamā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: svarūpāt adhamā jñeyā na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: jñānasvarūpadaṃ viṣṇuṃ yamo jānāti sarvadā // GarP_3,29.4 //
analyzed: jñāna sva rūpa dam viṣṇum yamaḥ jānāti sarvadā

original: ato gaṅgeti sā jñeyā sarvadā lokapāvanī /
analyzed: atas gaṅgā iti sā jñeyā sarvadā loka pāvanī

original: bhaktyā viṣṇupadītyeva kīrtitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,29.5 //
analyzed: bhaktyā viṣṇupadī iti eva kīrtitā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: yā pūrvakāle yajñaliṅgasya viṣṇoḥ sākṣāddharervikramataḥ khagendra /
analyzed: yā pūrva kāle yajña liṅgasya viṣṇoḥ sākṣāt hareḥ vikramataḥ khaga indra

original: vāmasya pādasya nakhāgrataśca nirbhidya cordhvāṇḍakaṭāhakhaṇḍam // GarP_3,29.6 //
analyzed: vāmasya pādasya nakha agrataḥ ca nirbhidya ca ūrdhva aṇḍa kaṭāha khaṇḍam

original: tadudaramativegātsampraviśyāvahantīṃ jagadaghatatihantuḥ pādakiñjalkaśuddhām /
analyzed: tad udaram ativegāt sampraviśya āvahantīm jagat agha tati hantuḥ pāda kiñjalka śuddhām

original: nikhilamalanihantrīṃ darśanātsparśanācca sakṛdavagahanādvā bhaktidāṃ viṣṇupāde /
analyzed: nikhila mala nihantrīm darśanāt sparśanāt ca sakṛt avagahanāt vā bhakti dām viṣṇu pāde

original: śaśikaravaragaurāṃ mīnanetrāṃ supūjyāṃ smarati haripadotthāṃ mokṣameti krameṇa // GarP_3,29.7 //
analyzed: śaśi kara vara gaurām mīna netrām su pūjyām smarati hari pada utthām mokṣam eti krameṇa

original: indropi vāyukaramarditavāyukūṭabinduṃ ca prāśya śirasi hyasahiṣṇumānaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ api vāyu kara mardita vāyukūṭa bindum ca prāśya śirasi hi a sahiṣṇu mānaḥ

original: bhāgīrathī haripadāṅkamiti sma nityaṃ jānanmahāparamabhāgavatapradhānaḥ /
analyzed: bhāgīrathī hari pada aṅkam iti sma nityam jānan mahā parama bhāgavata pradhānaḥ

original: bhaktyā ca khinnahṛdayaḥ paramādareṇa dhṛtvā svamūrdhni paramo hyaśivaḥ śivo 'bhūt // GarP_3,29.8 //
analyzed: bhaktyā ca khinna hṛdayaḥ parama ādareṇa dhṛtvā sva mūrdhni paramaḥ hi aśivaḥ śivaḥ bhūt

original: bhāgīrathyāśca catvāri rūpāṇyāsankhageśvara /
analyzed: bhāgīrathyāḥ ca catvāri rūpāṇi āsan khageśvara

original: mahābhiṣagjanendrasya bhāryā tu hyabhiṣecanī // GarP_3,29.9 //
analyzed: mahā bhiṣaj jana indrasya bhāryā tu hi abhiṣecanī

original: dvitīyenaiva rūpeṇa gaṅgā bhāryā ca śantanoḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyena eva rūpeṇa gaṅgā bhāryā ca śantanoḥ

original: suṣeṇā vai suṣeṇasya bhāryā sā vānarī smṛtā // GarP_3,29.10 //
analyzed: suṣeṇā vai suṣeṇasya bhāryā sā vānarī smṛtā

original: maṇḍūkabhāryā gaṅgā tu saiva maṇḍūkinī smṛtā /
analyzed: maṇḍūka bhāryā gaṅgā tu sā eva maṇḍūkinī smṛtā

original: evaṃ catvārī rūpāṇi gaṅgāyā iti kirtitamam // GarP_3,29.11 //
analyzed: evam catvāri rūpāṇi gaṅgāyāḥ iti kirtitamam

original: ādityāccaiva gaṅgātaḥ parjanyaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ādityāt ca eva gaṅgātaḥ parjanyaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: pravarṣati suvairāgyaṃ hyataḥ parjanyanāmakam // GarP_3,29.12 //
analyzed: pravarṣati suvairāgyam hi atas parjanya nāmakam

original: śaraṃvarāya pañcajanyācca pañca hitvā jagdhvā garvakaṃ ṣaṭkrameṇa /
analyzed: śaraṃvarāya pañcajanyāt ca pañca hitvā jagdhvā garvakam ṣaṣ krameṇa

original: svabāṇasya svahṛdi saṃsthitasya bhajetsadā naiva bhaktiṃ viṣaṃ ca // GarP_3,29.13 //
analyzed: sva bāṇasya sva hṛdi saṃsthitasya bhajet sadā nā eva bhaktim viṣam ca

original: liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ naiva kāryaṃ sadaiva liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ kāryamevaṃ sadāpi /
